tika-vin04t:1340_5: Ito paraṃ pana yattha anupaññatti atthi, tattha “ayaṃ anupaññattī”ti ettakameva dassayissāma.
tika-vin04t:1340_6: Ṭhapetvā pana anupaññattiṃ avasesā paññattiyevāti sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1340_7: Bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uppannavatthusmiṃyeva “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1340_8: paṭiseveyyā”ti evaṃ bhikkhunīnampi paññattito sādhāraṇapaññatti. Āṇattiyā anāpajjanato
tika-vin04t:1340_9: anāṇattikaṃ. Bhikkhuṃ pana āṇāpento akappiyasamādānāpattito na muccati, methunarāgena
tika-vin04t:1340_10: kāyasaṃsagge dukkaṭaṃ, jīvamānakasarīrassa vuttappakāre magge sacepi tacādīni anavasesetvā
tika-vin04t:1340_11: sabbaso chinne nimittasaṇṭhānamattaṃ paññāyati, tattha antamaso aṅgajāte uṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin04t:1340_12: anaṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ pīḷakaṃ vā cammakhilaṃ vā pavesentassāpi sevanacitte sati pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1340_13: naṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ sukkhapīḷakaṃ vā matacammaṃ vā lomaṃ vā pavesentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1340_14: sace nimittasaṇṭhānamattampi anavasesetvā sabbaso maggo uppāṭito, tattha upakkamato
tika-vin04t:1340_16: satthakena katavaṇe vā, hatthiassādīnañca tiracchānānaṃ vatthikosanāsāpuṭesu thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1340_17: Tiracchānānaṃ pana akkhikaṇṇanāsāvaṇesu ahimacchādīnaṃ pavesanappamāṇavirahite aṇunimitte
tika-vin04t:1340_18: sabbesañca upakacchakādīsu sesasarīresu dukkaṭaṃ. Matasarīre nimitte upaḍḍhakkhāyitato
tika-vin04t:1340_19: paṭṭhāya yāva na kuthitaṃ hoti, tāva thullaccayaṃ. Kuthite dukkaṭaṃ, tathā vaṭṭakate
tika-vin04t:1340_20: mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Oṭṭhato bahi nikkhantajivhāya
tika-vin04t:1340_21: vā dantesu vā thullaccayaṃ. Nimittato bahi patitamaṃsapesiyaṃ dukkaṭanti ayamettha āpattibhedo.
tika-vin04t:1341_0: Ajānantassa asādiyantassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikānañca
tika-vin04t:1341_1: anāpatti. Ettha pana yo niddaṃ okkantattā parena katampi upakkamaṃ na jānāti, so
tika-vin04t:1341_2: ajānanto. Yo jānitvāpi na sādiyati, so asādiyanto. Yo pittavasena atekicchaṃ ummādaṃ
tika-vin04t:1341_3: patto, so ummattako. Yakkhehi katacittavikkhepo khittacitto. Dvinnampi ca etesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1341_4: aggisuvaṇṇagūthacandanādīsu samappavattibhāvena ajānanabhāvova pamāṇaṃ. Yo adhimattavedanāya
tika-vin04t:1341_5: āturattā kiñci na jānāti, so vedanāṭṭo. Yo tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ādibhūto, so
tika-vin04t:1341_6: ādikammiko. Ayaṃ pana anāpatti. Catūsu vipattīsu sīlavipatti. Tassā dve aṅgāni sevanacittañca
tika-vin04t:1341_7: maggena maggapaṭipādanañcāti. Samuṭṭhānādito idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1341_8: kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dvivedananti,
tika-vin04t:1341_9: imāni ca samuṭṭhānādīni nāma āpattiyā honti, na sikkhāpadassa. Vohārasukhatthaṃ pana
tika-vin04t:1341_10: sabbaṭṭhakathāsu sikkhāpadasīsena desanā āgatā, tasmā aññesupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu
tika-vin04t:1348_0: Dutiye gāmā vā araññāvāti ettha sabbopi ekakuṭikādibhedo parikkhitto vā aparikkhitto
tika-vin04t:1348_1: vā samanusso vā amanusso vā antamaso atirekacātumāsaniviṭṭho yo koci satthopi “gāmo”ti
tika-vin04t:1348_2: veditabbo. Ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāma. Tattha asammohatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1348_3: gharaṃ gharūpacāro gāmo gāmūpacāroti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Nibbakosassa hi udakapatanaṭṭhānabbhantaraṃ
tika-vin04t:1348_4: gharaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana dvāre ṭhito mātugāmo bhājanadhovanaudakaṃ chaḍḍeti, tassa patanaṭṭhānañca
tika-vin04t:1348_5: mātugāmeneva antogehe ṭhitena pakatiyā bahi khittassa suppassa vā saṃmuñjaniyā vā
tika-vin04t:1348_6: patanaṭṭhānañca gharassa purato dvīsu koṇesu sambandhitvā majjhe rukkhasūcidvāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1348_7: ṭhapetvā gorūpānaṃ pavesananivāraṇatthaṃ kataparikkhepo ca ayaṃ sabbopi gharūpacāro
tika-vin04t:1348_8: nāma. Yaṃ pana sabbantimaṃ gharaṃ hoti, tassa gharassa tādise gharūpacāre ṭhitassa
tika-vin04t:1348_9: thāmamajjhimassa purisassa yathā taruṇamanussā attano balaṃ dassento bāhuṃ pasāretvā
tika-vin04t:1348_10: leḍḍuṃ khipanti, evaṃ khittassa leḍḍussa patanaṭṭhānabbhantaraṃ gāmo nāma. Tato aññassa
tika-vin04t:1348_11: leḍḍupātassa abbhantaraṃ gāmūpacāro nāma. Patitassa pana leḍḍuno pavattitvā gataṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1348_12: na gahetabbaṃ. Parikkhittassa pana gāmassa parikkhepoyeva gāmassa paricchedo, tassa
tika-vin04t:1348_13: sace dve indakhilā honti abbhantarime indakhile ṭhitassa leḍḍupātabbhantaraṃ gāmūpacāro
tika-vin04t:1348_14: nāma. Padabhājanepi hi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Tattha yvāyaṃ aparikkhittassa
tika-vin04t:1348_15: gāmassa upacāro dassito, tassa vasena vikāle gāmappavesanādīsu āpatti paricchinditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1348_16: Iti imaṃ ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ imasmiṃ sikkhāpade araññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1348_17: Desanāmattameva cetaṃ “gāmā vā araññāvā”ti. Ye pana imesaṃ paricchedadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1348_18: gharagharūpacāragāmūpacārā vuttā, tatopi pārājikavatthuṃ avaharantassa pārājikaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1349_0: Adinnanti aññassa manussajātikassa santakaṃ. Theyyasaṅkhātanti ettha thenoti coro,
tika-vin04t:1349_1: thenassa bhāvo theyyaṃ, avaharaṇacittassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Saṅkhā saṅkhātanti atthato ekaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1349_2: koṭṭhāsassetaṃ nāmaṃ “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā”tiādīsu viya. Theyyañca taṃ saṅkhātañcāti
tika-vin04t:1349_3: theyyasaṅkhātaṃ, theyyacittasaṅkhāto eko cittakoṭṭhāsoti attho. Karaṇatthe cetaṃ
tika-vin04t:1349_4: paccattavacanaṃ, tasmā theyyasaṅkhātenāti atthato daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yo ca theyyasaṅkhātena
tika-vin04t:1349_5: ādiyati, so yasmā theyyacitto hoti, tasmā byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā atthameva dassetuṃ
tika-vin04t:1350_0: Ādiyeyyāti pañcavīsatiyā avahārānaṃ aññataravasena hareyya. Te pana avahārā pañca
tika-vin04t:1350_1: pañcakāni samodhānetvā sādhukaṃ sallakkhetabbā. Pañca pañcakāni nāma nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1350_3: Tattha purimāni dve pañcakāni etasseva padassa padabhājane vuttānaṃ “ādiyeyya hareyya
tika-vin04t:1350_4: avahareyya iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyya ṭhānā cāveyyā”ti imesaṃ padānaṃ vasena labbhanti.
tika-vin04t:1350_5: Tattha nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ saviññāṇakāviññāṇakavasena daṭṭhabbaṃ, itaraṃ saviññāṇakavaseneva.
tika-vin04t:1350_6: Kathaṃ? Ādiyeyyāti ārāmaṃ abhiyuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Sāmikassa vimatiṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin04t:1350_7: āpatti thullaccayassa. Sāmiko “na mayhaṃ bhavissatī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati, āpatti
tika-vin04t:1350_8: pārājikassa. Hareyyāti aññassa bhaṇḍaṃ haranto sīse bhāraṃ theyyacitto āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1350_9: Phandāpeti, thullaccayaṃ. Khandhaṃ oropeti, pārājikaṃ. Avahareyyāti upanikkhittaṃ
tika-vin04t:1350_10: bhaṇḍaṃ “dehi me bhaṇḍa”nti vuccamāno “nāhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti bhaṇati, dukkaṭaṃ. Sāmikassa
tika-vin04t:1350_11: vimatiṃ uppādeti, thullaccayaṃ. Sāmiko “na mayhaṃ bhavissatī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1350_12: pārājikaṃ. Iriyāpathaṃ vikopeyyāti “saha bhaṇḍahārakaṃ nessāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ
tika-vin04t:1350_13: atikkāmeti, thullaccayaṃ. Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmeti, pārājikaṃ. Ṭhānā cāveyyāti thalaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1350_14: bhaṇḍaṃ theyyacitto āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ. Phandāpeti, thullaccayaṃ. Ṭhānā cāveti, pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1350_15: Evaṃ tāva nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sasāmikassa pana dāsassa vā tiracchānagatassa
tika-vin04t:1351_0: Katamaṃ sāhatthikapañcakaṃ? Sāhatthiko āṇattiko nissaggiyo atthasādhako dhuranikkhepoti.
tika-vin04t:1351_1: Tattha sāhatthiko nāma parassa bhaṇḍaṃ sahatthā avaharati. Āṇattiko nāma “asukassa
tika-vin04t:1351_2: bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpeti. Nissaggiyo nāma suṅkaghātakaparikappitokāsānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1351_3: anto ṭhatvā bahi pātanaṃ. Atthasādhako nāma “asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkoti, tadā
tika-vin04t:1351_4: taṃ avaharā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpeti. Tattha sace paro anantarāyiko hutvā taṃ avaharati,
tika-vin04t:1351_5: āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ. Parassa vā pana telakumbhiyā pādagghanakatelaṃ
tika-vin04t:1351_6: avassaṃ pivanakāni upāhanādīni pakkhipati, hatthato muttamatteyeva pārājikaṃ. Dhuranikkhepo
tika-vin04t:1352_0: Katamaṃ pubbapayogapañcakaṃ? Pubbapayogo sahapayogo saṃvidhāvahāro saṅketakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1352_1: nimittakammanti. Tattha āṇattivasena pubbapayogo veditabbo. Ṭhānā cāvanavasena, khilādīni
tika-vin04t:1352_2: saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo. Saṃvidhāvahāro nāma “asukaṃ
tika-vin04t:1352_3: nāma bhaṇḍaṃ avaharissāmā”ti saṃvidahitvā saṃmantayitvā avaharaṇaṃ. Evaṃ saṃvidahitvā
tika-vin04t:1352_4: gatesu hi ekenāpi tasmiṃ bhaṇḍe ṭhānā cāvite sabbesaṃ avahārā honti. Saṅketakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1352_5: nāma sañjānanakammaṃ. Sace hi purebhattādīsu yaṃkiñci kālaṃ paricchinditvā “asukasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1352_6: kāle itthannāmaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti vutto saṅketato apacchā apure taṃ avaharati,
tika-vin04t:1352_7: saṅketakārakassa saṅketakaraṇakkhaṇeyeva avahāro. Nimittakammaṃ nāma saññuppādanatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1352_8: akkhinikkhaṇādinimittakaraṇaṃ. Sace hi evaṃ katanimittato apacchā apure “yaṃ avaharā”ti
tika-vin04t:1352_9: vutto, taṃ avaharati, nimittakārakassa nimittakaraṇakkhaṇeyeva avahāroti idaṃ pubbapayogapañcakaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1353_0: Katamaṃ theyyāvahārapañcakaṃ? Theyyāvahāro pasayhāvahāro parikappāvahāro paṭicchannāvahāro
tika-vin04t:1353_1: kusāvahāroti. Tattha yo sandhicchedādīni katvā adissamāno avaharati, kūṭamānakūṭakahāpaṇādīhi
tika-vin04t:1353_2: vā vañcetvā gaṇhāti, tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro theyyāvahāroti veditabbo. Yo pana pasayha
tika-vin04t:1353_3: balakkārena paresaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhāti gāmaghātakādayo viya, attano pattabalito vā
tika-vin04t:1353_4: vuttanayeneva adhikaṃ gaṇhāti rājabhaṭādayo viya, tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro pasayhāvahāroti
tika-vin04t:1353_5: veditabbo. Parikappetvā gahaṇaṃ pana parikappāvahāro nāma. So bhaṇḍokāsavasena duvidho.
tika-vin04t:1353_6: Tatrāyaṃ bhaṇḍaparikappo – sāṭakatthiko antogabbhaṃ pavisitvā “sace sāṭako bhavissati,
tika-vin04t:1353_7: gaṇhissāmi, sace suttaṃ, na gaṇhissāmī”ti parikappetvā andhakāre pasibbakaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1353_8: tatra ce sāṭako hoti, uddhāreyeva pārājikaṃ. Suttaṃ ce hoti, rakkhati. Bahi nīharitvā
tika-vin04t:1353_9: muñcitvā “sutta”nti ñatvā puna āharitvā ṭhapeti, rakkhatiyeva. “Sutta”nti ñatvāpi
tika-vin04t:1353_10: “yaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ gahetabba”nti gacchati, padavārena kāretabbo. Bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:1353_11: gaṇhāti, uddhāre pārājikaṃ. “Coro coro”ti anubandho chaṭṭetvā palāyati, rakkhati.
tika-vin04t:1353_12: Sāmikā disvā gaṇhanti, rakkhati yeva. Añño ce koci gaṇhāti, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Sāmikesu
tika-vin04t:1353_13: nivattesu sayaṃ disvā paṃsukūlasaññāya “pagevetaṃ mayā gahitaṃ, mama dāni santaka”nti
tika-vin04t:1353_14: gaṇhantassāpi bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Tattha yvāyaṃ “sace sāṭako bhavissati, gaṇhissāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin04t:1353_15: nayena pavatto parikappo, ayaṃ bhaṇḍaparikappo nāma.
tika-vin04t:1354_0: Okāsaparikappo pana evaṃ veditabbo – ekacco pana parapariveṇādīni paviṭṭho kiñci
tika-vin04t:1354_2: paricchedaṃ katvā “sace maṃ etthantare passissanti, daṭṭhukāmatāya gahetvā vicaranto
tika-vin04t:1354_3: viya dassāmi, no ce passissanti, harissāmī”ti parikappeti, tassa taṃ ādāya parikappitaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin04t:1354_4: atikkantamatte avahāro hoti. Iti yvāyaṃ vuttanayeneva pavatto parikappo, ayaṃ okāsaparikappo
tika-vin04t:1354_5: nāma. Evamimesaṃ dvinnampi parikappānaṃ vasena parikappetvā gaṇhato avahāro “parikappāvahāro”ti veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1355_0: Paṭicchādetvā pana avaharaṇaṃ paṭicchannāvahāro nāma. So evaṃ veditabbo – yo bhikkhu
tika-vin04t:1355_1: uyyānādīsu paresaṃ omuñcitvā ṭhapitaaṅgulimuddikādīni disvā “pacchā gaṇhissāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1355_2: paṃsunā vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādeti, tassa ettāvatā uddhāro natthīti na tāva avahāro
tika-vin04t:1355_3: hoti. Yadā pana sāmikā vicinantā apassitvā “sve jānissāmā”ti sālayāva gatā honti,
tika-vin04t:1355_4: athassa taṃ uddharato uddhāre avahāro. Paṭicchannakāleyeva “etaṃ mama santaka”nti
tika-vin04t:1355_5: sakasaññāya vā “gatā dāni te, chaṭṭitabhaṇḍaṃ ida”nti paṃsukūlasaññāya vā gaṇhantassa
tika-vin04t:1355_6: pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Tesu dutiyatatiyadivase āgantvā vicinitvā adisvā dhuranikkhepaṃ
tika-vin04t:1355_7: katvā gatesupi gahitaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Pacchā ñatvā codiyamānassa adadato sāmikānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1355_8: dhuranikkhepe avahāro hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā tassa payogena tehi na diṭṭhaṃ. Yo pana
tika-vin04t:1355_9: tathārūpaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhitaṃyeva appaṭicchādetvā theyyacitto pādena akkamitvā
tika-vin04t:1355_10: kaddame vā vālukāya vā paveseti, tassa pavesitamatteyeva avahāro.
tika-vin04t:1356_0: Kusaṃ saṅkāmetvā pana avaharaṇaṃ kusāvahāro nāma. Sopi evaṃ veditabbo – yo bhikkhu
tika-vin04t:1356_1: vilīvamayaṃ vā tālapaṇṇamayaṃ vā katasaññāṇaṃ yaṃkiñci kusaṃ pātetvā cīvare bhājīyamāne
tika-vin04t:1356_2: attano koṭṭhāsassa samīpe ṭhitaṃ appagghataraṃ vā mahagghataraṃ vā samasamaṃ vā agghena
tika-vin04t:1356_3: parassa koṭṭhāsaṃ haritukāmo attano koṭṭhāse patitaṃ kusaṃ parassa koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya
tika-vin04t:1356_4: uddharati, rakkhati tāva. Parassa koṭṭhāse pātite rakkhateva. Yadā pana tasmiṃ patite
tika-vin04t:1356_5: parassa koṭṭhāsato parassa kusaṃ uddharati, uddhatamatte avahāro. Sace paṭhamataraṃ
tika-vin04t:1356_6: parakoṭṭhāsato parassa kusaṃ uddharati, attano koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya uddhāre rakkhati,
tika-vin04t:1356_7: pātanepi rakkhati, attano koṭṭhāsato pana attano kusaṃ uddharato uddhāreyeva rakkhati,
tika-vin04t:1356_8: taṃ uddharitvā parakoṭṭhāse pātentassa hatthato muttamatte avahāro. Ayaṃ kusāvahāro.
tika-vin04t:1356_9: Iti yaṃ vuttaṃ “ādiyeyyāti pañcavīsatiyā avahārānaṃ aññataravasena hareyyā”ti, tassattho pakāsito hoti.
tika-vin04t:1357_0: Yathārūpeti yādise. Adinnādāneti adinnassa parasantakassa gahaṇe. Rājānotiidaṃ bimbisāraṃyeva
tika-vin04t:1357_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ, aññe pana tathā kareyyuṃ vā na kareyyuṃ vāti te nappamāṇaṃ. Haneyyuṃ
tika-vin04t:1357_2: vāti hatthādīhi vā potheyyuṃ, satthena vā chindeyyuṃ. Bandheyyuṃ vāti rajjubandhanādīhi
tika-vin04t:1357_3: bandheyyuṃ vā. Pabbājeyyuṃ vāti nīhareyyuṃ vā. Corosi bālosi mūḷhosi thenosīti imehi
tika-vin04t:1357_4: vacanehi paribhāseyyuṃ. Kīdisassa pana adinnassa ādāne rājāno evaṃ karonti? Pādassa
tika-vin04t:1357_5: vā pādārahassa vā. Tathārūpaṃ bhikkhu adinnaṃ ādiyamānoti tādisaṃ bhikkhu porāṇakassa
tika-vin04t:1357_6: kahāpaṇassa pādaṃ vā pādārahaṃ vā bhaṇḍaṃ adinnaṃ bhūmiādīsu yattha katthaci ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin04t:1357_7: yaṃkiñci sajīvanijjīvaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ avahārānaṃ yena kenaci avahārena avaharanto
tika-vin04t:1357_8: pārājiko hoti, ko pana vādo tato atirekatarasminti.
tika-vin04t:1358_0: Rājagahe dhaniyattheraṃ ārabbha rañño dārūni adinnaṃ ādiyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1358_1: “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti, sāṇattikaṃ, haraṇatthāya
tika-vin04t:1358_2: gamanādike pubbappayoge dukkaṭaṃ, āmasane dukkaṭaṃ, pārājikavatthuno phandāpane thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1358_3: Ādiyantassa māsake vā ūnamāsake vā dukkaṭaṃ, atirekamāsake vā ūnapañcamāsake vā thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1358_4: pañcamāsake vā atirekapañcamāsake vā pārājikaṃ. Sabbattha gahaṇakālavasena ca gahaṇadesavasena
tika-vin04t:1358_5: ca paribhogabhājanaparivattanādīhi ca parihīnāparihīnavasena vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1358_6: Sakasaññissa, vissāsaggāhe, tāvakālike, petapariggahe, tiracchānagatapariggahe, paṃsukūlasaññissa,
tika-vin04t:1358_7: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Sīlavipatti, aññassa manussajātikassa vasena parapariggahitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1358_9: vasena avaharaṇañcāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1358_10: sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
tika-vin04t:1361_0: Tatiye sañciccāti saṃcetetvā saddhiṃ cetetvā. “Pāṇo”tisaññāya saddhiṃyeva “vadhāmi
tika-vin04t:1361_1: na”nti vadhakacetanāya cetetvā pakappetvā. Manussaviggahanti kalalato paṭṭhāya jīvamānakamanussajātikasarīraṃ.
tika-vin04t:1361_2: Jīvitā voropeyyāti kalalakālepi tāpanamaddanehi vā bhesajjasampadānena vā tato vā
tika-vin04t:1361_3: uddhampi tadanurūpena upakkamena jīvitā viyojeyya. Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1361_4: pāṇo veditabbo, pāṇātipāto veditabbo, pāṇātipātī veditabbo, pāṇātipātassa payogo
tika-vin04t:1361_5: veditabbo. Tattha pāṇoti vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Pāṇātipātoti
tika-vin04t:1361_6: yāya cetanāya jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sā cetanā. Pāṇātipātīti
tika-vin04t:1361_7: vuttacetanāya samaṅgipuggalo. Pāṇātipātassa payogoti pāṇātipātassa cha payogā sāhatthiko
tika-vin04t:1361_8: nissaggiyo āṇattiko thāvaro vijjāmayo iddhimayoti. Tattha sāhatthikoti sayaṃ mārentassa
tika-vin04t:1361_9: kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā paharaṇaṃ. Nissaggiyoti dūre ṭhitaṃ māretukāmassa
tika-vin04t:1361_10: kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā ususattiyantapāsāṇādīnaṃ nissajjanaṃ. Tattha ekeko
tika-vin04t:1361_11: uddissānuddissabhedato duvidho. Tattha uddissake yaṃ uddissa paharati, tasseva maraṇena
tika-vin04t:1361_12: kammabaddho. “Yo koci maratū”ti evaṃ anuddissake pahārappaccayā yassa kassaci maraṇena
tika-vin04t:1361_13: kammabaddho. Ubhayatthāpi ca paharitamatte vā maratu, pacchā vā teneva rogena, paharitakkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin04t:1361_14: kammabaddho. Āṇattikoti “asukaṃ nāma mārehī”ti aññaṃ āṇāpentassa āṇāpanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1363: Vatthu kālo ca okāso, āvudhaṃ iriyāpatho;
tika-vin04t:1365_0: Tattha vatthūti puggalo. Yañhi puggalaṃ “mārehī”ti āṇatto sace tameva māreti, āṇāpakassa
tika-vin04t:1365_1: āpatti. Atha aññaṃ māreti, taṃmaññamāno vā aññaṃ māreti, āṇāpako muccati. “Imaṃ mārehī”ti
tika-vin04t:1365_2: āṇatte pana āṇāpakassa dukkaṭaṃ. Kāloti purebhattādikālo. Sace hi “purebhattaṃ mārehī”ti
tika-vin04t:1365_3: āṇatto purebhattameva māreti, āṇāpakassa āpatti. Atha yaṃ purebhattaṃ niyāmitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1365_4: tato pacchā vā pure vā māreti, āṇāpako muccati. Iminā nayena sabbattha vinicchayo
tika-vin04t:1365_5: veditabbo. Thāvaroti asaṃhārimena upakaraṇena māretukāmassa opātakkhaṇanaṃ apassenasaṃvidhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1365_6: asiādīnaṃ upanikkhipanaṃ taḷākādīsu visasampayojanaṃ rūpūpahārotievamādi. Vuttanayeneva
tika-vin04t:1365_7: cetthāpi uddissānuddissabhedo veditabbo. Vijjāmayoti māraṇatthaṃ vijjāparijappanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1366_0: Satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyāti ettha haratīti hārakaṃ, kiṃ harati? Jīvitaṃ. Atha
tika-vin04t:1366_1: vā haritabbanti hārakaṃ, upanikkhipitabbanti attho. Satthañca taṃ hārakañcāti satthahārakaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1366_2: Assāti manussaviggahassa. Pariyeseyyāti yathā labhati, tathā kareyya, upanikkhipeyyāti
tika-vin04t:1366_3: attho. Etena thāvarapayogaṃ dasseti. Itarathā hi pariyiṭṭhimatteyeva pārājiko bhaveyya,
tika-vin04t:1366_4: na cetaṃ yuttaṃ. Padabhājane panassa byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā yaṃ ettha thāvarapayogasaṅgahitaṃ
tika-vin04t:1366_5: satthaṃ, tadeva dassetuṃ “asiṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyāti vācāya
tika-vin04t:1366_6: vā tālapaṇṇādīsu likhitvā vā “yo evaṃ marati, so dhanaṃ vā labhatī”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin04t:1366_7: maraṇe guṇaṃ pakāseyya. Etena yathā “adinnādāne ādiyeyyā”ti vuttattā pariyāyakathāya
tika-vin04t:1366_8: muccati, nayidha, evaṃ “saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti vacanato pana idha pariyāyakathāyapi na muccatīti
tika-vin04t:1366_9: ayamattho veditabbo. Maraṇāya vā samādapeyyāti “satthaṃ vā āharā”tiādinā nayena maraṇatthāya
tika-vin04t:1366_10: upāyaṃ gāhāpeyya. Etena āṇattikappayogaṃ dasseti. Ambho purisāti ālapanametaṃ. Kiṃ
tika-vin04t:1366_11: tuyhiminātiādi saṃvaṇṇanākāranidassanaṃ. Iti cittamanoti iti citto iti mano. “Mataṃ
tika-vin04t:1366_12: te jīvitā seyyo”tiettha vuttamaraṇacitto maraṇamanoti attho. Ettha ca “mano”tiidaṃ
tika-vin04t:1366_13: cittassa atthadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenevassa padabhājane “yaṃ cittaṃ taṃ mano”ti āha.
tika-vin04t:1366_14: Cittasaṅkappoti vicittasaṅkappo. Etthāpi iti-saddo āharitabbo. “Saṅkappo”ti ca saṃvidahanamattassetaṃ
tika-vin04t:1366_15: nāmaṃ, na vitakkasseva. Tañca saṃvidahanaṃ imasmiṃ atthe saññācetanādhippāyehi saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin04t:1366_16: gacchati, tasmā “iti cittasaṅkappo”ti “mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo”tiettha vuttamaraṇasaññī
tika-vin04t:1366_17: maraṇacetano maraṇādhippāyoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Padabhājanepi hi ayameva
tika-vin04t:1366_18: nayo dassito. Etena maraṇacittādīhi vinā “ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, vīriyamārabhato daḷha”ntiādinā
tika-vin04t:1366_19: nayena dhammaṃ bhāsantassa saṃvaṇṇanā nāma na hotīti dasseti. Anekapariyāyenāti nānappakārena
tika-vin04t:1366_20: uccāvacena kāraṇena. Puna maraṇavaṇṇantiādi nigamanavacanaṃ. Pārājiko hotīti taṅkhaṇūpapannampi
tika-vin04t:1366_21: manussaviggahaṃ vuttanayena jīvitā voropento pārājiko hotīti.
tika-vin04t:1367_0: Vesāliyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha aññamaññaṃ jīvitā voropanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1367_1: “maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti, sāṇattikaṃ, māraṇatthāya
tika-vin04t:1367_2: opātakkhaṇanādīsu dukkaṭaṃ, anodissa khate opāte yassa kassaci patanepi dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1367_4: manussajātikassa dukkhuppattiyaṃ thullaccayaṃ, tathā yakkhādīnaṃ maraṇe, tiracchānagatamaraṇe
tika-vin04t:1367_5: pana pācittiyaṃ, manussamaraṇe pārājikanti. Iminā nayena sabbattha payogabhedavasena
tika-vin04t:1367_6: āpattibhedo veditabbo. Asañcicca mārentassa ajānantassa namaraṇādhippāyassa ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1367_7: anāpatti. Tattha asañciccāti “iminā upakkamena imaṃ māremī”ti acetetvā katena upakkamena
tika-vin04t:1367_8: musalussāpanavatthusmiṃ viya pare matepi anāpatti. Ajānantassāti “iminā ayaṃ marissatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1367_9: ajānantassa upakkamena visagatapiṇḍapātavatthusmiṃ viya pare matepi anāpatti. Namaraṇādhippāyassāti
tika-vin04t:1367_10: maraṇaṃ anicchantassa upakkamena bhesajjavatthusmiṃ viya pare matepi anāpatti. Evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1367_11: asañciccātiādīsu vinicchayo veditabbo. Sīlavipatti, manussajātikapāṇo, pāṇasaññitā,
tika-vin04t:1367_12: vadhakacittaṃ, upakkamo, tena maraṇanti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Adinnādānasamauṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1367_13: kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1370_0: Catutthe anabhijānanti sakasantāne anuppannattā attani atthibhāvaṃ ajānanto. Uttarimanussadhammanti
tika-vin04t:1370_1: uttarimanussānaṃ jhāyīnañceva ariyānañca dhammaṃ. Attupanāyikanti attani taṃ upaneti
tika-vin04t:1370_2: “mayi atthī”ti samudācaranto, attānaṃ vā tattha upaneti “ahaṃ ettha sandissāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1370_3: samudācarantoti attupanāyiko, taṃ attupanāyikaṃ. Evaṃ katvā samudācareyyāti sambandho.
tika-vin04t:1370_5: ca diṭṭhamiva dhammaṃ paccakkhakaraṇato dassanatthena dassananti ñāṇadassanaṃ, ariyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1370_6: visuddhaṃ uttamaṃ ñāṇadassananti ariyañāṇadassanaṃ, alaṃ pariyattaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanasamatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1370_7: ariyañāṇadassanamettha jhānādibhede uttarimanussadhamme, alaṃ vā ariyañāṇadassanamassāti
tika-vin04t:1370_9: uttarimanussadhammaṃ attupanāyikaṃ katvā kāyena vā vācāya vā tadubhayena vā viññussa
tika-vin04t:1370_10: manussajātikassa āroceyya. Iti jānāmi iti passāmīti samudācaraṇākāradassanametaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1370_11: attupanāyikañhi katvā vinā aññāpadesena samudācaranto evaṃ samudācarati, tasmā yvāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1370_12: padabhājane “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjiṃ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno”tiādibhedo vutto,
tika-vin04t:1370_13: so sabbo idheva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti veditabbo. “Iti jānāmi iti passāmī”ti hi vadanto
tika-vin04t:1370_14: na yidaṃ vacanamattameva vadati, atha kho “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena ayaṃ dhammo
tika-vin04t:1370_15: mayi atthī”ti dīpeti, “samāpajji”ntiādīni ca vadantena hi samāpajjanādīhi kāraṇehi
tika-vin04t:1370_16: atthitā dīpitā hoti, tena vuttaṃ “yvāyaṃ padabhājane paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjiṃ,
tika-vin04t:1370_17: samāpajjāmi, samāpannotiādibhedo vutto, so sabbo idheva saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti. Tato
tika-vin04t:1370_18: aparena samayenāti tato ārocitakālato aññatarasmiṃ kāle. Iti āpattipaṭijānanakāladassanametaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1370_19: ayaṃ pana ārocitakkhaṇeva āpattiṃ āpajjati. Āpattiṃ pana āpanno yasmā parena codito
tika-vin04t:1370_20: vā acodito vā paṭijānāti, tasmā “samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1370_21: Āpannoti ārocitakkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ āpanno. Visuddhāpekkhoti attano gihibhāvādikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1370_22: visuddhiṃ apekkhamāno icchamāno. Ayañhi yasmā pārājikaṃ āpanno, tasmā bhikkhubhāve
tika-vin04t:1370_23: ṭhatvā abhabbo jhānādīni adhigantuṃ, iccassa bhikkhubhāvo visuddhi nāma na hoti.
tika-vin04t:1370_24: Yasmā pana gihi vā upāsakārāmikasāmaṇerānaṃ vā aññataro hutvā dānādīhi saggamaggaṃ
tika-vin04t:1370_25: vā jhānādīhi mokkhamaggaṃ vā ārādhetuṃ bhabbo hoti, tasmāssa gihiādibhāvo visuddhi
tika-vin04t:1370_26: nāma hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “gihibhāvādikaṃ visuddhiṃ apekkhamāno”ti. Evaṃ vadeyyāti evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1370_27: bhaṇeyya, kathaṃ? “Ajānamevaṃ, āvuso”tiādiṃ. Tattha ajānanti ajānanto. Apassanti
tika-vin04t:1370_28: apassanto. Tucchaṃ musā vilapinti ahaṃ vacanatthavirahato tucchaṃ, vañcanādhippāyato
tika-vin04t:1370_29: musā vilapiṃ abhaṇinti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññatra adhimānāti yvāyaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā
tika-vin04t:1370_30: saṅkhāre sammasantassa āraddhavipassakassa apatte pattasaññitāsaṅkhāto adhimāno uppajjati,
tika-vin04t:1370_31: taṃ adhimānaṃ ṭhapetvā kevalaṃ pāpicchatāya yo samudācareyya, ayampi pārājiko hotīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1371_0: Vesāliyaṃ vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha tesaṃ uttarimanussadhammārocanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1371_1: paññattaṃ, “aññatra adhimānā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1371_2: “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji”ntiādinā nayena vuttappakāraṃ asantaṃ jhānādidhammaṃ ārocentassa
tika-vin04t:1371_3: sace yassa kassaci āroceti, so manussajātiko hoti, anantarameva “ayaṃ jhānalābhī”ti
tika-vin04t:1371_4: vā “ariyo”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena tamatthaṃ jānāti, pārājikaṃ. Sace na jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1371_5: thullaccayaṃ. Sace pana “yo te vihāre vasi, so bhikkhu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjī”tiādinā
tika-vin04t:1371_6: nayena aññāpadesena ārocentassa jānāti, thullaccayaṃ. Sace na jānāti, dukkaṭaṃ. Adhimānena
tika-vin04t:1371_7: ārocentassa, anullapanādhippāyassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Sīlavipatti, uttarimanussadhammassa
tika-vin04t:1371_8: attani asantatā, pāpicchatāya tassa ārocanaṃ, anaññāpadeso, yassa āroceti, tassa
tika-vin04t:1371_9: manussajātikatā, taṅkhaṇavijānananti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādāne vuttasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1373_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammātiidaṃ idha uddiṭṭhapārājikaparidīpanameva.
tika-vin04t:1373_1: Samodhānetvā pana sabbāneva catuvīsati pārājikāni veditabbāni. Katamāni catuvīsati?
tika-vin04t:1373_2: Pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni tāva bhikkhūnaṃ cattāri bhikkhunīnaṃ asādhāraṇāni cattārīti aṭṭha,
tika-vin04t:1373_3: tāni ekādasannaṃ paṇḍakādīnaṃ abhabbabhāvasaṅkhātehi ekādasahi pārājikehi saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1373_4: ekūnavīsati, gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānāya bhikkhuniyā vibbhantabhāvapārājikena saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1373_5: vīsati, aparānipi lambī, mudupiṭṭhiko, parassa aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gaṇhāti, parassa
tika-vin04t:1373_6: aṅgajāte abhinisīdatīti imesaṃ catunnaṃ vasena “cattāri anulomapārājikānī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin04t:1373_7: iti imāni ca cattāri, purimāni ca vīsatīti samodhānetvā sabbāneva catuvīsati pārājikāni
tika-vin04t:1373_8: veditabbāni. Na labhati bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsanti uposathādibhedaṃ saṃvāsaṃ bhikkhūhi
tika-vin04t:1373_9: saddhiṃ na labhati. Yathā pure, tathā pacchāti yathā pubbe gihikāle anupasampannakāle
tika-vin04t:1373_10: ca, pacchā pārājikaṃ āpannopi tatheva asaṃvāso hoti, natthi tassa bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1373_11: uposathādibhedo saṃvāsoti. Tatthāyasmante pucchāmīti tesu catūsu pārājikesu āyasmante
tika-vin04t:1373_12: “kaccittha parisuddhā”ti pucchāmi. Kaccitthāti kacci ettha, etesu catūsu pārājikesu
tika-vin04t:1373_13: kacci parisuddhāti attho. Atha vā kaccittha parisuddhāti kacci parisuddhā attha,
tika-vin04t:1377_0: Ime kho panāti idāni vattabbānaṃ abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ. Āyasmantoti sannipatitānaṃ piyavacanena
tika-vin04t:1377_1: ālapanaṃ. Terasāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Saṅghādisesāti evaṃnāmakā. Dhammāti āpattiyo.
tika-vin04t:1377_2: Uddesaṃ āgacchantīti sarūpena uddisitabbataṃ āgacchanti, na nidāne viya “yassa siyā
tika-vin04t:1379_0: Saṃvijjati cetanā assāti sañcetanā, sañcetanāva sañcetanikā, sañcetanā vā assa atthīti
tika-vin04t:1379_1: sañcetanikā. Sukkavissaṭṭhīti sukkassa vissaṭṭhi, rāgūpatthambhādīsu yena kenaci
tika-vin04t:1379_2: aṅgajāte kammaññataṃ patte ārogyādīsu yaṃkiñci apadisitvā ajjhattarūpādīsu yattha
tika-vin04t:1379_3: katthaci mocanassādacetanāya nimitte upakkamantassa āsayadhātunānattato nīlādivasena
tika-vin04t:1379_4: dasavidhesu sukkesu yassa kassaci sukkassa ṭhānā cāvanāti attho. Aññatra supinantāti
tika-vin04t:1379_5: yā supine sukkavissaṭṭhi hoti, taṃ ṭhapetvā. Saṅghādisesoti yā aññatra supinantā
tika-vin04t:1379_6: sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi, ayaṃ saṅghādiseso nāma āpattinikāyoti attho. Vacanattho
tika-vin04t:1379_7: panettha saṅgho ādimhi ceva sese ca icchitabbo assāti saṅghādiseso. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti
tika-vin04t:1379_8: – imaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vuṭṭhātukāmassa yaṃ taṃ āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ, tassa ādimhi ceva
tika-vin04t:1379_9: parivāsadānatthāya, ādito sese majjhe mānattadānatthāya mūlāya paṭikassanena vā saha
tika-vin04t:1379_10: mānattadānatthāya, avasāne abbhānatthāya ca saṅgho icchitabbo, na hettha ekampi kammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1379_11: vinā saṅghena sakkā kātuṃ. Iti saṅgho ādimhi ceva sese ca icchitabbo assāti saṅghādisesoti.
tika-vin04t:1380_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ seyyasakaṃ ārabbha upakkamitvā asucimocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “aññatra
tika-vin04t:1380_1: supinantā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ. Sace pana parena
tika-vin04t:1380_2: attano aṅgajāte upakkamaṃ kāretvā mocāpeti, āpajjatiyeva. Cetetvā antamaso ākāse
tika-vin04t:1380_3: kaṭikampanenapi nimitte upakkamantassa sace na muccati, thullaccayaṃ. Sace pana antamaso
tika-vin04t:1380_4: yaṃ ekā khuddakamakkhikā piveyya, tattakampi ṭhānato muccati, dakasotaṃ anotiṇṇepi
tika-vin04t:1380_5: saṅghādiseso. Ṭhānato pana cutaṃ avassameva dakasotaṃ otarati, tasmā “dakasotaṃ otiṇṇamatte
tika-vin04t:1380_6: bahi nikkhante vā anikkhante vā saṅghādiseso”ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Anupakkamantassa
tika-vin04t:1380_7: ca, amocanādhippāyassa ca, supinaṃ passantassa ca, ummattakādīnañca muttepi anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1380_8: Sīlavipatti, cetanā, upakkamo, muccananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājike vuttasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1383_0: Dutiye otiṇṇoti yakkhādīhi viya sattā anto uppajjantena rāgena vā otiṇṇo, kūpādīni
tika-vin04t:1383_1: viya sattā asamapekkhitvā rajjanīye ṭhāne rajjanto sayaṃ vā rāgaṃ otiṇṇo, kāyasaṃsaggarāgasamaṅgissetaṃ
tika-vin04t:1383_2: adhivacanaṃ. Vipariṇatena cittenāti parisuddhabhavaṅgasantatisaṅkhātaṃ pakatiṃ vijahitvā
tika-vin04t:1383_3: aññathā pavattena, virūpaṃ vā pariṇatena yathā parivattamānaṃ virūpaṃ hoti, evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1383_4: vuttarāgavasena parivattetvā ṭhitena cittenāti attho. Mātugāmena saddhinti tadahujātāyapi
tika-vin04t:1383_6: kāyamissībhāvaṃ samāpajjeyya. Hatthaggāhaṃ vātiādi panassa vitthārena atthadassanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1383_7: Tattha hattho nāma kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva agganakhā. Veṇī nāma vinandhitvā vā avinandhitvā
tika-vin04t:1383_9: aññataramissehi vā katakesakalāpassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Veṇiggahaṇena cettha kesāpi
tika-vin04t:1383_10: gahitāyeva saddhiṃ lomehi. Iti vuttalakkhaṇassa hatthassa gahaṇaṃ hatthaggāho, veṇiyā
tika-vin04t:1383_11: gahaṇaṃ veṇiggāho. Avasesassa sarīrassa parāmasanaṃ aññatarassa vā aññatarassa vā
tika-vin04t:1383_12: aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ nāma. Yo taṃ hatthaggāhaṃ vā veṇiggāhaṃ vā aññatarassa vā aññatarassa
tika-vin04t:1383_13: vā aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ samāpajjeyya, tassa saṅghādiseso nāma āpattinikāyo hotīti.
tika-vin04t:1384_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha kāyasaṃsaggasamāpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1384_1: anāṇattikaṃ, itthiyā itthisaññino antamaso lomena lomaṃ phusantassāpi, itthiyā vā
tika-vin04t:1384_2: phusiyamānassa sevanādhippāyena vāyamitvā phassaṃ paṭijānantassa saṅghādiseso. Ekena
tika-vin04t:1384_3: pana hatthena gahetvā dutiyena hatthena divasampi tattha tattha phusantassa ekāva
tika-vin04t:1384_4: āpatti, aggahetvā phusanto pana sace sīsato yāva pādā, tāva kāyato hatthaṃ amocentoyeva
tika-vin04t:1384_5: phusati, ekāva āpatti, pañcannaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ ekato gahaṇepi ekāyeva. Sace pana nānitthīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1384_6: pañcaṅguliyo ekato gaṇhāti, pañca āpattiyo. Itthiyā vematikassa, paṇḍakapurisatiracchānagatasaññissa
tika-vin04t:1384_7: ca thullaccayaṃ, tathā kāyena kāyappaṭibaddhena, amanussitthipaṇḍakehi ca saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1384_8: kāyasaṃsaggepi. Manussitthiyā pana kāyappaṭibaddhena kāyappaṭibaddhādīsu, purisakāyaphusanādīsu
tika-vin04t:1384_9: ca dukkaṭaṃ. Itthiyā phusiyamānassa sevanādhippāyassāpi kāyena avāyamitvā phassaṃ
tika-vin04t:1384_10: paṭijānantassa, mokkhādhippāyena itthiṃ phusantassa, asañcicca, assatiyā, ajānantassa,
tika-vin04t:1384_11: asādiyantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Sīlavipatti, manussitthī, itthisaññitā,
tika-vin04t:1384_12: kāyasaṃsaggarāgo, tena rāgena vāyāmo, hatthaggāhādisamāpajjananti imānettha pañca
tika-vin04t:1387_0: Tatiye otiṇṇatā ca vipariṇatacittatā ca duṭṭhullavācassādarāgavasena veditabbā. Mātugāmanti
tika-vin04t:1387_3: nānappakāraṃ asaddhammavacanaṃ vadeyya. Yathā tanti ettha nti nipātamattaṃ, yathā
tika-vin04t:1387_4: yuvā yuvatinti attho. Etena obhāsane nirāsaṅkabhāvaṃ dasseti. Methunupasaṃhitāhītiidaṃ
tika-vin04t:1387_5: duṭṭhullavācāya sikhāpattalakkhaṇadassanaṃ. Saṅghādisesoti dvinnaṃ maggānaṃ vasena
tika-vin04t:1387_6: vaṇṇāvaṇṇehi vā methunayācanādīhi vā “sikharaṇīsi, saṃbhinnāsi, ubhatobyañjanakāsī”ti
tika-vin04t:1387_7: imesu tīsu aññatarena akkosavacanena vā mātugāmaṃ obhāsantassa saṅghādiseso nāma
tika-vin04t:1388_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha duṭṭhullavācāhi obhāsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1388_1: anāṇattikaṃ, itthiyā itthisaññino antamaso hatthamuddāyapi vuttanayena obhāsantassa
tika-vin04t:1388_2: sace sā tamatthaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe jānāti, saṅghādiseso. Paṇḍake thullaccayaṃ. Tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin04t:1388_3: itthisaññino dukkaṭaṃ. Punappunaṃ obhāsantassa, sambahulā ca itthiyo ekavācāya obhāsantassa
tika-vin04t:1388_4: vācāgaṇanāya ceva itthigaṇanāya ca āpattiyo. Sace yaṃ itthiṃ obhāsati, sā na jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1388_5: thullaccayaṃ. Adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ ādissa vaṇṇādibhaṇanepi thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1388_6: Paṇḍake dukkaṭaṃ, ubbhakkhakaṃ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṃ kāyappaṭibaddhañca ādissa vaṇṇādibhaṇane
tika-vin04t:1388_8: Sīlavipatti, manussitthī, itthisaññitā, duṭṭhullavācassādarāgo, tena rāgena obhāsanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1388_9: taṅkhaṇavijānananti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1388_10: sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dvivedananti.
tika-vin04t:1391_0: Catutthe otiṇṇatā ca vipariṇatacittatā ca attakāmapāricariyāvasena veditabbā. Mātugāmassa
tika-vin04t:1391_1: santiketi duṭṭhullobhāsane vuttappakārāya itthiyā samīpe. Attakāmapāricariyāyāti
tika-vin04t:1391_2: methunadhammasaṅkhātena kāmena pāricariyā kāmapāricariyā, attano atthāya kāmapāricariyā
tika-vin04t:1391_3: attakāmapāricariyā, attanā vā kāmitā icchitāti attakāmā, sayaṃ methunarāgavasena
tika-vin04t:1391_4: patthitāti attho, attakāmā ca sā pāricariyā cāti attakāmapāricariyā, tassā attakāmapāricariyāya.
tika-vin04t:1391_5: Vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyāti guṇaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ pakāseyya. Etadaggantiādi tassā attakāmapāricariyāya
tika-vin04t:1391_6: vaṇṇabhāsanākāranidassanaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ padasambandhavaseneva saṅkhepattho – yā mādisaṃ
tika-vin04t:1391_7: pāṇātipātādīhi virahitattā sīlavantaṃ methunadhammā virahitattā brahmacāriṃ tadubhayenāpi
tika-vin04t:1391_8: kalyāṇadhammaṃ etena dhammena paricareyya abhirameyya, tassā evaṃ mādisaṃ paricarantiyā
tika-vin04t:1391_9: yā ayaṃ pāricariyā nāma, etadaggaṃ pāricariyānanti. Methunupasaṃhitena saṅghādisesoti
tika-vin04t:1391_10: evaṃ attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto ca “arahasi tvaṃ mayhaṃ methunadhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1391_11: dātu”ntiādinā methunappaṭisaṃyutteneva vacanena yo bhāseyya, tassa saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:1392_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇabhāsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1392_1: asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, itthiyā itthisaññino antamaso hatthamuddāyapi vuttanayeneva
tika-vin04t:1392_2: attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa sace sā tamatthaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1392_3: saṅghādiseso. No ce jānāti, thullaccayaṃ. Paṇḍake paṇḍakasaññinopi thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1392_4: Tasmiṃyeva itthisaññino dukkaṭaṃ. Cīvarādīhi vatthukāmehi pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa
tika-vin04t:1392_5: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Sīlavipatti, manussitthī, itthisaññitā, attakāmapāricariyāya
tika-vin04t:1392_6: rāgo, tena rāgena vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ, taṅkhaṇavijānananti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1395_0: Pañcame sañcarittanti itthipurisānaṃ antare saṃcaraṇabhāvaṃ. Samāpajjeyyāti sammā
tika-vin04t:1395_1: paṭiggaṇhanavīmaṃsanapaccāharaṇāni karonto āpajjeyya. Itthiyā vātiādi samāpajjanākāradassanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1395_2: Tattha itthiyā vā purisamatinti purisena vā tassa mātāpitādīhi vā pesito purisassa
tika-vin04t:1395_3: matiṃ adhippāyaṃ itthiyā āroceyyāti attho. Purisassa vā itthimatinti itthiyā vā tassā
tika-vin04t:1395_4: mātāpitādīhi vā pesito itthiyā matiṃ adhippāyaṃ purisassa āroceyyāti attho. Jāyattane
tika-vin04t:1395_5: vā jārattane vāti jāyabhāve vā jārabhāve vā. Purisassa hi matiṃ itthiyā ārocento
tika-vin04t:1395_6: jāyattane āroceti, itthiyā matiṃ purisassa ārocento jārattane āroceti. Apica purisasseva
tika-vin04t:1395_7: matiṃ itthiyā ārocento jāyattane vā āroceti nibaddhabhariyabhāve, jārattane vā micchācārabhāve,
tika-vin04t:1395_8: tenevassa padabhājane “jāyattane vāti jāyā bhavissasi, jārattane vāti jārī bhavissasī”ti
tika-vin04t:1395_9: vuttaṃ. Eteneva upāyena itthiyā matiṃ purisassa ārocanepi “pati bhavissasi, jāro
tika-vin04t:1395_10: bhavissasī”ti vattabbatā veditabbā. Antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapīti sabbantimena paricchedena
tika-vin04t:1395_11: yā ayaṃ taṅkhaṇe muhuttamatte saṃvasitabbato “taṅkhaṇikā”ti vuccati, muhuttikāti
tika-vin04t:1395_12: attho. Tassāpi “muhuttikā bhavissasī”ti evaṃ purisassa matiṃ ārocentassa saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin04t:1395_13: eteneva upāyena “muhuttiko bhavissasī”ti evaṃ purisassa itthimatiṃ ārocentopi saṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1396_2: antevāsiṃ paccāharāpetī”tiiminā nayena sāṇattikaṃ, aññatra nālaṃvacanīyāya yāya kāyaci
tika-vin04t:1396_3: itthiyā antamaso mātuyāpi purisamatiṃ ārocento “hohi kira bhariyā dhanakkītā”ti vattukāmo
tika-vin04t:1396_4: sacepi chandavāsinīādīsu aññatarākārena ārocetvā tāya “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitepi asampaṭicchitepi
tika-vin04t:1396_5: puna āgantvā yena pahito, tassa taṃ pavattiṃ āroceti, saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjati. Sā
tika-vin04t:1396_6: pana tassa bhariyā hotu vā, mā vā, akāraṇametaṃ. Sacepi yassā santikaṃ pesito, taṃ
tika-vin04t:1396_7: adisvā aññatarassa avassārocanakassa “ārocehī”ti vatvā paccāharati, āpajjatiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1396_8: “Māturakkhitaṃ brūhī”ti pesitassa pana gantvā aññaṃ piturakkhitādīsu aññataraṃ vadantassa
tika-vin04t:1396_9: visaṅketaṃ hoti, purisassa vā itthiyā vā vacanaṃ “sādhū”ti kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena
tika-vin04t:1396_10: vā paṭiggaṇhitvā tassā itthiyā vā purisassa vā ārocetvā vā ārocāpetvā vā puna yena
tika-vin04t:1396_11: pesito, tassa taṃ pavattiṃ sayaṃ ārocentassa vā aññena ārocāpentassa vā saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:1396_12: Ettāvatā hi “paṭiggaṇhāti, vīmaṃsati, paccāharatī”tiidaṃ aṅgattayaṃ sampāditameva
tika-vin04t:1396_13: hoti, ito pana yehi kehici dvīhi aṅgehi, paṇḍake ca aṅgattayenāpi thullaccayaṃ. Ekena
tika-vin04t:1396_14: dukkaṭaṃ. Saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā gilānassa vā kiccena gacchantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1397: Sīlavipatti, yesu sañcarittaṃ samāpajjati, tesaṃ manussajātikatā, na nālaṃvacanīyatā,
tika-vin04t:1398_0: Paṭiggaṇhanavīmaṃsanapaccāharaṇānīti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, paṇṇattiṃ
tika-vin04t:1398_1: vā alaṃvacanīyabhāvaṃ vā ajānantassa kāyavikārena sāsanaṃ gahetvā tatheva vīmaṃsitvā
tika-vin04t:1398_2: tatheva paccāharantassa kāyato samuṭṭhāti. “Itthannāmā āgamissati, tassā cittaṃ jāneyyāthā”ti
tika-vin04t:1398_3: kenaci vutte “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā taṃ āgataṃ vatvā puna tasmiṃ purise āgate ārocentassa
tika-vin04t:1398_4: kāyena kiñci akatattā vācato samuṭṭhāti. Vācāya “sādhū”ti sāsanaṃ gahetvā aññena
tika-vin04t:1398_5: karaṇīyena tassā gharaṃ gantvā aññattha vā gamanakāle taṃ disvā vacībhedena vīmaṃsitvā
tika-vin04t:1398_6: punapi aññeneva kāraṇena tato apakkamma kadācideva taṃ purisaṃ disvā ārocentassāpi
tika-vin04t:1398_7: vācato samuṭṭhāti. Paṇṇattiṃ ajānantassa pana khīṇāsavassāpi pituvacanena gantvā
tika-vin04t:1398_8: alaṃvacanīyaṃ mātarampi “ehi me pitaraṃ upaṭṭhāhī”ti vatvā paccāharantassa kāyavācato
tika-vin04t:1398_9: samuṭṭhāti. Imāni tīṇi acittakasamuṭṭhānāni. Tadubhayaṃ pana jānitvā eteheva tīhi
tika-vin04t:1398_10: nayehi samāpajjantassa tāneva tīṇi tadubhayajānanacittena sacittakāni honti, kiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1398_11: nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, kusalādivasena
tika-vin04t:1398_12: cettha tīṇi cittāni, sukhādivasena tisso vedanāti.
tika-vin04t:1401_0: Chaṭṭhe saññācikāya panāti ettha saññācikā nāma sayaṃ pavattitayācanā vuccati, tasmā
tika-vin04t:1401_1: saññācikāyāti attano yācanāyāti vuttaṃ hoti, sayaṃ yācitakehi upakaraṇehīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1401_2: Ettha ca yaṃkiñci parapariggahitakaṃ mūlacchedavasena yācituṃ na vaṭṭati, tāvakālikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1401_3: pana vaṭṭati. Sahāyatthāya kammakaraṇatthāya “purisaṃ dethā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati, purisattakarampi
tika-vin04t:1401_4: yācituṃ vaṭṭati, purisattakaro nāma vaḍḍhakiādinā purisena kātabbaṃ hatthakammaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1401_5: Taṃ “purisattakaraṃ dehī”ti vā “hatthakammaṃ dehī”ti vā vatvā yācituṃ vaṭṭati. Hatthakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1401_6: nāma kiñci vatthu na hoti, tasmā “kiṃ, bhante, āgatatthā”ti pucchite vā apucchite
tika-vin04t:1401_7: vā yācituṃ vaṭṭati, viññattipaccayā doso natthi, migaluddakādayo pana sakakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1401_8: na yācitabbā. Kuṭinti ullittādīsu aññataraṃ. Tattha ullittā nāma ṭhapetvā thambhatulāpiṭṭhasaṅghāṭavātapānadhūmacchiddādibhedaṃ
tika-vin04t:1401_9: alepokāsaṃ avasese lepokāse kuṭṭehi saddhiṃ ghaṭetvā chadanassa anto sudhāya vā mattikāya
tika-vin04t:1401_10: vā littā. Avalittā nāma tatheva vuttanayeneva chadanassa bahi littā. Ullittāvalittā
tika-vin04t:1401_11: nāma tatheva chadanassa anto ca bahi ca littā. Kārayamānenāti sayaṃ vā karontena,
tika-vin04t:1401_12: āṇattiyā vā kārāpentena. Asāmikanti kāretā dāyakena virahitaṃ. Attuddesanti “mayhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1401_13: vāsāgāraṃ esā”ti evaṃ attā uddeso etissāti attuddesā, taṃ attuddesaṃ. Pamāṇikā kāretabbāti
tika-vin04t:1401_14: pamāṇayuttā kāretabbā. Tatridaṃ pamāṇanti tassā kuṭiyā idaṃ pamāṇaṃ. Dīghasoti dīghato.
tika-vin04t:1401_15: Dvādasa vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyātiettha sugatavidatthi nāma idāni majjhimassa
tika-vin04t:1401_16: purisassa tisso vidatthiyo, vaḍḍhakihatthena diyaḍḍho hattho hoti. Minantena pana
tika-vin04t:1401_17: kuṭiyā bahikuṭṭe paṭhamaṃ dinnaṃ mahāmattikapariyantaṃ aggahetvā thusapiṇḍapariyantena
tika-vin04t:1401_18: dvādasa vidatthiyo minetabbā, sace thusapiṇḍakena anatthiko hoti, mahāmattikalepeneva
tika-vin04t:1401_19: niṭṭhāpeti, sveva paricchedo. Tiriyanti vitthārato. Sattantarāti kuṭṭassa bahiantaṃ
tika-vin04t:1401_20: aggahetvā abbhantarimena antena satta sugatavidatthiyo pamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha
tika-vin04t:1401_21: ca kesaggamattampi dīghato hāpetvā tiriyaṃ, tiriyato vā hāpetvā dīghaṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ
tika-vin04t:1401_22: na vaṭṭati, ko pana vādo ubhatovaḍḍhane. Yā pana dīghato saṭṭhihatthāpi hoti, tiriyato
tika-vin04t:1401_23: tihatthā vā ūnakacatuhatthā vā, yattha pamāṇayutto mañco ito cito ca na parivaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1401_24: pacchimakoṭiyā catuhatthavitthārā na hoti, ayaṃ kuṭisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati, tasmā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1401_25: Bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāyāti yasmiṃ padese kuṭiṃ kāretukāmo hoti, taṃ sodhetvā
tika-vin04t:1401_26: padabhājane vuttanayena saṅghaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācitvā sabbe vā saṅghapariyāpannā saṅghena
tika-vin04t:1401_27: vā sammatā dve tayo bhikkhū tattha vatthudesanatthāya netabbā. Tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu
tika-vin04t:1401_28: desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamananti tehi bhikkhūhi kipillikādīnaṃ āsayādīhi terasahi,
tika-vin04t:1401_29: pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇanissitādīhi soḷasahi upaddavehi virahitattā anārambhaṃ, dvīhi vā catūhi
tika-vin04t:1401_30: vā balibaddhehi yuttena sakaṭena ekaṃ cakkaṃ nibbodakapatanaṭṭhāne ekaṃ bahi katvā
tika-vin04t:1401_31: āvijjhituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya saparikkamananti sallakkhetvā sace saṅghapahonakā honti,
tika-vin04t:1401_32: tattheva, no ce, saṅghamajjhaṃ gantvā tena bhikkhunā yācitehi ñattidutiyena kammena
tika-vin04t:1401_33: vatthu desetabbaṃ. Sārambhe cetiādi paṭipakkhanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1402_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha saññācikāya kuṭikaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1402_1: sāṇattikaṃ, “adesitavatthukaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ kuṭiṃ kāressāmī”ti upakaraṇatthaṃ araññaṃ
tika-vin04t:1402_2: gamanato paṭṭhāya sabbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ, “idāni dvīhi piṇḍehi niṭṭhānaṃ gamissatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1402_3: tesu paṭhamapiṇḍadāne thullaccayaṃ, dutiyadānena lepe ghaṭite sace adesitavatthukā
tika-vin04t:1402_4: eva vā pamāṇātikkantā eva vā hoti, eko saṅghādiseso, dve ca dukkaṭāni. Ubhayavippannā,
tika-vin04t:1402_5: dve saṅghādisesā, dve ca dukkaṭāni. Sace pana dvārabandhaṃ vā vātapānaṃ vā aṭṭhapetvāva
tika-vin04t:1402_6: mattikāya limpati, ṭhapite ca tasmiṃ lepo na ghaṭiyati, rakkhati tāva. Puna limpantassa
tika-vin04t:1402_7: pana ghaṭitamatte saṅghādiseso. Sace taṃ ṭhapiyamānaṃ paṭhamadinnalepena saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1402_8: nirantarameva hutvā tiṭṭhati, paṭhamameva saṅghādiseso. Kevalaṃ sārambhāya dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1402_9: tathā aparikkamanāya. Vippakataṃ kuṭiṃ aññassa dadato ca, bhūmiṃ samaṃ katvā bhindantassa
tika-vin04t:1402_10: ca, leṇaguhātiṇakuṭipaṇṇacchadanagehesu aññataraṃ kārentassa, kuṭimpi aññassa vāsatthāya,
tika-vin04t:1402_11: vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā uposathāgārādīsu aññataratthāya kārentassa ca ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1402_12: anāpatti. Sīlavipatti, ullittādīnaṃ aññataratā, heṭṭhimapamāṇasambhavo, adesitavatthukatā,
tika-vin04t:1402_13: pamāṇātikkantatā, attuddesikatā, vāsāgāratā, lepaghaṭanāti imānettha cha vā satta
tika-vin04t:1402_14: vā aṅgāni. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyañca, kiriyākiriyañca. Idañhi vatthuṃ desāpetvā pamāṇātikkantaṃ
tika-vin04t:1402_15: vā karoto kiriyato samuṭṭhāti, adesāpetvā karoto kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti. Sesamettha
tika-vin04t:1405_0: Sattame mahallakanti sasāmikabhāvena saññācitakuṭito mahantabhāvo etassa atthīti
tika-vin04t:1405_1: mahallako, yasmā vā vatthuṃ desāpetvā pamāṇātikkamenāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā pamāṇamahantatāyapi
tika-vin04t:1405_2: mahallako, taṃ mahallakaṃ. Yasmā panassa taṃ pamāṇamahantattaṃ sasāmikattāva labbhati,
tika-vin04t:1405_3: tasmā tadatthadassanatthaṃ “mahallako nāma vihāro sasāmiko vuccatī”ti evamassa padabhājane
tika-vin04t:1405_4: vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ kuṭikārasikkhāpade vuttasadisaṃ, sasāmikabhāvamattameva hi viseso.
tika-vin04t:1406: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattabhāvo, akiriyamattato samuṭṭhānabhāvo, ekasaṅghādisesatā ca ettha viseso.
tika-vin04t:1409_0: Aṭṭhame duṭṭho dosoti dūsito ceva dūsako ca. Uppanne hi dose puggalo tena dosena
tika-vin04t:1409_1: dūsito hoti, pakatibhāvaṃ jahāpito, tasmā “duṭṭho”ti vuccati. Parañca dūseti vināseti,
tika-vin04t:1409_2: tasmā “doso”ti vuccati. Iti “duṭṭho doso”ti ekassevetaṃ puggalassa ākāranānattena
tika-vin04t:1409_3: nidassanaṃ. Appatītoti nappatīto, pītisukhādīhi vivajjito, na abhisaṭoti attho. Amūlakenāti
tika-vin04t:1409_4: yaṃ codakena cuditakamhi puggale adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ, idaṃ etesaṃ dassanasavanaparisaṅkāsaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1409_5: mūlānaṃ abhāvato amūlakaṃ nāma. Taṃ pana so āpanno vā hotu, anāpanno vā, etaṃ idha
tika-vin04t:1409_6: appamāṇaṃ. Ettha ca adiṭṭhaṃ nāma attano pasādacakkhunā vā dibbacakkhunā vā adiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1409_7: assutaṃ nāma tatheva kenaci vuccamānaṃ na sutaṃ, aparisaṅkitaṃ nāma attano vā parassa
tika-vin04t:1409_8: vā diṭṭhasutamutavasena cetasā aparisaṅkitaṃ, iti evarūpena amūlakena. Pārājikenāti
tika-vin04t:1409_9: bhikkhuno anurūpesu ekūnavīsatiyā aññatarena, padabhājane pana pārājikuddese āgatāneva
tika-vin04t:1409_10: gahetvā “catunnaṃ aññatarenā”ti vuttaṃ. Anuddhaṃseyyāti dhaṃseyya viddhaṃseyya padhaṃseyya
tika-vin04t:1409_11: abhibhaveyya. Taṃ pana anuddhaṃsanaṃ yasmā attanā codentopi parena codāpentopi karoti,
tika-vin04t:1409_12: tasmāssa padabhājane “codeti vā codāpeti vā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha vatthusandassanā āpattisandassanā
tika-vin04t:1409_13: saṃvāsappaṭikkhepo sāmīcippaṭikkhepoti saṅkhepato catasso codanā. Tāsu vatthusandassanā
tika-vin04t:1409_14: nāma “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”tiādinā nayena pavattā. Āpattisandassanā nāma
tika-vin04t:1409_15: “tvaṃ methunadhammāpattiṃ āpanno”tiādinā nayena pavattā. Saṃvāsappaṭikkhepo nāma
tika-vin04t:1409_16: “natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti evaṃ pavatto. Ettāvatā
tika-vin04t:1409_17: pana sīsaṃ na eti, “assamaṇosī”tiādīhi vacanehi saddhiṃ ghaṭiteyeva sīsaṃ eti. Sāmīcippaṭikkhepo
tika-vin04t:1409_19: vandanādīni karoto ekassa akatvā sesānaṃ karaṇakāle veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā ca codanā
tika-vin04t:1409_20: nāma hoti, āpatti pana sīsaṃ na eti. “Kasmā mama vandanādīni na karosī”ti pucchite
tika-vin04t:1409_21: pana “assamaṇosī”tiādivacanehi saddhiṃ ghaṭiteyeva sīsaṃ eti, tasmā yo bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin04t:1409_22: samīpe ṭhatvā “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”ti vā “assamaṇosī”ti vā ādīhi vacanehi
tika-vin04t:1409_23: hatthamuddāya eva vā etamatthaṃ dīpento sayaṃ vā codeti, gahaṭṭhapabbajitesu vā aññatarena
tika-vin04t:1409_24: codāpeti, ayaṃ anuddhaṃseti nāma. Appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyanti
tika-vin04t:1409_25: api eva nāma naṃ puggalaṃ imamhā seṭṭhacariyā apaneyyaṃ. “Sādhu vatassa sacāhaṃ imaṃ
tika-vin04t:1409_26: puggalaṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti iminā adhippāyena anuddhaṃseyyāti vuttaṃ
tika-vin04t:1409_27: hoti. Etena ekaṃ cāvanādhippāyaṃ gahetvā avasesā akkosādhippāyo kammādhippāyo vuṭṭhānādhippāyo
tika-vin04t:1409_29: satta adhippāyā paṭikkhittā honti. Tato aparena samayenāti yasmiṃ samaye anuddhaṃsito
tika-vin04t:1409_30: hoti, tato aññasmiṃ samaye. Samanuggāhīyamāno vāti anuvijjakena kiṃ te diṭṭhantiādinā
tika-vin04t:1409_31: nayena anuvijjiyamāno upaparikkhiyamāno. Asamanuggāhīyamāno vāti diṭṭhādīsu kenaci
tika-vin04t:1409_32: vatthunāvā anuvijjakādīsu yena kenaci puggalena vā avuccamāno. Imesaṃ pana padānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1409_33: parato “bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhātī”ti iminā sambandho. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1409_34: samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti paṭicca tiṭṭhati
tika-vin04t:1409_35: paṭijānāti, saṅghādisesoti. Idañca amūlakabhāvassa pākaṭakāladassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1409_36: Āpattiṃ pana anuddhaṃsitakkhaṇeyeva āpajjati. Amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hotīti
tika-vin04t:1409_37: ettha pana diṭṭhamūlādīnaṃ abhāvena amūlakaṃ, samathehi adhikaraṇīyabhāvena adhikaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1409_38: Yañhi adhikicca ārabbha paṭicca sandhāya samathā pavattanti, taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ. Idha
tika-vin04t:1409_39: pana pārājikasaṅkhātaṃ āpattādhikaraṇameva adhippetaṃ. Yadi hi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ diṭṭhādīhi
tika-vin04t:1409_40: mūlehi amūlakañceva hoti, ayaṃ codetuṃ āgato bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti paṭicca
tika-vin04t:1409_41: tiṭṭhati, “tucchakaṃ mayā bhaṇita”ntiādīni vadanto paṭijānāti, tassa bhikkhuno anuddhaṃsitakkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin04t:1410_0: Rājagahe mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha amūlakena pārājikena anuddhaṃsanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1410_1: paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, sāṇattikaṃ, katūpasampadaṃ suddhaṃ vā asuddhaṃ vā puggalaṃ
tika-vin04t:1410_2: yena pārājikena codeti, taṃ “ayaṃ anajjhāpanno”ti ñatvā cāvanādhippāyena “karotu
tika-vin04t:1410_3: me āyasmā okāsaṃ, ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ okāsaṃ akāretvā codentassa sace so taṅkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin04t:1410_4: jānāti “maṃ codetī”ti, vācāya vācāya saṅghādiseso ceva dukkaṭañca. Okāsaṃ kāretvā
tika-vin04t:1410_5: codentassa saṅghādisesoyeva. Hatthamuddāya sammukhā codentassāpi eseva nayo. Parammukhā
tika-vin04t:1410_6: codentassa pana sīsaṃ na eti. Attanā samīpe ṭhatvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpeti, so tassa
tika-vin04t:1410_7: vacanena taṃ codeti, codāpakasseva vuttanayena āpattiyo. Atha sopi “mayā diṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1410_8: sutaṃ atthī”ti codeti, dvinnampi jānānaṃ tatheva āpattiyo. Akkosādhippāyena pana
tika-vin04t:1410_9: okāsaṃ akāretvā vadantassa vuttanayeneva pācittiyañceva dukkaṭañca. Okāsaṃ kāretvā
tika-vin04t:1410_10: vadantassa pācittiyameva. Kammādhippāyena asammukhā sattavidhampi kammaṃ karontassa
tika-vin04t:1410_11: dukkaṭameva. Vuṭṭhānādhippāyena “tvaṃ itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, taṃ paṭikarohī”ti
tika-vin04t:1410_12: vadantassa, uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapentassa ca okāsakammaṃ natthi, ṭhapanakkhettaṃ
tika-vin04t:1410_13: pana jānitabbaṃ, anuvijjakassāpi osaṭe vatthusmiṃ “atthetaṃ tavā”ti anuvijjanādhippāyena
tika-vin04t:1410_14: vadantassa okāsakammaṃ natthi, dhammakathikassāpi “yo idañca idañca karoti, ayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1410_15: assamaṇo”tiādinā nayena anodisakaṃ dhammaṃ kathentassa okāsakammaṃ natthi. Sace pana
tika-vin04t:1410_16: odissa niyametvā “asuko ca asuko ca assamaṇo anupāsako”ti katheti, āsanato oruyha
tika-vin04t:1410_17: āpattiṃ desetvā gantabbaṃ. Ummattakādīnañca anāpatti, sīlavipatti, yaṃ codeti vā
tika-vin04t:1410_18: codāpeti vā, tassa “upasampanno”ti saṅkhyupagamanaṃ, tasmiṃ suddhasaññitā, yena pārājikena
tika-vin04t:1410_19: codeti, tassa diṭṭhādivasena amūlakatā, cāvanādhippāyena sammukhācodanā, tassa taṅkhaṇavijānananti
tika-vin04t:1410_20: imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni. Vedanā panettha dukkhāyevāti.
tika-vin04t:1413_0: Navame aññabhāgiyassātiādīsu aññabhāgassa idaṃ, aññabhāgo vā assa atthīti aññabhāgiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1413_1: Adhikaraṇanti ādhāro veditabbo, vatthu adhiṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo hi so aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1413_2: “dabbo mallaputto nāmā”ti chagalako vutto. So yvāyaṃ āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa
tika-vin04t:1413_3: bhāgo koṭṭhāso pakkho manussajāti ceva bhikkhubhāvo ca, tato aññassa bhāgassa koṭṭhāsassa
tika-vin04t:1413_4: pakkhassa hoti tiracchānajātiyā ceva chagalakabhāvassa ca, so vā aññabhāgo assa atthi,
tika-vin04t:1413_5: tasmā aññabhāgiyasaṅkhyaṃ labhati. Yasmā ca tesaṃ “imaṃ mayaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ
tika-vin04t:1413_6: nāma karomā”ti vadantānaṃ tassa nāmakaraṇasaññāya ādhāro vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin04t:1413_7: “adhikaraṇa”nti veditabbo. Tañhi sandhāya “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ
tika-vin04t:1413_8: aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na vivādādhikaraṇādīsu aññataraṃ, kasmā?
tika-vin04t:1413_9: Asambhavato. Na hi mettiyabhūmajakā catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ kassaci aññabhāgiyassa
tika-vin04t:1413_10: adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ uppādiyiṃsu, na ca catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ leso
tika-vin04t:1413_11: nāma atthi. Jātilesādayo hi puggalānaṃyeva lesā vuttā, na vivādādhikaraṇādīnaṃ. Tañca
tika-vin04t:1413_12: “dabbo mallaputto”ti nāmaṃ tassa aññabhāgiyādhikaraṇabhāve ṭhitassa chagalakassa
tika-vin04t:1413_13: koci deso hoti theraṃ pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsetuṃ lesamatto, ettha ca dissati
tika-vin04t:1413_14: apadissati “assa aya”nti voharīyatīti deso, jātiādīsu aññatarakoṭṭhāsassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1413_15: Aññampi vatthuṃ lissati silissati vohāramatteneva īsakaṃ allīyatīti leso, jātiādīnaṃyeva
tika-vin04t:1413_16: aññatarakoṭṭhāsassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Padabhājane pana yassa aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa
tika-vin04t:1413_17: kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya, taṃ yasmā aṭṭhuppattivaseneva
tika-vin04t:1413_18: āvibhūtaṃ, tasmā taṃ avibhajitvā yāni “adhikaraṇa”nti vacanasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena
tika-vin04t:1413_19: pavattāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni, tesaṃ aññabhāgiyatā ca tabbhāgiyatā ca yasmā apākaṭā,
tika-vin04t:1413_20: jānitabbā ca vinayadharehi, tasmā tañca avasāne āpattaññabhāgiyena codanañca āvikātuṃ
tika-vin04t:1413_21: “aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassāti āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ vā hoti adhikaraṇaññabhāgiyaṃ vā”tiādi
tika-vin04t:1413_22: vuttaṃ, sesā vinicchayakathā aṭṭhame vuttasadisāyeva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – idaṃ aññabhāgiyassa
tika-vin04t:1413_23: adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1413_24: paññattaṃ, idha ca āpattaññabhāgiyacodanāya tathāsaññinopi anāpatti. Aṅgesu ca aññabhāgiyassa
tika-vin04t:1416_0: Dasame samaggassa saṅghassāti sahitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa, cittena ca sarīrena ca
tika-vin04t:1416_1: aviyuttassāti attho. Tenevassa padabhājane “samaggo nāma saṅgho samānasaṃvāsako samānasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1416_2: ṭhito”ti vuttaṃ. Samānasaṃvāsako hi samacittatāya cittena aviyutto hoti, samānasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1416_3: ṭhito kāyasāmaggidānato sarīrena aviyutto. Bhedāya parakkameyyāti “kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1416_4: bhijjeyyā”ti bhedanatthāya vāyāmeyya. Bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇanti bhedanassa
tika-vin04t:1416_5: saṅghabhedassa atthāya saṃvattanikaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Imasmiñhi okāse “kāmahetu kāmanidānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1416_6: kāmādhikaraṇa”nti ādīsu viya kāraṇaṃ “adhikaraṇa”nti adhippetaṃ. Taṃ bhedakaravatthuvasena
tika-vin04t:1416_7: aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ. Samādāyāti gahetvā. Paggayha tiṭṭheyyāti taṃ saṅghabhedassa atthāya
tika-vin04t:1416_8: saṃvattanikaṃ saṅghabhedanibbattisamatthaṃ kāraṇaṃ gahetvā dīpeyya ceva nappaṭinissajjeyya
tika-vin04t:1416_9: ca. Bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyoti ye taṃ paggayha tiṭṭhantaṃ sammukhā passanti, ye
tika-vin04t:1416_10: vā “asukasmiṃ nāma vihāre”ti suṇanti, tehi sabbantimena paricchedena aḍḍhayojanamattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1416_11: gantvāpi yvāyaṃ anantare “māyasmā”tiādivacanakkamo vutto, evamassa vacanīyo. Disvā
tika-vin04t:1416_12: vā sutvā vā avadantānaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Ettha ca māiti padaṃ “parakkamī”tipadena “aṭṭhāsī”tipadena
tika-vin04t:1416_13: ca saddhiṃ “mā parakkami, mā aṭṭhāsī”ti yojetabbaṃ. Sametāyasmā saṅghenāti āyasmā
tika-vin04t:1416_14: saṅghena saddhiṃ sametu samāgacchatu, ekaladdhiko hotūti attho. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Samaggo
tika-vin04t:1416_15: hi saṅgho…pe… viharatīti. Tattha sammodamānoti aññamaññasampattiyā suṭṭhu modamāno.
tika-vin04t:1416_16: Avivadamānoti “ayaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo”ti evaṃ na vivadamāno. Eko uddeso assāti
tika-vin04t:1416_17: ekuddeso, ekato pavattapātimokkhuddesoti attho. Phāsu viharatīti sukhaṃ viharati.
tika-vin04t:1416_18: Evaṃ visumpi saṅghamajjhepi tikkhattuṃ vuccamānassa appaṭinissajjato dukkaṭaṃ. Evañca
tika-vin04t:1416_19: sotiādimhi samanubhāsitabboti samanubhāsanakammaṃ kātabbaṃ. Iccetaṃ kusalanti iti
tika-vin04t:1416_20: etaṃ paṭinissajjanaṃ kusalaṃ khemaṃ sotthibhāvo tassa bhikkhuno. No ce paṭinissajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:1417_0: Rājagahe devadattaṃ ārabbha saṅghabhedāya parakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1417_1: anāṇattikaṃ, samanubhāsanakamme kariyamāne appaṭinissajjantassa ñattipariyosāne dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1417_2: dvīhi kammavācāhi dve thullaccayā, “yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyyā”ti evaṃ yya-kārapattāya
tika-vin04t:1417_3: tatiyakammavācāya tañca dukkaṭaṃ te ca thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti, saṅghādisesoyeva
tika-vin04t:1417_4: tiṭṭhati. Asamanubhāsiyamānassa ca paṭinissajjantassa ca ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1417_5: Sīlavipatti, bhedāya parakkamanaṃ, dhammakammena samanubhāsanaṃ, kammavācāpariyosānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1417_6: appaṭinissajjananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ, akiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1417_7: saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1420_0: Ekādasame tasseva kho panāti yo saṅghabhedāya parakkamati, tasseva. Anuvattakāti
tika-vin04t:1420_1: tassa diṭṭhiṃ khantiṃ ruciṃ gahaṇena anupaṭipajjanakā. Vaggaṃ asāmaggipakkhiyavacanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1420_2: vadantīti vaggavādakā. Yasmā pana tiṇṇaṃ uddhaṃ kammārahā na honti. Na hi saṅgho
tika-vin04t:1420_3: saṅghassa kammaṃ karoti, tasmā “eko vā dve vā tayo vā”ti vuttaṃ. Jānāti noti amhākaṃ
tika-vin04t:1420_4: chandādīni jānāti. Bhāsatīti “evaṃ karomā”ti amhehi saddhiṃ bhāsati. Amhākampetaṃ
tika-vin04t:1420_5: khamatīti yaṃ so karoti, etaṃ amhākampi ruccati. Sametāyasmantānaṃ saṅghenāti āyasmantānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1420_6: cittaṃ saṅghena saddhiṃ sametu samāgacchatu, ekībhāvaṃ gacchatūti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1421_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – idaṃ rājagahe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha devadattassa saṅghabhedāya
tika-vin04t:1421_1: parakkamantassa anuvattanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, aṅgesu ca yathā tattha parakkamanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1424_0: Dvādasame dubbacajātikoti dubbacasabhāvo, vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti attho. Uddesapariyāpannesūti
tika-vin04t:1424_1: uddese pariyāpannesu antogadhesu, “yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyyā”ti evaṃ saṅgahitattā
tika-vin04t:1424_2: anto pātimokkhassa vattamānesūti attho. Sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānoti sahadhammikena
tika-vin04t:1424_3: vuccamāno, kāraṇatthe cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Pañcahi sahadhammikehi sikkhitabbattā,
tika-vin04t:1424_4: tesaṃ vā santakattā “sahadhammika”nti laddhanāmena buddhapaññattena sikkhāpadena
tika-vin04t:1424_5: vuccamānoti attho. Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyāti yena vacanena maṃ vadatha, tato
tika-vin04t:1424_6: mama vacanato viramatha, mā maṃ taṃ vacanaṃ vadathāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vadatu saha dhammenāti
tika-vin04t:1424_7: sahadhammikena sikkhāpadena, sahadhammena vā aññenapi pāsādikabhāvasaṃvattanikena
tika-vin04t:1424_8: vacanena vadetu. Yadidanti vuddhikāraṇadassanatthe nipāto, tena yaṃ idaṃ aññamaññassa
tika-vin04t:1424_9: hitavacanaṃ, āpattito ca vuṭṭhāpanaṃ, tena aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanena.
tika-vin04t:1424_10: Evaṃ saṃvaddhāhi tassa bhagavato parisāti evaṃ parisāya vuddhikāraṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1425: Ayaṃ pana viseso – idaṃ kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha attānaṃ avacanīyakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, aṅgesu ca yathā tattha parakkamanaṃ, evaṃ idha avacanīyakaraṇatā daṭṭhabbāti.
tika-vin04t:1428_0: Terasame gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃvāti ettha nagarampi gāme antogadhameva. Upanissāya viharatītitattha
tika-vin04t:1428_1: paṭibaddhacīvarādipaccayatāya taṃ nissāya vasati. Pupphadānādīhi manussānaṃ saddhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1428_2: vināsento kulāni dūsetīti kuladūsako. Mālāvaccharopanādayo pāpakā samācārā assāti
tika-vin04t:1428_3: pāpasamācāro. So bhikkhūti so kuladūsako bhikkhu. Āyasmā kho kuladūsako…pe… alaṃ
tika-vin04t:1428_4: te idha vāsenāti imināssa pabbājanīyakammārahataṃ dasseti. Pabbājanīyakammakato panesa
tika-vin04t:1428_5: yasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā kuladūsakakammaṃ kataṃ, yasmiñca vihāre vasati, neva tasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1428_6: gāme vā nigame vā carituṃ labhati, na vihāre vasituṃ. Evañca so bhikkhūtiettha soti
tika-vin04t:1428_7: pabbājanīyakammakato adhippeto. Chandena gacchantīti chandagāmino, esa nayo sesesu.
tika-vin04t:1428_8: So bhikkhūti so “chandagāmino”tiādīni vadamāno. Tassa vacanassa paṭinissaggāya evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1428_9: vacanīyo, na kuladūsananivāraṇatthāya. Kuladūsanakammena hi so āpajjitabbā āpattiyo
tika-vin04t:1428_10: pubbeva āpanno, evaṃ panassa visumpi saṅghamajjhepi vuccamānassa appaṭinissajjato
tika-vin04t:1428_11: aparaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Evañca sotiādi ito pubbe vuttañca avuttañca sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.
tika-vin04t:1429_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – idaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ assajipunabbasuke bhikkhū ārabbha chandagāmitādīhi
tika-vin04t:1429_1: pāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, aṅgesu ca yathā tattha parakkamanaṃ, evaṃ idha chandādīhi
tika-vin04t:1432_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho…pe… evametaṃ dhārayāmītiettha paṭhamaṃ āpatti etesanti paṭhamāpattikā,
tika-vin04t:1432_1: paṭhamaṃ vītikkamanakkhaṇeyeva āpajjitabbāti attho. Itare pana yathā tatiye ca catutthe
tika-vin04t:1432_2: ca divase hotīti ettha “tatiyako, catutthako”ti vuccati, evaṃ yāvatatiye samanubhāsanakamme
tika-vin04t:1432_3: hontīti yāvatatiyakāti veditabbā. Yāvatīhanti yattakāni ahāni. Jānaṃ paṭicchādetīti
tika-vin04t:1432_4: jānanto paṭicchādeti. Tatthāyaṃ paṭicchādanalakkhaṇassa mātikā – āpatti ca hoti,
tika-vin04t:1432_5: āpattisaññī ca, pakatatto ca hoti, pakatattasaññī ca, anantarāyiko ca hoti, anantarāyikasaññī
tika-vin04t:1432_6: ca, pahu ca hoti, pahusaññī ca, chādetukāmo ca hoti, chādeti cāti. Tattha āpatti
tika-vin04t:1432_7: ca hoti, āpattisaññī cāti yaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, sā terasannaṃ aññatarā hoti, sopi ca
tika-vin04t:1432_8: tattha vatthuvasena vā “idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti nāmamattavasena vā “ayaṃ itthannāmā
tika-vin04t:1432_9: āpattī”ti āpattisaññīyeva hutvā “na dāni naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”ti evaṃ chādetukāmova
tika-vin04t:1432_10: dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeti, channā hoti āpatti. Sace panettha anāpattisaññī
tika-vin04t:1432_11: vā hoti, aññāpattikkhandhasaññī vā, vematiko vā, acchannāva hoti. Pakatattoti anukkhitto
tika-vin04t:1432_12: samānasaṃvāsako. So ce pakatattasaññī hutvā vuttanayeneva chādeti, channā hoti. Anantarāyikoti
tika-vin04t:1432_14: ekopi natthi, so ce anantarāyikasaññī chādeti, channā hoti. Pahūti yo sakkoti bhikkhuno
tika-vin04t:1432_15: santikaṃ gantuñceva ārocetuñca, so ce pahusaññī hutvā chādeti, channā hoti. Chādetukāmo
tika-vin04t:1432_16: ca hoti, chādeti cātiidaṃ uttānameva. Sacepi hi so sabhāgaṃ disvā “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo
tika-vin04t:1432_17: vā ācariyo vā”ti lajjāya nāroceti, channāva hoti. Upajjhāyādibhāvo hi idha appamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1432_18: sabhāgamattameva pamāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ “jānaṃ paṭicchādetī”tipadassa saṅkhepato atthavinicchayo.
tika-vin04t:1433_0: Tāvatīhanti tattakāni ahāni, paṭicchāditadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva ārocitadivaso, tāva
tika-vin04t:1433_1: divasapakkhamāsasaṃvaccharavasena yattako kālo atikkanto, tattakaṃ kālanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1433_2: Akāmā parivatthabbanti na kāmena na vasena, atha kho akāmena avasena parivāsaṃ samādāya
tika-vin04t:1433_3: vatthabbaṃ. Tattha paṭicchannaparivāso suddhantaparivāso samodhānaparivāso cāti tividho
tika-vin04t:1433_4: parivāso. Tattha paṭicchannaparivāso tāva yathāpaṭicchannāya āpattiyā dātabbo. Kassaci
tika-vin04t:1433_5: hi ekāhappaṭicchannā āpatti hoti, kassaci dvīhādippaṭicchannā. Kassaci ekā āpatti
tika-vin04t:1433_6: hoti, kassaci dve vā tisso vā taduttari vā. Tasmā paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ dentena paṭhamameva
tika-vin04t:1433_7: vuttanayena paṭicchannabhāvaṃ ñatvā tato paṭicchannadivase ca āpattiyo ca sallakkhetvā
tika-vin04t:1433_8: sace ekā ekāhappaṭicchannā hoti, “ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1433_9: sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchanna”nti evaṃ parivāsaṃ yācāpetvā khandhake āgatanayena
tika-vin04t:1433_10: kammavācaṃ vatvā parivāso dātabbo. Atha dvīhatīhādippaṭicchannā hoti, dvīhappaṭicchannaṃ
tika-vin04t:1433_12: yāva cuddasadivasāni divasavasena yojanā kātabbā, pañcadasadivasappaṭicchannāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1433_13: “pakkhappaṭicchanna”nti yojanā kātabbā. Tato yāva ekūnatiṃsatimo divaso, tāva “atirekapakkhappaṭicchanna”nti,
tika-vin04t:1433_15: temāsappaṭicchannaṃ…pe… atirekaekādasamāsappaṭicchannanti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā. Saṃvacchare
tika-vin04t:1434_0: Sace pana dve tisso taduttari vā āpattiyo honti, yathā “ekaṃ āpatti”nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1434_1: “dve āpattiyo, tisso āpattiyo”ti vattabbaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana sataṃ vā hotu, sahassaṃ
tika-vin04t:1434_2: vā, “sambahulā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Nānāvatthukāsupi “ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā
tika-vin04t:1434_3: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekaṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ ekaṃ duṭṭhullavācaṃ ekaṃ
tika-vin04t:1434_4: attakāmaṃ ekaṃ sañcarittaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ gaṇanavasena vā, “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1434_5: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukāyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1434_6: vatthukittanavasena vā, “ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti
tika-vin04t:1434_7: evaṃ nāmamattavasena vā yojanā kātabbā. Tattha nāmaṃ duvidhaṃ sajātisādhāraṇaṃ sabbasādhāraṇañca,
tika-vin04t:1434_8: tattha saṅghādisesoti sajātisādhāraṇaṃ, āpattīti sabbasādhāraṇaṃ, tasmā “sambahulā
tika-vin04t:1434_9: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇanāmavasenāpi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1434_10: Idañhi parivāsādivinayakammaṃ vatthuvasena gottavasena nāmavasena āpattivasena ca
tika-vin04t:1434_11: kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Tattha sukkavissaṭṭhīti vatthu ceva gottañca, saṅghādisesoti nāmañceva
tika-vin04t:1434_14: nāmañceva āpatti ca gahitā hoti, tasmā etesu yassa kassaci vasena kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin04t:1435_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca sace appabhikkhuko āvāso hoti, sakkā ratticchedaṃ anāpajjantena
tika-vin04t:1435_1: vasituṃ, tattheva “parivāsaṃ samādiyāmi, vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ vattaṃ samādātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1435_2: samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetvā puna āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocentena vattabhedañca
tika-vin04t:1435_3: ratticchedañca akatvā parivasitabbaṃ. Sace na sakkā hoti parivāsaṃ sodhetuṃ, nikkhittavattena
tika-vin04t:1435_4: vasitukāmo hoti, tattheva saṅghamajjhe, ekapuggalassa vā santike “parivāsaṃ nikkhipāmi,
tika-vin04t:1435_5: vattaṃ nikkhipāmī”ti parivāso nikkhipitabbo, ekapadenāpi cettha nikkhitto hoti parivāso,
tika-vin04t:1435_6: dvīhi pana sunikkhittoyeva, samādānepi eseva nayo. Nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne
tika-vin04t:1435_7: tiṭṭhati, athānena paccūsasamaye ekena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ parikkhittassa vihārassa
tika-vin04t:1435_8: parikkhepato, aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato
tika-vin04t:1435_9: okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditvā antoaruṇeyeva vattaṃ samādiyitvā
tika-vin04t:1435_10: ārocetabbaṃ. Yampi aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati, tassāpi ārocetabbameva. Aruṇe uṭṭhite
tika-vin04t:1435_11: tassa santike vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vihāraṃ gantabbaṃ. Sace so pure aruṇeyeva kenaci
tika-vin04t:1435_12: karaṇīyena gato, vihāraṃ gantvā yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati, tassa ārocetvā
tika-vin04t:1435_13: nikkhipitabbaṃ. Evaṃ sallakkhetvā yāva rattiyo pūrenti, tāva parivatthabbaṃ, ayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1435_14: saṅkhepato paṭicchannaparivāsavinicchayo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-vin04t:1436_0: Itaresu pana dvīsu “āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānātī”ti imasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1436_1: vatthusmiṃ khandhake anuññāto suddhantaparivāso nāma, so duvidho cūḷasuddhanto mahāsuddhantoti,
tika-vin04t:1436_2: duvidhopi cesa rattiparicchedaṃ sakalaṃ vā ekaccaṃ vā ajānantassa ca assarantassa
tika-vin04t:1436_3: ca tattha vematikassa ca dātabbo. Āpattipariyantaṃ pana “ettikā ahaṃ āpattiyo āpanno”ti
tika-vin04t:1436_4: jānātu vā, mā vā, akāraṇametaṃ. Tassa dānavidhi khandhake āgato, vinicchayakathā
tika-vin04t:1436_5: pana vitthārato samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttā. Itaro pana samodhānaparivāso nāma, so tividho
tika-vin04t:1436_6: hoti odhānasamodhāno agghasamodhāno missakasamodhānoti. Tattha odhānasamodhāno nāma
tika-vin04t:1436_7: antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādentassa parivutthadivase odhunitvā makkhetvā purimāya
tika-vin04t:1436_8: āpattiyā mūladivasaparicchede pacchā āpannaṃ āpattiṃ samodahitvā dātabbaparivāso
tika-vin04t:1436_9: vuccati. Agghasamodhāno nāma sambahulāsu āpattīsu yā ekā vā dve vā tisso vā sambahulā
tika-vin04t:1436_10: vā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo, tāsaṃ agghena samodhāya tāsaṃ rattiparicchedavasena
tika-vin04t:1436_11: avasesānaṃ ūnatarappaṭicchannānaṃ āpattīnaṃ dātabbaparivāso vuccati. Missakasamodhāno
tika-vin04t:1436_12: nāma nānāvatthukāyo āpattiyo ekato katvā dātabbaparivāso vuccati, ayaṃ tividhepi
tika-vin04t:1436_13: samodhānaparivāse saṅkhepakathā, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto, idaṃ “parivatthabba”nti
tika-vin04t:1437_0: Uttari chārattanti parivāsato uttari cha rattiyo. Bhikkhumānattāyāti bhikkhūnaṃ mānabhāvāya,
tika-vin04t:1437_1: ārādhanatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭipajjitabbanti vattitabbaṃ. Bhikkhumānattañca panetaṃ
tika-vin04t:1437_2: paṭicchannāpaṭicchannavasena duvidhaṃ. Tattha yassa appaṭicchannāpatti hoti, tassa
tika-vin04t:1437_3: parivāsaṃ adatvā mānattameva dātabbaṃ, idaṃ appaṭicchannamānattaṃ. Yassa paṭicchannā
tika-vin04t:1437_4: hoti, tassa parivāsapariyosāne dātabbaṃ mānattaṃ paṭicchannamānattanti vuccati, idaṃ
tika-vin04t:1437_5: idha adhippetaṃ. Ubhinnampi panetesaṃ dānavidhi vinicchayakathā ca samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1437_6: vuttanayena veditabbā, ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo. Sace ayaṃ vattaṃ nikkhipitvā paccūsasamaye
tika-vin04t:1437_7: samādātuṃ gacchati, sabbantimena paricchedena catūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ parivāse vuttappakāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1437_8: padesaṃ gantvā “mānattaṃ samādiyāmi, vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti samādiyitvā nesaṃ ārocetvā
tika-vin04t:1437_9: tato tesu gatesu vā agatesu vā purimanayena paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Yattha siyā vīsatigaṇoti
tika-vin04t:1437_10: ettha vīsatisaṅgho gaṇo assāti vīsatigaṇo. Tatrāti yatra sabbantimena paricchedena
tika-vin04t:1437_11: vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho atthi, tattha. Abbhetabboti abhietabbo, sampaṭicchitabbo,
tika-vin04t:1437_12: abbhānakammavasena osāretabboti vuttaṃ hoti. Avhātabboti vā attho. Abbhānakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1437_13: pana pāḷivasena khandhake vinicchayavasena samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Anabbhitoti
tika-vin04t:1437_14: na abbhito asampaṭicchito, akatabbhānakammoti vuttaṃ hoti. Anavhātoti vā attho. Te
tika-vin04t:1437_15: ca bhikkhū gārayhāti ye ūnabhāvaṃ ñatvā abbhenti, te bhikkhū ca garahitabbā, sātisārā
tika-vin04t:1437_16: sadosā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjantīti attho. Ayaṃ tattha sāmīcīti ayaṃ tattha anudhammatā lokuttaradhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1437_17: anugatā ovādānusāsanī sāmīci dhammatā. Sesamettha vuttanayamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1442_0: Aniyatuddese ime kho panātiādi vuttanayameva. Mātugāmenāti tadahujātāyapi jīvamānakamanussitthiyā.
tika-vin04t:1442_1: Eko ekāyāti eko bhikkhu mātugāmasaṅkhātāya ekāya itthiyā saddhiṃ. Rahoti cakkhussa
tika-vin04t:1442_2: raho. Kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ sotassa raho āgato, cakkhusseva pana raho “raho”ti idha adhippeto.
tika-vin04t:1442_3: Sacepi hi pihitakavāṭassa gabbhassa dvāre nisinno viññū puriso hoti, neva anāpattiṃ
tika-vin04t:1442_4: karoti. Yattha pana sakkā daṭṭhuṃ, tādise antodvādasahatthepi okāse nisinno sacakkhuko
tika-vin04t:1442_5: vikkhittacittopi niddāyantopi anāpattiṃ karoti, samīpe ṭhitopi andho na karoti, cakkhumāpi
tika-vin04t:1442_6: nipajjitvā niddāyantopi na karoti, itthīnaṃ pana satampi na karotiyeva, tena vuttaṃ
tika-vin04t:1442_7: “rahoti cakkhussa raho”ti. Paṭicchanne āsaneti kuṭṭādīhi paṭicchannokāse. Alaṃkammaniyeti
tika-vin04t:1442_8: kammakkhamaṃ kammayogganti kammaniyaṃ, alaṃ pariyattaṃ kammaniyabhāvāyāti alaṃkammaniyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1442_9: tasmiṃ alaṃkammaniye. Yattha ajjhācāraṃ karontā sakkonti taṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ, tādiseti
tika-vin04t:1442_10: attho. Nisajjaṃ kappeyyāti nisajjaṃ kareyya, nisīdeyyāti attho. Ettha ca sayanampi
tika-vin04t:1442_11: nisajjāya eva saṅgahitaṃ. Saddheyyavacasāti saddhātabbavacanā, ariyasāvikāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1442_12: Nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamānoti kiñcāpi evarūpā upāsikā disvā vadati, atha kho bhikkhu
tika-vin04t:1442_13: nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānova tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabbo, na appaṭijānamānoti
tika-vin04t:1442_14: attho. Yena vā sāti nisajjādīsu ākāresu yena vā ākārena saddhiṃ methunādīni āropetvā
tika-vin04t:1442_15: sā upāsikā vadeyya, paṭijānamānova tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo, evarūpāyapi hi upāsikāya
tika-vin04t:1442_16: vacanamattena ākārena na kāretabboti attho. Kasmā? Yasmā diṭṭhaṃ nāma tathāpi hoti,
tika-vin04t:1442_17: aññathāpīti. Ayaṃ dhammo aniyatoti tiṇṇaṃ āpattīnaṃ yaṃ āpattiṃ vā vatthuṃ vā paṭijānāti,
tika-vin04t:1443_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha mātugāmena saddhiṃ vuttappakāre āsane nisajjakappanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1443_2: rahassādena mātugāmassa santikaṃ gantukāmatāya akkhiañjanādito paṭṭhāya sabbapayogesu
tika-vin04t:1443_3: dukkaṭaṃ. Gantvā tasmiṃ vā nisinne itthī nisīdatu, tassā vā nisinnāya so nisīdatu,
tika-vin04t:1443_4: apacchā apurimaṃyeva ubho vā nisīdantu, ubhinnaṃ nisajjāya pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana
tika-vin04t:1443_5: kāyasaṃsaggaṃ vā methunaṃ vā samāpajjati, tesaṃ vasena kāretabbo. Nipajjanepi eseva
tika-vin04t:1443_6: nayo. Vuttappakāre purise nipajjitvā aniddāyante anandhe viññupurise upacāragate
tika-vin04t:1443_7: sati, ṭhitassa, arahopekkhassa, aññavihitassa ca nisajjanapaccayā anāpatti. Ummattakādīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1443_8: pana tīhipi āpattīhi anāpatti. Siyā sīlavipatti, siyā ācāravipatti. Yaṃ pana āpattiṃ
tika-vin04t:1443_9: paṭijānāti, tassā vasena aṅgabhedo ñātabbo. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1446_0: Dutiye itthīpi purisopi yo koci viññū anandho abadhiro antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhito
tika-vin04t:1446_1: vā nisinno vā vikkhittopi niddāyantopi anāpattiṃ karoti. Badhiro pana cakkhumāpi,
tika-vin04t:1446_2: andho vā abadhiropi na karoti. Pārājikāpattiñca parihāpetvā duṭṭhullavācāpatti vuttāti
tika-vin04t:1446_3: ayaṃ viseso. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Samuṭṭhānādīni panettha adinnādānasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1452: Ito paraṃ pana ime kho panātiādi sabbattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1455_0: Nissaggiyesu pana cīvaravaggassa tāva paṭhamasikkhāpade niṭṭhitacīvarasminti sūcikammapariyosānena
tika-vin04t:1455_1: vā, “naṭṭhaṃ vā vinaṭṭhaṃ vā daḍḍhaṃ vā cīvarāsā vā upacchinnā”ti imesu vā yena kenaci
tika-vin04t:1455_2: ākārena niṭṭhite cīvarasmiṃ, cīvarassa karaṇapalibodhe upacchinneti attho. Atthatakathinassa
tika-vin04t:1455_3: hi bhikkhuno yāva imehākārehi cīvarapalibodho na chijjati, tāva kathinānisaṃsaṃ labhati.
tika-vin04t:1455_4: Ubbhatasmiṃ kathineti yaṃ saṅghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ, tasmiñca ubbhate. Tatrevaṃ
tika-vin04t:1455_5: saṅkhepato kathinatthāro ca ubbhāro ca veditabbo. Ayañhi kathinatthāro nāma bhagavatā
tika-vin04t:1455_6: purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ anuññāto, so sabbantimena paricchedena pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1455_7: tasmā yattha cattāro vā tayo vā dve vā eko vā purimavassaṃ upagato, tattha pacchimavassūpagate
tika-vin04t:1455_8: gaṇapūrake katvā attharitabbaṃ, te ca gaṇapūrakāva honti, ānisaṃse na labhanti, tasmā
tika-vin04t:1455_9: sace purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitesu yo koci dhammena samena cīvaraṃ deti
tika-vin04t:1455_10: “iminā kathinaṃ attharathā”ti, taṃ khandhake vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya kathinatthārārahassa
tika-vin04t:1455_11: bhikkhuno dātabbaṃ. Tena tadaheva pañca vā atirekāni vā khaṇḍāni chinditvā saṅghāṭi
tika-vin04t:1455_12: vā uttarāsaṅgo vā antaravāsako vā kātabbo, sesabhikkhūhipi tassa sahāyehi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1455_13: sace katacīvarameva uppajjati, sundarameva. Acchinnāsibbitaṃ pana na vaṭṭati. Tena
tika-vin04t:1455_14: bhikkhunā sace saṅghāṭiyā attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇikaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharitvā
tika-vin04t:1455_15: navaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā “imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī”ti attharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1455_16: Uttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakesupi eseva nayo. Tato tena purimavassaṃvuṭṭhe antosīmāgate
tika-vin04t:1455_17: bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā “atthataṃ, bhante, saṅghassa kathinaṃ, dhammiko kathinatthāro,
tika-vin04t:1455_18: anumodathā”ti vattabbaṃ, therānañca navānañca bahūnañca ekassa ca anurūpaṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin04t:1455_19: vattabbaṃ. Tehipi “atthataṃ, bhante, saṅghassa kathina”nti vā “atthataṃ, āvuso, saṅghassa
tika-vin04t:1455_20: kathina”nti vā vatvā “dhammiko kathinatthāro, anumodāmā”ti vā “anumodāmī”ti vā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1455_21: Purimavassaṃvuṭṭhesupi ye anumodanti, tesaṃyeva atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ. Te tato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin04t:1455_22: yāva kathinassubbhārā anāmantacāro, asamādānacāro, yāvadatthacīvaraṃ, gaṇabhojanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1455_23: yo ca tattha cīvaruppādo, tasmiṃ āvāse saṅghassa uppannacīvarañcāti ime pañcānisaṃse
tika-vin04t:1455_24: labhanti, ayaṃ tāva kathinatthāro. Taṃ panetaṃ kathinaṃ “aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā
tika-vin04t:1455_25: kathinassubbhārāya pakkamanantikā niṭṭhānantikā sanniṭṭhānantikā nāsanantikā savanantikā
tika-vin04t:1455_26: āsāvacchedikā sīmātikkamanantikā sahubbhārā”ti evaṃ vuttāsu aṭṭhasu mātikāsu aññataravasena
tika-vin04t:1455_27: uddharīyati, tattha vitthāravinicchayo samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1456_0: Dasāhaparamanti dasa ahāni paramo paricchedo assāti dasāhaparamo, taṃ dasāhaparamaṃ
tika-vin04t:1456_1: kālaṃ dhāretabbanti attho. Adhiṭṭhitavikappitesu apariyāpannattā atirekaṃ cīvaranti
tika-vin04t:1456_2: atirekacīvaraṃ, cīvaraṃ nāma khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅganti
tika-vin04t:1456_3: etesaṃ vā tadanulomānaṃ vā aññataraṃ ayamassa jāti, pamāṇato pana taṃ vikappanupagaṃ
tika-vin04t:1456_4: pacchimaṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āyāmato aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ
tika-vin04t:1456_5: sugataṅgulena caturaṅgulavitthataṃ pacchimaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetu”nti. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ
