tika-vin04t:1456_7: adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ, vassikasāṭikaṃ vassānaṃ catumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ
tika-vin04t:1456_8: vikappetuṃ, nisīdanaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ paccattharaṇaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1456_9: kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ yāva ābādhā adhiṭṭhātuṃ tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ, mukhapuñchanacoḷakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1456_10: adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetuṃ, parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”nti iminā nayena
tika-vin04t:1456_11: adhiṭṭhātabbavikappetabbatā jānitabbā. Tattha ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhahantena rajitvā kappabinduṃ
tika-vin04t:1456_12: datvā pamāṇayuttameva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, tassa pamāṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena sugatacīvarato
tika-vin04t:1456_13: ūnakaṃ vaṭṭati, lāmakaparicchedena saṅghāṭiyā tāva uttarāsaṅgassa ca dīghato muṭṭhipañcakaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1456_14: tiriyaṃ muṭṭhittikaṃ, antaravāsako dīghato muṭṭhipañcako, tiriyaṃ dvihatthopi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1456_15: Vuttappamāṇato pana atirekañca ūnakañca “parikkhāracoḷa”nti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin04t:1456_16: yasmā “dve cīvarassa adhiṭṭhānāni kāyena vā adhiṭṭheti, vācāya vā adhiṭṭhetī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1456_17: tasmā purāṇasaṅghāṭiṃ “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paccuddharāmī”ti paccuddharitvā navaṃ hatthena
tika-vin04t:1456_18: gahetvā “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti cittena ābhogaṃ katvā kāyavikāraṃ karontena
tika-vin04t:1456_19: kāyena vā adhiṭṭhātabbā, vacībhedaṃ katvā vācāya vā adhiṭṭhātabbā. Tatra duvidhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1456_20: adhiṭṭhānaṃ – sace hatthapāse hoti, “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1456_21: Atha antogabbhādīsu sāmantavihāre vā hoti, ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā “etaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ
tika-vin04t:1456_22: adhiṭṭhāmī”ti vācā bhinditabbā. Esa nayo uttarāsaṅge ca antaravāsake ca. Nāmamattameva
tika-vin04t:1456_23: hi viseso. Tasmā sabbāni saṅghāṭiṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ antaravāsakanti evaṃ attano attano
tika-vin04t:1456_24: nāmeneva adhiṭṭhātabbāni. Sace adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitavatthehi saṅghāṭiādīni karoti,
tika-vin04t:1456_25: niṭṭhite rajane ca kappe ca “imaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti paccuddharitvā puna adhiṭṭhātabbāni.
tika-vin04t:1456_26: Idañca pana ticīvaraṃ sukhaparibhogatthaṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1457_0: Vassikasāṭikā anatirittapamāṇā nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttanayeneva cattāro vassike māse adhiṭṭhātabbā,
tika-vin04t:1457_1: tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā, vaṇṇabhedamattarattāpi cesā vaṭṭati, dve
tika-vin04t:1457_2: pana na vaṭṭanti. Nisīdanaṃ vuttanayena adhiṭṭhātabbameva, tañca kho pamāṇayuttaṃ
tika-vin04t:1457_3: ekameva, dve na vaṭṭanti. Paccattharaṇampi adhiṭṭhātabbameva, taṃ pana mahantampi
tika-vin04t:1457_4: ekampi bahūnipi vaṭṭanti, nīlampi pītakampi sadasampi pupphadasampīti sabbappakārampi
tika-vin04t:1457_5: vaṭṭati. Kaṇḍuppaṭicchādi yāva ābādho atthi, tāva pamāṇikā adhiṭṭhātabbā, ābādhe
tika-vin04t:1457_6: vūpasante paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā, sā ekāva vaṭṭati. Mukhapuñchanacoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbameva,
tika-vin04t:1457_7: taṃ pana ekampi bahūnipi mahantampi vaṭṭatiyeva. Parikkhāracoḷe gaṇanā natthi, yattakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1457_8: icchati, tattakaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbameva. Thavikāpi parissāvanampi vikappanupagaṃ pacchimapamāṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1457_9: “parikkhāracoḷa”nti adhiṭṭhātabbameva, bahūnipi ekato katvā “imāni cīvarāni parikkhāracoḷāni
tika-vin04t:1457_10: adhiṭṭhāmī”tiādinā nayena adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Mañcabhisi pīṭhabhisi bibbohanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1457_11: pāvāro kojavoti etesu pana senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇe ca adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ
tika-vin04t:1457_12: natthiyeva. Sabbañca panetaṃ vuttappakārena adhiṭṭhitacīvaraṃ aññassa dānena, acchinditvā
tika-vin04t:1457_13: gahaṇena, vissāsaggāhena, hīnāyāvattanena, sikkhāpaccakkhānena, kālaṅkiriyāya, liṅgaparivattanena,
tika-vin04t:1457_14: paccuddharaṇenāti imehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati. Ticīvaraṃ pana kaniṭṭhaṅgulinakhapiṭṭhippamāṇena
tika-vin04t:1457_15: chiddenāpi vijahati, tañca kho vinibbedheneva. Sace hi chiddassa abbhantare ekatantupi
tika-vin04t:1457_16: acchinno hoti, rakkhatiyeva. Tattha saṅghāṭiyā ca uttarāsaṅgassa ca dīghantato vidatthippamāṇassa
tika-vin04t:1457_17: tiriyantato aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇassa padesassa orato chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhindati, antaravāsakepi
tika-vin04t:1457_18: dīghantato etadeva pamāṇaṃ, tiriyantena pana caturaṅgulatā veditabbā. Tiṇṇannampi
tika-vin04t:1457_19: vuttokāsassa parato na bhindati, tasmā chidde jāte ticīvaraṃ atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne
tika-vin04t:1457_20: tiṭṭhati, sūcikammaṃ katvā puna adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Vassikasāṭikā vassānamāsātikkamenāpi,
tika-vin04t:1457_21: kaṇḍuppaṭicchādi ābādhavūpasamenāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati. Tasmā sā tato paraṃ vikappetabbā.
tika-vin04t:1457_22: Vikappanalakkhaṇaṃ pana sabbacīvarānaṃ vikappanasikkhāpadeyeva vaṇṇayissāma. Kevalañhi
tika-vin04t:1457_23: imasmiṃ okāse yaṃ evaṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitañca, taṃ “atirekacīvara”nti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1458_0: Taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti taṃ yathāvuttajātippamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃdasāhaparamaṃ
tika-vin04t:1458_1: kālaṃ atikkāmayato etthantare yathā atirekacīvaraṃ na hoti, tathā akrubbato nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1458_2: pācittiyaṃ, tañca cīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, pācittiyaṃ āpatti cassa hotīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1458_3: Atha vā nissajjanaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, pubbabhāge kattabbassa vinayakammassetaṃ nāmaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1458_4: nissaggiyamassa atthīti nissaggiyamicceva. Kiṃ taṃ? Pācittiyaṃ. Taṃ atikkāmayato
tika-vin04t:1458_5: saha nissaggiyena nissaggiyavinayakammaṃ pācittiyaṃ hotīti ayamettha attho. Tañca
tika-vin04t:1458_6: panetaṃ cīvaraṃ yaṃ divasaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa yo aruṇo, so uppannadivasanissito, tasmā
tika-vin04t:1458_7: cīvaruppādadivasena saddhiṃ ekādase aruṇuggamane dasāhātikkamitaṃ hoti, taṃ gahetvā
tika-vin04t:1458_8: saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā nissajjitabbaṃ, tatrāyaṃ nayo – saṅghassa tāva
tika-vin04t:1458_9: evaṃ nissajjitabbaṃ “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ dasahātikkantaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1458_10: saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti nissajjitvā “ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ āpanno,
tika-vin04t:1458_11: taṃ paṭidesemī”ti evaṃ āpatti desetabbā. Sace dve honti, “dve”ti vattabbaṃ, sace
tika-vin04t:1458_12: taduttari, “sambahulā”ti vattabbaṃ. Nissajjanepi sace dve vā bahūni vā honti, “imāni
tika-vin04t:1458_13: me, bhante, cīvarāni dasāhātikkantāni nissaggiyāni, imānāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1458_14: vattabbaṃ, pāḷiṃ vattuṃ asakkontena aññathāpi vattabbaṃ. Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena
tika-vin04t:1458_15: saṅgho ñāpetabbo “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati
tika-vin04t:1458_16: vivarati uttāniṃ karoti deseti, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin04t:1458_17: āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇheyya”nti, iminā lakkhaṇena āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇhitvā vattabbo “passasī”ti,
tika-vin04t:1458_18: “āma passāmī”ti, “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti, “sādhu suṭṭhu saṃvarissāmī”ti. Dvīsu pana
tika-vin04t:1458_19: sambahulāsu vā purimanayeneva vacanabhedo kātabbo. Desitāya āpattiyā “suṇātu me,
tika-vin04t:1458_20: bhante, saṅgho, idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1458_21: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā”ti
tika-vin04t:1458_22: evaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvaraṃ dātabbaṃ, dvīsu bahūsu vā vacanabhedo kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1459_0: Gaṇassa pana nissajjantena “imāha”nti vā “imāni aha”nti vā vatvā “āyasmantānaṃ nissajjāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1459_1: vattabbaṃ, āpattippaṭiggāhakenāpi “suṇantu me āyasmantā, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu
tika-vin04t:1459_2: āpattiṃ sarati…pe… deseti, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakalla”nti vattabbaṃ, cīvaradānepi
tika-vin04t:1459_3: “suṇantu me āyasmantā, idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ āyasmantānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1459_4: nissaṭṭhaṃ, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin04t:1459_5: dadeyyu”nti vattabbaṃ, sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Puggalassa pana nissajjantena “imāha”nti
tika-vin04t:1459_6: vā “imāni aha”nti vā vatvā “āyasmato nissajjāmī”ti vattabbaṃ, nissajjitvā “ahaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_7: bhante, ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ āpanno, taṃ paṭidesemī”ti evaṃ āpatti desetabbā.
tika-vin04t:1459_8: Sace pana navakataro hoti, “āvuso”ti vattabbaṃ, tenāpi “passasī”ti vā “passathā”ti
tika-vin04t:1459_9: vā vutte “āma, bhante”ti vā “āma āvuso”ti vā vatvā “passāmī”ti vattabbaṃ, tato “āyatiṃ
tika-vin04t:1459_10: saṃvareyyāsī”ti vā “saṃvareyyāthā”ti vā vutte “sādhu suṭṭhu saṃvarissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1459_11: Evaṃ desitāya āpattiyā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato dammī”ti dātabbaṃ, dvīsu tīsu vā pubbe
tika-vin04t:1459_12: vuttānusāreneva nayo veditabbo. Dvinnaṃ pana yathā gaṇassa, evaṃ nissajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_13: tato āpattippaṭiggahaṇañca nissaṭṭhacīvaradānañca tesaṃ aññatarena yathā ekena puggalena,
tika-vin04t:1459_14: tathā kātabbaṃ, idaṃ pana sabbanissaggiyesu vidhānaṃ. Cīvaraṃ patto nisīdananti vatthumattameva
tika-vin04t:1459_15: hi nānaṃ, parammukhaṃ pana vatthu “eta”nti nissajjitabbaṃ. Sace bahūni honti, “etānī”ti
tika-vin04t:1459_16: vattabbaṃ. Nissaṭṭhadānepi eseva nayo. Nissaṭṭhavatthuṃ “dinnamidaṃ iminā mayha”nti
tika-vin04t:1459_17: saññāya na paṭidentassa dukkaṭaṃ, tassa santakabhāvaṃ ñatvā lesena acchindanto sāmikassa
tika-vin04t:1460_0: Vesāliyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha atirekacīvaradhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “dasāhaparama”nti
tika-vin04t:1460_1: ayamettha anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, anissajjitvā paribhuñjantassa
tika-vin04t:1460_2: dukkaṭaṃ, yathā ca idha, evaṃ sabbattha, tasmā naṃ parato na vakkhāma. Dasāhaṃ anatikkantepi
tika-vin04t:1460_3: atikkantasaññino vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Atikkante anatikkantasaññinopi vematikassapi
tika-vin04t:1460_5: adhiṭṭhitādisaññino. Antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭhite vikappite vissajjite naṭṭhe vinaṭṭhe
tika-vin04t:1460_6: daḍḍhe acchinne vissāsena gāhite ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Ācāravipatti, yathā ca
tika-vin04t:1460_7: idaṃ, evaṃ ito parānipi, ubhatopātimokkhesupi hi pārājikāni ca saṅghādisesā ca sīlavipatti,
tika-vin04t:1460_8: sesāpattiyo ācāravipatti, ājīvavipatti vā diṭṭhivipatti vā kāci āpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin04t:1460_9: Ājīvavipattipaccayā pana ṭhapetvā dubbhāsitaṃ cha āpattikkhandhā paññattā, diṭṭhivipattipaccayā
tika-vin04t:1460_10: pācittiyadukkaṭavasena dve āpattikkhandhā paññattāti, idamettha lakkhaṇaṃ, iti vipattikathā
tika-vin04t:1460_11: idheva niṭṭhitāti, na naṃ ito paraṃ vicārayissāma. Jātippamāṇasampannassa cīvarassa
tika-vin04t:1460_12: attano santakatā, gaṇanupagatā, chinnapalibodhabhāvo, atirekacīvaratā, dasāhātikkamoti
tika-vin04t:1460_13: imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ, akiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1463_0: Dutiye niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunātiettha purimasikkhāpade viya atthaṃ aggahetvā
tika-vin04t:1463_1: niṭṭhite cīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunoti evaṃ sāmivasena karaṇavacanassa attho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1463_2: Karaṇavasena hi bhikkhunā idaṃ nāma kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ natthi, sāmivasena pana
tika-vin04t:1463_3: bhikkhuno cīvarasmiṃ niṭṭhite kathine ca ubbhate evaṃ imehi cīvaraniṭṭhānakathinubbhārehi
tika-vin04t:1463_4: chinnapalibodho ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyyāti evaṃ attho yujjati.
tika-vin04t:1463_5: Tattha ticīvarenāti ticīvarādhiṭṭhānanayena adhiṭṭhitesu saṅghāṭiādīsu yenakenaci.
tika-vin04t:1463_6: Vippavaseyyāti viyutto vaseyya, “gāmo ekūpacāro nānūpacāro”tiādinā nayena pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1463_8: pannarasānaṃ nikkhepaṭṭhānānaṃ yatthakatthaci nikkhipitvā tesaṃ gāmādīnaṃ bahi hatthapāsātikkamena
tika-vin04t:1463_9: aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyāti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto. Aññatra
tika-vin04t:1463_10: bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho gilānassa bhikkhuno ticīvarena avippavāsasammutiṃ deti,
tika-vin04t:1463_11: taṃ ṭhapetvā aladdhasammutikassa bhikkhuno ekarattampi vippavāsato vuttanayeneva
tika-vin04t:1463_12: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti veditabbaṃ, kevalaṃ idha “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ rattivippavutthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1463_13: aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiya”ntiādinā nayena vacanabhedo hoti, ayaṃ pana viseso.
tika-vin04t:1464: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1465_1: anāṇattikaṃ, avippavutthe vippavutthasaññino ceva vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Vippavutthe
tika-vin04t:1465_3: tathā apaccuddhaṭaavissajjitādīsu ca paccuddhaṭavissajjitādisaññino. Antoaruṇe paccuddhaṭe
tika-vin04t:1465_4: pana paṭhamakathine vuttavissajjitādibhede ca anāpatti, tathā laddhasammutikassa
tika-vin04t:1465_5: vippavāse. Ābādhe pana vūpasante paccāgantabbaṃ, tattheva vā ṭhitena paccuddharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1465_6: athāpissa puna so vā añño vā ābādho kuppati, laddhakappiyameva. Adhiṭṭhitacīvaratā,
tika-vin04t:1465_7: anatthatakathinatā, aladdhasammutikatā, rattivippavāsoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1465_8: Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathine vuttappakārāneva. Kevalañhi tattha anadhiṭṭhānaṃ avikappanañca
tika-vin04t:1468_0: Tatiye niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunāti sāmivaseneva karaṇattho veditabbo. Akālacīvaraṃ
tika-vin04t:1468_1: nāma yvāyaṃ “anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañcamāsā”ti
tika-vin04t:1468_2: cīvarakālo vutto, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññadā uppannaṃ, yañca kālepi saṅghassa vā “idaṃ akālacīvara”nti,
tika-vin04t:1468_3: puggalassa vā “idaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī”tiādinā nayena dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāma. Uppajjeyyāti
tika-vin04t:1468_4: evarūpaṃ cīvaraṃ attano bhāgapaṭilābhavasena saṅghato vā suttantikādigaṇato vā ñātito
tika-vin04t:1468_5: vā mittato vā paṃsukūlaṃ vā attano vā dhanena, atha vā pana “aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave,
tika-vin04t:1468_6: mātikā cīvarassa uppādāya sīmāya deti, katikāya deti, bhikkhāpaññattikāya deti, saṅghassa
tika-vin04t:1468_7: deti, ubhatosaṅghassa deti, vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa deti, ādissa deti, puggalassa detī”ti
tika-vin04t:1468_8: imāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ aññatarato uppajjeyya. Ettha ca “sīmāya dammī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1468_9: sīmaṃ parāmasitvā dento sīmāya deti nāma, esa nayo sabbattha. Ettha ca sīmāti khaṇḍasīmā
tika-vin04t:1468_10: upacārasīmā samānasaṃvāsasīmā avippavāsasīmā lābhasīmā gāmasīmā nigamasīmā nagarasīmā
tika-vin04t:1468_11: abbhantarasīmā udakukkhepasīmā janapadasīmā raṭṭhasīmā rajjasīmā dīpasīmā cakkavāḷasīmāti
tika-vin04t:1468_12: pannarasavidhā. Tattha upacārasīmā nāma parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepena, aparikkhittassa
tika-vin04t:1468_13: parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena paricchinnā. Api ca bhikkhūnaṃ dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānato vā pariyante
tika-vin04t:1468_14: ṭhitabhojanasālato vā nibaddhavasanakaāvāsato vā thāmamajjhimassa purisassa dvinnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1468_15: leḍḍupātānaṃ anto “upacārasīmā”ti veditabbā. Sā pana āvāse vaḍḍhante vaḍḍhati, hāyante
tika-vin04t:1468_16: hāyati, yojanasatampi upacārasīmāva hoti. Tattha dinnalābho sabbesaṃ antosīmagatānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1468_18: idampi sabbaṃ imissāva sīmāya vasena veditabbaṃ. Lābhasīmāti yaṃ rājarājamahāmattādayo
tika-vin04t:1468_19: vihāraṃ kārāpetvā gāvutaṃ vā addhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā samantā paricchinditvā “ayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1468_20: amhākaṃ vihārassa lābhasīmā, yaṃ etthantare uppajjati, taṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ vihārassa
tika-vin04t:1468_21: demā”ti ṭhapenti, ayaṃ lābhasīmā nāma. Kāsikosalādīnaṃ pana raṭṭhānaṃ anto bahū janapadā
tika-vin04t:1468_22: honti, tattha eko janapadaparicchedo janapadasīmā, kāsikosalādiraṭṭhaparicchedo raṭṭhasīmā,
tika-vin04t:1468_23: ekassa rañño āṇāpavattiṭṭhānaṃ rajjasīmā, samuddantena paricchinno mahādīpo vā antaradīpo
tika-vin04t:1468_24: vā dīpasīmā, ekacakkavāḷapabbataparikkhepabbhantaraṃ cakkavāḷasīmā, sesā nidānakathāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1468_25: vuttanayā eva. Tattha “khaṇḍasīmāya demā”ti dinnaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṭṭhānaṃyeva pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1468_26: tato bahisīmāya sīmantarikaṭṭhānampi na pāpuṇāti. “Upacārasīmāya demā”ti dinnaṃ pana
tika-vin04t:1468_27: antoparicchede khaṇḍasīmāsīmantarikāsu ṭhitānampi pāpuṇāti, samānasaṃvāsasīmāya dinnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1468_28: khaṇḍasīmāsīmantarikaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti, avippavāsasīmālābhasīmāsu dinnaṃ tāsaṃ
tika-vin04t:1468_29: antogadhānaṃyeva pāpuṇāti, gāmasīmādīsu dinnaṃ tāsaṃ sīmānaṃ abbhantare baddhasīmaṭṭhānampi
tika-vin04t:1468_30: pāpuṇāti, abbhantarasīmāudakukkhepasīmāsu dinnaṃ tattha antogadhānaṃyeva pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1468_31: janapadasīmādīsu dinnampi tāsaṃ abbhantare baddhasīmaṭṭhānampi pāpuṇāti, tasmā yaṃ
tika-vin04t:1468_32: jambudīpe ṭhatvā “tambapaṇṇidīpe saṅghassa demā”ti dīyati, taṃ tambapaṇṇidīpato ekopi
tika-vin04t:1468_33: gantvā sabbesaṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ labhati. Sacepi tattheva eko sabhāgo bhikkhu sabhāgānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1468_34: bhāgaṃ gaṇhāti, na vāretabbo. Yo pana vihāraṃ pavisitvā “asukasīmāyā”ti avatvāva
tika-vin04t:1468_35: kevalaṃ “sīmāya dammī”ti vadati, so pucchitabbo “sīmā nāma bahuvidhā, kataraṃ sandhāya
tika-vin04t:1468_36: vadasī”ti, sace vadati “ahametaṃ bhedaṃ na jānāmi, sīmaṭṭhakasaṅgho gaṇhatū”ti, upacārasīmaṭṭhehi bhājetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1469_0: Katikāyātiettha katikā nāma samānalābhakatikā. Sā pana evaṃ kātabbā, ekasmiṃ vihāre
tika-vin04t:1469_1: sannipatitehi bhikkhūhi yaṃ vihāraṃ saṅgaṇhitukāmā samānalābhaṃ kātuṃ icchanti, tassa
tika-vin04t:1469_2: nāmaṃ gahetvā “asuko nāma vihāro porāṇako appalābho”ti yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ vatvā “taṃ
tika-vin04t:1469_3: vihāraṃ iminā vihārena saddhiṃ ekalābhaṃ kātuṃ saṅghassa ruccatī”ti tikkhattuṃ sāvetabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1469_4: ettāvatā tasmiṃ vihāre nisinnopi idha nisinnova hoti, tasmiṃ vihārepi evameva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1469_5: ettāvatā idha nisinnopi tasmiṃ nisinnova hoti. Ekasmiṃ vihāre lābhe bhājiyamāne itarasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1470_0: Bhikkhāpaññattiyāti ettha bhikkhāpaññatti nāma dāyakassa pariccāgapaññattiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1470_1: tasmā “yattha mayhaṃ dhuvakārā karīyanti, tattha dammī”ti vā “tattha dethā”ti vā
tika-vin04t:1470_2: vutte yattha tassa pākavattaṃ vā vattati, yato vā bhikkhū niccaṃ bhojeti, yattha
tika-vin04t:1470_3: vā tena kiñci senāsanaṃ kataṃ, sabbattha dinnameva hoti. Sace pana ekasmiṃ dhuvakāraṭṭhāne
tika-vin04t:1470_4: thokatarā bhikkhū honti, ekameva vā vatthaṃ hoti, mātikaṃ āropetvā yathā so vadati, tathā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1471_0: Saṅghassa detīti ettha vihāraṃ pavisitvā “saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnaṃ upacārasīmāgatānañca
tika-vin04t:1471_1: tato bahiddhāpi tehi saddhiṃ ekābaddhānañca pāpuṇāti, tasmā tesaṃ gāhake sati asampattānampi
tika-vin04t:1471_2: bhāgo dātabbo. Yaṃ pana bahi upacārasīmāya bhikkhū disvā “saṅghassā”ti dīyati, taṃ
tika-vin04t:1471_3: ekābaddhaparisāya pāpuṇāti. Ye pana dvādasahi hatthehi parisaṃ asampattā, tesaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin04t:1472_0: Ubhatosaṅghassāti ettha pana yaṃ ubhatosaṅghassa dinnaṃ, tato upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1472_1: upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dātabbaṃ. Sacepi eko bhikkhu hoti, ekā vā bhikkhunī, antamaso
tika-vin04t:1472_2: anupasampannassāpi upaḍḍhameva dātabbaṃ. “Ubhatosaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”ti vutte pana
tika-vin04t:1472_3: sace dasa bhikkhū ca dasa bhikkhuniyo ca honti, ekavīsati paṭivīse katvā eko puggalassa
tika-vin04t:1472_4: dātabbo, dasa bhikkhusaṅghassa, dasa bhikkhunisaṅghassa ca, yena puggaliko laddho,
tika-vin04t:1472_5: so saṅghatopi attano vassaggena gahetuṃ labhati, kasmā? Ubhatosaṅghaggahaṇena gahitattā,
tika-vin04t:1472_6: “ubhatosaṅghassa ca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Idha pana cetiyassa saṅghato
tika-vin04t:1472_7: pāpuṇakoṭṭhāso nāma natthi, ekapuggalassa pattakoṭṭhāsasamo eko koṭṭhāso hoti. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-vin04t:1472_8: ca bhikkhunīnañcā”ti vutte pana na majjhe bhinditvā dātabbaṃ, bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin04t:1472_9: ca gaṇetvā dātabbaṃ. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañcā”ti vutte puggalo
tika-vin04t:1472_10: visuṃ na labhati, pāpuṇakoṭṭhāsato ekameva labhati. “Cetiyassa cā”ti vutte pana cetiyassa
tika-vin04t:1472_11: eko puggalapaṭivīso labbhati. “Bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañcā”ti vuttepi na majjhe bhinditvā
tika-vin04t:1472_12: dātabbaṃ, puggalagaṇanāya eva vibhajitabbaṃ, tehi saddhiṃ puggalacetiyaparāmasanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1472_13: anantaranayasadisameva, yathā ca bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādiṃ katvā nayo nīto, evaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ
tika-vin04t:1472_14: ādiṃ katvāpi netabbo. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”ti vuttepi puggalassa visuṃ na
tika-vin04t:1472_15: labbhati, cetiyassa pana labbhati. “Bhikkhūnañca tuyhañcā”ti vuttepi visuṃ na labbhati,
tika-vin04t:1473_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassāti ettha sace vihāraṃ pavisitvā “vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa dammī”ti
tika-vin04t:1473_1: vadati, ye tattha vassacchedaṃ akatvā purimavassaṃvuṭṭhā, tesaṃ bahi sīmaṭṭhānampi
tika-vin04t:1473_2: pāpuṇāti, na aññesaṃ. Sace pana bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhito “vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassā”ti
tika-vin04t:1473_3: vadati, yatthakatthaci vuṭṭhavassānaṃ sabbesaṃ sampattānaṃ pāpuṇāti. Atha “asukavihāre
tika-vin04t:1473_4: vassaṃvuṭṭhassā”ti vadati, tattha vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃyeva yāva kathinassubbhārā pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin04t:1473_5: Gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya evaṃ vadati, tatra sammukhībhūtānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti, na aññesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1474_0: Ādissa detīti ādisitvā paricchinditvā deti, kathaṃ? Bhikkhū ajjatanāya vā svātanāya
tika-vin04t:1474_1: vā yāguyā nimantetvā te ghare yāguṃ pāyetvā “imāni cīvarāni yehi mayhaṃ yāgu pītā,
tika-vin04t:1474_2: tesaṃ dammī”ti vadati, yehi nimantitehi yāgu pītā, tesaṃyeva pāpuṇāti, bhattakhajjakādīhi
tika-vin04t:1475_0: Puggalassa detīti “idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti evaṃ parammukhā vā, pādamūle
tika-vin04t:1475_1: ṭhapetvā “idaṃ tumhāka”nti evaṃ sammukhā vā detīti ayamettha saṅkhepakathā, vitthāro
tika-vin04t:1475_2: pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto. Iti imāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mātikāpadānaṃ vasena yaṃ akālacīvaralakkhaṇena
tika-vin04t:1476_0: Ākaṅkhamānenāti icchamānena. Khippameva kāretabbanti sīghaṃ antodasāheyeva kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1476_1: No cassa pāripūrīti no ce pāripūrī bhaveyya, yattakena kariyamānaṃ adhiṭṭhānacīvaraṃ
tika-vin04t:1476_2: pahoti, taṃ cīvaraṃ tattakaṃ na bhaveyya, ūnakaṃ bhaveyyāti attho. Satiyā paccāsāyāti
tika-vin04t:1476_3: “asukadivasaṃ nāma saṅgho cīvarāni labhissati, tato me cīvaraṃ uppajjissatī”tiiminā
tika-vin04t:1476_4: nayena saṅghagaṇañātimittesu vā aññataraṭṭhānato, “paṃsukūlaṃ vā lacchāmī”ti, “iminā
tika-vin04t:1476_5: vā kappiyabhaṇḍena cīvaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ vijjamānāya cīvarāsāya. Tato ce uttarīti
tika-vin04t:1476_6: māsaparamato ce uttari nikkhipeyya, nissaggiyanti attho. Yadi panassa mūlacīvaraṃ
tika-vin04t:1476_7: saṇhaṃ hoti, paccāsācīvaraṃ thūlaṃ hoti, na sakkā yojetuṃ, rattiyo ca sesā honti,
tika-vin04t:1476_8: na tāva māso pūrati, na akāmā cīvaraṃ kāretabbaṃ, aññaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ labhitvā eva
tika-vin04t:1476_9: kālabbhantare kāretabbaṃ. Sace na labhati, paccāsācīvarampi parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1476_10: Atha mūlacīvaraṃ thūlaṃ hoti, paccāsācīvaraṃ saṇhaṃ, mūlacīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ
tika-vin04t:1476_11: adhiṭṭhahitvā paccāsācīvarameva mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ, taṃ puna māsaparihāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1476_12: labhati, etenupāyena yāva na lacchati, tāva aññaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ labbhati.
tika-vin04t:1476_13: Imassa “idaṃ me, bhante, akālacīvaraṃ māsātikkantaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1477: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha akālacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1478: Paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, ito paraṃ sabbaṃ paṭhamakathine vuttasadisameva. Kevalañhi tattha dasāhātikkamo, idha māsātikkamoti ayaṃ viseso. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1481_0: Catutthe aññātikāyāti na ñātikāya, mātito vā pitito vā yāva sattamaṃ yugaṃ, tāva
tika-vin04t:1481_1: kenaci ākārena asambaddhāyāti attho. Bhikkhuniyāti sākiyāniyo viya suddhabhikkhusaṅghe
tika-vin04t:1481_2: vā ubhatosaṅghe vā upasampannāya. Purāṇacīvaranti rajitvā kappaṃ katvā ekavārampi
tika-vin04t:1481_3: nivatthaṃ vā pārutaṃ vā, yaṃ antamaso paribhogasīsena aṃse vā matthake vā katvā maggaṃ
tika-vin04t:1481_4: gato hoti, ussīsakaṃ vā katvā nipanno, etampi purāṇacīvarameva. Dhovāpeyya vāti sace
tika-vin04t:1481_5: “dhovā”tivācāya vadati, kāyavikāraṃ vā karoti, hatthena vā hatthe deti, pādamūle
tika-vin04t:1481_6: vā ṭhapeti, antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhatvā upari vā khipati, aññassa vā hatthe peseti,
tika-vin04t:1481_7: tāya dhotaṃ, dhovāpitameva hoti, rajāpanākoṭāpanesupi eseva nayo. Sikkhamānāya vā
tika-vin04t:1481_8: sāmaṇeriyā vā upāsikāya vā hatthe dhovanatthāya deti, sā sace upasampajjitvā dhovati,
tika-vin04t:1481_9: evampi nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Upāsakassa vā sāmaṇerassa vā hatthe dinnaṃ hoti, so
tika-vin04t:1481_10: ce liṅge parivatte upasampajjitvā dhovati, daharassa bhikkhussa vā dinnaṃ hoti, sopi
tika-vin04t:1481_11: liṅge parivatte dhovati, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyameva, rajāpanākoṭāpanesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:1481_12: “Idaṃ me, bhante, purāṇacīvaraṃ aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā dhovāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti
tika-vin04t:1482_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha purāṇacīvaradhovāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1482_1: sāṇattikaṃ “dhovā”tiādikāya āṇattiyā, evaṃ āṇattāya ca bhikkhuniyā uddhanasajjanādīsu
tika-vin04t:1482_2: sabbappayogesu bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ. Dhovitvā ukkhittamattaṃ pana rattamattaṃ ākoṭitamattañca
tika-vin04t:1482_3: nissaggiyaṃ hoti, dhovanādīni tīṇipi dve vā kārāpentassa ekena vatthunā nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1482_4: itarehi dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana “dhovā”ti vuttā sabbānipi karoti, dhovanapaccayāva āpatti.
tika-vin04t:1482_5: “Imasmiṃ cīvare yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ karohī”ti vadato pana ekavācāya pācittiyena saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1482_6: dve dukkaṭāni, bhikkhunisaṅghavasena ekatoupasampannāya dhovāpentassa anissajjitvā
tika-vin04t:1482_7: paribhuñjantassa, aññassa vā santakaṃ nisīdanapaccattharaṇaṃ vā dhovāpentassa, ñātikāya
tika-vin04t:1482_8: aññātikasaññino ceva, vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ, aññātikāya ñātikasaññinopi vematikassāpi
tika-vin04t:1482_9: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyameva. Ito paraṃ pana evarūpesu ṭhānesu “tikapācittiya”nti vakkhāma,
tika-vin04t:1482_10: sace ñātikāya sahāyā aññātikā “dhovā”ti avuttā vā dhovati, aparibhuttaṃ vā aññaṃ
tika-vin04t:1482_11: vā parikkhāraṃ dhovati, sikkhamānasāmaṇeriyo vā dhovanti, anāpatti, ummattakādīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1482_12: anāpattiyeva. Purāṇacīvaratā, upacāre ṭhatvā aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā āṇāpanaṃ, tassā
tika-vin04t:1482_13: dhovanādīni cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1482_14: acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
tika-vin04t:1485_0: Pañcame aññātikāyātiidaṃ vuttanayameva, tasmā ito paraṃ katthaci na vicārayissāma.
tika-vin04t:1485_1: Cīvaranti channaṃ aññataraṃ vikappanupagaṃ, esa nayo sabbesu cīvarappaṭisaṃyuttasikkhāpadesu.
tika-vin04t:1485_2: Yattha pana viseso bhavissati, tattha vakkhāma. Paṭiggaṇheyyātiettha hatthena vā
tika-vin04t:1485_3: hatthe detu, pādamūle vā ṭhapetu, dhammakathaṃ kathentassa vatthesu khipiyamānesu
tika-vin04t:1485_4: upacāraṃ muñcitvāpi upari vā khipatu, sace sādiyati, paṭiggahitameva hoti. Yassa
tika-vin04t:1485_5: kassaci pana anupasampannassa hatthe pesitaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati, “paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1485_6: saṅkārakūṭādīsu ṭhapitampi paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Aññatra
tika-vin04t:1485_7: pārivattakāti yaṃ “antamaso harīṭakakkhaṇḍampi datvā vā dassāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā
tika-vin04t:1485_8: vā pārivattakaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ antamaso vikappanupagaṃ paṭaparissāvanampi
tika-vin04t:1485_9: gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Tatra “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin04t:1485_10: hatthato paṭiggahitaṃ aññatra pārivattakā nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1486_0: Rājagahe udāyittheraṃ ārabbha cīvarappaṭiggahaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “aññatra pārivattakā”ti
tika-vin04t:1486_1: ayamettha anupaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, gahaṇatthāya hatthappasāraṇādippayoge
tika-vin04t:1486_2: dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti, nissajjitabbaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ekatoupasampannāya
tika-vin04t:1486_3: ñātikāya ca aññātikasaññissa vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Vissāsaggāhe, tāvakālike, pattatthavikādimhi
tika-vin04t:1486_4: ca anadhiṭṭhātabbaparikkhāre, sikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṃ hatthato gahaṇe, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1486_5: anāpatti. Vikappanupagacīvaratā, pārivattakābhāvo, aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇanti
tika-vin04t:1486_6: imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyākiriyaṃ, sesaṃ catutthasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1489_0: Chaṭṭhe gahapatinti bhikkhūsu apabbajitamanussaṃ. Gahapatāninti bhikkhunīsu apabbajititthiṃ,
tika-vin04t:1489_1: esa nayo sabbesu gahapatippaṭisaṃyuttesu sikkhāpadesu. Viññāpeyyāti yāceyya vā yācāpeyya
tika-vin04t:1489_2: vā. Aññatra samayāti yo acchinnacīvaro vā hoti naṭṭhacīvaro vā, tassa taṃ samayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1489_3: ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ viññāpanappayoge dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Tattha
tika-vin04t:1489_4: “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ aññatra samayā viññāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti
tika-vin04t:1490_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha cīvaraviññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. “Aññatra samayā”ti
tika-vin04t:1490_1: ayamettha anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ñātake aññātakasaññino
tika-vin04t:1490_2: vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Samaye vā ñātakappavārite vā viññāpentassa, aññassa vā ñātakappavārite
tika-vin04t:1490_3: tassevatthāya viññāpentassa, attano dhanena gaṇhantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1490_4: Vikappanupagacīvaratā, samayābhāvo, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha
tika-vin04t:1493_0: Sattame tañceti taṃ acchinnacīvaraṃ vā naṭṭhacīvaraṃ vā. Abhihaṭṭhunti abhīti upasaggo,
tika-vin04t:1493_1: haritunti attho, gaṇhitunti vuttaṃ hoti. Pavāreyyāti icchāpeyya, icchaṃ ruciṃ uppādeyya,
tika-vin04t:1493_2: “yāvattakaṃ icchasi, tāvattakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti evaṃ nimanteyyāti attho, yathā vā “nekkhammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1493_3: daṭṭhu khemato”ti ettha disvāti attho, evamidhāpi “abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyā”ti upanetvā
tika-vin04t:1493_4: purato ṭhapento kāyena vā, “amhākaṃ dussakoṭṭhāgārato yattakaṃ icchatha, tattakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1493_5: gaṇhathā”ti vadanto vācāya vā abhiharitvā nimanteyyāti attho. Santaruttaraparamanti
tika-vin04t:1493_6: saantaraṃ uttaraṃ paramaṃ assa cīvarassāti santaruttaraparamaṃ, nivāsanena saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1493_7: pārupanaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo assāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbanti tato abhihaṭacīvarato
tika-vin04t:1493_8: ettakaṃ cīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ, na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin04t:1494_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – yassa adhiṭṭhitacīvarassa tīṇi naṭṭhāni, tena dve sāditabbāni,
tika-vin04t:1494_1: ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā aññaṃ sabhāgaṭṭhānato pariyesitabbaṃ. Yassa dve naṭṭhāni,
tika-vin04t:1494_2: tena ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ. Sace pana pakatiyāva santaruttarena carati, dve sāditabbāni,
tika-vin04t:1494_3: evaṃ ekaṃ sādiyanteneva samo bhavissati. Yassa tīsu ekaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, kiñci na sāditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1494_4: Yassa pana dvīsu ekaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ. Yassa ekaṃyeva hoti, tañca naṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1494_5: dve sāditabbāni. Bhikkhuniyā pana pañcasu naṭṭhesu dve sāditabbāni, catūsu naṭṭhesu
tika-vin04t:1494_6: ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ, tīsu naṭṭhesu na kiñci sāditabbaṃ, ko pana vādo dvīsu vā ekasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1494_7: vā. Yena kenaci hi santaruttaraparamatāya ṭhātabbaṃ, tato uttari viññāpanappayoge
tika-vin04t:1494_8: dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Tattha “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ aññātakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1494_9: gahapatikaṃ tatuttari viññāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1495_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha bahucīvaraviññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1495_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ñātake aññātakasaññino vematikassa
tika-vin04t:1495_2: vā dukkaṭaṃ. Dve cīvarāni katvā “sesakaṃ āharissāmī”ti vatvā gaṇhantassa, “sesakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1495_3: tuyhaṃyeva hotū”ti vuttassa, na acchinnanaṭṭhakāraṇā dinnaṃ gaṇhantassa, vuttanayena
tika-vin04t:1495_4: ñātakappavārite viññāpentassa, attano dhanena gaṇhantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1495_5: Tatuttaritā, acchinnādikāraṇatā, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha
tika-vin04t:1498_0: Aṭṭhame bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissāti “itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmī”ti evaṃ apadisitvā.
tika-vin04t:1498_1: Cīvaracetāpannanti hiraññādikaṃ cīvaramūlaṃ. Upakkhaṭaṃ hotīti sajjitaṃ hoti, saṃharitvā
tika-vin04t:1498_2: ṭhapitaṃ. Cetāpetvāti parivattetvā, kāretvā vā kiṇitvā vāti attho. Cīvarena acchādessāmīti
tika-vin04t:1498_3: vohāravacanametaṃ, itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmīti ayaṃ panettha attho. Tatra ce
tika-vin04t:1498_4: soti yatra so gahapati vā gahapatānī vā, tatra so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin04t:1498_5: cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya ceti ayamettha padasambandho. Vikappaṃ āpajjeyyāti visiṭṭhakappaṃ
tika-vin04t:1498_6: adhikavidhānaṃ āpajjeyya. Yathā pana tamāpajjati, taṃ dassetuṃ sādhu vatātiādimāha.
tika-vin04t:1498_7: Tattha sādhūti āyācane nipāto. Vatāti parivitakke. Manti attānaṃ niddisati. Āyasmāti
tika-vin04t:1498_8: paraṃ ālapati. Evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vāti āyatādīsu aññataraṃ. Kalyāṇakamyataṃ upādāyāti
tika-vin04t:1498_9: sundarakāmataṃ visiṭṭhakāmataṃ cittena gahetvā, tassa “āpajjeyya ce”tiiminā sambandho,
tika-vin04t:1498_10: sace pana evarūpaṃ āpajjantassa tassa vacanena yo paṭhamaṃ adhippetato mūlaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
tika-vin04t:1498_11: sundarataraṃ cetāpeti, tassa payoge bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1498_12: Tattha “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ pubbe appavāritaṃ aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin04t:1498_13: vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1499_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1499_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ñātake aññātakasaññino vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Mahagghaṃ
tika-vin04t:1499_2: cetāpetukāmaṃ appagghaṃ vā, eteneva mūlena “aññaṃ evarūpaṃ vā dehī”ti vadantassa,
tika-vin04t:1499_3: vuttanayena ñātakappavārite viññāpentassa, attano dhanena gaṇhantassa, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1499_4: anāpatti. Cīvare bhiyyokamyatā, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi
tika-vin04t:1502_0: Navame imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Idañhi purimassa anupaññattisadisaṃ, kevalaṃ
tika-vin04t:1502_1: tattha ekassa pīḷā katā, idha dvinnaṃ, ayamettha viseso, sesaṃ sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
tika-vin04t:1502_2: Yathā ca dvinnaṃ, evaṃ bahūnaṃ pīḷaṃ katvā gaṇhatopi āpatti veditabbā. Nissajjanavidhāne
tika-vin04t:1502_3: ca “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ pubbe appavārite aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā vikappaṃ
tika-vin04t:1502_4: āpannaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena vacanabhedo ñātabboti.
tika-vin04t:1505_0: Dasame rājabhoggoti rājato bhoggaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ assa atthīti rājabhoggo, “rājabhogo”tipi
tika-vin04t:1505_1: pāṭho, rājato bhogo assa atthīti attho. Cīvaracetāpannanti hiraññādikaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1505_2: Pahiṇeyyāti peseyya. Iminātiādi āgamanasuddhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sace hi “idaṃ itthannāmassa
tika-vin04t:1505_3: bhikkhuno dehī”ti peseyya, āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha bhikkhunā
tika-vin04t:1505_4: kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyya. Ābhatanti ānītaṃ. Na kho mayantiādi idaṃ
tika-vin04t:1505_5: kappiyavasena ābhatampi cīvaramūlaṃ īdisena dūtavacanena akappiyaṃ hoti, tasmā taṃ
tika-vin04t:1505_6: paṭikkhipitabbanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ kahāpaṇo māsakoti imāni hi cattāri
tika-vin04t:1505_7: nissaggiyavatthūni, muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅko masāragallaṃ
tika-vin04t:1505_9: ca attano vā cetiyasaṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭanti, tasmā
tika-vin04t:1505_10: taṃ sādituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ “na kho maya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1506_0: Cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti idaṃ pana attānaṃ uddissa ābhatattā vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1506_1: tasmā vuttaṃ. Kālenāti yuttapattakālena, yadā no attho hoti, tadā kappiyaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin04t:1506_2: paṭiggaṇhāmāti attho. Veyyāvaccakaroti kappiyakārako. Niddisitabbotiidaṃ “atthi panāyasmato
tika-vin04t:1506_3: koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti kappiyavacanena vuttattā anuññātaṃ. Sace pana dūto “ko imaṃ
tika-vin04t:1506_4: gaṇhātī”ti vā “kassa demī”ti vā vadati, na niddisitabbo. Ārāmiko vā upāsako vātiidaṃ
tika-vin04t:1506_5: sāruppatāya vuttaṃ, ṭhapetvā pana pañca sahadhammike yo koci kappiyakārako vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1506_6: Eso kho, āvusotiidaṃ bhikkhussa kappiyavacanadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, evameva hi vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1506_7: “etassa dehī”tiādi na vattabbaṃ. Saññatto so mayāti āṇatto so mayā, yathā tumhākaṃ
tika-vin04t:1506_8: cīvarena atthe sati cīvaraṃ dassati, evaṃ vuttoti attho. Dūtena hi evaṃ ārociteyeva
tika-vin04t:1506_9: taṃ codetuṃ vaṭṭati, neva tassa hatthe datvā gatamattakāraṇena. Sace pana “ayaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti
tika-vin04t:1506_10: sammukhā niddiṭṭho hoti, dūto ca sammukhā eva tassa hatthe cetāpannaṃ datvā “therassa
tika-vin04t:1506_11: cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti gacchati, evaṃ “saññatto so mayā”ti avuttepi codetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1506_12: Sace pana dūto gacchantova “ahaṃ tassa hatthe dassāmi, tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti
tika-vin04t:1506_13: bhikkhuno vatvā vā gacchati, aññaṃ vā pesetvā ārocāpeti, evaṃ sati itarampi codetuṃ
tika-vin04t:1506_14: vaṭṭatiyeva. Desanāmattameva cetaṃ “dūtenā”ti. Yopi attanā āharitvā evaṃ paṭipajjati,
tika-vin04t:1506_15: tasmimpi idameva lakkhaṇaṃ. Attho me, āvuso, cīvarenāti codanālakkhaṇanidassanametaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1506_16: Sace hi vācāya codeti, idaṃ vā vacanaṃ yāya kāyaci bhāsāya etassa attho vā vattabbo,
tika-vin04t:1506_17: “dehi me, āhara me”tiādinā nayena pana vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. Abhinipphādeyyāti evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1506_18: vacībhedaṃ katvā tikkhattuṃ codayamāno paṭilābhavasena sādheyya. Iccetaṃ kusalanti etaṃ sundaraṃ.
tika-vin04t:1507_0: Chakkhattuparamanti bhāvanapuṃsakavacanametaṃ. Chakkhattuparamañhi tena cīvaraṃ uddissa
tika-vin04t:1507_1: tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbaṃ, na nisīditabbaṃ, na āmisaṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ, na dhammo bhāsitabbo.
tika-vin04t:1507_2: “Kiṃkāraṇā āgatosī”ti vutte pana “jānāhi, āvuso”ti ettakameva vattabbaṃ. Sace nisajjādīni
tika-vin04t:1507_3: karoti, ṭhānaṃ bhañjati, āgatakāraṇaṃ vināseti, idaṃ kāyena codanāya lakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1507_4: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena tissannaṃ codanānaṃ channañca ṭhānānaṃ anuññātattā
tika-vin04t:1507_5: codanāya diguṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ anuññātaṃ hoti, tasmā sace codetiyeva, na tiṭṭhati, cha codanāyo
tika-vin04t:1507_6: labbhanti. Sace tiṭṭhatiyeva, na codeti, dvādasa ṭhānāni labbhanti. Sace ubhayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1507_7: karoti, ekāya codanāya dve ṭhānāni hāpetabbāni. Tattha yo ekadivasameva punappunaṃ
tika-vin04t:1507_8: gantvā chakkhattuṃ codeti, sakiṃyeva vā gantvā “attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā”ti chakkhattuṃ
tika-vin04t:1507_9: vadati, tathā ekadivasameva punappunaṃ gantvā dvādasakkhattuṃ tiṭṭhati, sakiṃyeva
tika-vin04t:1507_10: vā gantvā tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhati, sopi sabbacodanāyo sabbaṭṭhānāni ca bhañjati,
tika-vin04t:1507_11: ko pana vādo nānādivasesu evaṃ karontassāti ayamettha vinicchayo. Ye pana kappiyakārake
tika-vin04t:1507_12: dāyako sayameva gantvā nisīdati te satakkhattumpi codetuṃ vaṭṭati. Yo pana ubhohi
tika-vin04t:1507_13: pi aniddiṭṭho mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako ca parammukhakappiyakārako ca, so na kiñci
tika-vin04t:1507_14: vattabbo, evaṃ idha dasapi kappiyakārakā dassitā honti.
tika-vin04t:1508_0: Tato ce uttarīti vuttacodanāṭhānaparimāṇato uttari. Nissaggiyanti uttari vāyāmamānassa
tika-vin04t:1508_1: sabbappayogesu dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1508_2: cīvaraṃ atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena abhinipphāditaṃ nissaggiya”nti
tika-vin04t:1508_3: iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yatassa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhatanti yato
tika-vin04t:1508_4: rājato vā rājabhoggato vā assa bhikkhuno cīvaracetāpannaṃ ānītaṃ, “yatvassā”tipi
tika-vin04t:1508_5: pāṭho, ayameva attho. Tatthāti tassa rañño vā rājabhoggassa vā santikaṃ, samīpatthe
tika-vin04t:1508_6: hi idaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhotīti taṃ cetāpannaṃ
tika-vin04t:1508_7: tassa bhikkhuno appamattakampi kammaṃ na nipphādeti. Yuñjantāyasmanto sakanti āyasmanto
tika-vin04t:1508_8: attano santakaṃ dhanaṃ pāpuṇantu. Mā vo sakaṃ vinassāti tumhākaṃ santakaṃ mā vinassatu.
tika-vin04t:1508_9: Ayaṃ tattha sāmīcīti ayaṃ tattha anudhammatā lokuttaradhammaṃ anugatā, vattadhammatāti
tika-vin04t:1508_10: attho, tasmā evaṃ akaronto vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1509_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha “ajjuṇho, bhante, āgamehī”ti vuccamāno nāgamesi, tasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1509_1: vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ūnakesu codanāṭhānesu
tika-vin04t:1509_2: atirekasaññino vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Acodanāya laddhe, sāmikehi codetvā dinne,
tika-vin04t:1509_3: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Kappiyakārakassa bhikkhuno niddiṭṭhabhāvo, dūtena appitatā,
tika-vin04t:1509_4: tatuttarivāyāmo, tena vāyāmena paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1514_0: Eḷakalomavaggassa paṭhame kosiyamissakanti ekenāpi kosiyaṃsunā antamaso tassa karaṇaṭṭhāne
tika-vin04t:1514_1: vātavegena nipātitenāpi missīkataṃ. Santhatanti same bhūmibhāge kosiyaṃsūni uparūpari
tika-vin04t:1514_2: santharitvā kañjiyādīhi siñcitvā kattabbatālakkhaṇaṃ. Kārāpeyya nissaggiyanti karaṇakārāpanappayogesu
tika-vin04t:1514_3: dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, kosiyamissakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1514_4: santhataṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ, imasseva
tika-vin04t:1514_5: vacanassa anusārena ito paraṃ sabbasanthataṃ veditabbaṃ. Sakkā hi ettāvatā jānitunti
tika-vin04t:1515_0: Āḷaviyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1515_1: asādhāraṇapaññatti, attano atthāya kārāpanavasena sāṇattikaṃ, attanā vippakatapaayosāpananayena
tika-vin04t:1515_2: catukkapācittiyaṃ, aññassatthāya karaṇakārāpanesu aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjane
tika-vin04t:1515_3: ca dukkaṭaṃ. Vitānādikaraṇe, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Kosiyamissakabhāvo, attano
tika-vin04t:1515_4: atthāya santhatassa karaṇakārāpanaṃ, paṭilābho cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1518: Dutiye suddhakāḷakānanti suddhānaṃ kāḷakānaṃ aññehi amissīkatānaṃ. Vesāliyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha tādisaṃ santhataṃ karaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesaṃ paṭhamasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1521_0: Tatiye dve bhāgāti dve koṭṭhāsā. Ādātabbāti gahetabbā. Gocariyānanti kapilavaṇṇānaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1521_1: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – yattakehi kattukāmo hoti, tesu tulayitvā dve koṭṭhāsā
tika-vin04t:1521_2: kāḷakānaṃ gahetabbā, eko odātānaṃ, eko gocariyānaṃ. Ekassāpi kāḷakalomassa atirekabhāve
tika-vin04t:1522_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha tādisaṃ santhataṃ karaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, kiriyākiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1522_1: sesaṃ paṭhamasadisamevāti. Imāni pana tīṇi nissajjitvā paṭiladdhānipi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin04t:1525_0: Catutthe orena ce channaṃ vassānanti channaṃ vassānaṃ orimabhāge, antoti attho. Aññatra
tika-vin04t:1525_1: bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho gilānassa bhikkhuno santhatasammutiṃ deti, taṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:1525_2: aladdhasammutikassa chabbassabbhantare aññaṃ santhataṃ karontassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1526_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1526_1: “aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, sā yena laddhā hoti, tassa yāva
tika-vin04t:1526_2: rogo na vūpasammati, vūpasanto vā puna kuppati, tāva gatagataṭṭhāne anuvassampi kātuṃ
tika-vin04t:1526_3: vaṭṭati, aññassatthāya kāretuṃ, katañca paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati, sesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1529_0: Pañcame purāṇasanthataṃ nāma yattha sakimpi nisinno vā hoti nipanno vā. Samantāti
tika-vin04t:1529_1: ekapassato vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā chinditvā gahitaṭṭhānaṃ yathā vidatthimattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1529_2: evaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Santharantena pana ekadese vā santharitabbaṃ, vijaṭetvā vā missakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1529_3: katvā santharitabbaṃ, evaṃ thirataraṃ hoti. Anādā ceti sati purāṇasanthate aggahetvā.
tika-vin04t:1529_4: Asati pana aggahetvāpi vaṭṭati, aññassatthāya kāretuṃ, katañca paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1530: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha santhatavissajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesaṃ tatiyasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1533_0: Chaṭṭhe addhānamaggappaṭipannassāti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ dīghamaggaṃ paṭipannassa, sabbañcetaṃ
tika-vin04t:1533_1: vatthumattadīpanameva, yattha katthaci pana dhammena labhitvā gaṇhato doso natthi.
tika-vin04t:1533_2: Tiyojanaparamanti gahitaṭṭhānato tiyojanappamāṇaṃ desaṃ. Sahatthāti sahatthena, attanā
tika-vin04t:1533_3: haritabbānīti attho. Asante hāraketi asanteyeva aññasmimpi hārake. Sace pana atthi,
tika-vin04t:1533_4: taṃ gāhetuṃ vaṭṭati. Attanā pana antamaso vātābādhappaṭikāratthaṃ suttakena abandhitvā
tika-vin04t:1533_5: kaṇṇacchidde pakkhittānipi ādāya tiyojanaṃ ekaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentassa dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapādātikkame
tika-vin04t:1534_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha tiyojanātikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1534_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ūnakatiyojane atirekasaññino vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1534_2: Tiyojanaṃ haraṇapaccāharaṇe, vāsādhippāyena gantvā tato paraṃ haraṇe, acchinnaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:1534_3: nissaṭṭhaṃ vā paṭilabhitvā haraṇe, aññaṃ harāpane, antamaso suttakenapi baddhakatabhaṇḍaharaṇe,
tika-vin04t:1534_4: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Eḷakalomānaṃ akatabhaṇḍatā, paṭhamappaṭilābho, attanā
tika-vin04t:1534_5: ādāya vā aññassa ajānantassa yāne pakkhipitvā vā tiyojanātikkamanaṃ, āharaṇapaccāharaṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1534_6: avāsādhippāyatāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1537: Sattame sakkesu chabbaggiye ārabbha eḷakalomadhovāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Tattha purāṇacīvaradhovāpane vuttanayeneva sabbopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1540_0: Aṭṭhame jātarūparajatanti suvaṇṇañceva rūpiyañca, apica kahāpaṇo lohamāsakadārumāsakajatumāsakādayopi
tika-vin04t:1540_1: ye vohāraṃ gacchanti, sabbe te idha rajatantveva vuttā. Uggaṇheyya vāti attano atthāya
tika-vin04t:1540_2: diyyamānaṃ vā yatthakatthaci ṭhitaṃ vā nippariggahitaṃ disvā sayaṃ gaṇheyya vā. Uggaṇhāpeyya
tika-vin04t:1540_3: vāti tadeva aññena gāhāpeyya vā. Upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyyāti “idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti
tika-vin04t:1540_4: evaṃ sammukhā vā, “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne mama hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ, taṃ tuyhaṃ hotū”ti
tika-vin04t:1540_5: evaṃ parammukhā ṭhitaṃ vā kevalaṃ vācāya vā hatthamuddāya vā “tuyha”nti vatvā pariccattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1540_6: yo kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā cittena adhivāseyya, ayaṃ “sādiyeyyā”ti vuccati. Sace
tika-vin04t:1540_7: pana cittena sādiyati, gaṇhitukāmo hoti, kāyena vā vācāya vā “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1540_8: paṭikkhipati, kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā suddhacitto hutvā “nayidaṃ amhākaṃ kappatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1540_9: na sādiyati, vaṭṭati. Nissaggiyanti uggahaṇādīsu yaṃkiñci karontassa aghanabaddhesu
tika-vin04t:1540_10: vatthūsu vatthugaṇanāya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Taṃ nissajjantena “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1540_11: rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahesiṃ, idaṃ me, bhante, nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1540_12: evaṃ saṅghamajjheyeva nissajjitabbaṃ. Sace tattha koci gahaṭṭho āgacchati, “idaṃ
tika-vin04t:1540_13: jānāhī”ti vattabbo. “Iminā kiṃ āhariyyatū”ti bhaṇante pana “idaṃ nāmā”ti avatvā “sappiādīni
tika-vin04t:1540_14: bhikkhūnaṃ kappantī”ti evaṃ kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace so āharati, rūpiyappaṭiggāhakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1540_15: ṭhapetvā sabbehi bhājetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Rūpiyappaṭiggāhakassa pana yaṃ tappaccayā
tika-vin04t:1540_16: uppannaṃ, taṃ aññena labhitvā diyyamānampi antamaso tato nibbattarukkhacchāyāpi paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin04t:1540_17: na vaṭṭati. Sace pana so kiñci āharituṃ na icchati, “imaṃ chaṭṭehī”ti vattabbo. Sace
tika-vin04t:1540_18: yattha katthaci nikkhipati, gahetvā vā gacchati, na vāretabbo. No ce chaṭṭeti, pañcaṅgasamannāgato
tika-vin04t:1540_19: bhikkhu rūpiyachaṭṭako sammannitabbo. Tena animittaṃ katvāva gūthaṃ viya chaṭṭetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1541_0: Rājagahe upanandaṃ ārabbha rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1541_1: sāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, arūpiye rūpiyasaññino vematikassa vā, saṅghacetiyādīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1541_2: atthāya gaṇhantassa, muttāmaṇiādippaṭiggahaṇe ca dukkaṭaṃ. Ratanasikkhāpadanayena
tika-vin04t:1541_3: nikkhipantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Jātarūparajatabhāvo, attuddesikatā, gahaṇādīsu
tika-vin04t:1541_4: aññatarabhāvoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīsu siyā kiriyaṃ gahaṇena āpajjanato,
tika-vin04t:1541_5: siyā akiriyaṃ paṭikkhepassa akaraṇato, sesaṃ sañcaritte vuttanayamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1544_0: Navame nānappakārakanti katādivasena anekavidhaṃ. Rūpiyasaṃvohāranti jātarūparajataparivattanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1544_1: Purimasikkhāpadena hi nissaggiyavatthudukkaṭavatthūnaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vāritaṃ, iminā
tika-vin04t:1544_3: ca dukkaṭavatthuṃ parivattentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Nissaggiyavatthunā pana nissaggiyavatthuṃ
tika-vin04t:1544_4: vā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā kappiyavatthuṃ vā, dukkaṭavatthukappiyavatthūhi ca nissaggiyavatthuṃ
tika-vin04t:1544_5: parivattentassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti, taṃ purimanayānusāreneva saṅghamajjhe nissajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1545_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha rūpiyasaṃvohāravatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1545_1: anāṇattikaṃ, yaṃ attano dhanena parivatteti, tassa vā dhanassa vā rūpiyabhāvo ceva,
tika-vin04t:1545_2: parivattanañcāti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Kiriyaṃ, sesaṃ anantarasikkhāpade vuttanayamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1548_0: Dasame nānappakārakanti cīvarādīnaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍānaṃ vasena anekavidhaṃ. Kayavikkayanti
tika-vin04t:1548_1: kayañceva vikkayañca. “Iminā imaṃ dehi, imaṃ āhara, parivattehi, cetāpehī”ti iminā
tika-vin04t:1548_2: hi nayena parassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanto kayaṃ samāpajjati, attano kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin04t:1548_3: dento vikkayaṃ samāpajjati. Tasmā ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike yaṃ evaṃ attano kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin04t:1548_4: datvā mātu santakampi kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Vuttalakkhaṇavasena
tika-vin04t:1548_5: saṅghagaṇapuggalesu yassa kassaci nissajjitabbaṃ, “imaṃ bhuñjitvā vā gahetvā vā idaṃ
tika-vin04t:1548_6: nāma āhara vā karohi vā”ti rajanādiṃ āharāpetvā vā dhamakaraṇādiparikkhāraṃ bhūmisodhanādiñca
tika-vin04t:1548_7: navakammaṃ kāretvā vā santaṃ vatthu nissajjitabbaṃ, asante pācittiyaṃ desetabbameva.
tika-vin04t:1549_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha kayavikkayavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “idaṃ kiṃ agghatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1549_1: evaṃ agghaṃ pucchantassa, yassa hatthato bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhitukāmo hoti, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ
tika-vin04t:1549_2: antamaso tasseva puttabhātukampi kappiyakārakaṃ katvā “iminā idaṃ nāma gahetvā dehī”ti
tika-vin04t:1549_3: ācikkhantassa, “idaṃ amhākaṃ atthi, amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca attho”ti evaṃ vatvā
tika-vin04t:1549_4: attano dhanena laddhaṃ gaṇhantassa, sahadhammikehi saddhiṃ kayavikkayaṃ karontassa,
tika-vin04t:1549_5: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Yaṃ attano dhanena parivatteti, yena ca parivatteti, tesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1549_6: kappiyavatthutā, asahadhammikatā, kayavikkayāpajjanañcāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1554_0: Pattavaggassa paṭhame atirekapattoti anadhiṭṭhito ca avikappito ca, so ca kho ukkaṭṭhamajjhimomakānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_2: nayena pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – anupahatapurāṇasālitaṇḍulānaṃ sukoṭṭitaparisuddhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_3: dve magadhanāḷiyo gahetvā tehi taṇḍulehi anuttaṇḍulamakilinnamapiṇḍikaṃ suvisadaṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_4: kundamakuḷarāsisadisaṃ avassāvitodanaṃ pacitvā niravasesaṃ patte pakkhipitvā tassa
tika-vin04t:1554_5: odanassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo nātighano nātitanuko hatthahāriyo sabbasambhārasaṅkhato
tika-vin04t:1554_6: muggasūpo pakkhipitabbo, tato ālopassa anurūpaṃ yāvacarimālopappahonakaṃ macchamaṃsādibyañjanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_7: pakkhipitabbaṃ, sappitelatakkarasakañjiyādīni pana gaṇanūpagāni na honti. Tāni hi
tika-vin04t:1554_8: odanagatikāneva, neva hāpetuṃ, na vaḍḍhetuṃ sakkonti, evametaṃ sabbampi pakkhittaṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_9: sace pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati, suttena vā hīrena vā chindantassa
tika-vin04t:1554_10: suttassa vā hīrassa vā heṭṭhimantaṃ phusati, ayaṃ ukkaṭṭho nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_11: atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ ukkaṭṭhomako nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ na sampāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1554_12: antogadhameva hoti, ayaṃ ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho nāma patto. Ukkaṭṭhato upaḍḍhappamāṇo majjhimo.
tika-vin04t:1554_13: Majjhimapattato upaḍḍhappamāṇo omako. Tesampi vuttanayeneva bhedo veditabbo. Iccetesu
tika-vin04t:1554_14: navasu ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho ca omakomako cāti dve apattā, sesā satta pattā pamāṇayuttā
tika-vin04t:1554_15: nāma, ayametthasaṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto, tasmā evaṃ pamāṇayuttaṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_16: samaṇasāruppena pakkaṃ ayopattaṃ vā mattikāpattaṃ vā labhitvā purāṇapattaṃ paccuddharitvā
tika-vin04t:1554_17: antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbo. Sace panassa mūlato kākaṇikamattampi dātabbaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_18: hoti, adhiṭṭhānupago na hoti, appaccuddharantena vikappetabbo. Tattha paccuddharaṇādhiṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_19: cīvaravagge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, vikappanalakkhaṇaṃ parato vakkhāma. Sace pana
tika-vin04t:1554_20: koci apattako bhikkhu dasa patte labhitvā sabbe attanāva paribhuñjitukāmo hoti, ekaṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_21: pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāya puna divase taṃ paccuddharitvā añño adhiṭṭhātabbo, etenupāyena
tika-vin04t:1554_22: vassasatampi pariharituṃ sakkā. Yo panassa patto mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulamattokāsato
tika-vin04t:1554_23: paṭṭhāya yatthakatthaci kaṅgusitthanikkhamanamattena chiddena chiddo hoti, so adhiṭṭhānupago
tika-vin04t:1554_24: na hoti. Puna chidde pākatike kate adhiṭṭhātabbo, sesaṃ adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ ticīvare vuttanayameva.
tika-vin04t:1555: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha atirekapattadhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti, sesavaṇṇanākkamo cīvaravaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabboti.
tika-vin04t:1558_0: Dutiye ūnāni pañca bandhanāni assāti ūnapañcabandhano, nāssa pañca bandhanāni pūrentīti
tika-vin04t:1558_1: attho, tena ūnapañcabandhanena, itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ. Tattha yasmā
tika-vin04t:1558_2: abandhanassāpi pañca bandhanāni na pūrenti sabbaso natthitāya, tenassa padabhājane
tika-vin04t:1558_3: “ūnapañcabandhano nāma patto abandhano vā ekabandhano vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Ūnapañcabandhanenā”ti
tika-vin04t:1558_4: ca vuttattā yassa pañcabandhano patto hoti pañcabandhanokāso vā, tassa so apatto,
tika-vin04t:1558_5: tasmā aññaṃ viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Yasmiṃ pana patte mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā bhaṭṭhā dvaṅgulappamāṇā
tika-vin04t:1558_6: ekāpi rāji hoti, taṃ tassā rājiyā heṭṭhimapariyante pattavedhakena vijjhitvā pacitvā
tika-vin04t:1558_7: suttarajjukamakacirajjukādīhi vā tipusuttakena vā bandhitvā taṃ bandhanaṃ āmisassa
tika-vin04t:1558_8: alagganatthaṃ tipupaṭṭakena vā kenaci baddhasilesādinā vā paṭicchādetabbaṃ, so ca
tika-vin04t:1558_9: patto adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbo, sukhumaṃ vā chiddaṃ katvā bandhitabbo, phāṇitaṃ
tika-vin04t:1558_10: jhāpetvā pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhitumpi vaṭṭati. Yassa pana dve rājiyo vā ekāyeva vā caturaṅgulā,
tika-vin04t:1558_11: tassa dve bandhanāni dātabbāni. Yassa tisso vā ekāyeva vā chaḷaṅgulā, tassa tīṇi.
tika-vin04t:1558_12: Yassa catasso vā ekāyeva vā aṭṭhaṅgulā, tassa cattāri. Yassa pañca vā ekāyeva vā
tika-vin04t:1558_13: dasaṅgulā, so baddhopi abaddhopi apattoyeva, añño viññāpetabbo, esa tāva mattikāpatte vinicchayo.
tika-vin04t:1559_0: Ayopatte pana sacepi pañca vā atirekāni vā chiddāni honti, tāni ce ayacuṇṇena vā
tika-vin04t:1559_1: āṇiyā vā lohamaṇḍalena vā baddhāni maṭṭhāni honti, sveva paribhuñjitabbo, añño na
tika-vin04t:1559_2: viññāpetabbo. Atha pana ekampi chiddaṃ mahantaṃ hoti, lohamaṇḍalena baddhampi maṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1559_3: na hoti, patte āmisaṃ laggati, akappiyo hoti ayaṃ patto, añño viññāpetabbo. Yo pana
tika-vin04t:1559_4: evaṃ pattasaṅkhepagate vā ayopatte, ūnapañcabandhane vā mattikāpatte sati aññaṃ viññāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1559_5: payoge dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyo hoti, nissajjitabbo. Nissajjantena saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin04t:1559_6: eva nissajjitabbo, tena vuttaṃ “bhikkhuparisāya nissajjitabbo”ti. Yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāyātiettha
tika-vin04t:1559_7: tehi bhikkhūhi pakatiyā eva attano attano adhiṭṭhitaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā sannipatitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1559_8: tato sammatena pattaggāhāpakena pattassa vijjamānaguṇaṃ vatvā “bhante, imaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin04t:1559_9: thero vattabbo. Sace therassa so patto na ruccati, appicchatāya vā na gaṇhāti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1559_10: Tasmiṃ pana anukampāya agaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana gaṇhāti, therassa pattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1559_11: dutiyattheraṃ gāhāpetvā eteneva upāyena yāva saṅghanavakā gāhāpetabbo, tena pariccattapatto
tika-vin04t:1559_12: pana pattapariyanto nāma, so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo. Tenāpi so yathā viññāpetvā
tika-vin04t:1559_13: gahitapatto, evameva sakkaccaṃ paribhuñjitabbo. Sace pana taṃ jigucchanto adese vā
tika-vin04t:1559_14: nikkhipati, aparibhogena vā paribhuñjati, vissajjeti vā, dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1560_0: Sakkesu chabbaggiye ārabbha bahū patte viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1560_1: anāṇattikaṃ, abandhanena abandhanaṃ, ekabandhanaṃ, dubandhanaṃ, tibandhanaṃ, catubbandhanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1560_2: abandhanokāsaṃ, ekadviticatubbandhanokāsaṃ cetāpeti, evaṃ ekekena pattena dasadhā
tika-vin04t:1560_3: dasavidhaṃ pattaṃ. Cetāpanavasena pana ekaṃ nissaggiyapācittiyasataṃ hoti. Naṭṭhapattassa,
tika-vin04t:1560_4: bhinnapattassa, attano ñātakappavārite, aññassa ca ñātakappavārite, tassevatthāya
tika-vin04t:1560_5: viññāpentassa, attano dhanena gaṇhato, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Adhiṭṭhānupagapattassa
tika-vin04t:1560_6: ūnapañcabandhanatā, attuddesikatā, akataviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri
tika-vin04t:1563_0: Tatiye paṭisāyanīyānīti paṭisāyitabbāni, paribhuñjitabbānīti attho. Etena sayaṃ uggahetvā
tika-vin04t:1563_1: nikkhittānaṃ sattāhātikkamepi anāpattiṃ dasseti, tāni hi paṭisāyituṃ na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin04t:1563_2: Bhesajjānīti bhesajjakiccaṃ karontu vā, mā vā, evaṃ laddhavohārāni. Sappi nāma gavādīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1563_3: sappi, yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati, tesaṃ sappi. Tathā navanītaṃ. Telaṃ nāma tilasāsapamadhūkaeraṇḍakavasādīhi
tika-vin04t:1563_4: nibbattitaṃ. Madhu nāma makkhikāmadhumeva. Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchurasaṃ upādāya pana
tika-vin04t:1563_5: apakkā vā avatthukapakkā vā sabbāpi ucchuvikati “phāṇita”nti veditabbaṃ. Tāni paṭiggahetvāti
tika-vin04t:1563_6: tāni bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā, na tesaṃ vatthūni. Etena ṭhapetvā vasātelaṃ yānettha
tika-vin04t:1563_7: yāvakālikavatthukāni, tesaṃ vatthūni paṭiggahetvā katāni sappiādīni sattāhaṃ atikkāmayatopi
tika-vin04t:1563_8: anāpattiṃ dasseti. Vasātelaṃ pana kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nipakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1563_9: telaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ anuññātaṃ, tasmā ṭhapetvā manussavasaṃ aññaṃ yaṃkañci
tika-vin04t:1563_10: vasaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahetvā sāmaṃ pacitvā nibbattitatelampi sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena
tika-vin04t:1563_11: vaṭṭati. Anupasampannena pacitvā dinnaṃ pana tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1563_12: aññesaṃ yāvakālikavatthūnaṃ vatthuṃ pacituṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva. Nibbattitasappi vā navanītaṃ
tika-vin04t:1563_13: vā pacituṃ vaṭṭati, taṃ pana tadahupurebhattampi sāmisaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1563_14: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīrādito anupasampannena pacitvā katasappiādīni pana tadahupurebhattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1563_15: sāmisānipi vaṭṭanti, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya anajjhoharaṇīyāni, sattāhātikkamepi
tika-vin04t:1563_16: anāpatti. Sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti sannidhiṃ katvā nidahitvā purebhattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1563_17: paṭiggahitāni tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogenāpi vaṭṭanti, pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin04t:1563_18: pana tāni ca, pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitāni ca sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbānīti
tika-vin04t:1563_19: attho. “Paribhuñjitabbānī”ti ca vacanato antosattāhe abbhañjanādīnaṃ atthāya adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin04t:1563_20: ṭhapitesu anāpatti, yāvajīvikāni sāsapamadhūkaeraṇḍakaaṭṭhīni telakaraṇatthaṃ paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin04t:1563_21: tadaheva katatelaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ, dutiyadivase kataṃ chāhaṃ vaṭṭati, tatiyadivase
tika-vin04t:1563_22: kataṃ pañcāhaṃ, catutthapañcamachaṭṭhasattamadivase kataṃ tadaheva vaṭṭati. Sace
tika-vin04t:1563_23: yāva aruṇassa uggamanā tiṭṭhati, nissaggiyaṃ hoti, aṭṭhamadivase kataṃ anajjhoharaṇīyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1563_24: anissaggiyattā pana bāhiraparibhogena vaṭṭati. Sacepi na karoti, telatthāya paṭiggahitasāsapādīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1563_25: pana pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasappiādīnañca sattāhātikkame dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Sītudakena katamadhūkapupphaphāṇitaṃ
tika-vin04t:1563_26: pana phāṇitagatikameva, ambaphāṇitādīni yāvakālikāni. Yaṃ panettha sattāhakālikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1563_27: taṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi aruādīni vā makkhetuṃ, ajjhoharituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1563_28: Padīpe kāḷavaṇṇe vā upanetabbaṃ, aññassa bhikkhuno kāyikaparibhogaṃ vaṭṭati. Yaṃ
tika-vin04t:1563_29: pana nirapekkho pariccajitvā puna labhati, taṃ ajjhoharitumpi vaṭṭati. Visuṃ ṭhapitasappiādīsu,
tika-vin04t:1564: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha sattāhaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesaṃ cīvaravaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:1567_0: Catutthe māso seso gimhānanti catunnaṃ gimhamāsānaṃ eko pacchimamāso seso. Pariyesitabbanti
tika-vin04t:1567_1: gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kattikamāsassa pacchimadivaso,
tika-vin04t:1567_3: attano ñātakappavāritaṭṭhānato pana “detha me vassikasāṭikacīvara”ntiādikāya viññattiyāpi
tika-vin04t:1567_4: pariyesitabbaṃ. Aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhāne satuppādaṃ karontassa vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1567_5: yathā vā tathā vā “detha me”tiādivacanena viññāpentassa aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena
tika-vin04t:1567_6: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Katvā nivāsetabbanti gimhānaṃ pacchimaddhamāsassa paṭhamadivasato
tika-vin04t:1567_7: paṭṭhāya yāva kattikamāsassa pacchimadivaso, tāva sūcikammaniṭṭhānena sakimpi vaṇṇabhedamattarajanena
tika-vin04t:1567_8: kappabindukaraṇena ca katvā paridahitabbā. Ettāvatā gimhānaṃ pacchimo māso pariyesanakkhettaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1567_9: pacchimo addhamāso karaṇanivāsanakkhettampi, vassānassa catūsu māsesu sabbampi taṃ
tika-vin04t:1567_10: vaṭṭatīti ayamattho dassito hoti. Yo cāyaṃ gimhānaṃ pacchimo māso anuññāto, ettha
tika-vin04t:1567_11: katapariyesitampi vassikasāṭikaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace tasmiṃ māse atikkante
tika-vin04t:1567_12: vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhiyati, puna māsaparihāraṃ labhati, dhovitvā pana nikkhipitvā vassūpanāyikadivase
tika-vin04t:1567_13: adhiṭṭhātabbā. Sace satisammosena vā appahonakabhāvena vā akatā hoti. Te ca dve māse
tika-vin04t:1567_14: vassānassa catumāsanti cha māse parihāraṃ labhati. Sace pana kattikamāse kathinaṃ
tika-vin04t:1567_15: atthariyati, aparepi cattāro māse labhati, evaṃ dasa māsā honti. Tato parampi satiyā
tika-vin04t:1567_16: paccāsāya taṃ mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapentassa ekamāsanti evaṃ ekādasa māse parihāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1567_17: labhati, ito paraṃ ekāhampi na labhati.
tika-vin04t:1568_0: Orena ce māso seso gimhānanti gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa orimabhāge yāva hemantassa
tika-vin04t:1568_1: paṭhamadivaso, tāvāti attho. Pariyeseyyāti etesu sattasu piṭṭhisamayamāsesu aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato
tika-vin04t:1568_2: satuppādakaraṇena pariyesantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, viññāpentassa aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena
tika-vin04t:1568_3: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, ñātakappavārite viññāpentassa tena sikkhāpadena anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:1568_4: satuppādaṃ karontassa iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti. Orenaddhamāso seso gimhānanti gimhānassa
tika-vin04t:1568_5: pacchimaddhamāsato orimabhāge ekasmiṃ addhamāse. Katvā nivāseyyāti etthantare dhammena
tika-vin04t:1569_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha vassikasāṭikapariyesanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1569_2: vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ, tathā satiyā vassikasāṭikāya naggassa kāyaṃ ovassāpayato.
tika-vin04t:1569_3: Pokkharaṇiyādīsu pana nhāyantassa vā acchinnacīvarassa vā naṭṭhacīvarassa vā “anivatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1569_4: corā harantī”ti evaṃ āpadāsu vā nivāsayato ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Ettha ca vassikasāṭikāya
tika-vin04t:1569_5: attuddesikatā, asamaye pariyesanatā, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imāni tāva pariyesanāpattiyā
tika-vin04t:1569_6: tīṇi aṅgāni. Sacīvaratā, āpadābhāvo, vassikasāṭikāya sakabhāvo, asamaye nivāsananti
tika-vin04t:1569_7: imāni nivāsanāpattiyā cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni dhovāpanasikkhāpade vuttanayānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1572_0: Pañcame sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvāti veyyāvaccādīni paccāsisamāno sayameva datvā. Acchindeyyāti
tika-vin04t:1572_1: veyyāvaccādīni akarontaṃ disvā sakasaññāya acchindantassa vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo.
tika-vin04t:1572_2: Acchindāpeyyātiettha pana “acchindā”ti āṇattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, acchindesu yattakāni āṇattāni,
tika-vin04t:1573_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha cīvaraacchindanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1573_1: sāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ. Anupasampanne upasampannasaññino, vematikassa, anupasampannasaññino
tika-vin04t:1573_2: vā, upasampannassāpi vikappanupagapacchimacīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ, anupasampannassa
tika-vin04t:1573_3: ca yaṃkiñci acchindato vā dukkaṭaṃ. Tena tuṭṭhena vā kupitena vā dinnaṃ pana tassa
tika-vin04t:1573_4: vissāsaṃ vā gaṇhantassa ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Vikappanupagapacchimacīvaratā,
tika-vin04t:1573_5: sāmaṃ dinnatā, sakasaññitā, upasampannatā, kodhavasena acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1573_6: vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni aññatra vedanāya.
tika-vin04t:1576_0: Chaṭṭhe suttanti chabbidhaṃ khomasuttādiṃ vā tesaṃ anulomaṃ vā. Viññāpetvāti cīvaratthāya
tika-vin04t:1576_1: yācitvā. Vāyāpeyyāti “cīvaraṃ me, āvuso, vāyathā”ti akappiyāya viññattiyā vāyāpeyya.
tika-vin04t:1576_2: Nissaggiyanti evaṃ vāyāpentassa yo tantavāyo cīvaravāyanatthaṃ turivemasajjanādike
tika-vin04t:1576_3: payoge karoti, tassa sabbappayogesu dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1577_0: Rājagahe chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha cīvaravāyāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1577_1: anāṇattikaṃ, viññāpitasuttaṃ viññāpitatantavāyena vāyāpentassa dīghato vidatthimatte
tika-vin04t:1577_2: tiriyañca hatthamatte vīte nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Iti yāva cīvaraṃ vaḍḍhati, tāva
tika-vin04t:1577_3: iminā pamāṇena āpattiyo vaḍḍhanti. Teneva pana aviññattiyā laddhasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa
tika-vin04t:1577_4: yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ, evaṃ idha dukkaṭaṃ. Teneva viññattañca aviññattañca vāyāpentassa
tika-vin04t:1577_5: sace vuttappamāṇena kedārabaddhaṃ viya cīvaraṃ hoti, akappiyasuttamaye paricchede
tika-vin04t:1577_6: pācittiyaṃ, itarasmiṃ tatheva dukkaṭaṃ. Tato ce ūnatarā paricchedā, sabbaparicchedesu
tika-vin04t:1577_7: dukkaṭāneva. Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā
tika-vin04t:1577_8: vītaṃ hoti, pubbe vuttappamāṇagaṇanāya dukkaṭāni. Eteneva upāyena kappiyatantavāyena
tika-vin04t:1577_9: akappiyasutte, kappiyākappiyehi tantavāyehi suttepi kappiye akappiye kappiyākappiye
tika-vin04t:1577_10: ca āpattibhedo veditabbo. Tikapācittiyaṃ, avāyāpite vāyāpitasaññino vematikassa vā
tika-vin04t:1577_12: suttaṃ viññāpentassa, ñātakappavāritehi kappiyasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa, aññassatthāya,
tika-vin04t:1577_13: attano dhanena, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti, cīvaratthāya viññāpitasuttaṃ, attuddesikatā,
tika-vin04t:1577_14: akappiyatantavāyena akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1580_0: Sattame tatra ce so bhikkhūti yatra gāme vā nigame vā tantavāyā, tatra. Pubbe appavāritoti
tika-vin04t:1580_1: cīvarasāmikehi appavārito hutvā. Vikappaṃ āpajjeyyāti visiṭṭhakappaṃ adhikavidhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1580_2: āpajjeyya. Idāni yenākārena vikappaṃ āpanno hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ kho, āvusotiādi
tika-vin04t:1580_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha āyatanti dīghaṃ. Vitthatanti puthulaṃ. Appitanti ghanaṃ. Suvītanti
tika-vin04t:1580_4: suṭṭhu vītaṃ, sabbaṭṭhānesu samaṃ katvā vītaṃ. Suppavāyitanti suṭṭhu pavāyitaṃ, sabbaṭṭhānesu
tika-vin04t:1580_5: samaṃ katvā tante pasāritaṃ. Suvilekhitanti lekhaniyā suṭṭhu vilekhitaṃ. Suvitacchitanti
tika-vin04t:1580_6: kocchena suṭṭhu vitacchitaṃ, suṭṭhu niddhotanti attho. Piṇḍapātamattampīti ettha
tika-vin04t:1580_7: ca na bhikkhuno piṇḍapātadānamattena taṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, sace pana te tassa vacanena
tika-vin04t:1580_8: cīvarasāmikānaṃ hatthato suttaṃ gahetvā īsakampi āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:1580_9: karonti, atha tesaṃ payoge bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1581_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1581_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ñātake aññātakasaññino vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Ñātakappavāritānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1581_2: tantavāyehi, aññassa vā atthāya, attano vā dhanena, mahagghaṃ vāyāpetukāmaṃ appagghaṃ
tika-vin04t:1581_3: vāyāpentassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Aññātakaappavāritānaṃ tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā
tika-vin04t:1581_4: vikappamāpajjanatā, cīvarassa attuddesikatā, tassa vacanena suttavaḍḍhanaṃ, cīvarappaṭilābhoti
tika-vin04t:1581_5: imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni dhovāpanasikkhāpade vuttanayānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1584_0: Aṭṭhame dasāhānāgatanti dasa ahāni dasāhaṃ, tena dasāhena anāgatā dasāhānāgatā, dasāhena
tika-vin04t:1584_1: asampattāti attho, taṃ dasāhānāgataṃ, accantasaṃyogavasena bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1584_3: purimanayeneva bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yato paṭṭhāya paṭhamappavāraṇā
tika-vin04t:1584_4: “dasāhānāgatā”ti vuccati, sacepi tāni divasāni accantameva bhikkhuno accekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin04t:1584_5: uppajjeyya, “accekaṃ ida”nti jānamānena bhikkhunā sabbampi paṭiggahetabbanti. Tena
tika-vin04t:1584_6: pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito
tika-vin04t:1584_7: hoti. Kāmañcesa “dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba”ntiimināva siddho, aṭṭhuppattivasena
tika-vin04t:1584_8: pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Accekacīvaranti gamikagilānagabbhiniabhinavuppannasaddhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1584_9: puggalānaṃ aññatarena “vassāvāsikaṃ dassāmī”ti evaṃ ārocetvā dinnaṃ. Sace taṃ pure
tika-vin04t:1584_10: pavāraṇāya vibhajitaṃ, yena gahitaṃ, tena vassacchedo na kātabbo, karoti ce, taṃ
tika-vin04t:1584_11: cīvaraṃ saṅghikaṃ hoti. Yāva cīvarakālasamayanti anatthate kathine yāva vassānassa
tika-vin04t:1584_12: pacchimo māso, atthate kathine yāva pañca māsā, tāva nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1585: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha accekacīvarassa cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesamettha cīvaravaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:1588_0: Navame upavassaṃ kho panāti ettha upavassanti upavassa, upavasitvāti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1588_1: upasampajjantiādīsu viya hettha anunāsiko daṭṭhabbo, vassaṃ upagantvā vasitvā cāti
tika-vin04t:1588_2: attho. Imassa ca padassa “tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto”tiiminā sambandho,
tika-vin04t:1588_3: idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – vassaṃ upagantvā vasitvā ca tato paraṃ pacchimakattikapuṇṇamapariyosānakālaṃ
tika-vin04t:1588_4: yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni…pe… antaraghare nikkhipeyyāti. Tattha āraññakānīti
tika-vin04t:1588_5: sabbapacchimāni āropitena ācariyadhanunā gāmassa indakhīlato paṭṭhāya pañcadhanusatappamāṇe
tika-vin04t:1588_6: padese katasenāsanāni. Sace pana aparikkhitto gāmo hoti, parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin04t:1588_7: minetabbaṃ. Sace vihārassa parikkhepo vā aparikkhittassa yaṃ gāmato sabbapaṭhamaṃ
tika-vin04t:1588_8: senāsanaṃ vā cetiyaṃ vā bodhi vā dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānaṃ vā yāva, taṃ tāva pakatimaggena
tika-vin04t:1588_9: minetabbaṃ, aññaṃ maggaṃ kātuṃ, amaggena vā minetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sāsaṅkasammatānīti
tika-vin04t:1588_10: corādīnaṃ niviṭṭhokāsādidassanena “sāsaṅkānī”ti sammatāni, evaṃ saññātānīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1588_11: Saha paṭibhayena sappaṭibhayāni, corehi manussānaṃ hataviluttākoṭitabhāvadassanato
tika-vin04t:1589_0: Antaraghare nikkhipeyyāti āraññakassa senāsanassa samantā sabbadisābhāgesu attanā
tika-vin04t:1589_1: abhirucite gocaragāme nikkhipeyya. Tañca kho satiyā aṅgasampattiyā, tatrāyaṃ aṅgasampatti
tika-vin04t:1589_2: – purimikāya upagantvā mahāpavāraṇāya pavārito hoti, idamekaṃ aṅgaṃ. Kattikamāsoyeva
tika-vin04t:1589_3: hoti, idaṃ dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ. Pañcadhanusatikapacchimappamāṇayuttaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti, idaṃ
tika-vin04t:1589_4: tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ. Ūnappamāṇe vā gāvutato atirekappamāṇe vā na labhati, yatra hi piṇḍāya
tika-vin04t:1589_5: caritvā bhuttavelāyameva puna vihāraṃ sakkā āgantuṃ, tadeva idhādhippetaṃ. Sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayameva
tika-vin04t:1589_6: hoti, idaṃ catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ hotīti. Kocideva paccayoti kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ. Tena cīvarenāti
tika-vin04t:1589_7: tena antaraghare nikkhittacīvarena. Vippavāsāyāti viyogavāsāya. Tato ce uttari vippavaseyyāti
tika-vin04t:1589_8: chārattato uttari tasmiṃ senāsane sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyāti attho, tathā asakkontena
tika-vin04t:1589_9: pana gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā sabhāyaṃ vā yattha katthaci vā vasitvā cīvarappavattiṃ ñatvā
tika-vin04t:1589_10: pakkamituṃ vaṭṭati. Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho gilānassa bhikkhuno cīvarena
tika-vin04t:1589_11: vippavāsasammutiṃ deti, taṃ ṭhapetvā aladdhasammutikassa atirekachārattaṃ vippavasato nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1590: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha cīvaravippavāsavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesamettha cīvaravaggassa dutiyasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:1593_0: Dasame saṅghikanti saṅghassa santakaṃ. So hi saṅghassa pariṇatattā hatthe anāruḷhopi
tika-vin04t:1593_1: ekena pariyāyena saṅghasantako hoti. Lābhanti labhitabbaṃ cīvarādivatthuṃ. Pariṇatanti
tika-vin04t:1593_2: “dassāma karissāmā”ti vacībhedena vā hatthamuddāya vā saṅghassa ninnaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1593_3: Attano pariṇāmeyyāti “idaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”tiādīni vadanto attaninnaṃ kareyya. Sace
tika-vin04t:1593_4: pana saṅghassa dinnaṃ hoti, taṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati, saṅghasseva dātabbaṃ. Pariṇataṃ
tika-vin04t:1593_5: pana sahadhammikānaṃ vā gihīnaṃ vā antamaso mātusantakampi attano pariṇāmentassa
tika-vin04t:1594_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha pariṇāmanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1594_1: anāṇattikaṃ, pariṇate vematikassa, apariṇate pariṇatasaññino ceva vematikassa ca,
tika-vin04t:1594_2: saṅghacetiyapuggalesu yassa kassaci pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghādīnaṃ pariṇāmentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1594_3: Apariṇatasaññino, “kattha demā”ti pucchite “yattha tumhākaṃ cittaṃ pasīdati, tattha
tika-vin04t:1594_4: detha, tumhākaṃ deyyadhammo paribhogaṃ vā labheyyā”tiādīni vadantassa, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1594_5: anāpatti. Saṅghe pariṇatabhāvo, taṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmanaṃ, paṭilābhoti imānettha
tika-vin04t:1602_0: Pācittiyesu musāvādavaggassa paṭhame sampajānamusāvādeti pubbepi jānitvā vacanakkhaṇepi
tika-vin04t:1602_1: jānantasseva musāvādabhaṇane. Bhaṇanañca nāma idha abhūtassa vā bhūtataṃ, bhūtassa
tika-vin04t:1602_2: vā abhūtataṃ katvā kāyena vā vācāya vā viññāpanappayogo, nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1602_3: Tasmā yo sampajānamusāvādaṃ vadati, tassa taṃnimittaṃ taṃhetu tappaccayā pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1602_4: hotīti evamettha aññesu ca īdisesu attho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1603_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ hatthakaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha avajānitvā paṭijānanādivatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1603_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, uttarimanussadhammārocanatthaṃ musā bhaṇantassa pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1603_2: amūlakena pārājikena anuddhaṃsanatthaṃ saṅghādiseso, saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃsanatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1603_3: pācittiyaṃ, ācāravipattiyā anuddhaṃsanatthaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, “yo te vihāre vasī”tiādinā
tika-vin04t:1603_4: pariyāyena uttarimanussadhammārocanatthaṃ paṭivijānantassa musā bhaṇite thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1603_5: appaṭivijānantassa dukkaṭaṃ, kevalaṃ musā bhaṇantassa idha pācittiyaṃ. Anupadhāretvā
tika-vin04t:1603_6: sahasā bhaṇantassa, “aññaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti aññaṃ bhaṇantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1603_7: Visaṃvādanapurekkhāratā, visaṃvādanacittena yamatthaṃ vattukāmo, tassa puggalassa
tika-vin04t:1603_8: viññāpanapayogo cāti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:1606_1: bhūtena vā abhūtena vā yena kenaci pārājikaṃ āpannaṃ vā anāpannaṃ vā yaṃkiñci bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin04t:1606_2: yāya kāyaci vācāya vā hatthamuddāya vā anaññāpadesena akkosanavacane pācittiyanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1607_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha omasanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1607_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tehiyeva dasahi akkosavatthūhi “santi idhekacce caṇḍālā”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin04t:1607_3: akkosantassa, yathā tathā vā anupasampannaṃ akkosantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Idha bhikkhunīpi
tika-vin04t:1607_4: anupasampannasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Anakkositukāmassa kevalaṃ davakamyatāya vadato sabbattha
tika-vin04t:1607_5: dubbhāsitaṃ. Atthadhammaanusāsanipurekkhārānaṃ, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Yaṃ akkosati,
tika-vin04t:1607_6: tassa upasampannatā, anaññāpadesena jātiādīhi akkosanaṃ, “maṃ akkosatī”ti jānanā,
tika-vin04t:1607_7: atthapurekkhāratādīnaṃ abhāvoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni,
tika-vin04t:1610_0: Tatiye bhikkhupesuññeti bhikkhussa pesuññe, jātiādīhi akkosavatthūhi bhikkhū akkosantassa
tika-vin04t:1610_1: bhikkhuno sutvā vacanaṃ bhikkhuno piyakamyatāya vā bhedādhippāyena vā yo akkuddho,
tika-vin04t:1610_2: tassa bhikkhussa kāyena vā vācāya vā upasaṃhaṭe tasmiṃ pesuññakaraṇavacane pācittiyanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1611_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha pesuññaupasaṃharaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1611_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, vuttanayeneva aññāpadesena akkosantassa vacanūpasaṃhāre
tika-vin04t:1611_2: vā pāḷimuttakaakkosūpasaṃhāre vā anupasampannassa ca upasaṃhāre dukkaṭaṃ. Idhāpi
tika-vin04t:1611_3: bhikkhunī anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhitā. Na piyakamyatāya, na bhedādhippāyena kevalaṃ
tika-vin04t:1611_4: pāpagarahitāya vadantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Jātiādīhi anaññāpadesena akkosantassa
tika-vin04t:1611_5: bhikkhuno sutvā vacanaṃ bhikkhussa upasaṃharaṇaṃ, piyakamyatābhedādhippāyesu aññataratā,
tika-vin04t:1611_6: tassa vijānanāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1614_0: Catutthe padaso dhammaṃ vāceyyāti saṅgītittayaṃ anāruḷhampi rājovādatikkhindriyacatuparivattananandopanandakulumpasuttamaggakathādidhammañca
tika-vin04t:1614_1: saṅgītittayamāruḷhaṃ tipiṭakadhammañca padaṃ padaṃ vāceyya, padānupadaanvakkharaanubyañjanesu
tika-vin04t:1614_2: ekekaṃ koṭṭhāsanti attho. Pācittiyanti etesu padādīsu bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:1614_3: yaṃkañci koṭṭhāsaṃ avasesapuggalehi saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇantassa padādigaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1615_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha padaso dhammavācanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1615_2: vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Anupasampannena saddhiṃ ekato uddesaggahaṇe, sajjhāyakaraṇe,
tika-vin04t:1615_3: tassa santike uddesaggahaṇe, yebhuyyena paguṇaganthaṃ bhaṇantassa, osārentassa ca
tika-vin04t:1615_4: khalitaṭṭhāne “evaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti vacane ca ekato bhaṇantassāpi, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1615_5: Anupasampannatā, vuttalakkhaṇaṃ dhammaṃ padaso vācanatā, ekato osāpanañcāti imānettha
tika-vin04t:1615_6: tīṇi aṅgāni. Padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1618_0: Pañcame anupasampannenāti bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā antamaso pārājikavatthubhūtena tiracchānagatenāpi.
tika-vin04t:1618_1: Uttaridirattatirattanti dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā rattīnaṃ upari. Sahaseyyanti sabbacchannaparicchanne
tika-vin04t:1618_2: yebhuyyena channaparicchanne vā senāsane pubbāpariyena vā ekakkhaṇena vā ekato nipajjanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1618_3: Kappeyyāti vidaheyya sampādeyya. Tattha chadanaṃ anāhacca diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena
tika-vin04t:1618_4: pākārādinā paricchinnampi sabbaparicchannamicceva veditabbaṃ, tasmā iminā lakkhaṇena
tika-vin04t:1618_5: samannāgato sacepi sattabhūmiko pāsādo ekūpacāro hoti, satagabbhaṃ vā catusālaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1618_6: yo tattha vā aññattha vā tādise tena vā aññena vā anupasampannena saha tisso rattiyo
tika-vin04t:1618_7: sayitvā catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye anupasampanne nipanne gabbhadvāraṃ pidhāya
tika-vin04t:1618_8: vā apidhāya vā nipajjati, paṭhamanipanno vā tasmiṃ nipajjante na vuṭṭhāti, tassa
tika-vin04t:1618_9: ubhinnaṃ uṭṭhahitvā nipajjanappayogagaṇanāya anupasampannagaṇanāya ca pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1618_10: Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ sabbappakārato vutto.
tika-vin04t:1619_0: Āḷaviyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anupasampannena sahaseyyavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
