tika-vin04t:1789_0: Tatiye saha ubhohi janehīti sabhojanaṃ, tasmiṃ sabhojane. Atha vā sabhojaneti sabhoge,
tika-vin04t:1789_1: rāgapariyuṭṭhitapurisassa hi itthī bhogo, itthiyā ca puriso, tenevassa padabhājane
tika-vin04t:1789_2: “itthī ceva hoti, puriso cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyyāti anupavisitvā
tika-vin04t:1789_3: nisīdeyya, yaṃ tasmiṃ kule sayanigharaṃ, tassa mahācatussālādīsu katassa mahallakassa
tika-vin04t:1789_4: piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā antosayanassa āsanne ṭhāne, khuddakassa vā
tika-vin04t:1789_5: vemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdeyyāti attho, evaṃ nisinnassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1790_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha anupakhajja nisajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1790_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, asayanighare sayanigharasaññino, vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1790_2: Nasayanigharasaññissa, vuttalakkhaṇaṃ padesaṃ anatikkamitvā nisinnassa, bhikkhusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1790_3: dutiyake sati, ubhosu nikkhantesu vā, vītarāgesu vā nisīdantassa, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1790_4: anāpatti. Avītarāgajāyampatikānaṃ sannihitatā, sayanigharatā, dutiyassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin04t:1790_5: abhāvo, anupakhajja nisīdananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:1793_0: Catutthapañcamāni sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha paṭicchannāsane ca, raho ca nisajjanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1796_0: Chaṭṭhe nimantitoti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantito. Sabhatto samānoti
tika-vin04t:1796_1: teneva nimantanabhattena sabhatto samāno. Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchāti antoupacārasīmāya
tika-vin04t:1796_2: dassanūpacāre bhikkhuṃ disvā yaṃ sakkā hoti pakativacanena āpucchituṃ, tādisaṃ “ahaṃ
tika-vin04t:1796_3: itthannāmassa gharaṃ gacchāmī”ti vā “cārittaṃ āpajjāmī”ti vā īdisena vacanena anāpucchitvā.
tika-vin04t:1796_4: Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vāti yena bhattena nimantito, tasmiṃ bhutte vā abhutte
tika-vin04t:1796_5: vā. Kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyyāti yasmiṃ kule nimantito, tato aññāni kulāni paviseyya.
tika-vin04t:1796_6: Aññatra samayā pācittiyanti sace so bhikkhu vuttalakkhaṇaṃ duvidhampi samayaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:1796_7: avītivatte majjhanhike aññaṃ kulaṃ pavisati, athassa gharūpacārokkamane dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1796_8: paṭhamapādena ummāraṃ atikkamantassa aparampi dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapādena atikkame pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1797_0: Rājagahe upanandaṃ ārabbha cārittāpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “santaṃ bhikkhuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1797_1: anāpucchā, purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ, aññatra samayā”ti ayamettha catubbidhā anupaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1797_2: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, animantite nimantitasaññissa, vematikassa
tika-vin04t:1797_3: vā dukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ animantitasaññissa, samaye santaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpucchitvā, asantaṃ
tika-vin04t:1797_4: bhikkhuṃ anāpucchitvā pavisato, aññassa gharena vā gharūpacārena vā maggo hoti, tena
tika-vin04t:1797_6: āpadāsu, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantanasādiyanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1797_7: santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchanā, bhattiyagharato aññagharappavisanaṃ, majjhanhikānatikkamo,
tika-vin04t:1797_8: samayassa vā āpadānaṃ vā abhāvoti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisāneva,
tika-vin04t:1800_0: Sattame catumāsappaccayapavāraṇāti cattāro māse gilānappaccayapavāraṇā, sabbañcetaṃ
tika-vin04t:1800_1: vatthuvasena vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha attho – catumāsapavāraṇā vā hotu, punapavāraṇā
tika-vin04t:1800_2: vā, niccapavāraṇā vā, sabbāpi sāditabbā, “idāni mama rogo natthī”ti na paṭikkhipitabbā,
tika-vin04t:1800_3: “roge pana sati viññāpessāmī”ti adhivāsetabbāti. Tato ce uttari sādiyeyyāti ettha
tika-vin04t:1800_4: sace tattha rattīhi vā bhesajjehi vā paricchedo kato hoti “ettakāyeva rattiyo, ettakāni
tika-vin04t:1800_5: vā bhesajjāni viññāpetabbānī”ti, atha tato rattipariyantato vā bhesajjapariyantato
tika-vin04t:1800_6: vā uttari, na bhesajjakaraṇīyena vā bhesajjaṃ, aññabhesajjakaraṇīyena vā aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ
tika-vin04t:1801_0: Sakkesu chabbaggiye ārabbha bhesajjaviññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1801_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, natatuttari tatuttarisaññino, vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1801_2: Natatuttari natatuttarisaññissa, yehi bhesajjehi pavārito, tato aññehi vā adhikatarehi
tika-vin04t:1801_3: vā atthe sati, yāsu ca rattīsu pavārito, tā atikkamitvāpi atthe sati yathābhūtaṃ
tika-vin04t:1801_4: ācikkhitvā viññāpentassa, ye ca ñātake vā puggalikappavāraṇāya pavārite vā apariyantapavāraṇāya
tika-vin04t:1801_5: vā pavārite, aññassa vā atthāya, attano vā dhanena viññāpenti, tesaṃ, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1801_6: anāpatti. Saṅghapavāraṇatā, tato bhesajjaviññatti, agilānatā, pariyantātikkamoti
tika-vin04t:1804_0: Aṭṭhame uyyuttanti katauyyogaṃ, gāmato nikkhantanti attho. Senanti caturaṅginiṃ.
tika-vin04t:1804_1: Aññatra tathārūpappaccayāti tathārūpe kāraṇe asati kevalaṃ senaṃ dassanatthāya gacchato
tika-vin04t:1804_2: pade pade dukkaṭaṃ, dassanūpacāre ṭhatvā passato pācittiyaṃ. Dassanūpacāro nāma yattha
tika-vin04t:1804_3: ṭhito passati, taṃ pana vijahitvā punappunaṃ passato payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1805_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha senādassanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “aññatra tathārūpappaccayā”ti
tika-vin04t:1805_1: ayamettha anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, hatthiādīsu
tika-vin04t:1805_2: ekamekaṃ dassanāya gamane vuttanayeneva dukkaṭaṃ, tathā anuyyutte uyyuttasaññino,
tika-vin04t:1805_3: vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Anuyyuttasaññino pana, ārāme ṭhatvā attano ṭhitokāsaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1805_4: paṭipathaṃ āgacchantañca passato, tathārūpappaccaye, āpadāsu, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1805_5: Uyyuttasenaṃ dassanatthāya gamanaṃ, anuññātokāsato aññatra dassanaṃ, tathārūpappaccayassa
tika-vin04t:1805_6: āpadāya vā abhāvoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisāni, idaṃ
tika-vin04t:1808: Navame tato ce uttarīti tirattato uttari catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye senāya tiṭṭhatu vā nisīdatu vā sayatu vā, sacepi ākāse iddhiyā kañci iriyāpathaṃ kappeti, pācittiyameva.
tika-vin04t:1809_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1809_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ūnakatiratte atirekasaññino, vematikassa
tika-vin04t:1809_2: vā dukkaṭaṃ. Ūnakasaññissa, tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasato, gilānassa
tika-vin04t:1809_3: vā gilānakaraṇīyena vā vasato, paṭisenāruddhāya senāya, kenaci palibuddhassa, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:1809_4: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Tirattātikkamo, senāya sūriyassa atthaṅgamo, gilānatādīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1809_5: abhāvoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1812_0: Dasame uggantvā uggantvā ettha yujjhantīti uyyodhikaṃ, sampahāraṭṭhānassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1812_1: Balassa aggaṃ jānanti etthāti balaggaṃ, balagaṇanaṭṭhānanti attho. Senāya viyūhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1812_2: senābyūhaṃ, senānivesassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Anīkassa dassanaṃ anīkadassanaṃ. Anīkaṃ nāma
tika-vin04t:1812_3: “dvādasapuriso hatthī, tipuriso asso, catuppuriso ratho”tiiminā lakkhaṇena tayo hatthī
tika-vin04t:1812_4: pacchimakaṃ hatthānīkaṃ, assānīkarathānīkesupi eseva nayo. Cattāro pana āvudhahatthā
tika-vin04t:1812_5: purisā pacchimakaṃ pattānīkaṃ. Etesu yaṃkiñci dassanāya gacchato pade pade dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1812_6: dassanūpacāre ṭhatvā passato pācittiyaṃ, upacāraṃ pana vijahitvā punappunaṃ passato
tika-vin04t:1812_7: payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ. Sesaṃ uyyuttasenāsikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, āpattibhedo
tika-vin04t:1817_0: Surāpānavaggassa paṭhame surāmerayapāneti ettha piṭṭhādīhi kataṃ majjaṃ surā, pupphādīhi
tika-vin04t:1817_1: kato āsavo merayaṃ, tadubhayampi bījato paṭṭhāya kusaggenāpi pivato payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1818_0: Kosambiyaṃ sāgatattheraṃ ārabbha majjapivanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1818_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, amajje majjasaññissa, vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Amajjasaññissa,
tika-vin04t:1818_2: amajjaṃ majjavaṇṇagandharasaṃ loṇasovīrakaṃ vā suttaṃ vā pivato, vāsaggāhāpanatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:1818_3: īsakaṃ majjaṃ pakkhipitvā sūpādīni pacanti, tesu sūpasampākādīsu, āmalakarasādīhi
tika-vin04t:1818_4: amajjaṃ majjasadisaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ karonti, taṃ pivato, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Majjabhāvo,
tika-vin04t:1818_5: tassa pānañcāti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisāni, idaṃ pana
tika-vin04t:1821: Dutiye aṅgulipatodaketi aṅgulīhi upakacchakādighaṭṭanaṃ vuccati, apica yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena hasādhippāyassa upasampannaṃ phusato pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1822_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha aṅgulipatodakena hasanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1822_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ, idha pana bhikkhunīpi bhikkhussa,
tika-vin04t:1822_2: bhikkhu ca bhikkhuniyā anupasampanno eva, kāyappaṭibaddhādīsu sabbattha dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1822_3: Na hasanādhippāyassa, sati karaṇīye āmasato, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Hasādhippāyatā,
tika-vin04t:1822_4: upasampannassa kāyena kāyāmasananti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1825_0: Tatiye udake hasadhammeti udakakīḷā vuccati. Tasmā yo bhikkhu uparigopphake udakeyeva
tika-vin04t:1825_1: gacchanto hasādhippāyo nimujjati vā ummujjati vā, tassa nimujjanādīnaṃ atthāya otarantassa
tika-vin04t:1825_2: hatthavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ, nimujjanummujjanesu payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ, nimujjitvā
tika-vin04t:1825_3: antoudakeyeva gacchantassa hatthavārapadavāresu, tarantassa vā yena yena aṅgena tarati,
tika-vin04t:1826_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha udake kīḷanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1826_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, udake ahasadhamme hasadhammasaññino, vematikassa vā
tika-vin04t:1826_2: dukkaṭaṃ, tathā nāvāya kīḷato hatthena vā pādena vā kaṭṭhena vā kathalāya vā udakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1826_3: paharato, bhājanagataṃ udakaṃ vā kañjikādīni vā cikkhallaṃ vā khipanakīḷāya kīḷato
tika-vin04t:1826_4: dukkaṭaṃ. Atthajotakaṃ pana akkharaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Na hasādhippāyassa, sati
tika-vin04t:1826_5: karaṇīye otaritvā nimujjanādīni karontassa, pāraṃ gacchato, āpadāsu, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1826_6: anāpatti. Uparigopphakatā, hasādhippāyena kīḷananti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1829_0: Catutthe anādariyeti puggalassa vā dhammassa vā anādarakaraṇe. Tasmā yo bhikkhu upasampannena
tika-vin04t:1829_1: paññattena vuccamāno tassa vā vacanaṃ akattukāmatāya, taṃ vā dhammaṃ asikkhitukāmatāya
tika-vin04t:1829_2: anādariyaṃ karoti, tassa tasmiṃ anādariye pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1830_0: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha anādariyakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1830_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ, upasampannena vā anupasampannena
tika-vin04t:1830_2: vā “idaṃ na sallekhāya saṃvattatī”tiādinā nayena apaññattena vuccamānassa anādariyepi
tika-vin04t:1830_3: dukkaṭameva. Paveṇiāgataṃ pana uggahaṃ gahetvā “evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchā”ti
tika-vin04t:1830_4: bhaṇantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Upasampannassa paññattena vacanaṃ, anādariyakaraṇanti
tika-vin04t:1830_5: imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1833: Pañcame bhiṃsāpeyyāti bhiṃsāpanatthaṃ rūpādīni upasaṃhareyya, bhayānakakathaṃ vā katheyya. So pana bhāyatu vā, mā vā, itarassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1834_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha bhiṃsāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1834_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ. Anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ, na bhiṃsāpetukāmassa tathā
tika-vin04t:1834_2: karoto, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Upasampannatā, tassa dassanasavanavisaye bhiṃsāpetukāmatāya
tika-vin04t:1834_3: vāyāmananti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni anantarasikkhāpadasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1837_0: Chaṭṭhe visibbanāpekkhoti tappitukāmo. Samādaheyyāti jāleyya, aññatra tathārūpappaccayāti
tika-vin04t:1837_1: padīpujjālanaṃ vā pattapacanādīsu jotikaraṇaṃ vāti evarūpaṃ paccayaṃ vinā. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1837_2: vinicchayo – sayaṃ samādahantassa araṇisaṇṭhāpanato paṭṭhāya yāva jālā na uṭṭhahati,
tika-vin04t:1837_3: tāva sabbappayogesu dukkaṭaṃ, jāluṭṭhāne pācittiyaṃ. Samādahāpentassa āṇattiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1837_4: sakiṃ āṇattena bahumpi samādahite ekameva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1838_0: Bhaggesu sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha jotiṃ samādahitvā visibbanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1838_1: “agilāno, aññatra tathārūpappaccayā”ti imānettha dve anupaññattiyo, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1838_2: sāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, gilānassa agilānasaññino, vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ, tathā
tika-vin04t:1838_3: paṭilātaṃ ukkhipantassa, tañca avijjhātaṃ ukkhipitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapentassa. Vijjhātaṃ
tika-vin04t:1838_4: pana jālayato pācittiyameva. Gilānassa gilānasaññissa, aññena kataṃ vā vītaccitaṅgāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1838_5: vā visibbentassa, padīpajotikajantāgharādike tathārūpappaccaye, āpadāsu, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1838_6: anāpatti. Agilānatā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvo, visibbetukāmatā, samādahananti imānettha
tika-vin04t:1838_7: cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni sañcaritte vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti.
tika-vin04t:1841_0: Sattame nahāyeyyāti yo bhikkhu majjhimadese nahānadivasato paṭṭhāya addhamāse apuṇṇe
tika-vin04t:1841_1: aññatra samayā “nahāyissāmī”ti cuṇṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā abhisaṅkharoti, tassa tato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin04t:1841_2: sabbappayogesu dukkaṭaṃ, nahānapariyosāne pācittiyaṃ. Samayesu pariveṇasammajjanamattampi
tika-vin04t:1841_3: kammasamayo, addhayojanaṃ gantukāmassa, gacchato, gatassa vā addhānagamanasamayo,
tika-vin04t:1841_4: sarajena vātena okiṇṇassa dvīsu vā tīsu vā udakaphusitesu kāye patitesu vātavuṭṭhisamayoti
tika-vin04t:1842_0: Rājagahe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha na mattaṃ jānitvā nahāyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1842_1: “aññatra samayā”ti ayamettha chabbidhā anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1842_2: tikapācittiyaṃ, atirekaddhamāse ūnakasaññino, vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Atirekasaññissa,
tika-vin04t:1842_3: samaye vā nahāyantassa, yo vā nadīpāraṃ gacchanto vālukaṃ ukkiritvā kataāvāṭesupi
tika-vin04t:1842_4: nahāyati, tassa, paccantime janapade sabbesaṃ, āpadāsu, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1842_5: Majjhimadeso, ūnakaddhamāse nahānaṃ, samayānaṃ vā nadīpāragamanassa vā āpadānaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:1842_6: abhāvoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1845_0: Aṭṭhame alabhīti labho, labho eva lābho, kiṃ alabhi? Cīvaraṃ, kīdisaṃ? Navaṃ, iti
tika-vin04t:1845_2: paṭiladdhanavacīvarenāti attho. Majjhe ṭhitapadadvaye panāti nipātamattaṃ. Bhikkhunāti
tika-vin04t:1845_3: yena laddhaṃ, tassa nidassanaṃ, sesaṃ padatthato uttānameva. Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo
tika-vin04t:1845_4: – nivāsanapārupanupagaṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā tassa niṭṭhitarajanassa yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1845_5: vā padese kaṃsanīlena vā pattanīlena vā kaddamena vā yena kenaci kāḷakena vā morakkhimaṇḍalamaṅgulapiṭṭhīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:1845_6: aññatarappamāṇaṃ kappabinduṃ ādiyitvā taṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjitabbaṃ, anādiyitvā paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1846_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha attano cīvaraajānanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1846_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ādinne anādinnasaññino, vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Ādinnasaññissa,
tika-vin04t:1846_2: kappe naṭṭhe, kappakatokāse jiṇṇe, kappakatena akappakate saṃsibbite, pacchā āropitesu
tika-vin04t:1846_3: aggaḷaanuvātaparibhaṇḍesu taṃ paribhuñjantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Vuttappakārassa
tika-vin04t:1846_4: cīvarassa akatakappakatā, na naṭṭhacīvarāditā, nivāsanaṃ vā pārupanaṃ vāti imānettha
tika-vin04t:1846_5: tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriyanti.
tika-vin04t:1849_0: Navame vikappetvāti ettha dve vikappanā sammukhāvikappanā parammukhāvikappanā ca.
tika-vin04t:1849_1: Kathaṃ sammukhāvikappanā hoti? Cīvarānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca
tika-vin04t:1849_2: ñatvā ‘imaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘imāni cīvarānī’ti vā ‘etaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘etāni cīvarānī’ti
tika-vin04t:1849_3: vā vatvā ‘tuyhaṃ vikappemī’ti vattabbaṃ, ayamekā sammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ
tika-vin04t:1849_4: vaṭṭati, paribhuñjituṃ pana vissajjetuṃ vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vā na vaṭṭati. “Mayhaṃ santakaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1849_5: mayhaṃ santakāni paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ pana vutte
tika-vin04t:1849_6: paccuddhāro nāma hoti, tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭanti. Aparo nayo, tatheva
tika-vin04t:1849_7: cīvarānaṃ ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca ñatvā tasseva bhikkhuno santike
tika-vin04t:1849_8: ‘imaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘imāni cīvarānī’ti vā ‘etaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘etāni cīvarānī’ti
tika-vin04t:1849_9: vā vatvā pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa attanā abhirucitassa yassa kassaci nāmaṃ
tika-vin04t:1849_10: gahetvā “tissassa bhikkhuno vikappemī”ti vā “tissāya bhikkhuniyā, sikkhamānāya, sāmaṇerassa,
tika-vin04t:1849_11: tissāya sāmaṇeriyā vikappemī”ti vā vattabbaṃ, ayaṃ aparāpi sammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā
tika-vin04t:1849_12: nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati, paribhogādīsu ekampi na vaṭṭati. Tena pana bhikkhunā “tissassa
tika-vin04t:1849_13: bhikkhuno santakaṃ…pe… tissāya sāmaṇeriyā santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1849_14: karohī”ti vutte paccuddhāro nāma hoti, tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin04t:1850_0: Kathaṃ parammukhāvikappanā hoti? Cīvarānaṃ tatheva ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca
tika-vin04t:1850_1: ñatvā ‘imaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘imāni cīvarānī’ti vā ‘etaṃ cīvara’nti vā ‘etāni cīvarānī’ti
tika-vin04t:1850_2: vā vatvā “tuyhaṃ vikappanatthāya dammī”ti vattabbaṃ. Tena vattabbo “ko te mitto vā
tika-vin04t:1850_3: sandiṭṭho vā”ti. Tato itarena purimanayeneva ‘tisso bhikkhū’ti vā…pe… ‘tissā sāmaṇerī’ti
tika-vin04t:1850_4: vā vattabbaṃ. Puna tena bhikkhunā “ahaṃ tissassa bhikkhuno dammī”ti vā…pe… “tissāya
tika-vin04t:1850_5: sāmaṇeriyā dammī”ti vā vattabbaṃ, ayaṃ parammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1850_6: paribhogādīsu ekampi na vaṭṭati. Tena pana bhikkhunā dutiyasammukhāvikappanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-vin04t:1850_7: “itthannāmassa santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ karohī”ti vutte
tika-vin04t:1850_8: paccuddhāro nāma hoti, tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantīti. Pattavikappanāyampi
tika-vin04t:1850_9: eseva nayo. Iti imāsu dvīsu vikappanāsu yāya kāyaci vikappanāya pañcasu sahadhammikesu
tika-vin04t:1850_10: yassa kassaci cīvaraṃ vikappetvā vuttanayena akatappaccuddhāraṃ vā yena vinayakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1850_11: kataṃ, tassa vā vissāsena aggahetvā paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1851_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1851_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, taṃ pana adhiṭṭhahantassa vā vissajjentassa
tika-vin04t:1851_2: vā dukkaṭaṃ, tathā paccuddhāraṇe appaccuddhāraṇasaññissa vematikassa vā. Paccuddhāraṇasaññissa
tika-vin04t:1851_3: pana vissāsena paribhuñjantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Sāmaṃ vikappitassa appaccuddhāro,
tika-vin04t:1851_4: vikappanupagacīvaratā, paribhogoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisāneva,
tika-vin04t:1854_0: Dasame pattanti adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ. Cīvaranti vikappanupagaṃ. Nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ
tika-vin04t:1854_1: vuccati. Sūcigharaṃ nāma sasūcikaṃ vā asūcikaṃ vā. Kāyabandhanaṃ nāma paṭṭikā vā
tika-vin04t:1854_2: sūkarantakaṃ vā. Apanidheyyāti apanetvā nidaheyya. Hasāpekkhoti hasādhippāyo. Pācittiyanti
tika-vin04t:1854_3: sayaṃ apanidhentassa pācittiyaṃ, aññaṃ āṇāpentassa āṇattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, tena apanihite
tika-vin04t:1855_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha apanidhānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1855_1: sāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ, vuttappakārāni pana pattādīni
tika-vin04t:1855_2: ṭhapetvā aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ upasampannassa vā anupasampannassa vā santakaṃ apanidhentassa
tika-vin04t:1855_3: dukkaṭameva. Dunnikkhittaṃ paṭisāmentassa, “dhammakathaṃ katvā dassāmī”ti paṭisāmentassa,
tika-vin04t:1855_4: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Upasampannassa santakānaṃ pattādīnaṃ apanidhānaṃ, vihesetukāmatā
tika-vin04t:1855_5: vā hasādhippāyatā vāti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:1860: Sappāṇakavaggassa paṭhame pāṇoti tiracchānagatapāṇo adhippeto. Taṃ khuddakampi mahantampi mārentassa pācittiyameva, mahante pana upakkamamahantatāya akusalaṃ mahantaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1861_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1861_1: sāṇattikaṃ, pāṇe vematikassa, apāṇe pāṇasaññino, vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ. Apāṇasaññissa,
tika-vin04t:1861_2: asañcicca, ajānantassa, namaraṇādhippāyassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Sesaṃ manussaviggahe vuttanayamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1864: Dutiye sappāṇakanti ye pāṇakā paribhogena maranti, tehi sappāṇakaṃ, tādisañhi jānaṃ paribhuñjantassa payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1865: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesamettha siñcanasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:1868_0: Tatiye yathādhammanti yo yassa adhikaraṇassa vūpasamāya dhammo vutto, teneva dhammena.
tika-vin04t:1868_1: Nihatādhikaraṇanti nihataṃ adhikaraṇaṃ, samathakkhandhake satthārā vuttadhammeneva
tika-vin04t:1868_2: vūpasamitanti attho, vūpasamananayaṃ panassa adhikaraṇasamathesu dassayissāma. Punakammāya
tika-vin04t:1868_3: ukkoṭeyyāti tassa tassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā “akataṃ kamma”ntiādīni vadanto
tika-vin04t:1868_4: punakaraṇatthāya uccāleyya. Yathāṭhitabhāvena patiṭṭhātuṃ na dadeyya, tassevaṃ karontassa
tika-vin04t:1868_5: pācittiyaṃ. Yaṃ pana dhammena adhikaraṇaṃ nihataṃ, taṃ sunihatameva. Sace vippakate
tika-vin04t:1868_6: kamme paṭikkosati, taṃ saññāpetvā kātabbaṃ. Itarathā kammañca kuppati, kārakānañca āpatti.
tika-vin04t:1869_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha ukkoṭanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1869_1: anāṇattikaṃ, dhammakamme vematikassa, adhammakamme dhammakammasaññino, vematikassa
tika-vin04t:1869_2: vā dukkaṭaṃ. Ubhayesu adhammakammasaññissa, “adhammena vā vaggena vā akammārahassa
tika-vin04t:1869_3: vā kammaṃ kata”nti jānantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Yathādhammaṃ nihatabhāvo,
tika-vin04t:1869_4: jānanā, ukkoṭanāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ
tika-vin04t:1872_0: Catutthe duṭṭhullanti saṅghādisesaṃ adhippetaṃ, taṃ yena kenaci upāyena ñatvā paṭicchādentassa
tika-vin04t:1872_1: pācittiyaṃ. Sacepi “na dāni naṃ kassaci bhikkhuno ārocessāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin04t:1872_2: pacchā āroceti, pācittiyaṃ, āpajjitvāva ārocessati. Sace pana evaṃ dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin04t:1872_3: paṭicchādanatthameva aññassa āroceti, sopi aññassāti etenupāyena samaṇasatampi āpajjatiyeva
tika-vin04t:1872_4: tāva, yāva koṭi na chijjati. Kathaṃ pana koṭi chijjati? Sace hi āpanno ekassa āroceti,
tika-vin04t:1872_5: sopi aññassa āroceti, so nivattitvā yenassa ārocitaṃ, tasseva āroceti, evaṃ tatiyena
tika-vin04t:1872_6: puggalena dutiyassa ārocite koṭi chinnā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1873_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha duṭṭhullāpattipaṭicchādanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1873_1: asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, duṭṭhullāya āpattiyā ādipade pācittiyaṃ, itaresu
tika-vin04t:1873_2: dvīsu dukkaṭaṃ, aduṭṭhullāya tikadukkaṭaṃ, anupasampannassa duṭṭhulle vā aduṭṭhulle
tika-vin04t:1873_3: vā ajjhācāre dukkaṭameva. “Saṅghassa bhaṇḍanādīni bhavissantī”ti vā “ayaṃ kakkhaḷo
tika-vin04t:1873_4: pharuso jīvitantarāyaṃ vā brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā karissatī”ti vā anārocentassa,
tika-vin04t:1873_5: patirūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ apassato, na chādetukāmassa, “paññāyissati sakena kammenā”ti anārocentassa,
tika-vin04t:1873_7: nārocessāmī”ti dhuranikkhepoti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni samanubhāsanasaasānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1876_0: Pañcame ūnavīsativassanti paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya aparipuṇṇavīsativassaṃ. Upasampādeyyāti
tika-vin04t:1876_1: upajjhāyo hutvā upasampādeyya. So ca puggalo anupasampannoti jānantenāpi ajānantenāpi
tika-vin04t:1876_2: upasampādito anupasampannova. Sace pana so dasavassaccayena aññaṃ upasampādeti, tañce
tika-vin04t:1876_3: muñcitvā gaṇo pūrati, sūpasampanno. Sopi yāva na jānāti, tāva tassa neva saggantarāyo
tika-vin04t:1876_4: na mokkhantarāyo, ñatvā pana puna upasampajjitabbaṃ. Te ca bhikkhū gārayhāti ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:1876_5: upajjhāyaṃ avasesā gārayhā honti, sabbe dukkaṭaṃ āpajjanti. Idaṃ tasmiṃ pācittiyanti
tika-vin04t:1876_6: yo pana upajjhāyo hutvā upasampādeti, tasmiṃyeva puggale idaṃ pācittiyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1876_7: Tasmā yo “evaṃ upasampādessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariyaṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati,
tika-vin04t:1876_8: sīmaṃ vā sammannati, udakukkhepaṃ vā paricchindati, so etesu sabbakiccesu ñattiyā,
tika-vin04t:1876_9: dvīsu ca kammavācāsu dukkaṭāni āpajjitvā kammavācāpariyosāne pācittiyaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1877_0: Rājagahe sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ūnavīsativassaṃ upasampādanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1877_2: ūnakasaññino, vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Ubhayattha paripuṇṇasaññissa, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1877_3: anāpatti. Ūnavīsativassatā, ūnakasaññitā, upasampādananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1877_4: Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana paṇṇattivajjaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
tika-vin04t:1880_0: Chaṭṭhe ye rājānaṃ vā vañcetvā suṅkaṃ vā pariharitukāmā corā katakammā ceva akatakammā
tika-vin04t:1880_1: ca maggappaṭipannā, tesu idha theyyasatthasaññino tassa theyyasatthabhāvaṃ ñatvā
tika-vin04t:1880_2: tena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya gacchantassa saṃvidhāne ca gamane ca ovādavagge vuttanayena
tika-vin04t:1881_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ
tika-vin04t:1881_1: paṭipajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, manussesu asaṃvidahantesu
tika-vin04t:1881_2: sayameva saṃvidahitvā gacchantassa, theyyasatthe vematikassa, atheyyasatthe theyyasatthasaññino,
tika-vin04t:1881_3: vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Atheyyasatthasaññissa, asaṃvidahitvā vā kālavisaṅketena
tika-vin04t:1881_4: vā, āpadāsu vā, gacchantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Theyyasatthabhāvo, jānanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1881_5: saṃvidhānaṃ, avisaṅketena gamananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1881_6: kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
tika-vin04t:1884_0: Sattame sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekaddhānamaggaṃ
tika-vin04t:1884_1: paṭipajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesamettha bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhānasikkhāpade
tika-vin04t:1887_0: Aṭṭhame saggamokkhānaṃ antarāyaṃ karontīti antarāyikā, te kammakilesavipākaupavādapaññattivītikkamanavasena
tika-vin04t:1887_1: pañcavidhā. Tesu mudukānaṃ attharaṇādīnaṃ phasso viya itthisamphassopi vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin04t:1887_2: methunavītikkamane dosaṃ adisvā paññattivītikkamantarāyike sandhāya “yeme antarāyikā
tika-vin04t:1887_3: dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Anekapariyāyenāti
tika-vin04t:1887_4: “aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā”tiādīhi nekehi kāraṇehi. So bhikkhu bhikkhūhīti ye passanti
tika-vin04t:1887_5: vā suṇanti vā, tehi tikkhattuṃ evaṃ vattabbo “mā āyasmā evaṃ avaca…pe… alañca pana
tika-vin04t:1887_6: te paṭisevato antarāyāyā”ti. Evaṃ vutte appaṭinissajjantassa dukkaṭaṃ, sutvā avadantānampi
tika-vin04t:1887_7: dukkaṭaṃ. Puna saṅghamajjhampi ākaḍḍhitvā tatheva vattabbo, tatrāpi tassa appaṭinissajjane,
tika-vin04t:1887_8: itaresañca avacane dukkaṭameva. Evampi appaṭinissajjanto puna ñatticatutthena kammena
tika-vin04t:1887_9: yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo, athassa appaṭinissajjato puna ñattiyā ca dvīhi ca kammavācāhi
tika-vin04t:1888_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ ārabbha pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1888_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, adhammakamme tikadukkaṭaṃ. Asamanubhāsiyamānassa,
tika-vin04t:1888_2: paṭinissajjantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Dhammakammatā, samanubhāsanā, appaṭinissajjananti
tika-vin04t:1891_0: Navame tathāvādināti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhamma”ntiādivādinā. Akatānudhammenāti anudhammo
tika-vin04t:1891_1: vuccati āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge vā dhammena
tika-vin04t:1891_2: vinayena ukkhittakassa anulomavattaṃ disvā kataosāraṇā, so osāraṇasaṅkhāto anudhammo
tika-vin04t:1891_3: yassa na kato, ayaṃ akatānudhammo nāma, tādisena saddhinti attho. Sambhuñjeyya vāti
tika-vin04t:1891_4: āmisasambhogaṃ vā dhammasambhogaṃ vā kareyya. Saṃvaseyya vāti uposathādikaṃ saṅghakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1891_5: kareyya. Saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyyāti nānūpacārepi ekacchanne nipajjeyya. Tattha āmisaparibhoge
tika-vin04t:1891_6: ekappayogena bahūpi dadato vā gaṇhato vā ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ, vicchindane sati payoge
tika-vin04t:1891_7: payoge pācittiyaṃ. Dhammasambhoge padādīhi uddisantassa vā uddisāpentassa vā padasodhamme
tika-vin04t:1891_8: vuttanayena, saṃvāse kammapariyosānavasena, sahaseyyāya ekasmiṃ nipanne itarassa
tika-vin04t:1892_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha ariṭṭhena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ sambhuñjanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1892_1: paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, ukkhittake vematikassa, anukkhittake ukkhittakasaññino
tika-vin04t:1892_2: ceva vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Ubhosu anukkhittakasaññissa, “osārito”ti vā “taṃ diṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1892_3: paṭinissaṭṭho”ti vā jānantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Akatānudhammatā, jānanā,
tika-vin04t:1892_4: sambhogādikaraṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ
tika-vin04t:1895_0: Dasame samaṇuddesoti sāmaṇero. Carāti gaccha. Pireti para amāmaka. Vinassāti nassa,
tika-vin04t:1895_1: yattha taṃ na passāma, tattha gacchāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathānāsitantiettha saṃvāsanāsanā
tika-vin04t:1895_2: liṅganāsanā daṇḍakammanāsanāti tisso nāsanā. Tattha āpattiyā adassanādīsu ukkhepanā
tika-vin04t:1895_3: saṃvāsanāsanā nāma. Dūsako nāsetabbo, mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethāti ayaṃ liṅganāsanā
tika-vin04t:1895_4: nāma. “Ajjatagge te, āvuso samaṇuddesa, na ceva so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo”ti
tika-vin04t:1895_5: ayaṃ daṇḍakammanāsanā nāma, ayaṃ idhādhippetā. Tena vuttaṃ “tathānāsita”nti. Upalāpeyyāti
tika-vin04t:1895_6: “pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā dassāmī”ti saṅgaṇheyya. Upaṭṭhāpeyyāti
tika-vin04t:1895_7: cuṇṇamattikādīni sādiyanto tena attano upaṭṭhānaṃ kārāpeyya. Sambhogasahaseyyā anantarasikkhāpade
tika-vin04t:1895_8: vuttanayā eva, tasmā āpattiparicchedopettha tasmiṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1896: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha kaṇṭakasamaṇuddesaupalāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesaṃ ariṭṭhasikkhāpade vuttasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:1901_0: Sahadhammikavaggassa paṭhame sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānoti imassattho dubbacasikkhāpade
tika-vin04t:1901_1: vutto. Etasmiṃ sikkhāpadeti etasmiṃ sikkhāpade yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ na tāva sikkhissāmīti
tika-vin04t:1901_2: attho. Pācittiyanti ettha pana anādariyabhayā lesena evaṃ vadantassa vācāya vācāya
tika-vin04t:1901_3: pācittiyaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sikkhamānenāti ovādaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā sikkhitukāmeneva
tika-vin04t:1901_4: hutvā. Aññātabbanti ājānitabbaṃ. Paripucchitabbanti “imassa ko attho”ti paripucchitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1902_0: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha evaṃ bhaṇanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1902_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ, ubhohipi “idaṃ na sallekhāyā”tiādinā
tika-vin04t:1902_2: nayeneva appaññattena vuccamānassāpi evaṃ vadato dukkaṭameva. “Jānissāmi sikkhissāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:1902_3: bhaṇantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Upasampannassa paññattena vacanaṃ, asikkhitukāmatāya
tika-vin04t:1902_4: evaṃ vacananti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1905_0: Dutiye uddissamāneti ācariyena antevāsikassa vuccamāne vā sajjhāyavasena parivattiyamāne
tika-vin04t:1905_1: vā. Khuddānukhuddakehīti khuddakehi ca anukhuddakehi ca. Yāvadevāti tesaṃ saṃvattanamariyādaparicchedavacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1905_2: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – etāni hi ye uddisanti vā uddisāpenti vā sajjhāyanti vā, tesaṃ
tika-vin04t:1905_3: tāva saṃvattanti, yāva “kappati nu kho, na kappati nu kho”ti kukkuccavippaṭisāro,
tika-vin04t:1905_4: vihesā, vicikicchā manovilekhā ca uppajjantiyeva. Atha vā yāvadevāti atisayavavatthāpanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1905_5: Tassa ‘saṃvattantī’tiiminā sambandho, kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya ativiya saṃvattantiyevāti
tika-vin04t:1905_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Sikkhāpadavivaṇṇaketi evaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vivaṇṇake garahaṇe pācittiyaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1906_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha vinayavivaṇṇanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1906_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampannassa vivaṇṇane tikadukkaṭaṃ, ubhinnampi
tika-vin04t:1906_2: aññadhammavivaṇṇane dukkaṭameva. Na vivaṇṇetukāmassa, “iṅgha tāva suttante vā gāthāyo
tika-vin04t:1906_3: vā abhidhammaṃ vā pariyāpuṇassu, pacchāpi vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇissasī”ti bhaṇato, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1906_4: anāpatti. Garahitukāmatā ca, upasampannassa santike sikkhāpadavivaṇṇanañcāti imānettha
tika-vin04t:1906_5: dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1909_0: Tatiye anvaḍḍhamāsanti anupaṭipāṭiyā addhamāse addhamāse. Uddissamāneti uposathavasena
tika-vin04t:1909_1: uddisiyamāne. Yañca tattha āpattiṃ āpannoti yaṃ so anācāraṃ ācaritvā aññāṇakena āpannabhāvaṃ
tika-vin04t:1909_2: jānāpetukāmo evamāha, tasmiṃ anācāre yaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno. Tañca yathādhammo kāretabboti
tika-vin04t:1909_3: aññāṇakena āpannattā mokkho natthi, yathā pana dhammo ca vinayo ca ṭhito, tathā taṃ
tika-vin04t:1909_4: āpattiṃ kāretabbo, desanāgāminiyā desāpetabbo, vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhāpetabboti attho.
tika-vin04t:1909_5: Uttari cassa moho āropetabboti yathādhammakaraṇato ca uttari “tassa te, āvuso”tiādivacanehi
tika-vin04t:1909_6: ninditvā tassa puggalassa ñattidutiyakammena moho āropetabbo. Idaṃ tasmiṃ mohanake
tika-vin04t:1909_7: pācittiyanti yo evaṃ āropite mohe puna moheti, tasmiṃ mohanake puggale idaṃ pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1910_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha mohanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1910_1: tikapācittiyaṃ, adhammakamme tikadukkaṭaṃ, anāropite mohe dukkaṭameva. Yena na vitthārena
tika-vin04t:1910_2: sutaṃ, ūnakadvattikkhattuṃ vā vitthārena sutaṃ, ye ca na mohetukāmā tesaṃ, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1910_3: anāpatti. Mohāropanaṃ, mohetukāmatā, vuttanayena sutabhāvo, mohananti imānettha cattāri
tika-vin04t:1910_4: aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1913: Catutthe pahāraṃ dadeyyāti ettha paharitukāmatāya pahāre dinne sacepi marati, pācittiyameva.
tika-vin04t:1914_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha pahāradānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1914_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ, virūpakaraṇādhippāyena pana
tika-vin04t:1914_2: upasampannassapi kaṇṇādicchedane dukkaṭameva. Kenaci viheṭhiyamānassa pana mokkhādhippāyassa,
tika-vin04t:1914_3: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Kupitatā, na mokkhādhippāyatā, upasampannassa pahāradānanti
tika-vin04t:1914_4: imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1917_0: Pañcame talasattikaṃ uggireyyāti pahāradānākāraṃ dassento kāyaṃ vā kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1917_1: vā uccāreyya. Ettha ca uggiraṇapaccayā pācittiyaṃ. Sace pana uggiritvā viraddho pahāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1917_2: deti, na paharitukāmatāya dinnattā dukkaṭameva, tena pahārena hatthādīsu yaṃkiñci
tika-vin04t:1917_3: bhijjati, dukkaṭameva. Sesamettha sabbaṃ purimasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:1920: Chaṭṭhe amūlakenāti diṭṭhādimūlavirahitena. Anuddhaṃseyyāti codeyya vā codāpeyya vā. Pācittiyanti sace cuditako taṅkhaṇaññeva “codeti ma”nti jānāti, codakassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1921_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1921_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, sāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ācāravipattiyā vā diṭṭhivipattiyā
tika-vin04t:1921_2: vā anuddhaṃsane dukkaṭaṃ, anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ. Tathāsaññissa, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1921_3: anāpatti. Upasampannatā, saṅghādisesassa amūlakatā, anuddhaṃsanā, taṅkhaṇavijānanāti
tika-vin04t:1921_4: imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1924: Sattame kukkuccaṃ upadaheyyāti “ūnavīsativasso tvaṃ maññe”tiādīni bhaṇanto uppādeyya. Evaṃ aññasmiṃ uppādanapaccaye asati sañcicca uppādentassa vācāya vācāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1925_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha kukkuccauppādanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1925_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ. Nauppādetukāmassa, kevalaṃ
tika-vin04t:1925_2: hitesitāya tathā vadantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Upasampannatā, aphāsukāmatā,
tika-vin04t:1925_3: kukkuccuppādananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni anantarasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:1928_0: Aṭṭhame vivādāpannānanti bhaṇḍanakalahehi vivaḍḍhitaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ āpannānaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1928_1: Upassutinti sutisamīpaṃ, yattha ṭhatvā sakkā hoti tesaṃ vacanaṃ sotuṃ, tattha tiṭṭheyyāti
tika-vin04t:1928_2: attho. “Tattha sossāmī”ti codetukāmatāya gacchato pade pade dukkaṭaṃ, turitagamanepi
tika-vin04t:1928_3: ohīyamānepi eseva nayo. Yattha pana ṭhito suṇāti, tattha ṭhitassa pācittiyaṃ, attano
tika-vin04t:1928_4: ṭhitokāsaṃ āgantvā tesu mantayamānesupi ukkāsitvā, “ahaṃ etthā”ti vā vatvā jānāpetabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1929_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha upassutiṭṭhānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1929_1: anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ, “imesaṃ sutvā oramissāmi
tika-vin04t:1929_2: viramissāmi vūpasamissāmi attānaṃ parimocessāmī”ti gacchato, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1929_3: Upasampannatā, codanādhippāyo, savananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1929_4: idaṃ pana siyā kiriyaṃ, siyā akiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1932_0: Navame dhammikānaṃ kammānanti dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena katānaṃ apalokanakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1932_1: ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakammanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1932_2: saṅkhepato kammavinicchayo – tatra apalokanakammaṃ nāma samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā
tika-vin04t:1932_3: taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ kittetvā “ruccati saṅghassā”ti tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1932_4: vuccati. Samaggasseva pana saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ñattikammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1932_5: nāma. Ekāya ñattiyā ceva anussāvanāya ca kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1932_6: Ekāya pana ñattiyā tīhi ca anussāvanāhi kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1933_0: Tesu apalokanakammaṃ pañca ṭhānāni gacchati osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ bhaṇḍukammaṃ brahmadaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin04t:1933_1: kammalakkhaṇanti. Tattha kaṇṭakasāmaṇerassa nāsanā viya nissāraṇā, tādisaṃyeva sammāvattantaṃ
tika-vin04t:1933_2: disvā pavesanā ‘osāraṇā’ti veditabbā. Pabbajjāpekkhassa kesacchedanāpucchanaṃ bhaṇḍukammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1933_3: nāma. Mukharassa bhikkhuno bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭentassa “itthannāmo bhikkhu
tika-vin04t:1933_4: mukharo bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭento viharati, so bhikkhu yaṃ iccheyya, taṃ
tika-vin04t:1933_5: vadeyya, bhikkhūhi itthannāmo bhikkhu neva vattabbo, na ovādānusāsaniṃ kattabbo,
tika-vin04t:1933_6: na ovaditabbo”ti “saṅghaṃ, bhante, pucchāmi ‘itthannāmassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa
tika-vin04t:1933_7: dānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā’ti, dutiyampi pucchāmi, tatiyampi pucchāmi ‘itthannāmassa,
tika-vin04t:1933_8: bhante, bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa dānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā”’ti evaṃ kattabbaṃ kammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1933_9: brahmadaṇḍaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ ūruṃ vivaritvā dassanādivatthūsu
tika-vin04t:1933_10: “avandiyo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbo”ti evaṃ avandiyakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1933_11: anuññātaṃ, yaṃ bhikkhunīhi “ayye, asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ appasādanīyaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin04t:1933_12: etassa ayyassa avandiyakaraṇaṃ ‘ruccati bhikkhunisaṅghassā”’ti evaṃ upassaye nisinnāheva
tika-vin04t:1933_13: bhikkhunīhi kattabbaṃ, evarūpaṃ kammaṃ yasmā tassa kammaṃyeva lakkhaṇaṃ na osāraṇādīni,
tika-vin04t:1933_14: tasmā kammalakkhaṇanti vuccati. Idañca kammalakkhaṇaṃ nāma bhikkhunimūlakaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1933_15: apica bhikkhūnampi labbhati, tasmā bhikkhūhipi acchinnacīvarakādīnaṃ cīvarādīni vā
tika-vin04t:1933_16: dentehi, paribhuñjitabbāni apanetabbānipi vatthūni paribhuñjantehi vā, apanentehi
tika-vin04t:1933_17: vā, tathārūpaṃ vā dhammikaṃ katikaṃ karontehi tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1933_18: kātabbaṃ, sabbañhetaṃ kammalakkhaṇameva pavisati, iti apalokanakammaṃ pañca ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin04t:1934_0: Ñattikammaṃ pana nava ṭhānāni gacchati osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ uposathaṃ pavāraṇaṃ sammutiṃ
tika-vin04t:1934_1: dānaṃ paṭiggahaṃ paccukkaḍḍhanaṃ kammalakkhaṇanti. Tattha “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin04t:1934_2: itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, anusiṭṭho so mayā, yadi saṅghassa
tika-vin04t:1934_3: pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo āgaccheyya, ‘āgacchāhī’ti vattabbo”ti evaṃ upasampadāpekkhassa
tika-vin04t:1934_4: osāraṇā osāraṇā nāma. “Suṇantu me āyasmantā, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu dhammakathiko,
tika-vin04t:1934_5: imassa neva suttaṃ āgacchati, no suttavibhaṅgo, so atthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanacchāyāya
tika-vin04t:1934_6: atthaṃ paṭibāhati, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin04t:1934_7: avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā”ti evaṃ ubbhāhikavinicchaye dhammakathikassa
tika-vin04t:1934_8: bhikkhuno nissāraṇā nissāraṇā nāma. “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ajjuposatho…pe… uposathaṃ
tika-vin04t:1934_9: kareyyā”ti evaṃ uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti uposatho nāma. “Suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1934_10: saṅgho, ajja pavāraṇā pannarasī, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho pavāreyyā”ti
tika-vin04t:1934_11: evaṃ pavāraṇākammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti pavāraṇā nāma. “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin04t:1934_12: itthannāmo itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin04t:1934_13: anusāseyya”nti, “yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ anusāseyyā”ti
tika-vin04t:1934_14: evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā sammannituṃ ṭhapitā ñatti sammuti nāma. “Suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1934_15: saṅgho, imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ, yadi
tika-vin04t:1934_16: saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā”ti evaṃ
tika-vin04t:1934_17: nissaṭṭhacīvarapattādīnaṃ dānaṃ dānaṃ nāma. “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo
tika-vin04t:1934_18: bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati vivarati uttāniṃ karoti deseti, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1934_19: ahaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno āpattiṃ paṭiggaṇheyya”nti, tena vattabbo ‘passasī’ti,
tika-vin04t:1934_20: ‘āma, passāmī’ti, “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti evaṃ āpattippaṭiggaho paṭiggaho nāma. “Suṇantu
tika-vin04t:1934_21: me āyasmantā āvāsikā, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma, pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1934_22: uddiseyyāma, āgame kāle pavāreyyāmā”ti evaṃ katappavāraṇappaccukkaḍḍhanā paccukkaḍḍhanā
tika-vin04t:1934_23: nāma. Tiṇavattārakasamathe sabbasaṅgāhikañatti, ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekā ñatti cāti
tika-vin04t:1934_24: tissopi ñattiyo kammalakkhaṇaṃ nāma. Iti ñattikammaṃ nava ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin04t:1935_0: Ñattidutiyakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchati osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ sammutiṃ dānaṃ uddhāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1935_1: desanaṃ kammalakkhaṇanti. Tattha bhikkhūnaṃ alābhāya parisakkanādikehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi
tika-vin04t:1935_2: samannāgatassa upāsakassa saṅghena asambhogakaraṇatthaṃ pattanikkujjanavasena nissāraṇā
tika-vin04t:1935_3: nissāraṇā nāma. Tasseva sammāvattantassa pattukkujjanavasena osāraṇā ca veditabbā,
tika-vin04t:1935_4: sā khuddakakkhandhake vaḍḍhalicchavivatthusmiṃ vuttā. Sīmāsammuti ticīvarena
tika-vin04t:1935_6: etāsaṃ sammutīnaṃ vasena sammuti veditabbā. Kathinacīvaramatakacīvaradānavasena dānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1935_8: desanā veditabbā. Yā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathe ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekā, ekasmiṃ pakkhe
tika-vin04t:1935_9: ekāti dve ñattidutiyakammavācā vuttā, yā ca mohāropanādīsu kammavācā vuttā, tāsaṃ
tika-vin04t:1935_10: vasena kammalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, iti ñattidutiyakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin04t:1936_0: Ñatticatutthakammampi satteva ṭhānāni gacchati osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ sammutiṃ dānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1936_1: niggahaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ kammalakkhaṇanti. Tattha tajjanīyakammādīnaṃ sattannaṃ kammānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1936_2: vasena nissāraṇā, tesaṃyeva kammānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena osāraṇā ca veditabbā,
tika-vin04t:1936_3: bhikkhunovādakasammutivasena sammuti, parivāsadāna mānattadānavasena dānaṃ, mūlāyapaṭikassanavasena
tika-vin04t:1936_4: niggaho, ukkhittānuvattikā, aṭṭha yāvatatiyakā, ariṭṭho, caṇḍakāḷī cāti ime te yāvatatiyakāti
tika-vin04t:1936_5: imāsaṃ ekādasannaṃ samanubhāsanānaṃ vasena samanubhāsanā, upasampadākammaabbhānakammavasena
tika-vin04t:1936_6: kammalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iti ñatticatutthakammaṃ satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin04t:1937_0: Imesu pana catūsu kammesu apalokanakammaṃ apaloketvāva kātabbaṃ, ñattikammādivasena
tika-vin04t:1937_1: na kātabbaṃ. Ñattikammampi ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvāva kātabbaṃ, apalokanakammādivasena
tika-vin04t:1937_2: na kātabbaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ pana apaloketvā kātabbampi atthi akātabbampi, tattha
tika-vin04t:1937_3: sīmāsammuti sīmāsamūhananaṃ kathinacīvaradānaṃ kathinuddhāro kuṭivatthudesanā vihāravatthudesanāti
tika-vin04t:1937_4: imāni cha kammāni garukāni apaloketvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭanti, ñattidutiyakammavācaṃ sāvetvāva
tika-vin04t:1937_6: etāni lahukammāni apaloketvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭanti, ñattikammādivasena pana na kātabbāneva.
tika-vin04t:1937_7: Ñatticatutthakammampi sakalakkhaṇeneva kātabbaṃ, na sesakammavasena. Evaṃ attano
tika-vin04t:1937_8: attano lakkhaṇeneva vatthuñattianussāvanāsīmāparisāsampattiyā katāni etāni kammāni
tika-vin04t:1937_9: dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena katattā dhammo etesu atthīti dhammikāni nāma honti,
tika-vin04t:1937_10: iti etesaṃ dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjantassa
tika-vin04t:1938_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha khīyanadhammāpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1938_1: anāṇattikaṃ, dhammakamme vematikassa, adhammakamme dhammakammasaññino, vematikassa
tika-vin04t:1938_2: ca dukkaṭaṃ. Adhammakammasaññissa, “adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1938_3: karontī”ti ñatvā khīyantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Dhammakammatā, dhammakammasaññitā,
tika-vin04t:1938_4: chandaṃ datvā khīyananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāneva,
tika-vin04t:1941_0: Dasame vinicchayakathāyāti yāva ārocitaṃ vatthu avinicchikaṃ, ñattiṃ vā ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:1941_1: kammavācā aniṭṭhāpitā, tāva vinicchayakathā vattamānā nāma hoti. Yo bhikkhu etasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1941_2: antare kammaṃ kopetukāmatāya parisāya hatthapāsaṃ vijahati, tassa vijahane dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1942_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha chandaṃ adatvā pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1942_1: sādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, dhammakamme vematikassa, adhammakamme dhammakammasaññino,
tika-vin04t:1942_2: vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Adhammakammasaññissa pana, yo ca “saṅghassa bhaṇḍanādīni
tika-vin04t:1942_3: vā bhavissanti, adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṃ karissantī”ti ñatvā,
tika-vin04t:1942_4: gilāno vā hutvā, gilānassa vā karaṇīyena, uccārādīhi vā pīḷito, na ca kammaṃ kopetukāmo
tika-vin04t:1942_5: “puna paccāgamissāmī”ti gacchati, tassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Vinicchayakathāya
tika-vin04t:1942_6: vattamānatā, dhammakammatā, dhammakammasaññitā, samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitatā, samānasaṃvāsakatā,
tika-vin04t:1942_7: kopetukāmatāya hatthapāsavijahananti imānettha cha aṅgāni. Samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1942_8: kiriyākiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1945_0: Ekādasame samaggena saṅghenāti samānasaṃvāsakena samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitena saṅghena saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:1945_1: cīvaraṃ datvā. Yathāsanthutanti yo yo mittasandiṭṭhasambhattavasena santhuto, tassa
tika-vin04t:1945_2: tassāti attho. Pācittiyanti evaṃ saṅghena saddhiṃ sayameva senāsanapaññāpanādivasena
tika-vin04t:1945_3: sammatassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyantassa vācāya vācāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1946_0: Rājagahe chabbaggiye ārabbha cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1946_1: anāṇattikaṃ, dhammakamme tikapācittiyaṃ, cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ vissajjiyavebhaṅgiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1946_2: parikkhāraṃ datvā pacchākhīyantassa dukkaṭaṃ, vissajjiyavebhaṅgiyo nāma ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:1946_3: pañca garubhaṇḍāni avaseso. Rāsivasena hi pañca garubhaṇḍāni vuttāni, tattha ārāmo
tika-vin04t:1946_4: ārāmavatthūti ekaṃ, vihāro vihāravatthūti dutiyaṃ, mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohananti
tika-vin04t:1946_5: tatiyaṃ, lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṃ lohavārako lohakaṭāhaṃ vāsi parasu kuṭhārī kudālo
tika-vin04t:1946_6: nikhādananti catutthaṃ, valli veḷu muñjaṃ pabbajaṃ tiṇaṃ mattikā dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍanti
tika-vin04t:1946_7: pañcamaṃ. Etāni hi pañca saṅghasantakāni neva saṅghassa, na gaṇapuggalānaṃ vissajjetuṃ
tika-vin04t:1946_8: vā vibhajituṃ vā vaṭṭanti, vissajjitavibhattānipi saṅghikāneva honti. Thāvarena pana
tika-vin04t:1946_9: thāvaraṃ, itarena ca akappiyena mahagghakappiyena vā itaraṃ saṅghassa upakāraṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin04t:1946_10: kappiyaparivattanena parivattetuṃ vaṭṭati, varasenāsanādīnaṃ saṃrakkhaṇatthaṃ lāmakāni
tika-vin04t:1946_11: vissajjetuṃ vissajjetvā paribhuñjituñca vaṭṭati. Ettha ca purimesu tīsu rāsīsu agarubhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin04t:1946_12: nāma kiñci natthi, catutthe lohakumbhī arañjarasaṇṭhānaṃ lohabhāṇakaṃ lohakaṭāhanti
tika-vin04t:1946_13: imāni tīṇi antamaso pasatamattaudakaggaṇhanakānipi garubhaṇḍāni. Lohavārako pana
tika-vin04t:1946_14: kāḷalohatambalohakaṃsalohavaṭṭalohānaṃ yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādaggaṇhanako
tika-vin04t:1946_15: bhājetabbo, pādo ca nāma magadhanāḷiyā pañcanāḷimattaṃ gaṇhāti, tato atirekaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1947_1: khuddakānipi garubhaṇḍāneva, ayapatto ayathālakaṃ tambalohathālakanti imāni pana
tika-vin04t:1947_2: bhājanīyāni, kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā vā
tika-vin04t:1947_3: vaṭṭati, puggalikaparibhogena na vaṭṭati. Ṭhapetvā pana taṃ bhājanavikatiṃ aññasmimpi
tika-vin04t:1947_4: kappiyalohabhaṇḍe añjanī añjanisalākā natthudānaṃ kaṇṇamalaharaṇī sūci khuddako pipphaliko
tika-vin04t:1947_5: khuddakaṃ ārakaṇṭakaṃ kuñcikā tāḷaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi vedhako bhindivālako yathātathāghanakatalohaṃvippakatalohabhaṇḍañca
tika-vin04t:1947_7: pana aññāni vā bhitticchadanakavāṭādīsu upanetabbāni, antamaso lohakhilakaṃ upādāya
tika-vin04t:1947_8: sabbānipi lohabhaṇḍāni garubhaṇḍāniyeva, attanā laddhāni pariharitvāpi puggalikaparibhogena
tika-vin04t:1947_9: na paribhuñjitabbāni, saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti, tipubhaṇḍepi
tika-vin04t:1948_0: Ghaṭako pana telabhājanaṃ vā pādaggaṇhanakato atirekameva garubhaṇḍaṃ, suvaṇṇarajataārakūṭajātiphalikabhājanāni
tika-vin04t:1948_1: gihivikaṭānipi na vaṭṭanti. Senāsanaparibhoge pana āmāsampi anāmāsampi sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1949_0: Vāsiyādīsu pana yāya vāsiyā dantakaṭṭhacchedanaucchutacchanamattato aññaṃ mahākammaṃ
tika-vin04t:1949_1: kātuṃ na sakkā, ayaṃ bhājanīyā. Sesā yena kenaci ākārena katā garubhaṇḍaṃ, parasu
tika-vin04t:1949_2: pana antamaso vejjānaṃ sirāvedhakopi garubhaṇḍameva, tathā kuṭhārī. Yā pana āvudhasaṅkhepena
tika-vin04t:1949_3: katā, ayaṃ anāmāsā, kudālo daṇḍabandhanikhādanaṃ vā agarubhaṇḍaṃ nāma natthi. Sammuñjanidaṇḍakhaṇanakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1949_4: pana adaṇḍakaṃ phalamattakameva, yaṃ sakkā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharituṃ, taṃ
tika-vin04t:1949_5: bhājanīyaṃ. Sikharampi nikhādaneneva saṅgahitaṃ, yehi manussehi vihāre vāsiādīni
tika-vin04t:1949_6: dinnāni honti, te ce ghare daḍḍhe vā vilutte vā “detha no, bhante, upakkhare, puna
tika-vin04t:1949_7: āharissāmā”ti vadanti, dātabbā. Sace haranti, na vāretabbā, anāharantāpi na codetabbā.
tika-vin04t:1950_1: sabbāni lohamayāni upakaraṇāni saṅghe dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍāni. Tipukoṭṭakasuvaṇṇakāracammakāraupakaraṇesupi
tika-vin04t:1950_2: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso, tipukoṭṭakaupakaraṇesu tipucchedanakasatthakaṃ, suvaṇṇakāraupakaraṇesu
tika-vin04t:1950_4: imāni bhājanīyāni. Nhāpitatunnakāraupakaraṇesupi ṭhapetvā mahākattariṃ mahāsaṇḍāsaṃ
tika-vin04t:1951_0: Valliādīsu vettavalliādikā yā kāci aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tatthajātakā
tika-vin04t:1951_1: vā rakkhitagopitāva garubhaṇḍaṃ, sā saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate sace atirekā
tika-vin04t:1951_2: hoti, puggalikakammepi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati, suttamakacivākanāḷikerahīracammamayā rajjukā
tika-vin04t:1951_3: vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikerahīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā ekavaṭṭā vā dvivaṭṭā vā saṅghassa
tika-vin04t:1951_4: santakā garubhaṇḍaṃ. Suttaṃ pana avaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ makacivākanāḷikerahīrā ca bhājanīyā.
tika-vin04t:1951_5: Yehi panetāni rajjukādīni dinnāni honti, te attano karaṇīyena harantā na vāretabbā.
tika-vin04t:1952_0: Yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍakamattopi veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito
tika-vin04t:1952_1: garubhaṇḍaṃ, sopi saṅghassa kamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atireko puggalikakamme dātuṃ
tika-vin04t:1952_2: vaṭṭati. Pādaggaṇhanakatelanāḷi pana kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanadaṇḍako chattadaṇḍo chattasalākāti
tika-vin04t:1952_3: idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ, daḍḍhagehamanussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na vāretabbā.
tika-vin04t:1953_0: Muñjañca pabbajañca avasesañca chadanatiṇaṃ muṭṭhippamāṇampi chadanatiṇasaṅkhepagatesu
tika-vin04t:1953_1: tālapaṇṇādīsu yaṃkiñci ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ vā bahiārāme
tika-vin04t:1953_2: saṅghike tiṇavatthusmiṃ jātakaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ, tampi saṅghakamme
tika-vin04t:1953_3: ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Daḍḍhagehamanussā gahetvā
tika-vin04t:1953_4: gacchantā na vāretabbā, aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopi rittakapotthako garubhaṇḍameva.
tika-vin04t:1954_0: Mattikā pakatimattikā vā hotu pañcavaṇṇā vā sudhā vā sajjurasakaṅguṭṭhasilesādīsu
tika-vin04t:1954_1: vā yaṃkiñci dullabhaṭṭhāne ānetvā vā dinnaṃ tatthajātakaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ tālapakkamattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1954_2: garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme
tika-vin04t:1955_0: Dārubhaṇḍe yo koci veḷumhi vuttappamāṇo dārubhaṇḍako saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako
tika-vin04t:1955_1: vā rakkhitagopito garubhaṇḍaṃ, api ca sabbāpi dāruveḷucammapāsāṇādivikati dārubhaṇḍena
tika-vin04t:1955_2: saṅgahitā, tattha mañcapīṭhehi asaṅgahitāni āsandikādīni antamaso coḷena vā palālehi
tika-vin04t:1955_3: vā paṇṇehi vā katapīṭhaṃ upādāya sabbāni āsanāni.
tika-vin04t:1956_1: dantakaṭṭhacchedanagaṇṭhikā daṇḍamuggaro nāvā ambaṇaṃ rajanadoṇi udakapaṭicchako
tika-vin04t:1956_2: dārumayo vā dantamayo vā veḷumayo vā sapādakopi apādakopi samuggo mañjūsā pādaggaṇhanakato
tika-vin04t:1956_3: atirekappamāṇo karaṇḍo udakadoṇi udakakaṭāhaṃ uḷuṅko kaṭacchupānīyasarāvaṃ pānīyasaṅkhoti
tika-vin04t:1956_4: etesu yaṃkiñci saṅghe dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. Saṅkhathālakaṃ pana bhājanīyaṃ, tathā dārumayo udakatumbo.
tika-vin04t:1957_0: Pādakathalikamaṇḍalaṃ dārumayaṃ vā hotu coḷapaṇṇādimayaṃ vā sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. Ādhārako
tika-vin04t:1957_1: pattapidhānaṃ tālavaṇṭaṃ bījanī caṅkoṭakaṃ pacchi yaṭṭhisammuñjanī muṭṭhisammuñjanīti
tika-vin04t:1957_2: etesupi yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā dāruveḷupaṇṇacammādīsu yena kenaci kataṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
tika-vin04t:1958_0: Thambhatulāsopānaphalakādīsu yaṃkiñci dārumayaṃ vā pāsāṇamayaṃ vā gehasambhārūpagaṃ
tika-vin04t:1958_1: yo koci kaṭasārako yaṃkiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ yaṃkiñci akappiyacammaṃ, sabbaṃ saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1958_2: garubhaṇḍaṃ, bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Eḷakacammaṃ pana paccattharaṇagatikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1958_3: hoti, tampi garubhaṇḍameva, kappiyacammāni bhājanīyāni, kurundiyaṃ pana sabbaṃ mañcappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1959_0: Udukkhalaṃ musalaṃ suppaṃ nisadaṃ nisadapoto pāsāṇadoṇi pāsāṇakaṭāhaṃ sabbaṃ kasibhaṇḍampi
tika-vin04t:1959_1: garubhaṇḍaṃ, sabbaṃ cakkayuttayānaṃ garubhaṇḍameva. Mañcapīṭhānaṃ pādā ca aṭaniyo
tika-vin04t:1959_2: ca vāsiparasuādīnaṃ daṇḍā cāti etesu yaṃkiñci aniṭṭhitaṃ bhājanīyaṃ, tacchitamaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1959_3: pana garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, anuññātavāsiyā daṇḍo chattaṃ muṭṭhipaṇṇaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanā
tika-vin04t:1959_4: araṇisahitaṃ dhammakaraṇo pādaggaṇhanakato anatirittaṃ āmalakatumbaṃ āmalakaghaṭo
tika-vin04t:1959_5: lābukatumbaṃ lābukaghaṭo visāṇatumbanti sabbametaṃ bhājanīyaṃ, tato paraṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1960_0: Hatthidanto vā yaṃkiñci visāṇaṃ vā atacchitaṃ yathāgatameva bhājanīyaṃ, tehi katamañcapīṭhapādādīsu
tika-vin04t:1960_1: purimasadisova vinicchayo. Tacchitaniṭṭhitopi hiṅgukaraṇḍako añjanikaraṇḍako gaṇṭhikā
tika-vin04t:1960_2: vidho añjanī añjanisalākā udakapuñchanīti idaṃ sabbaṃ bhājanīyameva.
tika-vin04t:1961_1: pattakaṭāhaṃ aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ dhūmadānakaṃ dīparukkhako dīpakapallikā cayaniṭṭhakā chadaniṭṭhakā
tika-vin04t:1961_2: thupikāti sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ, etesu pana vuttanayesu garubhaṇḍesu yaṃkiñci veḷuādiṃ
tika-vin04t:1961_3: attano atthāya gaṇhantena samakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā phātikammaṃ katvā gahetabbaṃ. Pādaggaṇhanakato
tika-vin04t:1961_4: anatirittappamāṇo pana ghaṭako patto thālakaṃ kañcanako kuṇḍikāti idamettha bhājanīyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1961_5: yathā ca mattikābhaṇḍe evaṃ lohabhaṇḍepi kuṇḍikā bhājanīyakoṭṭhāsameva bhajati. Iti
tika-vin04t:1961_6: yaṃ bhājanīyaṃ vissajjanīyampi taṃ evaṃ vissajjiyavebhaṅgiyasaṅkhātaṃ aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1961_7: datvā khīyantassa dukkaṭaṃ, itaraṃ pana dātumeva na vaṭṭati. Issaravatāya dento thullaccayaṃ
tika-vin04t:1961_8: āpajjati, theyyacittena gaṇhanto bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabbo. Yathā ca aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1961_9: datvā khīyantassa dukkaṭaṃ, tathā saṅghena asammatassa cīvaraṃ vā aññaṃ vā parikkhāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1961_10: datvā khīyantassa dukkaṭameva, anupasampanne sabbattha tikadukkaṭaṃ. Pakatiyā pana
tika-vin04t:1961_11: chandādivasena karontaṃ disvā “ko attho tassa dinnena, laddhāpi vinipātessati, na
tika-vin04t:1961_12: sammā upanessatī”ti khīyantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Upasampannatā, dhammena
tika-vin04t:1961_13: laddhasammutitā, saṅghena saddhiṃ vikappanupagacīvaradānaṃ, pacchā khīyitukāmatāya
tika-vin04t:1961_14: khīyanāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:1964_0: Dvādasame sabbaṃ tiṃsakakaṇḍe pariṇāmanasikkhāpade vuttanayameva. Ayameva hi viseso,
tika-vin04t:1964_1: tattha attano pariṇāmitattā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ, idha puggalassa pariṇāmitattā
tika-vin04t:1969_0: Ratanavaggassa paṭhame khattiyassāti khattiyajātikassa, muddhābhisittassāti khattiyābhisekena
tika-vin04t:1969_1: muddhani abhisittassa. Anikkhanto rājā itoti anikkhantarājakaṃ, tasmiṃ anikkhantarājake,
tika-vin04t:1969_2: sayanighareti attho. Ratanaṃ vuccati mahesī, niggatanti nikkhantaṃ, aniggataṃ ratanaṃ
tika-vin04t:1969_3: itoti aniggataratanakaṃ, tasmiṃ aniggataratanake, sayanighareti attho. Indakhīlaṃ
tika-vin04t:1969_4: atikkameyyāti ettha attano āgatabhāvaṃ ajānāpetvā sayanigharassa ummāraṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin04t:1970_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha rañño antepurappavisanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1970_2: vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭisaṃviditasaññissa, na khattiyassa vā, na khattiyābhisekena
tika-vin04t:1970_3: abhisittassa vā, ubhosu vā, ubhinnaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ nikkhante sayanigharaṃ pavisantassa,
tika-vin04t:1970_4: asayanighare, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Khattiyatā, abhisittatā, ubhinnampi sayanigharato
tika-vin04t:1970_5: anikkhantatā, appaṭisaṃviditatā, indakhīlātikkamoti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:1973_0: Dutiye ratananti muttādidasavidhaṃ. Ratanasammatanti yaṃkiñci manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1973_1: Ajjhārāme vāti parikkhittassa antopaṭikkhepe aparikkhittassa dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1973_2: anto. Ajjhāvasatheti parikkhittassa antopaṭikkhepe, aparikkhittassa musalapātabbhantare.
tika-vin04t:1973_3: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – jātarūparajataṃ attano atthāya uggaṇhantassa vā uggaṇhāpentassa
tika-vin04t:1973_4: vā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Saṅghagaṇapuggalacetiyanavakammānaṃ atthāya dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1973_5: avasese muttādiratane sabbesampi atthāya dukkaṭameva. Kappiyavatthuṃ vā akappiyavatthuṃ
tika-vin04t:1973_6: vā antamaso mātusantakampi bhaṇḍāgārikasīsena paṭisāmentassa pācittiyaṃ, tādisaṃ
tika-vin04t:1973_7: pana attano santakaṃ katvā paṭisāmetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Idaṃ paṭisāmethā”ti vutte pana “na
tika-vin04t:1973_8: vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace kupitā pātetvā gacchanti, palibodho nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1973_9: paṭisāmetabbaṃ. Vihāre kammaṃ karontā vaḍḍhakīādayo vā rājavallabhā vā “yaṃkiñci
tika-vin04t:1973_10: upakaraṇaṃ vā sayanabhaṇḍaṃ vā paṭisāmetvā dethā”ti vadanti, chandenapi bhayenapi
tika-vin04t:1973_11: na kātabbameva, guttaṭṭhānaṃ pana dassetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1974_0: Ajjhārāmaajjhāvasathesupi yādise ṭhāne “bhikkhūhi vā sāmaṇerehi vā gahitaṃ bhavissatī”ti
tika-vin04t:1974_1: āsaṅkā uppajjati, tādiseyeva ṭhāne uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1974_2: “yassa bhaṇḍaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, so āgacchatū”ti ca ācikkhitabbaṃ. Atha yo āgacchati, so “kīdisaṃ
tika-vin04t:1974_3: te bhaṇḍaṃ naṭṭha”nti pucchitabbo, sace saññāṇena sampādeti, dātabbaṃ. No ce, ‘vicināhī’ti
tika-vin04t:1974_4: vattabbo. Tamhā āvāsā pakkamantena patirūpānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ hatthe, tesu asati patirūpānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1974_5: gahapatikānaṃ hatthe nikkhipitvā pakkamitabbaṃ. Yo pana neva pakkamati, na sāmikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1974_6: passati, tena thāvaraṃ senāsanaṃ vā cetiyaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā kāretabbo. Sace dīghassa
tika-vin04t:1974_7: addhuno accayena sāmiko āgacchati, taṃ dassetvā ‘anumodāhī’ti vattabbo. Sace nānumodati,
tika-vin04t:1975_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha ratanauggaṇhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “aññatra
tika-vin04t:1975_1: ajjhārāmā vā, ajjhāvasathā vā”ti ayamettha duvidhā anupaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1975_2: sāṇattikaṃ, anuññātaṭṭhāne anādariyena uggahetvā anikkhipantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Anuññātaṭṭhāne
tika-vin04t:1975_3: gahetvā nikkhipantassa, yaṃ hoti āmāsaṃ ratanasammataṃ, taṃ vissāsaṃ vā tāvakālikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1975_4: vā uggaṇhantassa, paṃsukūlasaññāya gaṇhato, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Ananuññātakaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1975_5: parasantakatā, vissāsaggāhapaṃsukūlasaññānaṃ abhāvo, uggahaṇaṃ vā uggahāpanaṃ vāti
tika-vin04t:1978_0: Tatiye santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchāti idaṃ cāritte vuttanayameva. Vikāleti majjhanhikātikkamato
tika-vin04t:1978_1: paṭṭhāya antoaruṇe, etasmiṃ antare “vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchāmī”ti vā, “gāmaṃ
tika-vin04t:1978_2: pavisissāmī”ti vā anāpucchitvā asati tathārūpe accāyike karaṇīye parikkhittassa gāmassa
tika-vin04t:1978_3: parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa, aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1978_4: dutiyapāde pācittiyaṃ. Sacepi sambahulā kenaci kammena gāmaṃ pavisanti, sabbehi aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin04t:1978_5: āpucchitabbaṃ. “Tasmiṃ gāme taṃ kammaṃ na sampajjatī”ti aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchantānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1978_6: puna āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi. Sace pana ussāhaṃ paṭippassambhetvā vihāraṃ gacchantā
tika-vin04t:1978_7: antarā aññaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitukāmā honti, āpucchitabbameva. Kulaghare vā āsanasālāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:1978_8: vā bhattakiccaṃ katvā telabhikkhāya vā sappibhikkhāya vā caritukāmena sace passe
tika-vin04t:1978_9: bhikkhu atthi, āpucchitabbo, asante ‘natthī’ti gantabbaṃ. Vīthiṃ otaritvā pana bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin04t:1978_10: disvāpi āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi. Yo pana gāmamajjhena maggo hoti, sace tena gacchantassa
tika-vin04t:1978_11: “telādīnaṃ atthāya carissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati, passe bhikkhuṃ disvā āpucchitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1978_12: Maggā anokkamma carantassa pana āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi, okkamantassa vuttanayeneva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1979_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha vikāle gāmappavesanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “santaṃ
tika-vin04t:1979_1: bhikkhu”nti ca “anāpucchā”ti ca “aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā”ti ca imā panettha
tika-vin04t:1979_2: tisso anupaññattiyo, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, kāle vikālasaññino,
tika-vin04t:1979_3: vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Kālasaññino pana, yo ca accāyike vā karaṇīye, santaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:1979_5: vā aññataraṃ gacchati, tassa, gāmena maggo hoti, tena gacchato, āpadāsu, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1979_6: anāpatti. Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchatā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvo, vikāle gāmappavisananti
tika-vin04t:1979_7: imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāneva, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriyanti.
tika-vin04t:1982: Catutthe bhedanameva bhedanakaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti bhedanakaṃ. Tasmā evarūpe sūcighare karaṇakārāpanesu dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena pana taṃ bhinditvā pācittiyaṃ desetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1983_0: Sakkesu sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bahusūcigharaviññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti,
tika-vin04t:1983_1: sāṇattikaṃ, attanā vippakataṃ attanā vā, parehi vā, parehi vippakatampi attanā vā,
tika-vin04t:1983_2: parehi vā pariyosāpetvā labhantassa catukkapācittiyaṃ. Aññassatthāya karaṇakārāpanesu,
tika-vin04t:1983_3: aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjane dukkaṭaṃ. Gaṇṭhike araṇike vidhe añjaniyā
tika-vin04t:1983_4: añjanisalākāya vāsijaṭe udakapuñchaniyāti etesu yaṃkiñci aṭṭhiādīhi karontassa, ummattakādīnañca
tika-vin04t:1983_5: anāpatti. Sūcigharatā, aṭṭhimayāditā, attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti
tika-vin04t:1986: Pañcame mañcanti masārakādīsu aññataraṃ. Pīṭhampi tādisameva, taṃ pana mañco viya atidīghaṃ, āsandiko viya ca samaṃ caturassaṃ na hoti. Chedanakaṃ bhedanakasadisameva.
tika-vin04t:1987_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha ucce mañce sayanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, pamāṇikaṃ karontassa,
tika-vin04t:1987_1: pamāṇātikkantaṃ labhitvā chinditvā yathā pamāṇameva upari dissati, evaṃ nikhaṇitvā
tika-vin04t:1987_2: vā, uttānaṃ vā katvā, aṭṭakaṃ vā bandhitvā paribhuñjantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1987_3: Pamāṇātikkantamañcapīṭhatā, attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imānettha
tika-vin04t:1990: Chaṭṭhe tūlaṃ onaddhametthāti tūlonaddhaṃ, cimilikaṃ pattharitvā tūlaṃ pakkhipitvā upari cimilikāya onaddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Uddālanakaṃ bhedanakasadisameva.
tika-vin04t:1991_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha tūlonaddhakārāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, āyoge kāyabandhane
tika-vin04t:1991_1: aṃsabaddhake pattatthavikāya parissāvane bimbohane, aññena kataṃ tūlonaddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā
tika-vin04t:1991_2: uddāletvā paribhuñjantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Bimbohanañcettha sīsappamāṇameva
tika-vin04t:1991_3: vaṭṭati, sīsappamāṇaṃ nāma yassa vitthārato tīsu koṇesu dvinnaṃ antaraṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ
tika-vin04t:1991_4: hoti, majjhe muṭṭhiratanaṃ, dīghato diyaḍḍharatanaṃ vā dviratanaṃ vā. Tūlonaddhamañcapīṭhatā,
tika-vin04t:1991_5: attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:1994: Sattame nisīdananti santhatasadisaṃ santharitvā ekasmiṃ ante sugatavidatthippamāṇaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā katāhi tīhi dasāhi yuttassa parikkhārassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1995_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha appamāṇikāni nisīdanāni dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1995_1: “dasā vidatthī”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, asādhāraṇapaññatti, pamāṇikaṃ vā ūnakaṃ
tika-vin04t:1995_2: vā karontassa, aññena kataṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ paṭilabhitvā chinditvā paribhuñjantassa,
tika-vin04t:1995_3: vitānādīsu yaṃkiñci karontassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Nisīdanassa pamāṇātikkantatā,
tika-vin04t:1995_4: attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:1998: Aṭṭhame kaṇḍuppaṭicchādinti adhonābhiubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ kaṇḍupīḷakaassāvathullakacchābādhānaṃ paṭicchādanatthaṃ anuññātaṃ cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin04t:1999: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha appamāṇikāyo kaṇḍuppaṭicchādikāyo dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, sesaṃ nisīdane vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2002: Navame sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha appamāṇikāyo vassikasāṭikāyo dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ nisīdane vuttanayamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2005: Dasame sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ ārabbha sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sādhāraṇapaññatti, sesaṃ nisīdane vuttanayamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2012_0: Pāṭidesanīyesu paṭhame antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāyāti vacanato sace tassā antarārāmādīsu
tika-vin04t:2012_1: ṭhatvāpi dadamānāya hatthato sayaṃ rathiyābyūhasiṅghāṭakagharānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ ṭhitopi
tika-vin04t:2012_2: gaṇhāti, doso natthi. Tassā pana rathiyādīsu ṭhatvā dadamānāya, rathiyādīsu vā, antarārāmādīsu
tika-vin04t:2012_3: vā ṭhatvāpi yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya gaṇhato paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre
tika-vin04t:2012_4: ajjhohāre pāṭidesanīyaṃ. Tassa desetabbākāro gārayhaṃ āvusotiādinā nayena sikkhāpade dassitoyeva.
tika-vin04t:2013_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya
tika-vin04t:2013_1: hatthato āmisaṃ paṭiggahaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti, anāṇattikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2013_2: yathā cetaṃ, tathā sesānipi, tikapāṭidesanīyaṃ, yāmakālikādīsu paṭiggahaṇepi ajjhoharaṇepi
tika-vin04t:2013_3: dukkaṭaṃ, ekatoupasampannāya yāvakālikepi tatheva, ñātikāya aññātikasaññivematikānampi
tika-vin04t:2013_4: eseva nayo. Ñātikasaññino pana, ñātikāya vā dāpentiyā, upanikkhipitvā vā dadamānāya,
tika-vin04t:2013_5: yā ca antarārāmabhikkhunupassayatitthiyaseyyapaṭikkamanesu ṭhatvā gāmato bahi nīharitvā,
tika-vin04t:2013_6: yāmakālikādīni vā “sati paccaye paribhuñjā”ti deti, tassa, sikkhamānasāmaṇerīnañca
tika-vin04t:2013_7: hatthato gahetvā paribhuñjantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Paripuṇṇūpasampannatā,
tika-vin04t:2013_8: aññātikatā, antaraghare ṭhitāya hatthato sahatthā paṭiggahaṇaṃ, yāvakālikatā, ajjhoharaṇanti
tika-vin04t:2016_0: Dutiye idha sūpantiādi vosāsanākāradassanaṃ. Apasakka tāva bhaginītiādi apasādetabbākāradassanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2016_1: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – ekenāpi bhikkhunā anapasādite ajjhoharaṇatthāya āmisaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2017_0: Rājagahe chabbaggiye ārabbha bhikkhuniyā vosāsantiyā nanivāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2017_1: tikapāṭidesanīyaṃ, ekatoupasampannāya vosāsantiyā nanivārentassa dukkaṭaṃ, tathā
tika-vin04t:2017_2: anupasampannāya upasampannasaññino vematikassa ca. Anupasampannasaññino, pana yo
tika-vin04t:2017_3: ca attano vā bhattaṃ dāpentiyā, aññesaṃ vā bhattaṃ dentiyā, yaṃ vā na dinnaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin04t:2017_4: dāpentiyā, yattha vā na dinnaṃ, tattha, sabbesaṃ vā samakaṃ dāpentiyā, sikkhamānāya
tika-vin04t:2017_5: vā sāmaṇeriyā vā vosāsantiyā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjati, tassa, pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:2017_6: sabbattha, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Paripuṇṇūpasampannatā, pañcabhojanatā, antaraghare
tika-vin04t:2017_7: anuññātapakārato aññathā vosāsanā, anivāraṇā, ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2020_0: Tatiye sekkhasammatānīti laddhasekkhasammutikāni. Pubbe animantitoti gharūpacārokkamanato
tika-vin04t:2020_1: paṭhamataraṃ upacāraṃ anokkamanteyeva pubbe animantito. Agilāno nāma yo sakkoti piṇḍāya
tika-vin04t:2020_2: carituṃ. Pāṭidesanīyanti gharūpacāraṃ okkamitvā āmisaṃ gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe tāva
tika-vin04t:2020_3: dukkaṭaṃ, taṃ gahetvā yatthakatthaci bhuñjantassa ajjhohāre ajjhohāre pāṭidesanīyanti.
tika-vin04t:2021_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha na mattaṃ jānitvā paṭiggahaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2021_1: “pubbe animantito, agilāno”ti imā panettha dve anupaññattiyo, tikapāṭidesanīyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2021_2: yāmakālikādīsu paṭiggahaṇepi ajjhohārepi dukkaṭaṃ, tathā asekkhasammate sekkhasammatasaññino
tika-vin04t:2021_3: vematikassa ca. Asekkhasammatasaññino, pana yo ca pubbe nimantito vā gilāno vā aññassa
tika-vin04t:2021_4: vā tesaṃ ghare paññattaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāti, yassa ca gharato nīharitvā, āsanasālādīsu
tika-vin04t:2021_5: vā bhikkhuṃ adisvā paṭhamaṃyeva nīharitvā, dvāramūle vā ṭhapitaṃ denti, tassa taṃ
tika-vin04t:2021_6: bhuñjantassa, niccabhattake, salākabhatte, pakkhike, uposathike, pāṭipadike, yāmakālikādiṃ
tika-vin04t:2021_7: “sati paccaye paribhuñjā”ti dinnaṃ paribhuñjantassa, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Sekkhasammatatā,
tika-vin04t:2021_8: pubbe animantitatā, agilānatā, gharūpacārokkamanaṃ, ṭhapetvā niccabhattakādīni aññaṃ
tika-vin04t:2021_9: āmisaṃ gahetvā bhuñjananti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:2024_0: Catutthe yāni kho pana tāni āraññakānītiādi cīvaravippavāsasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva
tika-vin04t:2024_1: veditabbaṃ. Pubbe appaṭisaṃviditanti ettha yaṃ itthiyā vā purisena vā gahaṭṭhena
tika-vin04t:2024_2: vā pabbajitena vā ārāmaṃ vā ārāmūpacāraṃ vā pavisitvā “itthannāmassa, bhante, kulassa
tika-vin04t:2024_3: khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā āhariyissatī”ti ārocitaṃ, taṃ pacchā yathāārocitameva
tika-vin04t:2024_4: vā āhariyatu, tassa parivāraṃ katvā aññaṃ vā tena saddhiṃ bahukampi, “itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin04t:2024_5: kulaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā gahetvā gacchatī”ti sutvā
tika-vin04t:2024_6: aññāni vā kulāni tehi saddhiṃ āharantu, taṃ sabbaṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana
tika-vin04t:2024_7: evaṃ anārocitaṃ anāhaṭañca, taṃ appaṭisaṃviditaṃ nāma. Agilāno nāma yo sakkoti piṇḍāya
tika-vin04t:2024_8: gantuṃ. Pāṭidesanīyanti evarūpaṃ antamaso ārāmamajjhena gacchantehi addhikehi dinnampi
tika-vin04t:2024_9: ārāme vā ārāmūpacāre vā paṭiggahetvā ajjhoharantassa paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre
tika-vin04t:2025_0: Sakkesu sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ārāme core paṭivasante anārocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2025_1: “agilāno”ti ayamettha ekā anupaññatti, tikapāṭidesanīyaṃ, yāmakālikādīsu āhāratthāya
tika-vin04t:2025_2: paṭiggahaṇepi ajjhohārepi dukkaṭameva, tathā paṭisaṃvidite appaṭisaṃviditasaññino
tika-vin04t:2025_3: vematikassa ca, paṭisaṃviditasaññino, pana gilānassa, yo ca paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā
tika-vin04t:2025_4: āhaṭaṃ vā gilānāvasesakaṃ vā bahārāme vā paṭiggahitaṃ, tatthajātakameva vā mūlaphalādiṃ,
tika-vin04t:2025_5: yāmakālikādīsu vā yaṃkiñci “sati paccaye paribhuñjā”ti laddhaṃ paribhuñjantassa,
tika-vin04t:2025_7: agilānatā, agilānāvasesakatā, appaṭisaṃviditatā, ajjhārāme paṭiggahaṇaṃ, ajjhoharaṇanti
tika-vin04t:2025_8: imānettha satta aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāneva, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriyanti.
tika-vin04t:2031_0: Sekhiyesu paṭhame parimaṇḍalanti samantato maṇḍalaṃ. Sikkhā karaṇīyāti “evaṃ nivāsessāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:2031_1: ārāmepi antaragharepi sabbattha sikkhā kātabbā, ettha ca yasmā vattakkhandhake vuttavattānipi
tika-vin04t:2031_2: sikkhitabbattā sekhiyāneva honti, tasmā pārājikādīsu viya paricchedo na kato. Cārittavinayadassanatthañca
tika-vin04t:2031_3: “yo pana bhikkhu olambento nivāseyya, dukkaṭa”nti evaṃ āpattināmena avatvā “sikkhā
tika-vin04t:2031_4: karaṇīyā”ti evaṃ sabbasikkhāpadesu pāḷi āropitā, padabhājane pana “āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin04t:2032_0: Idāni parimaṇḍalanti ettha nābhimaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā jāṇumaṇḍalassa heṭṭhā jaṅghaṭṭhikato
tika-vin04t:2032_1: paṭṭhāya aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ nivāsanaṃ otāretvā nivāsentena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivatthaṃ nāma
tika-vin04t:2032_2: hoti, evaṃ anivāsetvā anādariyena purato vā pacchato vā olambetvā nivāsentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2032_3: Na kevalañca tasseva, ye caññe “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā gihinivatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:2032_4: nivāsenti, hatthisoṇḍakaṃ macchavālakaṃ catukkaṇṇakaṃ tālavaṇṭakaṃ satavalikaṃ nivāsenti,
tika-vin04t:2032_5: saṃvalliyaṃ nivāsentī”ti khandhake nivāsanadosā vuttā, tathā nivāsentassapi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:2033_0: Tattha hatthisoṇḍakaṃ nāma nābhimūlato hatthisoṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ olambakaṃ katvā nivatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:2033_1: coḷikaitthīnaṃ nivāsanaṃ viya. Macchavālakaṃ nāma ekatodasantaṃ ekato pāsantaṃ olambetvā
tika-vin04t:2033_2: nivatthaṃ. Catukkaṇṇakaṃ nāma upari dve, heṭṭhato dveti evaṃ cattāro kaṇṇe dassetvā
tika-vin04t:2033_3: nivatthaṃ. Tālavaṇṭakaṃ nāma tālavaṇṭākārena sāṭakaṃ olambetvā nivatthaṃ. Satavalikaṃ
tika-vin04t:2033_4: nāma dīghasāṭakaṃ anekakkhattuṃ obhujitvā ovaṭṭikaṃ karontena nivatthaṃ, vāmadakkhiṇapassesu
tika-vin04t:2033_5: vā nirantaraṃ valiyo dassetvā nivatthaṃ. Sace pana jāṇuto paṭṭhāya ekā vā dve vā
tika-vin04t:2033_6: valiyo paññāyanti, vaṭṭati. Saṃvalliyanti mallakammakārādīhi viya kacchaṃ bandhitvā
tika-vin04t:2033_7: nivatthaṃ. Evaṃ nivāsetuṃ gilānassāpi maggappaṭipannassāpi na vaṭṭati. Yampi maggaṃ
tika-vin04t:2033_8: gacchantā ekaṃ vā dve vā kaṇṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari lagganti, anto vā
tika-vin04t:2033_9: ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ tathā nivāsetvā bahi aparaṃ nivāsenti, sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2034_0: Gilāno pana antokāsāvassa ovaṭṭikaṃ dassetvā aparaṃ upari nivāsetuṃ labhati, agilānena
tika-vin04t:2034_1: dve nivāsentena saguṇaṃ katvā nivāsetabbāni. Iti imaṃ khandhake paṭikkhittañca olambakañca
tika-vin04t:2034_2: sabbaṃ vivajjetvā vuttalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ, tathā
tika-vin04t:2035_0: “Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthu”ntiādike pana vinicchaye surusurukārakaṃ kosambiyaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2035_2: sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha, sesāni sabbāneva sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha olambetvā
tika-vin04t:2035_3: nivāsanādivatthusmiṃ paññattāni. Sūpodanaviññattiyaṃ dhammadesanādīsu ca gilānavasena
tika-vin04t:2035_4: ekā anupaññatti, sabbāni sādhāraṇapaññattiyo, anāṇattikāni, sabbesu dukkaṭameva,
tika-vin04t:2035_5: añño āpattibhedo natthi, vipattivicāraṇā vuttāyeva, samuṭṭhānādīni sabbesaṃ avasāne
tika-vin04t:2035_6: dassayissāma. Anāpattimattaṃ pana aṅgañca sabbattha vattabbaṃ, tayidaṃ vuccati. Imasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2035_7: tāva sikkhāpade asañcicca, assatiyā, ajānantassa, gilānassa, āpadāsu, ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2036_0: Tattha asañciccāti “aparimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsessāmī”ti evaṃ asañcicca, atha kho “parimaṇḍalaṃyeva
tika-vin04t:2036_1: nivāsessāmī”ti virajjhitvā aparimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsentassa anāpatti. Assatiyāti aññāvihitassāpi
tika-vin04t:2036_2: tathā nivāsentassa anāpatti. Ajānantassāti parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetuṃ ajānantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:2036_3: apica nivāsanavattaṃ uggahetabbaṃ. Yo pana sukkhajaṅgho vā hoti mahāpiṇḍikamaṃso
tika-vin04t:2036_4: vā, tassa sāruppatthāya aṭṭhaṅgulādhikampi otāretvā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati. Gilānassāti
tika-vin04t:2036_5: yassa jaṅghāya vā pāde vā vaṇo hoti, tassa ukkhipitvā vā otāretvā vā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2036_6: Āpadāsūti vāḷā vā corā vā anubandhanti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu anāpatti. Ummattakādayo
tika-vin04t:2036_7: vuttanayā eva. Anādariyaṃ, anāpattikāraṇābhāvo, aparimaṇḍalanivāsananti imānettha
tika-vin04t:2036_8: tīṇi aṅgāni. Yathā cettha, evaṃ sabbattha purimāni dve tattha tattha vuttappaṭipakkhakaraṇañcāti
tika-vin04t:2036_9: tīṇiyeva honti, tasmā ito paraṃ tānipi avatvā anāpattimattameva vakkhāmāti.
tika-vin04t:2038_0: Dutiye “na, bhikkhave, gihipārutaṃ pārupitabba”nti evaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ gihipārutaṃ
tika-vin04t:2038_1: apārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā pārupanaṃ parimaṇḍalapārupanaṃ nāma, tattha yaṃkiñci
tika-vin04t:2038_4: parimaṇḍalalakkhaṇato aññathā pārutaṃ, sabbametaṃ gihipārutaṃ nāma. Tasmā yathā setapaṭā
tika-vin04t:2038_5: aḍḍhapālakanigaṇṭhā pārupanti, yathā ca ekacce paribbājakā uraṃ vivaritvā dvīsu aṃsakūṭesu
tika-vin04t:2038_6: pāvuraṇaṃ ṭhapenti, yathā ca ekasāṭakā manussā nivatthasāṭakassa ekena antena piṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin04t:2038_7: pārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe ubhosu aṃsakūṭesu ṭhapenti, yathā ca surāsoṇḍādayo sāṭakena
tika-vin04t:2038_8: gīvaṃ parikkhipitvā ubho ante ure vā olambenti, piṭṭhiyaṃ vā khipanti, yathā ca antepurikāyo
tika-vin04t:2038_9: akkhitārakamattaṃ dassetvā oguṇṭhitaṃ pārupanti, yathā ca mahājeṭṭhā dīghasāṭakaṃ
tika-vin04t:2038_10: nivāsetvā tasseva ekenantena sakalasarīraṃ pārupanti, yathā ca kassakā khettakuṭiṃ
tika-vin04t:2038_11: pavisantā sāṭakaṃ paliveṭhetvā upakacchake pakkhipitvā tasseva ekenantena sarīraṃ
tika-vin04t:2038_12: pārupanti, yathā ca brāhmaṇā ubhinnaṃ upakacchakānaṃ antare sāṭakaṃ pavesetvā aṃsakūṭesu
tika-vin04t:2038_13: pakkhipanti, yathā ca pāḷikārako bhikkhu ekaṃsapārupanena pārutaṃ vāmabāhuṃ vivaritvā
tika-vin04t:2038_14: cīvaraṃ aṃsakūṭe āropeti, evaṃ apārupitvā sabbepi ete, aññe ca evarūpe pārupanadose
tika-vin04t:2038_15: vajjetvā nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ. Tathā apārupitvā ārāme vā antaraghare
