tika-vin04t:2038_16: vā anādarena yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ, anāpatti purimasadisāyeva, yathā
tika-vin04t:2038_17: cettha, evaṃ sabbattha. Yattha pana viseso bhavissati, tattha vakkhāmāti.
tika-vin04t:2040_0: Tatiye suppaṭicchannoti suṭṭhu paṭicchanno, gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā anuvātantena gīvaṃ
tika-vin04t:2040_1: paṭicchādetvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā paṭisaṅgharitvā yāva maṇibandhaṃ paṭicchādetvā
tika-vin04t:2040_2: antaraghare gamissāmīti attho, tathā akatvā pana jāṇuṃ vā uraṃ vā vivaritvā gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2041_0: Catutthe galavāṭakato paṭṭhāya sīsaṃ, maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya hatthe, piṇḍikamaṃsato
tika-vin04t:2041_1: paṭṭhāya pāde vivaritvā sesaṃ chādetvā nisinno suppaṭicchanno nāma hoti, ettha pana
tika-vin04t:2043: Pañcame susaṃvutoti hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā akīḷāpento suvinītoti attho. Chaṭṭhepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2045_0: Sattame okkhittacakkhūti heṭṭhā khittacakkhu hutvā purato yugamattaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ
tika-vin04t:2045_1: pekkhamāno, ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā hatthiassādiparissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2047: Navame ukkhittakāyāti ukkhepena, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ, ekato vā ubhato vā ukkhittacīvaro hutvāti attho, anto indakhīlato paṭṭhāya evaṃ na gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2048: Dasame nisinnakāle dhamakaraṇaṃ nīharantenāpi cīvaraṃ anukkhipitvāva nīharitabbaṃ, vāsūpagatassa pana anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2050: Ekādasame ujjagghikāyāti mahāhasitaṃ hasantoti attho. Idhāpi hi itthambhūtalakkhaṇeyeva karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2051: Dvādasamepi eseva nayo. Ubhayattha hasanīyasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mihitamattaṃ karontassa anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2053_0: Terasame appasaddoti na uccāsaddamahāsaddo hutvā. Cuddasamepi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ panettha
tika-vin04t:2053_1: appasaddatāparicchedo – sace dvādasahatthe gehe ādimhi saṅghatthero, majjhe dutiyatthero,
tika-vin04t:2053_2: ante tatiyattheroti evaṃ nisinnesu yaṃ saṅghatthero dutiyattherena saddhiṃ manteti,
tika-vin04t:2053_3: dutiyatthero ca tassa saddaṃ suṇāti, kathañca vavatthapeti. Tatiyatthero pana saddameva
tika-vin04t:2053_4: suṇāti, kathaṃ na vavatthapeti, ettāvatā appasaddo hoti. Sace pana tatiyatthero kathañca
tika-vin04t:2055_0: Ito paresu chasu kāyappacālakanti kāyaṃ cāletvā cāletvā, esa nayo sabbattha. Tasmā
tika-vin04t:2055_1: kāyādīni paggahetvā niccalāni ujukāni ṭhapetvā gantabbañceva nisīditabbañca, nisīdanappaṭisaṃyuttesu
tika-vin04t:2057: Ekavīsadvāvīsesu khambhakatoti kaṭiyaṃ hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā katakhambho.
tika-vin04t:2061: Pañcavīse ukkuṭikā vuccati paṇhiyo ukkhipitvā aggapādeheva, aggapāde vā ukkhipitvā paṇhīhiyeva bhūmiyaṃ phusantassa gamanaṃ, karaṇavacanaṃ panettha vuttalakkhaṇameva.
tika-vin04t:2063_0: Chabbīse na pallatthikāyāti hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā na nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2063_1: Anādarena nisīdantassa dukkaṭaṃ, vāsūpagatassa pana idhāpi purimesu ca dvāvīsacatuvīsesu anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2068: Dutiye patte saññā pattasaññā, sā assa atthīti pattasaññī, attano bhājane upanibaddhasaññī hutvāti attho.
tika-vin04t:2070_0: Tatiye samasūpako nāma yattha muggamāsehi vā kulatthādīhi vā kato hatthahāriyo sūpo
tika-vin04t:2070_1: bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo hoti, tato hi adhikaṃ gaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:2070_2: pana sūpaṃ avasesā sabbāpi sūpeyyabyañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hoti, tasmiṃ rasarase,
tika-vin04t:2070_3: ñātakānaṃ vā pavāritānaṃ vā aññassatthāya vā attano dhanena vā idha anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2072_0: Catutthe samatittikanti samapuṇṇaṃ samabharitaṃ adhiṭṭhānupagapattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ
tika-vin04t:2072_1: anatikkamitvā racitaṃ. Piṇḍapātanti yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ. Anadhiṭṭhānupage pana yāvakālikaṃ
tika-vin04t:2072_2: yāmakālikādīni ca yatthakatthaci thūpīkatānipi vaṭṭanti, yaṃ pana dvīsu pattesu gahetvā
tika-vin04t:2072_3: ekaṃ pūretvā vihāraṃ harati, yaṃ vā pakkhipiyamānaṃ pūvaucchukkhaṇḍaphalāphalādi
tika-vin04t:2072_4: heṭṭhā orohati, takkolavaṭaṃsakādayo vā upari ṭhapetvā diyyanti, yañca paṇṇe vā thālake
tika-vin04t:2072_5: vā pakkhipitvā pattamatthake ṭhapitaṃ hoti, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ nāma, tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin04t:2072_6: vaṭṭati. Idha pana gilānassāpi anāpatti natthi, tasmā tenapi samatittikoyeva gahetabbo.
tika-vin04t:2072_7: Sabbattha pana paṭiggahetumeva na vaṭṭati, paṭiggahitaṃ pana suppaṭiggahitaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin04t:2074_0: Sattame sapadānanti tattha tattha odhiṃ akatvā anupaṭipāṭiyā. Yo pana aññesaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:2074_1: dento, aññabhājane vā ākiranto tato tato omasati, tassa, uttaribhaṅgañca uppaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin04t:2076: Navame thūpakatoti matthakato vemajjhatoti attho. Yo pana parittake sese ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā omadditvā bhuñjati, tassāpi anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2078: Dasame yassa bhattasāmikā māghātasamayādīsu byañjanaṃ paṭicchādetvā denti, yo ca na bhiyyokamyatāya paṭicchādeti, tesaṃ anāpatti, gilānassa pana anāgatattā āpattiyeva.
tika-vin04t:2080: Ekādasame ñātakānaṃ vā pavāritānaṃ vā aññassatthāya attano dhanenāti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2082: Dvādasame ujjhāne saññā ujjhānasaññā, sā assa atthīti ujjhānasaññī. Idhāpi gilāno na muccati, “dassāmī”ti vā, “dāpessāmī”ti vā olokentassa pana, na ujjhānasaññissa ca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2084: Terasame nātimahantanti mayūraṇḍaṃ atimahantaṃ, kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ atikhuddakaṃ, tesaṃ vemajjhappamāṇaṃ. Mūlakhādanīyādibhede pana sabbakhajjake phalāphale ca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2086: Cuddasame parimaṇḍalanti adīghaṃ. Idha pana khajjakaphalāphalehi saddhiṃ uttaribhaṅgepi anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2088: Pannarasame anāhaṭeti anāharite, mukhadvāraṃ asampatteti attho. Soḷasame sabbahatthanti sakalaṃ hatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2090_0: Sattarasame sakabaḷenāti ettha yattakena vacanaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ hoti, tattake sati kathentassa
tika-vin04t:2090_1: āpatti. Yo pana dhammaṃ kathento hariṭakādīni mukhe pakkhipitvā katheti, yattakena
tika-vin04t:2090_2: vacanaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ na hoti, tattake mukhamhi sati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2092: Aṭṭhārasame piṇḍukkhepakanti piṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā ukkhipitvā, idhāpi khajjakaphalāphalesu anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2094: Ekūnavīsatime kabaḷāvacchedakanti kabaḷaṃ avacchinditvā avacchinditvā, idha khajjakaphalāphalehi saddhiṃ uttaribhaṅgepi anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2096: Vīsatime avagaṇḍakārakanti makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe katvā katvā, idha phalāphalamattake anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2098: Ekavīsatime hatthaniddhunakanti hatthaṃ niddhunitvā niddhunitvā, anāpattiyaṃ panettha “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍento hatthaṃ niddhunātī”ti idaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2100: Dvāvīsatime sitthāvakārakanti sitthāni avakiritvā avakiritvā, idhāpi “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍento sitthaṃ chaḍḍayatī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2104: Catuvīsatime capucapukārakanti capu capūti evaṃ saddaṃ katvā katvā. Pañcavīsatimepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2106_0: Chabbīsatime hatthanillehakanti hatthaṃ nillehitvā nillehitvā. Bhuñjantena hi aṅgulimattampi
tika-vin04t:2106_1: nillehituṃ na vaṭṭati. Ghanayāguphāṇitapāyāsādike pana aṅgulīhi gahetvā aṅguliyo
tika-vin04t:2106_2: mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, sattavīsatimaaṭṭhavīsatimesupi eseva nayo. Tasmā
tika-vin04t:2106_3: ekaṅguliyāpi patto na nillehitabbo, ekaoṭṭhopi ca jivhāya na nillehitabbo, oṭṭhamaṃsehi
tika-vin04t:2106_4: eva pana gahetvā anto pavesetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2108_0: Ekūnatiṃsatime na sāmisenāti etaṃ paṭikūlavasena paṭikkhittaṃ, tasmā saṅghikampi
tika-vin04t:2108_1: puggalikampi gihisantakampi attano santakampi saṅkhopi sarāvakampi thālakampi na
tika-vin04t:2108_2: gahetabbameva, gaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana hatthassa ekadeso āmisamakkhito na
tika-vin04t:2108_3: hoti, tena padesena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati, idha “dhovissāmīti vā, dhovāpessāmīti vā paṭiggaṇhātī”ti
tika-vin04t:2110_0: Tiṃsatime “uddharitvā vā bhinditvā vā paṭiggahe vā nīharitvā vā chaḍḍetī”ti idaṃ
tika-vin04t:2110_1: anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ. Tattha uddharitvā vāti sitthāni udakato uddharitvā, ekasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2110_2: ṭhāne rāsiṃ katvā udakaṃ chaḍḍeti. Bhinditvā vāti sitthāni bhinditvā udakagatikāni
tika-vin04t:2110_3: katvā chaḍḍeti. Paṭiggahe vāti paṭiggahena paṭicchantānaṃ paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti. Nīharitvāti
tika-vin04t:2110_4: bahi nīharitvā chaḍḍeti, evaṃ chaḍḍentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2113_0: Dhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyuttesu paṭhame yaṃkiñci chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi. So
tika-vin04t:2113_1: taṃ chattaṃ yatthakatthaci sarīrāvayave ṭhapetvāpi yāva hatthena na muñcati, tāvassa
tika-vin04t:2113_2: dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace panassa añño chattaṃ dhāreti, passe vā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2113_3: hatthato apagatamatte chattapāṇi nāma na hoti, tassa desetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dhammaparicchedo
tika-vin04t:2115_0: Dutiye daṇḍo nāma majjhimassa purisassa catuhatthappamāṇo, daṇḍapāṇibhāvo panassa
tika-vin04t:2115_1: chattapāṇimhi vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tatiyepi eseva nayo. Asiṃ sannahitvā ṭhitopi
tika-vin04t:2117_0: Catutthe sabbāpi dhanuvikati saddhiṃ saravikatiyā āvudhanti veditabbā, tasmā saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:2117_1: vā sarena dhanuṃ gahetvā, suddhadhanuṃ vā suddhasaraṃ vā sajiyadhanuṃ vā nijjiyadhanuṃ
tika-vin04t:2117_2: vā gahetvā ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace panassa dhanu
tika-vin04t:2117_3: khandhepi paṭimukkaṃ hoti, yāva na gaṇhāti, tāva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2119_0: Pañcame pādukāruḷhassāti chattadaṇḍake aṅgulantarikaṃ appavesetvā kevalaṃ akkantassa
tika-vin04t:2119_1: vā, pavesetvā ṭhānavasena paṭimukkassa vā. Chaṭṭhepi eseva nayo. Idha pana yvāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2119_2: paṇhikabandhaṃ omuñcitvā ṭhānavasena “omukko”ti vuccati, tassāpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2121_0: Sattame sacepi dvīhi janehi hatthasaṅghāṭena gahito, sāṭake vā ṭhapetvā vaṃsena vayhati,
tika-vin04t:2121_1: ayutte vā vayhādike yāne visaṅkharitvā vā ṭhapite cakkamattepi nisinno hoti, yānagatotveva
tika-vin04t:2121_2: saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Sace pana dvepi ekayāne nisinnā honti, vaṭṭati. Visuṃ nisinnesupi
tika-vin04t:2121_3: ucce yāne nisinnena nīce nisinnassa desetuṃ vaṭṭati, samappamāṇepi vaṭṭati, tathā
tika-vin04t:2121_4: purime nisinnena pacchime nisinnassa. Pacchime pana uccatarepi nisinnena desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2123_0: Aṭṭhame sayanagatassāti antamaso kaṭasārakepi pakatibhūmiyampi nipannassa uccepi
tika-vin04t:2123_1: mañce vā pīṭhe vā bhūmippadese vā ṭhitena nisinnena vā desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sayanagatena
tika-vin04t:2123_2: pana sayanagatassa uccatare vā samappamāṇe vā nipannena desetuṃ vaṭṭati. Nipannena
tika-vin04t:2123_3: pana ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā nipannassa vā, nisinnena ca ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa
tika-vin04t:2125: Navame hatthapallatthikādīsu yāya kāyaci nisinnassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2127: Dasame veṭhitasīsassāti dussaveṭhena vā moḷiādīhi vā yathā kesanto na dissati, evaṃ veṭhitasīsassa, tenevassa anāpattiyaṃ “kesantaṃ vivarāpetvā desetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2129: Ekādasame oguṇṭhitasīsassāti sasīsaṃ pārutassa, anāpattiyaṃ panettha “sīsaṃ vivarāpetvā desetī”ti adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2131: Dvādasame chamāyaṃ nisīditvāti bhūmiyaṃ nisīditvā. Āsaneti antamaso vatthampi tiṇānipi santharitvā nisinnassa.
tika-vin04t:2133: Terasame ucce āsaneti antamaso bhūmippadesepi unnatappadese nisinnassa.
tika-vin04t:2135_0: Cuddasame na ṭhito nisinnassāti sace therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhitaṃ daharaṃ āsane
tika-vin04t:2135_1: nisinno mahāthero pañhaṃ pucchati, na kathetabbaṃ. Gāravena pana theraṃ “uṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin04t:2135_2: pucchā”ti vattuṃ na sakkā, tasmā “passe ṭhitassa bhikkhuno kathessāmī”ti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2137_0: Pannarasame sace purato gacchanto pañhaṃ pucchati, tassa taṃ akathetvā “pacchimassa
tika-vin04t:2137_1: bhikkhuno kathessāmī”ti kathetabbaṃ. Saddhiṃ uggahitadhammaṃ pana sajjhāyituṃ, samadhurena
tika-vin04t:2139: Soḷasame na uppathenāti ettha sace dvepi sakaṭamaggasmiṃ ekekacakkapathena vā uppathena vā samadhuraṃ gacchanti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2141: Sattarasame “asañciccā”ti anāpattiyaṃ sace paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati, asañcicca kato nāma hoti.
tika-vin04t:2143_0: Aṭṭhārasame yampi jīvamānarukkhassa mūlaṃ pathaviyaṃ dissamānaṃ gacchati, sākhā vā
tika-vin04t:2143_1: bhūmilaggā gacchati, sabbaṃ haritasaṅkhātameva. Khandhe nisīditvā pana appaharitaṭṭhāne
tika-vin04t:2143_2: pātetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace appaharitaṭṭhānaṃ olokentasseva sahasā nikkhamati, gilānaṭṭhāne
tika-vin04t:2143_3: ṭhito hoti, “appaharite kato haritaṃ ottharatī”ti idamettha anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2143_4: Tattha sacepi appaharitaṃ alabhantena tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ vā palalaṇḍupakaṃ vā ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:2143_5: kato pacchā haritaṃ ottharati, vaṭṭatiyeva. Kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi saṅgahitā.
tika-vin04t:2145_0: Ekūnavīsatime na udaketi etaṃ paribhogaudakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ, vaccakuṭisamuddādiudakesu
tika-vin04t:2145_1: pana aparibhogesu anāpatti. Deve vassante samantato udakoghe jāte anudakaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2145_2: alabhantena udake kātuṃ vaṭṭati, idhāpi “thale kato udakaṃ ottharatī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2146_2: pañcāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānāni, ekekamettha kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2146_3: sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedanaṃ. Sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin04t:2146_4: theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2146_6: ekādasa dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānāni, kiriyākiriyāni, saññāvimokkhāni, sacittakāni, lokavajjāni,
tika-vin04t:2146_7: vacīkammāni, akusalacittāni, dukkhavedanāni. Sesāni tepaṇṇāsa paṭhamapārājikasamauṭṭhānādibhedānīti.
tika-vin04t:2151_0: Adhikaraṇasamathesu sattāti tesaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo. Adhikaraṇāni samenti vūpasamentīti
tika-vin04t:2151_1: adhikaraṇasamathā. Uddesaṃ āgacchantīti āpattādhikaraṇasaṅkhātāsu ca avasesādhikaraṇattayapaccayāsu
tika-vin04t:2151_2: ca āpattīsu parisuddhabhāvaṃ pucchanatthaṃ uddisitabbataṃ āgacchanti. Uppannuppannānanti
tika-vin04t:2151_3: uppannānaṃ uppannānaṃ. Adhikaraṇānanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:2151_4: kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ. Samathāya vūpasamāyāti samanatthañceva vūpasamanatthañca
tika-vin04t:2151_5: sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārakoti ime satta samathā dātabbā. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo
tika-vin04t:2151_6: – adhikaraṇesu tāva “dhammo”ti vā, “adhammo”ti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2151_7: bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo, idaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā
tika-vin04t:2151_8: vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca, idaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:2151_9: Mātikāya āgatā pañca, vibhaṅge dveti sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, nāma.
tika-vin04t:2151_10: Yaṃ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ, idaṃ kiccādhikaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:2152_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya
tika-vin04t:2152_1: ca, sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre uppannaṃ, tasmiṃyeva vā, aññattha
tika-vin04t:2152_2: vūpasametuṃ gacchantānaṃ antarāmagge vā, yattha gantvā saṅghassa niyyātitaṃ, tattha
tika-vin04t:2152_3: saṅghena vā vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṃ
tika-vin04t:2152_4: sammati, evaṃ sammamāne ca pana tasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhatā dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā
tika-vin04t:2152_5: puggalasammukhatā ayaṃ sammukhāvinayo nāma. Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena
tika-vin04t:2152_6: sammukhībhāvo saṅghasammukhatā, sametabbassa vatthuno bhūtatā dhammasammukhatā, yathā
tika-vin04t:2152_7: taṃ sametabbaṃ, tathevassa samanaṃ vinayasammukhatā, yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati,
tika-vin04t:2152_8: tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ atthapaccatthikānaṃ sammukhībhāvo puggalasammukhatā. Ubbāhikāya vūpasamane
tika-vin04t:2152_9: panettha saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati, evaṃ tāva sammukhāvinayeneva sammati.
tika-vin04t:2153_0: Sace panevampi na sammati, atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṃ sakkoma
tika-vin04t:2153_1: vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti, tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin04t:2153_2: salākaggāhāpakaṃ sammannitvā tena guḷhakavivaṭṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhesu
tika-vin04t:2153_3: aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhetvā sannipatitaparisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā
tika-vin04t:2153_4: te dhammavādino vadanti, evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya
tika-vin04t:2153_5: ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Tattha sammukhāvinayo vuttanayo eva, yaṃ pana yebhuyyasikakammassa
tika-vin04t:2153_6: karaṇaṃ. Ayaṃ yebhuyyasikā nāma, evaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati.
tika-vin04t:2154_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena
tika-vin04t:2154_1: ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yo ca anuvadati, yañca anuvadati,
tika-vin04t:2154_2: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi, ubho khamāpetvā, sace atthi, “ayaṃ nāmettha
tika-vin04t:2154_3: āpattī”ti evaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasammati, tattha sammukhāvinayalakkhaṇaṃ vuttanayameva.
tika-vin04t:2154_4: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ
tika-vin04t:2154_5: yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti, tadā sammukhāvinayena
tika-vin04t:2154_6: ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti, dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci
tika-vin04t:2154_7: anuvādo na ruhati. Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena gate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre
tika-vin04t:2154_8: “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno “ummattakena me, āvuso, etaṃ
tika-vin04t:2154_9: kataṃ, nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī”ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ
tika-vin04t:2154_10: yācati, saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti. Tadā sammukhāvinayena
tika-vin04t:2154_11: ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti, dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale
tika-vin04t:2155_0: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṃ paṭicarato
tika-vin04t:2155_1: pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa puggalassa “sacāyaṃ acchinnamūlo bhavissati, sammā vattitvā
tika-vin04t:2155_2: osāraṇaṃ labhissati, sace chinnamūlo, sayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno
tika-vin04t:2155_3: saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ kammaṃ karoti, tadā sammukhāvinayena
tika-vin04t:2155_4: ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti, evaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati.
tika-vin04t:2156_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca
tika-vin04t:2156_1: tiṇavatthārakena ca. Tassa sammukhāvinayeneva vūpasamo natthi, yadā pana ekassa vā
tika-vin04t:2156_2: bhikkhuno, nissaggiyavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ
tika-vin04t:2156_3: āpattiṃ deseti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
tika-vin04t:2156_4: Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva yo ca deseti, yassa ca deseti, tesaṃ sammukhībhāvo puggalasammukhatā,
tika-vin04t:2156_5: sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati.
tika-vin04t:2157_0: Yā panettha “ahaṃ, bhante, itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno”ti ca, “passasī”ti, “āma passāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:2157_1: ca paṭiññā, tāya “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti karaṇaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ nāma. Saṅghādisese
tika-vin04t:2157_2: parivāsādiyācanā paṭiññā, parivāsādīnaṃ dānaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ nāma. Dvepakkhajātā
tika-vin04t:2157_3: pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna lajjidhamme
tika-vin04t:2157_4: uppanne “sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ karissāma, siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷatthāya
tika-vin04t:2157_5: vāḷatthāya saṃvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ
tika-vin04t:2157_6: karonti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati. Tatra
tika-vin04t:2157_7: hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā “na metaṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā niddampi
tika-vin04t:2157_8: okkamantā honti, sabbesaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihippaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo
tika-vin04t:2157_9: vuṭṭhahanti, evaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati.
tika-vin04t:2158_0: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ekena samathena sammati sammukhāvinayeneva. Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni
tika-vin04t:2158_1: yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti, tena vuttaṃ “uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2158_2: samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārako”ti. Ayamettha vinicchayanayo,
tika-vin04t:2158_3: vitthāro pana samathakkhandhake āgatoyeva, vinicchayopissa samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto.
tika-vin04t:2159_0: Tatthāyasmante pucchāmi, kaccittha parisuddhāti tesu sattasu adhikaraṇasamathesu
tika-vin04t:2159_1: kaccittha parisuddhā, natthi vo kiñci samathehi vūpasametabbanti pucchāmi, etena
tika-vin04t:2160_0: Uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānantiādi nigamanavacanaṃ. Tattha ettakanti ettakaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2160_1: Suttāgatanti sutte pātimokkhe āgataṃ. Suttapariyāpannanti tattheva antogadhaṃ. Anvaddhamāsaṃ
tika-vin04t:2160_2: uddesaṃ āgacchatīti addhamāse addhamāse uposathavasena uddisitabbataṃ āgacchati.
tika-vin04t:2160_3: Samaggehīti kāyasāmaggivasena samaggehi. Sammodamānehīti cittasāmaggivasena ekajjhāsayatāya
tika-vin04t:2160_4: suṭṭhu modamānehi. Avivadamānehīti aṭṭhārasasu vivādavatthūsu aññataravasenāpi avivadamānehi.
tika-vin04t:2160_5: Sikkhitabbanti taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamantehi adhisīlasikkhā sampādetabbā. Antarantarā
tika-vin04t:2160_6: pana yaṃ na vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ purime purime sikkhāpade vuttattā ceva uttānatthattā cāti.
tika-vin04t:2168: Yaṃ nātho, tassa dāneso, sampatto vaṇṇanākkamo.
tika-vin04t:2171_0: Tattha suṇātu metiādīnaṃ bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:2171_1: Kevalañhi, bhante, ayyetiādivasena tasmiñca idha ca abhilāpamattameva liṅgabhedamattañca
tika-vin04t:2171_2: viseso. Yasmā ca bhikkhuniyā sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā bhikkhunīnaṃ “sikkhāsājīvasamāpannā
tika-vin04t:2171_3: sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti avatvā yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ
tika-vin04t:2171_4: dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyāti vuttaṃ. Tattha chandasoti methunarāgappaṭisaṃyuttena chandena
tika-vin04t:2171_5: ceva ruciyā ca. Chande pana asati balakkārena padhaṃsitāya anāpatti, tasmā yā paripuṇṇūpasampadā
tika-vin04t:2171_7: sajīvassa vā nijjīvassa vā santhatassa vā asanthatassa vā akkhāyitassa vā yebhuyyena
tika-vin04t:2171_8: akkhāyitassa vā aṅgajātassa attano vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhesu tīsu yatthakatthaci
tika-vin04t:2171_9: santhate vā asanthate vā pakativātena asaṃphuṭṭhe allokāse antamaso tilaphalamattampi
tika-vin04t:2171_10: padesaṃ chandaso paveseti, parena vā pavesiyamānā pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭṭhitauddharaṇesu
tika-vin04t:2171_11: yaṃkiñci sādiyati, ayaṃ pārājikā hoti. Sesamettha ito paresu ca sādhāraṇasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin04t:2174_0: Asādhāraṇesu pana catunnaṃ tāva pārājikānaṃ paṭhame avassutāti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena
tika-vin04t:2174_1: tintā, kilinnāti attho. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Purisapuggalassāti kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
tika-vin04t:2174_2: samāpajjituṃ viññussa manussajātikassa purisasaṅkhātassa puggalassa. Adhakkhakanti
tika-vin04t:2174_3: attano akkhakānaṃ adho. Ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalanti jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ upari, ettha ca ubbhakapparampi
tika-vin04t:2174_4: ubbhajāṇumaṇḍaleneva saṅgahitaṃ. Āmasananti āmajjanaṃ phuṭṭhokāsaṃ anatikkamitvā
tika-vin04t:2174_5: tattheva saṅghaṭṭanaṃ. Parāmasananti ito cito ca sañcaraṇaṃ. Gahaṇanti gahitamattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2174_6: Chupananti asaṅghaṭṭetvā phuṭṭhamattaṃ. Paṭipīḷananti aṅge gahetvā nippīḷanaṃ. Sādiyeyyāti
tika-vin04t:2174_7: yā bhikkhunī attano yathāparicchinne kāye purisassa etaṃ āmasanādiṃ sādiyati, sayaṃ
tika-vin04t:2174_8: vā pana tena kāyena purisassa yaṃkiñci kāyappadesaṃ sādayamānā chupati, ayaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikā
tika-vin04t:2175_0: “Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthu”ntiādike tena vitthāravinicchaye yasmā sabbāneva asādhāraṇapaññattiyo
tika-vin04t:2175_1: honti, tasmā ito paṭṭhāya santiṃ anupaññattiṃ vatvā sādhāraṇapaññattīti vā asādhāraṇapaññattīti
tika-vin04t:2175_2: vā na vakkhāma, āṇattiyaṃ yattha āṇatti natthi, tattha kiñci avatvā yattha atthi,
tika-vin04t:2176_0: Avasesaṃ pana sabbattha vattabbaṃ, tayidaṃ vuccati, idaṃ tāva sikkhāpadaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2176_1: sundarīnandaṃ ārabbha kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, ekatoavassute
tika-vin04t:2176_2: yathāparicchinnena kāyena purisassa kāyaṃ, ubhatoavassutepi kāyena kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2176_3: yathāparicchinnakāyappaṭibaddhena vā avasesakāyena vā tassa kāyaṃ āmasantiyā thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2176_5: kāyena kāyaṃ āmasantiyāpi thullaccayaṃ, sace pana purisassa kāyasaṃsaggarāgo natthi,
tika-vin04t:2176_6: pārājikakkhettepi thullaccayameva. Avasese pana kāyappaṭibaddhena kāyappaṭibaddhādibhede,
tika-vin04t:2176_7: methunarāgagehasitapemesu ca sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ. Asañcicca, assatiyā, ajānantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2176_8: asādiyantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Aṅgāni samuṭṭhānādīni ca bhikkhupātimokkhe
tika-vin04t:2179_0: Dutiye gaṇassāti aññāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ. Ṭhitāti saliṅge ṭhitā. Cutāti kālaṅkatā. Nāsitāti
tika-vin04t:2179_1: liṅganāsanāya sayaṃ vā naṭṭhā, aññehi vā nāsitā. Avassaṭāti titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā.
tika-vin04t:2179_2: Pubbevāhaṃ ayye aññāsinti idaṃ tassā vacanakāladassanaṃ, saliṅge ṭhitāya pana pārājikabhāvaṃ
tika-vin04t:2179_3: ñatvā “na dāni naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”ti dhure nikkhittamatteyeva ayaṃ vajjappaṭicchādikā
tika-vin04t:2180_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha nevaattanāpaṭicodanā nagaṇassa ārocanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2180_2: veditabbaṃ. Tatra hi pācittiyaṃ, idha pārājikanti ayameva viseso, sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2183_0: Tatiye ukkhittanti āpattiyā adassanādīsu ukkhittaṃ. Dhammenāti bhūtena vatthunā.
tika-vin04t:2183_1: Vinayenāti codetvā sāretvā. Satthusāsanenāti idhāpi codetvā sāretvā karaṇameva satthusāsanaṃ
tika-vin04t:2183_2: nāma. Anādaranti yena saṅghena ukkhepaniyakammaṃ kataṃ, tasmiṃ vā, tattha pariyāpannagaṇe
tika-vin04t:2183_3: vā ekapuggale vā tasmiṃ vā kamme ādaravirahitaṃ, sammāvattanāya avattamānanti attho.
tika-vin04t:2183_4: Appaṭikāranti paṭikārarahitaṃ, anosāritanti attho. Akatasahāyanti ekakammādike saṃvāse
tika-vin04t:2183_5: saha ayanabhāvena samānasaṃvāsakā bhikkhū sahāyā nāma, yassa pana so saṃvāso tehi
tika-vin04t:2183_6: saddhiṃ natthi na tena te sahāyā katā honti, iti so akatasahāyo nāma, taṃ akatasahāyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2183_7: samānasaṃvāsakabhāvaṃ anupagatanti attho. Tamanuvatteyyāti taṃ ukkhittakaṃ ukkhittakabhāveyeva
tika-vin04t:2183_8: ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ yā bhikkhunī yaṃdiṭṭhiko so hoti, tāya diṭṭhiyā gahaṇabhāvena anuvatteyya.
tika-vin04t:2183_9: Sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saṅghabhedasikkhāpadādīsu vuttanayena visuṃ saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin04t:2183_10: ca vuccamānā taṃ vatthuṃ appaṭinissajjantī samanubhāsanakammapariyosāne ukkhittānuvattikā
tika-vin04t:2184_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha ukkhittānuvattanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2184_1: dvīhi kammavācāhi dve thullaccayā, “yassā nakkhamati, sā bhāseyyā”ti evaṃ yya-kārappattāya
tika-vin04t:2184_2: tatiyakammavācāya pārājikaṃ, adhammakamme tikadukkaṭaṃ, sesaṃ saṅghabhedasikkhāpadādīsu
tika-vin04t:2187_0: Catutthe avassutāti lokassādamittasanthavavasena kāyasaṃsaggarāgena tintā. Ayameva
tika-vin04t:2187_1: hi attho sīhaḷamātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto, samantapāsādikāyaṃ panassa vicāraṇā katā,
tika-vin04t:2187_2: dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇaṃ vātiādīsu pana yaṃ purisapuggalena
tika-vin04t:2187_3: hatthe gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, taṃ “purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇa”nti vuttaṃ, eseva nayo
tika-vin04t:2187_4: saṅghāṭikaṇṇaggahaṇepi. Hatthaggahaṇanti ettha ca yassa kassaci apārājikakkhettabhūtassa
tika-vin04t:2187_5: aṅgassa gahaṇaṃ hatthaggahaṇaṃ, yassa kassaci nivatthassa vā pārutassa vā gahaṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:2187_7: paṭisevanatthāya purisassa hatthapāse santiṭṭheyya vā, tattha ṭhitā sallapeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:2187_8: purisena vā “itthannāmaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchā”ti vuttā taṃ saṅketaṃ gaccheyya, tassa vā
tika-vin04t:2187_9: purisassa abbhāgamanaṃ sādiyeyya, yena kenaci vā paṭicchannaṃ okāsaṃ paviseyya, purisassa
tika-vin04t:2187_10: hatthapāse ṭhatvā kāyaṃ upasaṃhareyyāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Ayampi pārājikāti yathā
tika-vin04t:2187_11: purimāyo, evaṃ ayampi bhikkhunī etassa kāyasaṃsaggasaṅkhātassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya
tika-vin04t:2187_12: etāni aṭṭha vatthūni paṭipāṭiyā vā uppaṭipāṭiyā vā pūretvā aṭṭhavatthukā nāma pārājikā hotīti.
tika-vin04t:2188_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūraṇavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2188_1: paññattaṃ, saṅketagamane pade pade dukkaṭaṃ, purisassa hatthapāsaṃ okkantamatte thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2188_2: purisassa abbhāgamanasādayamānepi dukkaṭaṃ. Hatthapāsokkamane thullaccayaṃ, sesesu
tika-vin04t:2188_3: ekekasmiṃ thullaccayameva, aṭṭhame paripuṇṇe pārājikaṃ. Ekekasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2188_4: satakkhattumpi vītikkante tā āpattiyo desetvā muccati, apicettha gaṇanūpikā āpatti
tika-vin04t:2188_5: veditabbā, “idāni nāpajjissāmī”ti hi dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā desitā gaṇanūpikā, desitagaṇanaṃ
tika-vin04t:2188_6: upeti, pārājikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti. Tasmā yā ekaṃ āpannā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā desetvā
tika-vin04t:2188_7: puna kilesavasena āpajjati, punapi deseti, evaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ paripūrentīpi pārājikā na
tika-vin04t:2188_8: hoti. Yā pana āpajjitvā “punapi aññaṃ vatthuṃ āpajjissāmī”ti saussāhāva deseti, tassā
tika-vin04t:2188_9: sā āpatti agaṇanūpikā, desitāpi adesitā hoti, pārājikassa aṅgaṃ hoti. Asañcicca,
tika-vin04t:2188_10: assatiyā, ajānantiyā asādiyantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Kāyasaṃsaggarāgo, saussāhatā,
tika-vin04t:2188_11: aṭṭhamassa vatthussa pūraṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyākiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2188_12: saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dvivedananti.
tika-vin04t:2190_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo aṭṭha pārājikā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā cattāro,
tika-vin04t:2190_1: ime cattāroti evaṃ pātimokkhuddesamaggena aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā uddiṭṭhāti evamettha
tika-vin04t:2196_0: Saṅghādisesesu paṭhame ussayavādikāti mānussayavasena kodhussayavasena aḍḍakaraṇatthāya
tika-vin04t:2196_1: vinicchayamahāmattānaṃ santike vivadamānā. Gahapatinā vātiādīhi ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike
tika-vin04t:2196_2: avasesā gahaṭṭhapabbajitā saṅgahitā. Ayaṃ bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikanti ādimhi paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin04t:2196_3: āpatti etassāti paṭhamāpattiko, vītikkamakkhaṇeyeva āpajjitabboti attho, taṃ paṭhamāpattikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2196_4: Āpannāti aḍḍapariyosāne āpannā. Bhikkhuniṃ saṅghato nissāretīti nissāraṇīyo, taṃ
tika-vin04t:2197_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha ussayavādikavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sāṇattikaṃ, “aḍḍaṃ
tika-vin04t:2197_1: karissāmī”ti yaṃkiñci dutiyikaṃ vā sakkhiṃ vā sahāyaṃ vā pariyesantiyā pariyesane
tika-vin04t:2197_2: dukkaṭaṃ, yattha ṭhitāya “aḍḍaṃ kātuṃ gacchāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati, tato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin04t:2197_3: gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ, yatthakatthaci antamaso bhikkhunupassayaṃ āgatepi
tika-vin04t:2197_4: vohārike disvā attano kathaṃ ārocentiyā dukkaṭaṃ. Itarena attano kathāya ārocitāya
tika-vin04t:2197_5: bhikkhuniyā thullaccayaṃ, paṭhamaṃ itarena pacchā bhikkhuniyā ārocanepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2197_6: Sace pana bhikkhunī taṃ vadati “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvaṃyeva ārocehī”ti, so attano
tika-vin04t:2197_7: vā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārocetu, tassā vā, paṭhamārocane bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭaṃ, dutiye
tika-vin04t:2197_8: thullaccayaṃ, tena evaṃ vuttāya bhikkhuniyā ārocanepi eseva nayo. Sace pana bhikkhunī
tika-vin04t:2197_9: aññena kathāpeti, tatrāpi eseva nayo. Yathā vā tathā vā hi ārociyamāne paṭhamārocane
tika-vin04t:2197_10: bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭaṃ, dutiye thullaccayaṃ. Ubhinnaṃ pana kathaṃ sutvā vohārikehi
tika-vin04t:2197_11: vinicchaye kate aḍḍapariyosānaṃ nāma hoti, tasmiṃ aḍḍapariyosāne bhikkhuniyā jayepi
tika-vin04t:2198_0: Yā pana paccatthikamanussehi dūtaṃ vā pahiṇitvā, sayaṃ vā āgantvā “ehi, ayye”ti ākaḍḍhiyamānā
tika-vin04t:2198_1: gacchati, yā vā upassaye aññehi kataṃ anācāraṃ anodissa ācikkhantī rakkhaṃ yācati,
tika-vin04t:2198_2: yāya ca kiñci avuttā vohārikā aññato sutvā sayameva aḍḍaṃ pariyosāpenti, tassā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2198_3: anāpatti. Aññehi anākaḍḍhitāya aḍḍakaraṇaṃ, aḍḍapariyosānanti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2201_0: Dutiye yāya pañcamāsagghanakato paṭṭhāya yaṃkiñci parasantakaṃ avaharitaṃ, ayaṃ corī
tika-vin04t:2201_1: nāma, taṃ coriṃ. Vajjhaṃ viditanti tena kammena “vadhārahā aya”nti evaṃ viditaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2201_2: Anapaloketvāti anāpucchā. Gaṇanti mallagaṇabhaṭiputtagaṇādikaṃ. Pūganti dhammagaṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2201_3: Seṇinti gandhikaseṇidussikaseṇiādikaṃ. Yattha yattha hi rājāno gaṇādīnaṃ gāmanigame
tika-vin04t:2201_4: niyyātenti “tumheva ettha anusāsathā”ti, tattha tattha teyeva issarā honti, tasmā
tika-vin04t:2201_5: te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha ca rājānaṃ vā gaṇādike vā apaloketvāpi bhikkhunisaṅgho
tika-vin04t:2201_6: apaloketabbova. Aññatra kappāti titthiyesu vā aññabhikkhunīsu vā pabbajitapubbā kappā
tika-vin04t:2201_7: nāma, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ upasampādentiyā gaṇaācarinī pattacīvarapariyesanesu sīmāsammutiyā
tika-vin04t:2201_8: ñattiyā ca dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayaṃ, kammavācāpariyosāne saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:2202_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha coriṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, coriyā vematikāya
tika-vin04t:2202_1: dukkaṭaṃ, tathā acoriyā corisaññāya ceva vematikāya ca. Acorisaññāya, ajānantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2202_2: apaloketvā vuṭṭhāpentiyā, kappaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Coritā,
tika-vin04t:2202_3: corisaññitā, aññatra anuññātakāraṇā vuṭṭhāpananti, imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2202_4: kiriyākiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2205_0: Tatiye gāmantarantiādīsu sakagāmato tāva nikkhamantiyā anāpatti, nikkhamitvā pana
tika-vin04t:2205_1: aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ, ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepe
tika-vin04t:2205_2: vā upacāre vā atikkante thullaccayaṃ, dutiyena atikkantamatte saṅghādiseso, tato
tika-vin04t:2205_3: nikkhamitvā puna sakagāmaṃ pavisantiyāpi eseva nayo. Sace pana khaṇḍapākārena vā
tika-vin04t:2205_4: vaticchiddena vā bhikkhunivihārabhūmiṃyeva sakkā hoti pavisituṃ, evaṃ pavisamānāya
tika-vin04t:2205_5: kappiyabhūmiyā paviṭṭhā nāma hoti, tasmā vaṭṭati. Bahigāme ṭhatvā yaṃkiñci sakagāmaṃ
tika-vin04t:2205_6: vā paragāmaṃ vā akappiyabhūmiṃ padasā pavisantiyā āpattīti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-vin04t:2206_0: Nadipāragamane vuttalakkhaṇāya nadiyā dutiyikaṃ vinā paratīraṃ gacchantiyā vā antarānadiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2206_1: dutiyikāya saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā puna orimatīrameva paccuttarantiyā vā paṭhamapādaṃ uddharitvā
tika-vin04t:2206_2: tīre ṭhapitakkhaṇe thullaccayaṃ, dutiyapāduddhāre saṅghādiseso. Iddhisetuyānanāvāhi
tika-vin04t:2206_3: pana paratīraṃ otarituṃ, nahānādikāraṇena ca otiṇṇāya orimatīraṃ padasāpi paccuttarituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2207: Rattivippavāse “purearuṇeyeva dutiyikāya hatthapāsaṃ okkamissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ vinā ekagabbhepi dutiyikāya hatthapāsātikkame ṭhatvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpentiyā āpatti.
tika-vin04t:2208_0: Ekā vā gaṇamhāti ettha pana ekā bhikkhunīpi gaṇoyeva. Ohīyeyyāti avahīyeyya, dassanūpacāraṃ
tika-vin04t:2208_1: vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijaheyyāti attho. Tasmā indakhīlātikkamato paṭṭhāya bahigāme
tika-vin04t:2208_3: savanūpacāro atthi, āpattiyeva. Ajjhokāse pana dūrepi dassanūpacāro hoti, tattha
tika-vin04t:2208_4: maggamūḷhasaddena viya dhammassavanārocanasaddena viya ca ‘ayye’ti saddāyantiyā saddassavanātikkame
tika-vin04t:2208_5: āpattiyeva. Sace pana maggaṃ gacchantī ohīyitvā “idāni pāpuṇissāmī”ti saussāhā anubandhati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2209_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha gāmantaragamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, “ekā
tika-vin04t:2209_1: vā nadipāra”ntiādikā ettha tividhā anupaññatti, pure aruṇe sakagāmato nikkhamitvā
tika-vin04t:2209_2: aruṇuggamanakāle gāmantarapariyāpannaṃ nadipāraṃ okkamanantiyā pana catassopi āpattiyo
tika-vin04t:2214_0: Etenupāyena tiṇṇaṃ, dvinnañca ekatobhāvo veditabbo. Dutiyikāya pana pakkantāya vā
tika-vin04t:2214_1: vibbhantāya vā kālaṅkatāya vā pakkhasaṅkantāya vā āpadāsu vā gāmantaragamanādīni
tika-vin04t:2214_2: karontiyā ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Antarāyena ekatobhāvo, gāmantaragamanādīsu aññataratāpajjanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2214_3: āpadāya abhāvoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisāni, idaṃ
tika-vin04t:2217_0: Catutthe ukkhittanti āpattiyā adassanādīsu ukkhittaṃ. Anaññāya gaṇassa chandanti
tika-vin04t:2217_1: tasseva kārakasaṅghassa chandaṃ ajānitvā. Osāreyyāti osāraṇakammaṃ kareyya. Tassā
tika-vin04t:2217_2: evaṃ karontiyā, gaṇapariyesane sīmāsammutiyā ñattiyā ca dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi
tika-vin04t:2218_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evaṃ osāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, tikasaṅghādisesaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2218_1: adhammakamme tikadukkaṭaṃ, kārakasaṅghaṃ vā āpucchitvā, gaṇassa vā chandaṃ jānitvā,
tika-vin04t:2218_2: vatte vā vattantiṃ, asante kārakasaṅghe osārentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Dhammakammena
tika-vin04t:2218_3: ukkhittatā, aññatra anuññātakāraṇā osāraṇanti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2221: Pañcame avassutāti chandarāgena tintā. Avassutassāti tādisasseva. Khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vāti ettha paṭiggahaṇe thullaccayaṃ, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:2222_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sundarīnandaṃ ārabbha avassutāya avassutassa hatthato āmisappaṭiggahaṇavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2222_1: paññattaṃ, ekatoavassute paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2222_3: nayo. Tattha pana ekatoavassute sati dukkaṭaṃ, sabbattha udakadantaponaggahaṇepi
tika-vin04t:2222_4: paribhogepi dukkaṭameva. Ubhosu anavassutesu, “anavassuto”ti vā ñatvā gaṇhantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2222_5: ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Udakadantaponato aññaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ, ubhatoavassutatā,
tika-vin04t:2222_6: sahatthā gahaṇaṃ, ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:2225_0: Chaṭṭhe yato tvanti yasmā tvaṃ. Iṅghāti uyyojanatthe nipāto. Ayampīti yā evaṃ uyyojeti,
tika-vin04t:2225_1: sā evaṃ uyyojanena ca tena vacanena itarissā paṭiggahaṇena ca dukkaṭāni, ajjhohāragaṇanāya
tika-vin04t:2225_2: thullaccayāni ca āpajjitvā bhojanapariyosāne saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:2226_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha evaṃ uyyojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sāṇattikameva,
tika-vin04t:2226_1: purisassa vā yakkhādīnaṃ vā hatthato udakadantaponappaṭiggahaṇuyyojane ca tesaṃ paribhoge
tika-vin04t:2226_2: ca dukkaṭaṃ, esa nayo yakkhādīnaṃ hatthato avasesaggahaṇatthaṃ uyyojane, tesaṃ gahaṇe,
tika-vin04t:2226_3: ajjhohāre ca. Bhojanapariyosāne pana thullaccayaṃ. “Anavassuto”ti ñatvā vā, “kupitā
tika-vin04t:2226_4: na paṭiggaṇhatī”ti vā, “kulānuddayatāya na paṭiggaṇhatī”ti vā uyyojentiyā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2226_5: anāpatti. Manussapurisatā, aññatra anuññātakāraṇā, “khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin04t:2226_6: bhuñjā”ti uyyojanā, tena vacanena gahetvā itarissā bhojanapariyosānanti imānettha
tika-vin04t:2232_0: Dasame kiṃnumāva samaṇiyoti kiṃnu imā eva samaṇiyo. Tāsāhanti tāsaṃ ahaṃ. Yāvatatiyakapadattho
tika-vin04t:2232_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo, idaṃ pana sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷibhikkhuniṃ ārabbha “buddhaṃ
tika-vin04t:2232_3: paccācikkhāmī”tiādivacanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, evaṃ vacanameva cettha catūsu aṅgesu
tika-vin04t:2232_4: paṭhamaṃ aṅganti ayaṃ viseso, sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2235_0: Ekādasame kismiñcideva adhikaraṇeti catunnaṃ aññatarasmiṃ. Paccākatāti parājitā.
tika-vin04t:2235_1: Idampi sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”tiādivacanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2238_0: Dvādasame saṃsaṭṭhāti pabbajitānaṃ ananulomena gihīnaṃ koṭṭanapacanasāsanaharaṇādinā
tika-vin04t:2238_1: kāyikavācasikena missībhūtā. Pāpo kāyikavācasiko ācāro etāsanti pāpācārā. Pāpo kittisaddo
tika-vin04t:2238_2: etāsanti pāpasaddā. Pāpo ājīvasaṅkhāto siloko etāsanti pāpasilokā. Bhikkhunisaṅghassa
tika-vin04t:2238_3: vihesikāti aññamaññissā kamme kariyamāne paṭikkosanena vihesikā. Vajjappaṭicchādikāti
tika-vin04t:2239_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha saṃsaṭṭhavihāravatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesametthāpi
tika-vin04t:2239_1: dasame vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, samanubhāsanakammakāle pana dvetisso ekato samanubhāsitabbāti.
tika-vin04t:2242_0: Terasame evaṃ vadeyyāti tā samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeyya. Evācārāti evaṃācārā,
tika-vin04t:2242_1: yādiso tumhākaṃ ācāro, tādiso ācāroti attho, esa nayo sabbattha. Uññāyāti avaññāya
tika-vin04t:2242_2: nīcaṃ katvā jānanāya. Paribhavenāti “kiṃ imā karissantī”ti evaṃ paribhavitvā jānanena.
tika-vin04t:2242_3: Akkhantiyāti asahanatāya, kodhenāti attho. Vebhassiyāti balavantassa bhāvena, attano
tika-vin04t:2242_4: balappakāsanena samutrāsenāti attho. Dubbalyāti tumhākaṃ dubbalabhāvena, sabbattha
tika-vin04t:2242_5: uññāya ca paribhavena cāti evaṃ samuccayattho daṭṭhabbo. Viviccathāti nānā hotha,
tika-vin04t:2243: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha “saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha, mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesametthāpi dasame vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2246_0: Saṅghabhedādīsu catūsu vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabbo. Kevalañhi bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ
tika-vin04t:2246_1: na bhindati, bhedāya pana parakkamati ceva anuvattati ca. Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo sattarasa
tika-vin04t:2246_2: saṅghādisesā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā satta, asādhāraṇā dasāti
tika-vin04t:2246_3: evaṃ sattarasa. Ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbanti bhikkhuniyā hi āpattiṃ chādentiyāpi
tika-vin04t:2246_4: parivāso nāma natthi, chādanapaccayāpi na dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, tasmā chādetvāpi achādetvāpi
tika-vin04t:2246_5: ekaṃ pakkhamānattameva caritabbaṃ. Taṃ bhikkhunīhi attano sīmaṃ sodhetvā vihārasīmāya
tika-vin04t:2246_6: vā, sodhetuṃ asakkontīhi khaṇḍasīmāya vā sabbantimena paricchedena catuvaggaṃ gaṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:2246_7: sannipātāpetvā dātabbaṃ. Sace ekā āpatti hoti, ekissā vasena, sace dve vā tisso vā
tika-vin04t:2246_8: sambahulā vā ekavatthukā vā nānāvatthukā vā, tāsaṃ tāsaṃ vasena bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2246_9: vuttavatthugottanāmaāpattibhedesu yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ ādāya yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin04t:2247_0: Tatridaṃ paṭhamāpattivasena mukhamattanidassanaṃ – tāya āpannāya bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ
tika-vin04t:2247_1: upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ
tika-vin04t:2247_2: nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassavacanīyo “ahaṃ, ayye, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ ussayavādaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2247_3: sāhaṃ, ayye, saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācāmī”ti, evaṃ
tika-vin04t:2247_4: tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin04t:2248_0: “Suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ ussayavādaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2248_1: sā saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācati, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2248_2: saṅgho itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ dadeyya, esā ñatti.
tika-vin04t:2249_0: “Suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī…pe… dutiyampi…pe… tatiyampi etamatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:2249_1: vadāmi, suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho…pe… sā bhāseyya. Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin04t:2249_2: ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ. Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.
tika-vin04t:2250_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne “vattaṃ samādiyāmi, mānattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti samādiyitvā saṅghassa
tika-vin04t:2250_1: ārocetvā nikkhittavattena tāva vasitukāmāya tattheva saṅghamajjhe vā pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu
tika-vin04t:2250_2: ekabhikkhuniyā vā dutiyikāya vā santike “vattaṃ nikkhipāmi, mānattaṃ nikkhipāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:2250_3: nikkhipitabbaṃ. Aññissā pana āgantukāya santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ, nikkhittakālato
tika-vin04t:2250_4: paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, tato purearuṇeyeva catūhi bhikkhunīhi taṃ bhikkhuniṃ
tika-vin04t:2250_5: gahetvā gāmūpacārato ca bhikkhūnaṃ vihārūpacārato ca dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggā
tika-vin04t:2250_6: okkamma gumbavatiādīhi paṭicchanne okāse nisīditabbaṃ. Catūhi bhikkhūhipi tattha
tika-vin04t:2250_7: gantabbaṃ, gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ avidūre visuṃ nisīditabbaṃ. Atha tāya bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin04t:2250_8: vuttanayeneva vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhunisaṅghassa tāva evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ –
tika-vin04t:2251_0: “Ahaṃ, ayye, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ ussayavādaṃ, sāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya
tika-vin04t:2251_1: pakkhamānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassā me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ
tika-vin04t:2251_2: adāsi, sāhaṃ mānattaṃ carāmi, vedayāmahaṃ, ayye, ‘vedayatī’ti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti.
tika-vin04t:2252_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ “ahaṃ, ayyā, ekaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin04t:2252_1: āpajjiṃ…pe… vedayāmahaṃ, ayyā, ‘vedayatī’ti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti. Ārocetvā bhikkhunisaṅghasseva
tika-vin04t:2252_2: santike nisīditabbaṃ, tato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūsu vā, dutiyikaṃ ṭhapetvā bhikkhunīsu
tika-vin04t:2252_3: vā pakkantāsupi ubhatosaṅghe mānattaṃ ciṇṇameva hoti. Yāva aruṇaṃ na uṭṭhahati, tāva
tika-vin04t:2252_4: yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati bhikkhuṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ vā, tassā ārocetabbaṃ. Uṭṭhite aruṇe
tika-vin04t:2252_5: vattaṃ nikkhipitvā upassayaṃ gantabbaṃ, evaṃ pañcadasa aruṇā gahetabbā.
tika-vin04t:2253_0: Anikkhittavattāya pana āgantukesu asati catunnaṃ bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca devasikaṃ
tika-vin04t:2253_1: ārocetvā, āgantukesu sati sabbesampi āgantukānaṃ ārocentiyā pañcadasa divasāni pārivāsikakkhandhake
tika-vin04t:2253_2: vuttanayeneva sammā vattitabbanti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2253_3: vutto, ciṇṇamānattāya bhikkhuniyāti yadā evaṃ ciṇṇamānattā bhikkhunī hoti, athassā
tika-vin04t:2253_4: yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅghoti vuttanayeneva abbhānakammaṃ kātabbaṃ, sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2259: Nissaggiyesu ādivaggassa tāva paṭhame pattasannicayaṃ kareyyāti pattasannidhiṃ kareyya, ekāhaṃ anadhiṭṭhahitvā vā avikappetvā vā adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ pattaṃ ṭhapeyyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:2260_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha pattasannicayavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesakathāmaggo
tika-vin04t:2260_1: bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo, tatra hi dasāhātikkame āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2260_2: idha ekāhātikkameti ettakameva tassa ca imassa ca nānākaraṇaṃ, sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2263_0: Dutiye akālacīvaranti atthate kathine kathinamāsehi, anatthate cīvaramāsato aññasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2263_1: kāle uppannaṃ, yaṃ vā pana kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ. Ādissa dinnaṃ nāma “sampattā bhājentū”ti
tika-vin04t:2263_2: vatvā vā, “idaṃ gaṇassa, idaṃ tumhākaṃ dammī”ti vatvā vā, dātukāmatāya pādamūle ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:2263_3: vā dinnaṃ. Iccetaṃ akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpentiyā payoge
tika-vin04t:2263_4: dukkaṭaṃ, yaṃ attanā laddhaṃ, taṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi yathādāneyeva
tika-vin04t:2263_5: upanetabbaṃ, aññasmimpi evarūpe sikkhāpade eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2264_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2264_1: paññattaṃ, akālacīvare vematikāya, kālacīvare akālacīvarasaññāya ceva vematikāya
tika-vin04t:2264_2: ca dukkaṭaṃ. Ubhosu kālacīvarasaññāya, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Akālacīvaratā,
tika-vin04t:2264_3: tathāsaññitā, “kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhāya lesena bhājāpanaṃ, paṭilābhoti imānettha
tika-vin04t:2267_0: Tatiye handāti gaṇha. Acchindeyyāti sayaṃ acchindantiyā bandhitvā ṭhapitesu bahūsupi
tika-vin04t:2267_1: ekāpatti, itaresu vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo. Acchindāpane pana ekāya āṇattiyā bahūsu
tika-vin04t:2268_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2268_1: sāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, aññasmiṃ parikkhāre tikadukkaṭaṃ, anupasampannāya cīvarepi
tika-vin04t:2268_2: tikadukkaṭameva. Yā pana tāya vā diyyamānaṃ, tassā vā vissāsaṃ gaṇhāti, tassā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2268_3: anāpatti. Upasampannatā, parivattitacīvarassa vikappanupagatā, sakasaññāya acchindanaṃ
tika-vin04t:2268_4: vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ
tika-vin04t:2271_0: Catutthe viññāpetvāti jānāpetvā, “idaṃ nāma āharā”ti yācitvā vā. Aññaṃ viññāpeyyāti
tika-vin04t:2271_1: yaṃ pubbe “kinte, ayye, aphāsu, kiṃ āhariyatū”ti vuttāya viññāpitaṃ, taṃ paṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin04t:2271_2: tañceva aññañca gahetukāmā tato aññaṃ viññāpeyya, tassā viññattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:2272_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2272_1: tikapācittiyaṃ, anaññe dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Anaññe anaññasaññāya pana, tasmiṃ appahonte
tika-vin04t:2272_2: puna taññeva, aññenapi atthe sati tena saddhiṃ aññañca, yañca viññattaṃ, tato ce
tika-vin04t:2272_3: aññaṃ samagghataraṃ hoti, imaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā suddhaṃ aññameva ca viññāpentiyā,
tika-vin04t:2272_4: ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Lesena gahetukāmatā, aññassa viññāpanaṃ, paṭilābhoti imānettha
tika-vin04t:2275_0: Pañcame aññaṃ cetāpetvāti attano kappiyabhaṇḍena “idaṃ nāma āharā”ti aññaṃ parivattāpetvā.
tika-vin04t:2275_1: Aññaṃ cetāpeyyāti “evaṃ me idaṃ datvā aññampi āharissatī”ti maññamānā “na me iminā
tika-vin04t:2275_2: attho, idaṃ nāma me āharā”ti tato aññaṃ cetāpeyya. Tassā cetāpanappayoge dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2275_3: paṭilābhena tena vā aññena vā mūlena āhaṭaṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, sesaṃ catutthasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2278_0: Chaṭṭhe aññadatthikenāti aññassatthāya dinnena. Aññuddisikenāti aññaṃ uddisitvā dinnena.
tika-vin04t:2278_1: Saṅghikenāti saṅghassa pariccattena. Parikkhārenāti kappiyabhaṇḍena. Aññaṃ cetāpeyyāti
tika-vin04t:2278_2: “idaṃ nāma paribhuñjeyyāthā”ti yaṃ uddisitvā niyametvā yo parikkhāro dinno, tato
tika-vin04t:2278_3: aññaṃ parivattāpeyya, tassā payoge dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2279_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha tādisena parikkhārena aññaṃ cetāpanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2279_1: paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anaññadatthike dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana anaññadatthikasaññāya,
tika-vin04t:2279_2: sesakaṃ upanentiyā, “tumhehi etadatthāya dinno, amhākañca iminā nāma attho”ti sāmike
tika-vin04t:2279_3: apaloketvā upanentiyā, yadā bhikkhuniyo vihārampi chaḍḍetvā pakkamanti, evarūpāsu
tika-vin04t:2279_4: āpadāsu upanentīnaṃ, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sesaṃ catutthasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2282: Sattame saññācikenāti sayaṃ yācitakenāpi. Etadevettha nānākaraṇaṃ, sesaṃ chaṭṭhasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2285: Aṭṭhame mahājanikenāti gaṇassa pariccattena, idamettha chaṭṭhato nānākaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2288: Navame saññācikenāti idaṃ aṭṭhamato atirittaṃ, sesaṃ dvīsupi chaṭṭhasikkhāpadasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2291_0: Dasame puggalikenāti ekabhikkhuniyā pariccattena. Saññācikenāti sayaṃ yācitakena
tika-vin04t:2291_1: ca. Aññaṃ cetāpeyyāti yaṃ uddisitvā dinnaṃ, tato aññaṃ cetāpentiyā payoge dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2292: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha tādisena parikkhārena aññaṃ cetāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesaṃ chaṭṭhasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2296_0: Dutiyassa paṭhame garupāvuraṇanti sītakāle pāvuraṇaṃ. Catukkaṃsaparamanti kaṃso nāma
tika-vin04t:2296_1: catukkahāpaṇiko hoti, tasmā soḷasakahāpaṇagghanakaṃ. Cetāpetabbanti ṭhapetvā sahadhammike
tika-vin04t:2296_2: ca ñātakappavārite ca aññena kismiñcideva guṇe parituṭṭhena “vadethāyye, yenattho”ti
tika-vin04t:2296_3: vuttāya viññāpetabbaṃ. Tato ce uttarīti tatuttari viññāpentiyā dukkaṭaṃ, paṭiladdhaṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:2297_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha rājānaṃ kambalaṃ viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2297_1: tikapācittiyaṃ, ūnakacatukkaṃse dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana ūnakasaññāya, catukkaṃsaparamaṃ
tika-vin04t:2297_2: cetāpentiyā, ñātakappavārite vā, aññassa vā atthāya, attano vā dhanena, mahagghaṃ
tika-vin04t:2297_3: cetāpentaṃ appagghaṃ cetāpentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Garupāvuraṇatā, atirekacatukkaṃsatā,
tika-vin04t:2297_4: ananuññātaṭṭhāne viññatti, paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni sañcarittasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:2300: Dutiye lahupāvuraṇanti uṇhakāle pāvuraṇaṃ. Aḍḍhateyyakaṃsaparamanti dasakahāpaṇagghanakaṃ, sesaṃ paṭhamasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2302: Ito parāni imasmiṃ vagge aṭṭha, tatiyavagge dasāti imāni aṭṭhārasa sikkhāpadāni bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti.
tika-vin04t:2304: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā aṭṭhārasa, asādhāraṇā dvādasāti evaṃ tiṃsa. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2310_0: Pācittiyesu lasuṇavaggassa tāva paṭhame lasuṇanti magadharaṭṭhe jātaṃ āmakaṃ bhaṇḍikalasuṇameva,
tika-vin04t:2310_1: na ekadvitimiñjakaṃ. Tañhi “khādissāmī”ti paṭiggaṇhantiyā dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2311_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha lasuṇaṃ harāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2311_1: alasuṇe dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana alasuṇasaññāya, palaṇḍuke, bhañjanake, haritake,
tika-vin04t:2311_2: cāpalasuṇe, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, sāḷave, uttaribhaṅge, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2311_3: anāpatti. Āmakalasuṇañceva, ajjhoharaṇañcāti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2314_0: Dutiye sambādheti paṭicchannokāse, upakacchakesu ca muttakaraṇe cāti attho. Saṃharāpeyyāti
tika-vin04t:2314_1: ettha khurasaṇḍāsakattariādīsu yena kenaci saṃharāpentiyā payogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ, na lomagaṇanāya.
tika-vin04t:2315_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2315_1: paññattaṃ, attano atthāya aññaṃ āṇāpentiyā sāṇattikaṃ, āpattibhedonatthi. Ābādhapaccayā,
tika-vin04t:2315_2: ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Ābādhābhāvo, sambādhe lomasaṃharaṇanti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2318: Tatiye talaghātaketi antamaso uppalakesarenāpi muttakaraṇassa talaghātane muttakaraṇamhi pahāradāne pācittiyanti attho.
tika-vin04t:2319_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ dve bhikkhuniyo ārabbha talaghātakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, purimanayeneva
tika-vin04t:2319_1: sāṇattikaṃ, āpattibhedo natthi. Ito paraṃ pana yattha natthi, tattha avatvāva gamissāma.
tika-vin04t:2319_2: Ābādhapaccayā gaṇḍaṃ vā vaṇaṃ vā paharantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Ābādhābhāvo,
tika-vin04t:2319_3: muttakaraṇe pahāradānaṃ, phassasādiyananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2322: Catutthe jatumaṭṭhaketi jatunā kate maṭṭhadaṇḍake. Vatthuvasenetaṃ vuttaṃ, kāmarāgena pana uppalakesarampi pavesentiyā āpatti.
tika-vin04t:2323: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha jatumaṭṭhakasādiyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesaṃ tatiyasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2326_0: Pañcame udakasuddhikanti muttakaraṇassa dhovanaṃ. Ādiyamānāyāti karontiyā. Dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ
tika-vin04t:2326_1: ādātabbanti dvīsu aṅgulīsu ekekaṃ katvā dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabbaṃ. Taṃ atikkāmentiyāti
tika-vin04t:2326_2: sace dhovanakāle rāgavasena vitthārato tatiyāya aṅguliyā aggapabbaṃ, gambhīrato ekissāva
tika-vin04t:2327_0: Sakkesu aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2327_1: paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, ūnakadvaṅgulapabbe dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana ūnakasaññāya,
tika-vin04t:2327_2: dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādiyantiyā, ābādhapaccayā atirekampi, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:2330_0: Chaṭṭhe bhuñjantassāti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhuñjato. Pānīyenāti suddhena
tika-vin04t:2330_1: vā udakena, takkādīsu vā aññatarena. Vidhūpanenāti yāya kāyaci bījaniyā. Upatiṭṭheyyāti
tika-vin04t:2330_2: yā etesu dvīsu aññataraṃ gahetvā hatthapāse tiṭṭhati, tassā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2331_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha bhuñjantassa evaṃ tiṭṭhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2331_1: tikapācittiyaṃ, hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā khādanīyaṃ khādantassa upatiṭṭhantiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2331_2: anupasampanne tikadukkaṭaṃ. “Imaṃ pivatha, iminā bījathā”ti evaṃ dentiyā vā, dāpentiyā
tika-vin04t:2331_3: vā, anupasampannaṃ vā upatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ āṇāpentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Bhuñjantassa
tika-vin04t:2331_4: bhikkhuno hatthapāse ṭhānaṃ, pānīyassa vā vidhūpanassa vā gahaṇanti imānettha dve
tika-vin04t:2334_0: Sattame viññatvāti antamaso mātarampi yācitvā. Bhuñjeyyāti ajjhohareyya. Ettha ca
tika-vin04t:2334_1: viññatti ceva bhojanañca pamāṇaṃ, tasmā sayaṃ viññatvā aññāya bhajjanādīni kārāpetvā
tika-vin04t:2334_2: vā, aññāya viññāpetvā sayaṃ bhajjanādīni katvā vā paṭiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dantehi
tika-vin04t:2334_3: saṃkhādanaṃ, tāva pubbappayogesu dukkaṭāni, ajjhohāre ajjhohāre pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2335_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2335_1: sayaṃ vā aññāya vā aviññattiyā laddhaṃ bhajjanādīni katvā vā kāretvā vā bhuñjantiyā
tika-vin04t:2335_2: dukkaṭaṃ, aññāya viññattiyā laddhaṃ pana sayaṃ bhajjanādīni katvāpi kāretvāpi bhuñjantiyā
tika-vin04t:2335_3: dukkaṭameva. Ābādhe sati sedakammādīnaṃ atthāya viññāpentiyā, aviññattiyā labbhamānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2335_5: ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ aññatarassa viññāpanaṃ vā viññāpāpanaṃ
tika-vin04t:2335_6: vā, paṭilābho, bhajjanādīni katvā vā kāretvā vā ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2338_0: Aṭṭhame saṅkāranti kacavaraṃ. Vighāsanti yaṃkiñci paribhuttāvasesaṃ ucchiṭṭhodakampi
tika-vin04t:2338_1: dantakaṭṭhampi, aṭṭhikacalakesu pana vattabbameva natthi. Tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre
tika-vin04t:2338_2: vāti yassakassaci kuṭṭassa vā pākārassa vā parato. Chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vāti
tika-vin04t:2338_3: sabbānipetāni ekato chaḍḍentiyā ekappayoge ekāpatti, sakiṃ āṇattiyā bahukepi chaḍḍite ekāva.
tika-vin04t:2339_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2339_1: sāṇattikaṃ, bhikkhussa dukkaṭaṃ, oloketvā vā avalañje vā chaḍḍentiyā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2339_2: anāpatti. Uccārādibhāvo, anolokanaṃ, valañjanaṭṭhānaṃ, tirokuṭṭatiropākāratā, chaḍḍanaṃ
tika-vin04t:2339_3: vā chaḍḍāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni sañcarittasadisāni, idaṃ
tika-vin04t:2342_0: Navame hariteti khette vā nāḷikerādiārāme vā yatthakatthaci ropimaharitaṭṭhāne. Tāni
tika-vin04t:2342_1: vatthūni chaḍḍentiyā vā chaḍḍāpentiyā vā purimanayeneva āpatti, tādise ṭhāne nisīditvā
tika-vin04t:2342_2: antamaso udakaṃ pivitvā matthakacchinnaṃ nāḷikerampi chaḍḍentiyā āpattiyeva.
tika-vin04t:2343_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha uccārādīni harite chaḍḍanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2343_1: sāṇattikaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ, bhikkhuniyāpi nikkhittabīje khette
tika-vin04t:2343_2: yāva aṅkuro na uṭṭhahati, tāva dukkaṭaṃ, aharite dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana aharitasaññāya
tika-vin04t:2343_3: chaḍḍitakhette vā, sāmike apaloketvā vā chaḍḍentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sesaṃ
tika-vin04t:2346_0: Dasame naccanti antamaso moranaccampi. Gītanti antamaso dhammabhāṇakagītampi. Vāditanti
tika-vin04t:2346_1: antamaso udakabherivāditampi. Dassanāyāti etesu yaṃkiñci dassanāya gacchantiyā pade
tika-vin04t:2346_2: pade dukkaṭaṃ, yattha ṭhitā passati vā suṇāti vā, ekappayoge ekāpatti, taṃ taṃ disaṃ
tika-vin04t:2347_0: Rājagahe chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha naccādīni dassanāya gamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2347_1: sayaṃ tāni vatthūni karontiyā, aññaṃ vā āṇāpentiyā, “cetiyassa upahāraṃ dethā”ti
tika-vin04t:2347_2: īdisena pariyāyena vā bhaṇantiyā, “cetiyassa upahāraṃ karomā”ti vā vutte “sādhū”ti
tika-vin04t:2347_3: sampaṭicchantiyā ca pācittiyamevāti sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ, bhikkhuno sabbattha
tika-vin04t:2347_4: dukkaṭaṃ. “Tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karomā”ti vutte pana “upaṭṭhānakaraṇaṃ nāma
tika-vin04t:2347_5: sundara”nti īdisaṃ pariyāyaṃ bhaṇantiyā, ārāme ṭhatvā passantiyā vā suṇantiyā vā,
tika-vin04t:2347_6: tathā attano ṭhitokāsaṃ āgantvā payojitaṃ paṭipathaṃ gacchantiyā sammukhībhūtaṃ salākabhattādike
tika-vin04t:2347_7: sati karaṇīye gantvā, āpadāsu vā samajjaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvāpi passantiyā vā suṇantiyā
tika-vin04t:2347_8: vā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Naccādīnaṃ aññataratā, aññatra anuññātakāraṇā gamanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2347_9: dassanaṃ vā savanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisāni,
tika-vin04t:2352_0: Andhakāravaggassa paṭhame rattandhakāreti rattiandhakāre. Appadīpeti pajjotacandasūriyaaggīsu
tika-vin04t:2352_1: ekekenāpi anobhāsite. Purisenāti santiṭṭhituṃ sallapituñca viññunā manussapurisena
tika-vin04t:2352_2: saddhiṃ. Santiṭṭheyya vāti hatthapāse ṭhitamattāya pācittiyaṃ. Sallapeyyāti tattha
tika-vin04t:2353_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha evaṃ santiṭṭhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, purisassa
tika-vin04t:2353_1: hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā, yakkhādīnaṃ hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvāpi santiṭṭhantiyā, sallapentiyā
tika-vin04t:2353_2: vā dukkaṭaṃ, yaṃkiñci viññuṃ dutiyaṃ gahetvā evaṃ karontiyā, arahopekkhāya, aññavihitāya,
tika-vin04t:2353_3: ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Rattandhakāratā, purisassa hatthapāse ṭhānaṃ vā sallapanaṃ
tika-vin04t:2353_4: vā, sahāyābhāvo, rahopekkhatāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2353_5: kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
tika-vin04t:2356: Dutiye paṭicchanne okāseti kuṭṭādīsu yena kenaci paṭicchanne, idamevettha nānattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2359: Tatiye ajjhokāseti nānaṃ, sesaṃ ubhayatthāpi paṭhamasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2362_0: Catutthe rathikāyāti racchāyaṃ. Byūheti anividdharacchāyaṃ. Siṅghāṭaketi caccare.
tika-vin04t:2362_1: Nikaṇṇikaṃ vā jappeyyāti kaṇṇamūle kiñci jappeyya. Uyyojeyyāti anācāraṃ caritukāmatāya
tika-vin04t:2362_2: “gaccha tva”nti dutiyikaṃ uyyojeyya. Pācittiyanti purimanayeneva tāva santiṭṭhanādīsu
tika-vin04t:2362_3: tīṇi pācittiyāni, uyyojentiyā pana uyyojane ca hatthapāsavijahane ca dukkaṭaṃ, vijahite pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2363_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evaṃ santiṭṭhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesaṃ purimattayasadisameva.
tika-vin04t:2363_1: Anāpattiyaṃ pana “na anācāraṃ ācaritukāmā, sati karaṇīye dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ uyyojetī”ti ettakaṃ adhikanti.
tika-vin04t:2366_0: Pañcame purebhattanti aruṇuggamanaṃ upādāya yāva majjhanhikaṃ. Āsaneti pallaṅkassokāsabhūte.
tika-vin04t:2366_1: Sāmike anāpucchāti tasmiṃ kule yaṃkiñci viññuṃ manussaṃ anāpucchā. Pakkameyyāti ettha
tika-vin04t:2366_2: channassa anto nisīditvā anovassakaṃ ajjhokāse upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā paṭhamapāde
tika-vin04t:2367_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha anāpucchā pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2367_1: tikapācittiyaṃ, pallaṅkassa anokāse dukkaṭaṃ, tathā āpucchite anāpucchitasaññāya
tika-vin04t:2367_2: ceva vematikāya ca. Āpucchitasaññāya pana, asaṃhārime, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2367_3: anāpatti. Purebhattatā, antaraghare nisajjā, āsanassa pallaṅkokāsatā, aññatra anuññātakāraṇā
tika-vin04t:2367_4: anāpucchanaṃ, vuttaparicchedātikkamoti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni,
tika-vin04t:2370_0: Chaṭṭhe pacchābhattanti majjhanhike vītivatte yāva sūriyassa atthaṅgamā. Abhinisīdeyya
tika-vin04t:2370_1: vāti ādimhi nisīditvā gacchantiyā ekā āpatti, anisīditvā nipajjitvāva gacchantiyāpi
tika-vin04t:2371: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha āsane abhinisīdanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesaṃ pañcamasadisameva. Yathā pana tattha asaṃhārime, evamidha dhuvapaññatte anāpattīti.
tika-vin04t:2374: Sattame vikāleti atthaṅgate sūriye. Seyyanti antamaso paṇṇasanthārampi, sesaṃ chaṭṭhasadisameva.
tika-vin04t:2375_0: Idaṃ pana sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike
tika-vin04t:2375_1: anāpucchitvā seyyaṃ santharitvā abhinisīdanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, anāpattiyañcettha
tika-vin04t:2378_0: Aṭṭhame duggahitena dūpadhāritenāti yaṃ vuttaṃ, tato aññathā gahitena ca upadhāritena
tika-vin04t:2378_1: ca. Paranti “ahaṃ kirayye ayyaṃ na sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahāmī”tiādinā nayena upasampannaṃ
tika-vin04t:2379_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha evaṃ paraṃ ujjhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2379_1: tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampannāya tikadukkaṭaṃ, ummattikādīnaṃyeva anāpatti. Duggahitatā,
tika-vin04t:2379_2: ujjhāpanaṃ, yaṃ ujjhāpeti, tassā upasampannatāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2382_0: Navame abhisapeyyāti sapathaṃ kareyya. Tattha “niraye upapajjāmi, niraye upapajjatū”tievamādīni
tika-vin04t:2382_1: vadamānā nirayena abhisapati nāma, akkosatīti attho. “Gihinī homi, gihinī hotū”tievamādīni
tika-vin04t:2382_2: vadamānā brahmacariyena. Tassā vācāya vācāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2383_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha evaṃ abhisapanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2383_1: anupasampannāya tikadukkaṭaṃ, tiracchānayoniyā vā pettivisayena vā manussadobhaggena
tika-vin04t:2383_2: vā abhisapane dukkaṭaṃ. Atthadhammānusāsanipurekkhārānaṃ ummattikādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2383_3: Nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapanaṃ, upasampannatā, atthadhammapurekkhārādīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:2383_4: abhāvoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni aṭṭhamasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:2386: Dasame vadhitvāti hatthādīhi paharitvā, ubhayaṃ karontiyāva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2387_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha attānaṃ vadhitvā rodanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, kevalaṃ
tika-vin04t:2387_1: vadhantiyā vā rodantiyā vā dukkaṭameva. Ñātirogabhogabyasanehi phuṭṭhāya kevalaṃ
tika-vin04t:2387_2: rodantiyā eva na vadhantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Attānaṃ vadhanañceva, rodanañcāti
tika-vin04t:2387_3: imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni samanubhāsanasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2392: Naggavaggassa paṭhame naggāti anivatthā vā apārutā vā. Evañhi nahāyantiyā sabbappayogesu dukkaṭaṃ, nahānapariyosāne pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2393_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha evaṃ nahānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, udakasāṭikacīvare
tika-vin04t:2393_1: acchinne vā naṭṭhe vā, “mahagghaṃ idaṃ disvā corāpi hareyyu”nti evarūpāsu āpadāsu
tika-vin04t:2393_2: vā nahāyantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Naggatā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvo, nahānapariyosānanti
tika-vin04t:2396_0: Dutiye sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha appamāṇikāyo udakasāṭikāyo dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2396_1: paññattaṃ, sesamettha sabbaṃ ratanavagge nisīdanasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2399_0: Tatiye visibbetvāti dussibbitaṃ punasibbanatthāya visibbetvā. Anantarāyikinīti dasasu
tika-vin04t:2399_1: antarāyesu ekekasmimpi asati. Aññatra catūhapañcāhāti visibbitadivasato pañca divase
tika-vin04t:2399_2: atikkāmetvā “neva sibbissāmi, na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2400_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha cīvaraṃ visibbetvā na sibbanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2400_1: tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampannāya tikadukkaṭaṃ, tathā ubhinnampi aññasmiṃ parikkhāre.
tika-vin04t:2400_2: Yā pana antarāyikinī vā hoti, pariyesitvā vā kiñci na labhati, karontī vā pañcāhaṃ
tika-vin04t:2400_3: atikkāmeti, tassā ca, gilānāya ca, āpadāsu ca, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Nivāsanapārupanupagacīvaratā,
tika-vin04t:2400_4: upasampannāya santakatā, sibbanatthāya visibbanaṃ vā visibbāpanaṃ vā, aññatra anuññātakāraṇā
tika-vin04t:2400_5: pañcāhātikkamo, dhuranikkhepoti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni samanubhāsanasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:2403_0: Catutthe pañca ahāni pañcāhaṃ, pañcāhameva pañcāhikaṃ. Saṅghāṭīnaṃ cāro saṅghāṭicāro,
tika-vin04t:2403_1: paribhogavasena vā otāpanavasena vā saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena ‘saṅghāṭī’ti laddhanāmaṃ ticīvaraṃ,
tika-vin04t:2403_2: udakasāṭikā, saṃkaccikāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ parivattananti attho. Atikkāmeyya
tika-vin04t:2403_3: pācittiyanti chaṭṭhe aruṇuggamane ekasmiṃ cīvare vuttanayena aparivattite ekā āpatti, pañcasu pañca.
tika-vin04t:2404_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ
tika-vin04t:2404_1: pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, pañcāhānatikkante dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2404_2: pana anatikkantasaññāya, pañcamaṃ divasaṃ pañca cīvarāni nivāsentiyā vā pārupantiyā
tika-vin04t:2404_3: vā otāpentiyā vā, gilānāya, “idaṃ me cīvaraṃ mahagghaṃ īdise corabhaye na sakkā dhāretu”nti
tika-vin04t:2404_4: evarūpāsu āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataratā, pañcāhātikkamo,
tika-vin04t:2404_5: anuññātakāraṇābhāvo, aparivattananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:2407_0: Pañcame cīvarasaṅkamanīyanti saṅkametabbaṃ cīvaraṃ, aññissā santakaṃ anāpucchā gahitaṃ
tika-vin04t:2407_1: puna paṭidātabbaṃ pañcannaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaranti attho. Dhāreyyāti sace taṃ nivāseti
tika-vin04t:2408_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ ādāya anāpucchā pārupanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2408_1: paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, anupasampannāya tikadukkaṭaṃ. Yā pana tāya vā dinnaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2408_2: taṃ vā āpucchā, acchinnanaṭṭhacīvarikā vā hutvā, “idaṃ me cīvaraṃ mahagghaṃ īdise
tika-vin04t:2408_3: corabhaye na sakkā dhāretu”nti evarūpāsu āpadāsu vā dhāreti, tassā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2408_4: anāpatti. Cīvarasaṅkamanīyatā, upasampannāya santakatā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvo, dhāraṇanti
tika-vin04t:2408_5: imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriyanti.
tika-vin04t:2411_0: Chaṭṭhe gaṇassāti bhikkhunisaṅghassa. Cīvaralābhanti vikappanupagampi pacchimaṃ labhitabbaṃ
tika-vin04t:2411_1: cīvaraṃ. Antarāyaṃ kareyyāti yathā te dātukāmā na denti, evaṃ parakkameyya. Pācittiyanti
tika-vin04t:2411_2: sace tassā vacanena te na denti, bhikkhuniyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2412_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha gaṇassa cīvaralābhantarāyakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2412_1: aññasmiṃ parikkhāre dukkaṭaṃ, sambahulānaṃ pana ekabhikkhuniyā vā cīvaralābhepi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:2412_2: “Samagghakāle dassathā”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā nivārentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2412_3: Vikappanupagapacchimatā, saṅghassa pariṇatabhāvo, vinā ānisaṃsadassanena antarāyakaraṇanti
tika-vin04t:2415: Sattame dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅganti samaggena saṅghena sannipatitvā karīyamānaṃ cīvaravibhaṅga. Paṭibāheyyāti paṭisedheyya, evaṃ paṭisedhentiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2416_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ paṭibāhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2416_1: dhammike vematikāya, adhammike dhammikasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ. Ubhayattha
tika-vin04t:2416_2: adhammikasaññāya, ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā paṭibāhantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Cīvaravibhaṅgassa
tika-vin04t:2416_3: dhammikatā, dhammikasaññitā, vinā ānisaṃsena paṭibāhananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2419_0: Aṭṭhame samaṇacīvaranti kappakataṃ nivāsanapārupanupagaṃ, evarūpaṃ ṭhapetvā pañca
tika-vin04t:2419_1: sahadhammike mātāpitaro ca yassa kassaci gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā pariccajitvā dentiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2420_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha agārikassa samaṇacīvaradānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2420_1: bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ. Mātāpitūnaṃ pariccajitvāpi, aññesaṃ tāvakālikameva dentiyā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2420_2: anāpatti. Samaṇacīvaratā, ṭhapetvā sahadhammike ca mātāpitaro ca aññesaṃ dānaṃ, atāvakālikatāti
tika-vin04t:2423_0: Navame dubbalacīvarapaccāsāyāti dubbalāya cīvarapaccāsāya, “sace sakkoma dassāmā”ti
tika-vin04t:2423_1: ettakamattaṃ sutvā uppāditāya āsāyāti attho. Cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeyyāti vassaṃvuṭṭhabhikkhunīhi
tika-vin04t:2423_2: kālacīvare bhājiyamāne “āgameyyātha, ayye, atthi saṅghassa cīvarapaccāsā”ti vatvā
tika-vin04t:2423_3: taṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ cīvarakālaṃ atikkāmeyya, tassā anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimamāsaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2424_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2424_1: paññattaṃ, dubbalacīvare vematikāya, adubbalacīvare dubbalacīvarasaññāya ceva vematikāya
tika-vin04t:2424_2: ca dukkaṭaṃ. Ubhayattha adubbalacīvarasaññāya, kiñcāpi ‘na sakkomā’ti vadanti, “idāni
tika-vin04t:2424_3: pana tesaṃ kappāso vā uppajjissati, saddho vā puriso āgamissati, tasmiṃ āgate addhā
tika-vin04t:2424_4: dassantī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā nivārentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Dubbalacīvaratā,
tika-vin04t:2424_5: dubbalasaññitā, vinā ānisaṃsena nivāraṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2427_0: Dasame dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāranti sabbāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmena upāsakena
tika-vin04t:2427_1: yattako atthāramūliko ānisaṃso, tato adhikaṃ vā samakaṃ vā datvā yācitena samaggena
tika-vin04t:2427_2: bhikkhunisaṅghena yaṃ kathinaṃ ñattidutiyakammena antarā uddharīyati, tassa so uddhāro
tika-vin04t:2427_3: ‘dhammiko’ti vuccati, evarūpaṃ kathinuddhāranti attho. Paṭibāheyyāti nivāreyya, tassa
tika-vin04t:2428: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesaṃ sattame vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2433: Tuvaṭṭavaggassa paṭhame tuvaṭṭeyyunti nipajjeyyuṃ. Tāsu pana ekāya vā nipannāya aparā nipajjatu, dvepi vā saheva nipajjantu, dvinnampi pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2434_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha dvinnaṃ ekamañce tuvaṭṭanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2434_1: sace pana ekāya nipannāya ekā nisīdati, ubho vā nisīdanti, tāsaṃ, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2434_2: anāpatti. Ekamañcatā, dvinnaṃ tuvaṭṭananti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:2437_0: Dutiye ekaṃ attharaṇañceva pāvuraṇañca etāsanti ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā, saṃhārimānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2437_1: pāvārattharaṇakaṭasārakādīnaṃ ekaṃ antaṃ attharitvā ekaṃ pārupitvā tuvaṭṭentīnametaṃ
tika-vin04t:2437_2: adhivacanaṃ. Pācittiyanti taṃyeva attharitvā taṃ pārupitvā nipajjantīnaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2438_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha evaṃ tuvaṭṭanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2438_1: attharaṇe vā pāvuraṇe vā ekasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ, nānattharaṇapāvuraṇe dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2438_2: pana nānattharaṇapāvuraṇasaññāya, vavatthānaṃ dassetvā nipajjantiyā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2441_0: Tatiye aphāsunti “iminā imissā aphāsu bhavissatī”ti anāpucchā purato caṅkamanaṭṭhānanissajjādayo
tika-vin04t:2441_1: vā uddisauddisāpanaparipucchanasajjhāyaṃ vā karontiyā caṅkamane nivattanagaṇanāya,
tika-vin04t:2442_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha sañcicca aphāsukaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2442_1: anupasampannāya tikadukkaṭaṃ, na aphāsukāmatāya, āpucchā purato caṅkamanādīni karontiyā,
tika-vin04t:2442_2: ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Upasampannatā, aphāsukāmatā, aphāsukaraṇaṃ, anāpucchananti
tika-vin04t:2442_3: imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriyaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:2445: Catutthe dukkhitanti gilānaṃ. Sahajīvininti saddhivihāriniṃ. Neva upaṭṭhaheyyāti tassā upaṭṭhānaṃ sayaṃ vā akarontiyā, parehi vā akārentiyā dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2446_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ anupaṭṭhānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2446_1: antevāsiniyā vā anupasampannāya vā dukkaṭaṃ, dasasu aññatarantarāye sati pariyesitvā
tika-vin04t:2446_2: alabhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Gilānatā, saddhivihāritā,
tika-vin04t:2446_3: anuññātakāraṇābhāvo, upaṭṭhāne dhuranikkhepoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2449_0: Pañcame upassayaṃ datvāti sakavāṭabaddhaṃ attano puggalikavihāraṃ datvā. Nikkaḍḍheyyāti
tika-vin04t:2449_1: bahūnipi dvārāni ekappayogena nikkaḍḍhentiyā ekā āpatti, nānāpayogehi payogagaṇanāya
tika-vin04t:2449_2: āpattiyo, āṇattiyampi eseva nayo. Sace pana “imañcimañca dvāraṃ atikkāmehī”ti āṇāpeti,
tika-vin04t:2450_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha etādise vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, akavāṭabaddhato
tika-vin04t:2450_1: dukkaṭaṃ, anupasampannāya tikadukkaṭaṃ, sakavāṭabaddhato vā akavāṭabaddhato vā ubhinnampi
tika-vin04t:2453: Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānapadatthameva. Sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha saṃsaṭṭhavihāravatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesamettha paṭhamaariṭṭhasikkhāpade vuttavinicchayasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2456: Sattame antoraṭṭheti yassa vijite viharati, tassa raṭṭhe. Asatthikā cārikanti vinā satthena gacchantiyā, gāmantaragaṇanāya, agāmake araññe addhayojanagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2457_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vuttanayeneva desacārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2457_1: paññattaṃ. Satthena saha gacchantiyā, kheme appaṭibhaye, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2457_2: anāpatti. Antoraṭṭhatā, akhematā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvo, cārikaṃ pakkamananti imānettha
tika-vin04t:2460: Aṭṭhame tiroraṭṭheti yassa vijite viharati, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa raṭṭhe. Sesaṃ sattame vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, nagaraṃ panettha rājagahanti.
tika-vin04t:2463_0: Navame antovassanti purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ, pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā tassa vassassa
tika-vin04t:2463_1: antoyeva. Idha sattāhakaraṇīyena vā kenaci ubbaḷhāya vā āpadāsu vā gacchantiyā ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2466_0: Dasame vassaṃvuṭṭhāti purimaṃ vā temāsaṃ, pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ vuṭṭhā. Chappañcayojanānīti
tika-vin04t:2466_1: ettha pavāretvā pañca yojanāni gantumpi vaṭṭati, chasu vattabbameva natthi. Sace
tika-vin04t:2466_2: pana tīṇi gantvā teneva maggena paccāgacchati, na vaṭṭati, aññena āgantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2466_3: “Vuttappamāṇaṃ addhānaṃ na gacchissāmī”ti dhure nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2467_0: Rājagahe sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vassaṃ vasitvā cārikaṃ apakkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2467_1: paññattaṃ. Antarāye sati, pariyesitvā dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ alabhantiyā, gilānāya,
tika-vin04t:2467_2: āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Vassaṃvuṭṭhatā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvo, pañcayojanānatikkamoti
tika-vin04t:2467_3: imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisāni, idaṃ pana akiriyaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:2472_0: Cittāgāravaggassa paṭhame rājāgāranti rañño kīḷanagharaṃ. Cittāgāranti kīḷanacittasālaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2472_1: Ārāmanti kīḷanaupavanaṃ. Uyyānanti kīḷanuyyānaṃ. Pokkharaṇinti kīḷanapokkharaṇiṃ.
tika-vin04t:2472_2: Dassanāyāti “etesu yaṃkiñci passissāmī”ti gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ, yattha
tika-vin04t:2472_3: ṭhatvā passati, tattha padaṃ anuddharitvā pañcāpi passantiyā ekāva āpatti. Sace pana
tika-vin04t:2472_4: taṃ taṃ viloketvā passati, gīvaṃ parivattanappayogagaṇanāya āpattiyo, na ummīlanagaṇanāya.
tika-vin04t:2473_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2473_1: paññattaṃ, bhikkhussa sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ, avaseso vinicchayo naccadassanasikkhāpade
tika-vin04t:2476: Dutiye āsandī nāma atikkantappamāṇā vuccati. Pallaṅko nāma saṃhārimena vāḷena katoti vutto. Paribhuñjeyyāti ettha pana nisīdananipajjanappayogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2477_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha āsandipallaṅkaparibhogavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2477_1: āsandiyā pāde chinditvā, pallaṅkassa vāḷe bhinditvā paribhuñjantiyā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2477_2: anāpatti. Āsandipallaṅkatā, nisīdanaṃ nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2480: Tatiye suttanti channaṃ aññataraṃ. Kanteyyāti ettha yattakaṃ hatthena añchitaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ takkamhi veṭhite ekā āpatti. Idañhi sandhāya padabhājanīye “ujjavujjave”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2481_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha suttaṃ kantanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, kantanato
tika-vin04t:2481_1: pubbe kappāsavicinanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbappayogesu hatthavāragaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Kantitasuttaṃ
tika-vin04t:2481_2: kantantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Akantitatā, kantananti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2484_0: Catutthe gihiveyyāvaccanti gihīnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ. Sacepi hi mātāpitaro attano kiñci
tika-vin04t:2484_1: kammaṃ akārāpetvā tesaṃ yāgupacanādīni karonti, pubbappayogesu payogagaṇanāya dukkaṭāni
tika-vin04t:2484_2: āpajjitvā yāguādīsu bhājanagaṇanāya, khādanīyādīsu pūvagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:2485_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha gihīnaṃ veyyāvaccakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2485_1: manussehi saṅghassa yāgupāne vā bhatte vā cetiyapūjāya vā karīyamānāya tesaṃ sahāyabhāvena
tika-vin04t:2485_2: yāgupacanādīni, attano veyyāvaccakarassa ca tāniyeva karontiyā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2485_3: anāpatti. Gihiveyyāvaccakaraṇaṃ, anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2488: Pañcame adhikaraṇanti catunnaṃ aññataraṃ. Pācittiyanti idha cīvarasibbane viya dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ, ekāhampi parihāro natthi.
tika-vin04t:2489: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha adhikaraṇaṃ navūpasamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesamettha cīvarasibbanasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2492: Chaṭṭhe sahatthāti kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā ṭhapetvā pañcasahadhammike avasesānaṃ aññatra udakadantaponā yaṃkiñci ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ dadantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
