tika-vin04t:2493_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha agārikassa khādanīyabhojanīyadānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2493_1: udakadantapone dukkaṭaṃ. Yā pana dāpeti na deti, upanikkhipitvā deti, bāhiralepaṃ
tika-vin04t:2493_2: deti, tassā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Aññatra udakadantaponā ajjhoharaṇiyaṃ, ṭhapetvā
tika-vin04t:2493_3: pañca sahadhammike aññassa sahatthā dānanti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2496_0: Sattame āvasathacīvaranti “utuniyo bhikkhuniyo paribhuñjantū”ti dinnacīvaraṃ. Anissajjitvāti
tika-vin04t:2496_1: catutthe divase dhovitvā aññissā antamaso sāmaṇeriyāpi utuniyā adatvā. Pācittiyanti
tika-vin04t:2497_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2497_1: paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, nissajjite dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana nissajjitasaññāya,
tika-vin04t:2497_2: puna pariyāyena vā, aññāsaṃ utunīnaṃ abhāvena vā, acchinnanaṭṭhacīvarikāya vā, āpadāsu
tika-vin04t:2497_3: vā paribhuñjantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Āvasathacīvaratā, catutthadivasatā,
tika-vin04t:2497_4: dhovitvā anissajjanaṃ, anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2500_0: Aṭṭhame āvasathanti kavāṭabaddhavihāraṃ. Anissajjitvāti rakkhaṇatthāya adatvā, “idaṃ
tika-vin04t:2500_1: jaggeyyāsī”ti evaṃ anāpucchitvāti attho. Cārikaṃ pakkameyya pācittiyanti ettha sakagāmato
tika-vin04t:2500_2: aññaṃ gāmaṃ ekarattivāsatthāyapi pakkamantiyā parikkhittassa āvasathassa parikkhepaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2500_3: aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ paṭhamapādena atikkantamatte dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyena pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2501_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2501_1: paññattaṃ, tikapācittiyaṃ, akavāṭabaddhe dukkaṭaṃ, nissajjite dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2501_2: pana nissajjitasaññāya, sati antarāye, paṭijaggikaṃ pariyesitvā alabhantiyā, gilānāya,
tika-vin04t:2501_3: āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sakavāṭabaddhatā, vuttanayena pakkamanaṃ, anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti
tika-vin04t:2501_4: imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisānīti, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriyanti.
tika-vin04t:2504_1: parūpaghātakaraṃ vijjaṃ. Pariyāpuṇeyyāti ettha yassa kassaci santike taṃ padādivasena
tika-vin04t:2504_2: pariyāpuṇantiyā padagaṇanāya ceva akkharagaṇanāya ca pācittiyanti.
tika-vin04t:2507_0: Dasame vāceyyāti padaṃ viseso. Ubhayampi sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā ceva sambahulā bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin04t:2507_1: ca ārabbha tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇanavācanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Lekhe, dhāraṇāya
tika-vin04t:2507_2: ca, guttatthāya ca yakkhaparittanāgamaṇḍalādike sabbaparitte, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2507_3: Tiracchānavijjatā, pariyāpuṇanavācanā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti imānettha dvīsupi tīṇi
tika-vin04t:2512_0: Ārāmavaggassa paṭhame sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmanti yattha bhikkhū rukkhamūlepi vasanti,
tika-vin04t:2512_1: taṃ padesaṃ. Anāpucchāti ettha bhikkhusāmaṇeraārāmikesu yaṃkiñci anāpucchā, parikkhittassa
tika-vin04t:2512_2: ārāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantiyā, aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ okkamantiyā paṭhamapāde
tika-vin04t:2513_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2513_1: “santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā”ti ca “jānaṃ sabhikkhuka”nti ca imānettha dve anupaññattiyo,
tika-vin04t:2513_2: sabhikkhuke vematikāya, abhikkhuke sabhikkhukasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2513_3: Tasmiṃ pana duvidhepi abhikkhukasaññāya, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpucchā pavisantiyā, paṭhamappaviṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2513_4: vā bhikkhunīnaṃ sīsaṃnulokikāya, yattha vā bhikkhuniyo sannipatitā, tattha “tāsaṃ
tika-vin04t:2513_5: santikaṃ gacchāmī”ti saññāya, ārāmena vā maggo hoti, tena gacchantiyā, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2513_7: imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samanubhāsanasamauṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyākiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2513_8: sacittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
tika-vin04t:2516: Dutiye akkoseyyāti dasannaṃ akkosavatthūnaṃ aññatarena sammukhā vā parammukhā vā akkoseyya. Paribhāseyyāti bhayamassa upadaṃseyya. Pācittiyanti tassā evaṃ karontiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2517_0: Vesāliyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ akkosanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2517_2: anāpatti. Upasampannatā, akkosanaparibhāsanaṃ, atthapurekkhāratādīnaṃ abhāvoti imānettha
tika-vin04t:2517_3: tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:2520_0: Tatiye caṇḍikatāti kuddhā. Gaṇanti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ. Paribhāseyyāti ettha “bālā etā
tika-vin04t:2520_1: abyattā etā, netā jānanti kammaṃ vā kammadosaṃ vā kammasampattiṃ vā kammavipattiṃ
tika-vin04t:2520_2: vā”ti evaṃ yattha katthaci paribhāsantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2521: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha gaṇaṃ paribhāsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sambahulā vā ekaṃ vā anupasampannaṃ vā paribhāsantiyā dukkaṭaṃ. Sesaṃ dutiyasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2524_0: Catutthe gaṇabhojane vuttanayena nimantitā, pavāraṇāsikkhāpade vuttanayena pavāritā
tika-vin04t:2524_1: veditabbā. Pācittiyanti tassā purebhattaṃ ṭhapetvā yāguñceva sesāni ca tīṇi kālikāni
tika-vin04t:2524_2: aññaṃ yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya paṭiggaṇhantiyā gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, ajjhohāre
tika-vin04t:2525_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha aññatra bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, tīṇi
tika-vin04t:2525_1: kālikāni āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhantiyāpi ajjhoharantiyāpi dukkaṭaṃ. Yā pana nimantitā
tika-vin04t:2525_2: appavāritā yāguṃ pivati, sāmike apaloketvā bhuñjati, tīṇi kālikāni sati paccaye paribhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:2525_3: tassā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Nimantitā vā pavāritā vā taṃ ubhayaṃ vā, purebhattaṃ
tika-vin04t:2525_4: vuttalakkhaṇassa āmisassa ajjhohāro, sāmikānaṃ anāpucchananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2525_5: Addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ, nimantitāya anāpucchā bhuñjantiyā āpattisambhavato siyā kiriyākiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2525_6: pavāritāya kappiyaṃ kāretvāpi akāretvāpi paribhuñjantiyā āpattisambhavato siyā kiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2525_7: nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
tika-vin04t:2528_0: Pañcame kule maccharo kulamaccharo, kulamaccharo etissā atthi, kulaṃ vā maccharāyatīti
tika-vin04t:2528_1: kulamaccharinī. Assāti yā īdisī bhaveyya. Pācittiyanti tassā “yaṃ kulaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:2528_2: paccaye dātukāmaṃ, kathaṃ nāma tattha bhikkhuniyo na gaccheyyu”nti bhikkhunīnaṃ vā
tika-vin04t:2528_3: santike kulassa, “kathaṃ nāma ime tāsaṃ kiñci na dajjeyyu”nti kulassa vā santike
tika-vin04t:2529_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kulamaccharāyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Amaccharāyitvā
tika-vin04t:2529_1: santaṃyeva ādīnavaṃ ācikkhantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Bhikkhunīnaṃ alābhakāmatā,
tika-vin04t:2529_2: kulassa vā santike bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vā santike kulassa avaṇṇabhaṇananti
tika-vin04t:2529_3: imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:2532_0: Chaṭṭhe sace bhikkhunupassayato addhayojanabbhantare ovādadāyakā bhikkhū na vasanti,
tika-vin04t:2532_1: maggo vā akhemo hoti na sakkā anantarāyena gantuṃ, ayaṃ abhikkhuko nāma āvāso. Tattha
tika-vin04t:2532_3: aruṇuggamanā pācittiyaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto.
tika-vin04t:2533_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2533_1: paññattaṃ, yattha pana vassūpagatā bhikkhū pakkantā vā honti vibbhantā vā kālaṅkatā
tika-vin04t:2533_2: vā pakkhasaṅkantā vā tattha vasantiyā, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Abhikkhukāvāsatā,
tika-vin04t:2533_3: vassūpagamanaṃ, aruṇuggamananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:2536_0: Sattame vassaṃvuṭṭhāti purimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ vuṭṭhā. Ubhatosaṅgheti bhikkhunisaṅghe
tika-vin04t:2536_1: ceva bhikkhusaṅghe ca. Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayakathā – bhikkhunīhi cātuddaseyeva
tika-vin04t:2536_2: sannipatitvā “suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho, ajja pavāraṇā cātuddasī, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2536_3: saṅgho pavāreyyā”ti evaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikañattiṃ vā, “tevācikaṃ pavāreyyā”ti evaṃ tevācikañattiṃ
tika-vin04t:2536_4: vā, sati antarāye “dvevācikaṃ, ekavācikaṃ, samānavassikaṃ pavāreyyā”ti evaṃ dvevācikādiñattiṃ
tika-vin04t:2536_5: vā ṭhapetvā sabbasaṅgāhikañatti ce ṭhapitā, “saṅghaṃ, ayye, pavāremi diṭṭhena vā
tika-vin04t:2536_6: sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadantu maṃ ayyāyo anukampaṃ upādāya, passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:2536_7: evaṃ sakiṃ vā, “dutiyampi, ayye, saṅghaṃ…pe… tatiyampi, ayye, saṅghaṃ…pe… paṭikarissāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:2536_8: evaṃ dvattikkhattuṃ vā vatvā paṭipāṭiyā pavāretabbaṃ. Tevācikāya ñattiyā vacanaṃ
tika-vin04t:2536_9: na hāpetabbaṃ, dvevācikādīsu vaḍḍhetuṃ vaṭṭati, hāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Evaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghe
tika-vin04t:2536_10: pavāretvā tattheva ekā bhikkhunī bhikkhunikkhandhake vuttena ñattidutiyakammena bhikkhunisaṅghassatthāya
tika-vin04t:2536_11: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāretuṃ sammannitabbā. Tāya sammatāya bhikkhuniyā pannarase bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ
tika-vin04t:2536_12: ādāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā
tika-vin04t:2536_13: evamassa vacanīyo “bhikkhunisaṅgho ayya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāreti diṭṭhena vā sutena
tika-vin04t:2536_14: vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadatāyya bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya, passanto
tika-vin04t:2536_15: paṭikarissati, dutiyampi ayya…pe… tatiyampi ayya…pe… passanto paṭikarissatī”ti evaṃ pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2537: Sace pañcavaggo bhikkhunisaṅgho na pūrati, catūhi vā tīhi vā gaṇañattiṃ ṭhapetvā, dvīhi vinā ñattiyā aññamaññaṃ pavāretabbaṃ. Ekāya “ajja me pavāraṇā”ti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2538_0: Vihāraṃ pana gantvā “bhikkhuniyo, ayya, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavārenti diṭṭhena vā sutena
tika-vin04t:2538_1: vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadatāyya bhikkhusaṅgho bhikkhuniyo anukampaṃ upādāya, passantiyo
tika-vin04t:2538_2: paṭikarissantī”ti ca, “ahaṃ, ayya, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāremi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā
tika-vin04t:2538_3: parisaṅkāya vā, vadatu maṃ, ayya, bhikkhusaṅgho anukampaṃ upādāya, passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:2539_0: Sace bhikkhusaṅgho na pūrati, “bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayya, ayye pavāreti diṭṭhena vā sutena
tika-vin04t:2539_1: vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadantu ayyā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya, passanto paṭikarissatī”ti
tika-vin04t:2539_2: ca, “bhikkhunisaṅgho, ayya, ayyaṃ pavāreti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2539_3: vadatāyyo bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya, passanto paṭikarissatī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2540_0: Ubhinnaṃ aparipūriyā “bhikkhuniyo, ayyā, ayye pavārenti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya
tika-vin04t:2540_1: vā, vadantāyyā bhikkhuniyo anukampaṃ upādāya, passantiyo paṭikarissantī”ti ca, “bhikkhuniyo,
tika-vin04t:2540_2: ayya, ayyaṃ pavārenti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, vadatāyyo bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin04t:2540_3: anukampaṃ upādāya, passantiyo paṭikarissantī”ti ca, “ahaṃ, ayyā, ayye pavāremi diṭṭhena
tika-vin04t:2540_4: vā sutena vā…pe… vadantu maṃ, ayyā, anukampaṃ upādāya, passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:2540_5: ca, “ahaṃ, ayya, ayyaṃ pavāremi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā…pe… vadatu maṃ, ayyo, anukampaṃ
tika-vin04t:2540_6: upādāya, passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ. Sabbāheva hi iminā
tika-vin04t:2540_7: nayena ubhatosaṅghe pavāritā hoti, yā pana vassaṃvuṭṭhā “ubhatosaṅghe evaṃ na pavāressāmī”ti
tika-vin04t:2540_8: dhuraṃ nikkhipati, tassā saha dhuranikkhepena pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2541_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vassaṃ vasitvā na pavāraṇāvatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2541_1: Antarāye pana sati, pariyesitvā bhikkhū alabhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2541_2: anāpatti. Vassaṃvuṭṭhatā, na ubhatosaṅghe pavāraṇā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti imānettha
tika-vin04t:2544: Aṭṭhame ovādāyāti garudhammassavanatthāya. Saṃvāsāyāti uposathapucchanatthāya ceva pavāraṇatthāya ca. Pācittiyanti “etesaṃ atthāya na gacchāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2545_0: Sakkesu chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha ovādāya agamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Antarāye
tika-vin04t:2545_1: pana sati, pariyesitvā dutiyikaṃ alabhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2545_2: anāpatti. Ovādasaṃvāsānaṃ atthāya agamanaṃ, anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2545_3: Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisāni, idaṃ pana akiriyaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:2548_0: Navame anvaddhamāsanti addhamāse addhamāse. Uposathapucchakanti uposathapucchanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2548_1: Ovādūpasaṅkamananti ovādatthāya upasaṅkamanaṃ. Taṃ atikkāmentiyāti ettha bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin04t:2548_2: terase vā cātuddase vā ārāmaṃ gantvā “ayaṃ uposatho cātuddaso pannaraso”ti pucchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2548_3: uposathadivase nidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena ovādūpasaṅkamanaṃ yācitabbaṃ. Yā bhikkhunī
tika-vin04t:2548_4: vuttappakāre kāle tadubhayaṃ na karoti, sā taṃ atikkāmeti nāma, tassā “uposathampi
tika-vin04t:2548_5: na pucchissāmi, ovādampi na yācissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2549_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha uposathaovādānaṃ apucchanaayācanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2549_1: paññattaṃ, anāpatti aṭṭhamasadisāyeva. Uposathovādānaṃ apucchanaayācanāyaṃ dhuranikkhepo,
tika-vin04t:2549_2: anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni samanubhāsanasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:2552_0: Dasame pasākheti nābhiyā heṭṭhā jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ uparipadese. Tato hi yasmā rukkhassa
tika-vin04t:2552_1: sākhā viya ubho ūrū pabhijjitvā gatā, tasmā so “pasākho”ti vuccati, tasmiṃ pasākhe.
tika-vin04t:2552_2: Gaṇḍanti yaṃkiñci gaṇḍaṃ. Rudhitanti vaṇaṃ. Bhedāpeyya vātiādīsu sace “bhinda phālehī”ti
tika-vin04t:2552_3: sabbāni āṇāpeti, so ca tatheva karoti, cha dukkaṭāni cha ca pācittiyāni. Athāpi “yaṃkiñci
tika-vin04t:2552_4: ettha kattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ karohī”ti evaṃ āṇāpeti, so ca sabbānipi bhedanādīni karoti,
tika-vin04t:2552_5: ekavācāya cha dukkaṭāni cha ca pācittiyāni. Sace pana bhedanādīsu ekaṃyeva “idaṃ
tika-vin04t:2552_6: nāma karohī”ti āṇāpeti, so ca sabbāni karoti. Yaṃ āṇattaṃ, tasseva karaṇe pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2553_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ purisena bhedāpanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2553_1: paññattaṃ, apaloketvā vā viññuṃ vā yaṃkañci dutiyikaṃ gahetvā evaṃ karontiyā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2553_2: anāpatti. Pasākhe jātatā, anapalokanaṃ, dutiyikābhāvo, purisena bhedādīnaṃ kārāpananti
tika-vin04t:2553_3: imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriyanti.
tika-vin04t:2558: Gabbhinivaggassa paṭhame “gabbhinī”ti jānitvā upajjhāyāya vuṭṭhāpentiyā gaṇapariyesanādīsu ca ñattikammavācādvaye ca dukkaṭaṃ, kammavācāpariyosāne pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2559_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2559_1: gabbhiniyā vematikāya agabbhiniyā gabbhinisaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ. Ubhosu
tika-vin04t:2559_2: agabbhinisaññāya, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Gabbhinitā, ‘gabbhinī’ti jānanaṃ, vuṭṭhāpananti
tika-vin04t:2559_3: imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana paṇṇattivajjaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2562: Dutiye pāyantinti thaññaṃ pāyamānaṃ, yaṃ pāyeti, tassa mātā vā, dhāti vā. Idaṃ vatthumattamevettha viseso, sesaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpadasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2565_0: Tatiye dve vassānīti pavāraṇāvasena dve saṃvaccharāni. Chasu dhammesūti pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīsu
tika-vin04t:2565_2: vuttanayeneva adinnasikkhaṃ vā kupitasikkhaṃ vā. Sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyyāti tesu chasu
tika-vin04t:2565_3: dhammesu sikkhanato, te vā sikkhāsaṅkhāte dhamme mānanato evaṃladdhanāmaṃ anupasampannaṃ
tika-vin04t:2565_4: upasampādeyya. Pācittiyanti paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva kammavācāpariyosāne pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2566_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha evarūpaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2566_1: paññattaṃ, dhammakamme tikapācittiyaṃ, adhammakamme tikadukkaṭaṃ. Dve vassāni chasu
tika-vin04t:2566_2: dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Vuttanayena
tika-vin04t:2566_3: asikkhitasikkhatā, dhammakammatā, kammavācāpariyosānanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin04t:2569_0: Catutthe saṅghena asammatanti yassā saṅghena antamaso upasampadāmāḷakepi padabhājane
tika-vin04t:2569_1: vuttā upasampadāsammuti na dinnā hoti, taṃ imā dvepi mahāsikkhamānā nāma. Idha saṅghena
tika-vin04t:2569_2: sammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sesaṃ tatiye vuttasadisameva,
tika-vin04t:2572_0: Pañcame gihigatanti purisantaragataṃ, idhāpi idaṃ vatthumattameva viseso. Ūnadvādasavassañca
tika-vin04t:2572_1: paripuṇṇasaññāya vuṭṭhāpentiyā kiñcāpi anāpatti, sā pana anupasampannāva hoti. Sesaṃ
tika-vin04t:2575: Chaṭṭhe sabbaṃ tatiye vuttanayena. Sattamepi sabbaṃ catutthe vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2578_0: Aṭṭhame sahajīvininti saddhivihāriniṃ. Neva anuggaṇheyyāti sayaṃ uddesādīhi nānuggaṇheyya.
tika-vin04t:2578_1: Na anuggaṇhāpeyyāti “imissā, ayye, uddesādīni dehī”ti evaṃ na aññāya anuggaṇhāpeyya.
tika-vin04t:2579: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evarūpe vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, sesamettha tuvaṭṭavagge dukkhitasahajīvinisikkhāpade vuttasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2582_0: Navame vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattininti vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ yāya upasampāditā, taṃ upajjhāyininti
tika-vin04t:2582_1: attho. Nānubandheyyāti cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakenāti evaṃ tena tena
tika-vin04t:2582_2: karaṇīyena na upaṭṭhaheyya. Pācittiyanti nānubandhissanti dhure nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2583_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha nānubandhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Bālaṃ
tika-vin04t:2583_1: pana alajjiniṃ vā ananubandhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2583_2: Vuṭṭhāpitappavattinitā, dve vassāni ananubandhane dhuranikkhepo, anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti
tika-vin04t:2583_3: imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisāni, idaṃ pana akiriyaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:2586: Dasame neva vūpakāseyyāti na gahetvā gaccheyya. Na vūpakāsāpeyyāti “imaṃ, ayye, gahetvā gacchāhī”ti aññaṃ na āṇāpeyya. Pācittiyanti dhure nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2587_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha sahajīviniyā avūpakāsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Sati
tika-vin04t:2587_1: pana antarāye, pariyesitvā dutiyikaṃ alabhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2592_0: Kumāribhūtavaggassa paṭhamadutiyatatiyāni tīhi gihigatasikkhāpadehi sadisāneva. Yā
tika-vin04t:2592_1: pana tā sabbapaṭhamā dve mahāsikkhamānā, tā atikkantavīsativassāti veditabbā. Tā
tika-vin04t:2592_2: hi gihigatā vā hontu, agihigatā vā, sammutikammādīsu “sikkhamānā”icceva vattabbā,
tika-vin04t:2592_3: “gihigatā”ti vā “kumāribhūtā”ti vā na vattabbā. Gihigatāya dasavassakāle sikkhāsammutiṃ
tika-vin04t:2592_4: datvā dvādasavassakāle upasampadā kātabbā, ekādasavassakāle datvā terasavassakāle
tika-vin04t:2592_6: datvā vīsativassakāle upasampadā kātabbā. Aṭṭhārasavassakālato paṭṭhāya ca panāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2592_8: sāmaṇerī, sā “gihigatā”ti na vattabbā, “kumāribhūtā”icceva vattabbā. Sikkhāsammutidānavasena
tika-vin04t:2595: Catutthe ūnadvādasavassāti upasampadāvasena aparipuṇṇadvādasavassā. Pācittiyanti upajjhāyā hutvā vuṭṭhāpentiyā vuttanayeneva dukkaṭāni antarā, kammavācāpariyosāne pācittiyanti.
tika-vin04t:2598: Pañcame saṅghena asammatāti yassā saṅghena padabhājane vuttā vuṭṭhāpanasammuti na dinnā. Sesaṃ ubhayatthāpi mahāsikkhamānāsikkhāpadadvayasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2601_0: Chaṭṭhe alaṃ tāva te ayye vuṭṭhāpitenāti vuccamānāti vuṭṭhāpanasammutiyā yācitāya
tika-vin04t:2601_1: saṅghena upaparikkhipitvā “yasmā bālā abyattā ca alajjinī ca hoti, tasmā alaṃ tāva
tika-vin04t:2601_2: tuyhaṃ upasampāditenā”ti evaṃ nivārīyamānā. Pacchā khīyanadhammanti pacchā aññāsaṃ
tika-vin04t:2601_3: byattānaṃ lajjinīnaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ diyyamānaṃ disvā “ahameva nūna bālā”tiādīni
tika-vin04t:2601_4: bhaṇamānā yattha katthaci khīyeyya. Pācittiyanti evaṃ khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2602_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha evaṃ khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2602_1: pakatiyā chandādīnaṃ vasena karontīnaṃ khīyantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Vuṭṭhāpanasammutiyā
tika-vin04t:2602_2: yācanaṃ, upaparikkhitvā na chandādivasena paṭikkhittāya “sādhū”ti paṭissavo, pacchākhīyananti
tika-vin04t:2602_3: imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedananti.
tika-vin04t:2605_0: Sattame sā pacchāti sikkhamānāya upasampadāya yāciyamānāya sā bhikkhunī evaṃ vatvā
tika-vin04t:2605_1: laddhe cīvare pacchā asati antarāye “neva vuṭṭhāpessāmi, na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ
tika-vin04t:2605_2: karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipeyya, tassā saha dhuranikkhepena pācittiyanti. Aṭṭhamepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2606_0: Ubhayampi sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha etesu vatthūsu paññattaṃ, dvīsupi sati
tika-vin04t:2606_1: antarāye, pariyesitvā alabhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2606_2: Ubhayattha “evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti paṭiññā, ākaṅkhitanipphatti, pacchā dhuranikkhepo,
tika-vin04t:2606_3: anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni samanubhāsanasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:2609_0: Navame sokāvāsanti saṅketaṃ katvā āgacchamānā purisānaṃ antosokaṃ pavesetīti sokāvāsā,
tika-vin04t:2609_1: taṃ sokāvāsaṃ. Atha vā gharaṃ viya gharasāmikā ayampi purisasamāgamaṃ alabhamānā
tika-vin04t:2609_2: sokaṃ āvisati, iti yaṃ āvisati, svāssā āvāso hotīti sokāvāsā. Tenevassa padabhājane
tika-vin04t:2609_3: “sokāvāsā nāma paresaṃ dukkhaṃ uppādeti, sokaṃ āvisatī”ti dvidhā attho vutto. Pācittiyanti
tika-vin04t:2609_4: evarūpaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā vuttanayeneva kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2610_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evarūpaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2610_1: Ajānantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sokāvāsatā, jānanaṃ, vuṭṭhāpananti imānettha
tika-vin04t:2613_0: Dasame mātāpitūhīti vijātamātarā ca janakapitarā ca. Sāmikenāti yena pariggahitā,
tika-vin04t:2613_1: tena. Ananuññātanti upasampadatthāya ananuññātaṃ. Dvikkhattuñhi bhikkhunīhi āpucchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2613_2: pabbajjākāle ca upasampadākāle ca, bhikkhūnaṃ pana sakiṃ āpucchitepi vaṭṭati. Tasmā
tika-vin04t:2613_3: yā upasampadākāle anāpucchā upasampādeti, tassā vuttanayeneva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2614_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha ananuññātavuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Apaloketvā
tika-vin04t:2614_1: vuṭṭhāpentiyā, tesaṃ atthibhāvaṃ ajānantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Anapalokanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2614_2: atthibhāvajānanaṃ, vuṭṭhāpananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Ananuññātasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyākiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2614_3: nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ, tivedananti.
tika-vin04t:2617: Ekādasame pārivāsikachandadānenāti pārivāsiyena chandadānena. Tattha catubbidhaṃ pārivāsiyaṃ parisapārivāsiyaṃ rattipārivāsiyaṃ chandapārivāsiyaṃ ajjhāsayapārivāsiyanti.
tika-vin04t:2618_0: Tattha parisapārivāsiyaṃ nāma bhikkhū kenacideva karaṇīyena sannipatitā honti, atha
tika-vin04t:2618_1: megho vā uṭṭhahati, ussāraṇā vā karīyati, manussā vā ajjhottharantā āgacchanti, bhikkhū
tika-vin04t:2618_2: “anokāsā mayaṃ, aññatra gacchāmā”ti chandaṃ avissajjitvāva uṭṭhahanti, idaṃ parisapārivāsiyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2618_3: nāma, kiñcāpi parisapārivāsiyaṃ, chandassa pana avissaṭṭhattā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2619_0: Puna bhikkhū “uposathādīni karissāmā”ti rattiṃ sannipatitvā “yāva sabbe sannipatanti,
tika-vin04t:2619_1: tāva dhammaṃ suṇissāmā”ti ekaṃ ajjhesanti, tasmiṃ dhammakathaṃ kathenteyeva aruṇo
tika-vin04t:2619_2: uggacchati. Sace “cātuddasikaṃ uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti nisinnā, “pannaraso”ti kātuṃ
tika-vin04t:2619_3: vaṭṭati. Sace pannarasikaṃ kātuṃ nisinnā, pāṭipade anuposathe uposathaṃ kātuṃ na
tika-vin04t:2619_4: vaṭṭati. Aññaṃ pana saṅghakiccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ rattipārivāsiyaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:2620_0: Puna bhikkhū “kiñcideva abbhānādisaṅghakammaṃ karissāmā”ti sannisinnā honti, tatreko
tika-vin04t:2620_1: nakkhattapāṭhako bhikkhu evaṃ vadati “ajja nakkhattaṃ dāruṇaṃ, mā idaṃ kammaṃ karothā”ti.
tika-vin04t:2620_2: Te tassa vacanena chandaṃ vissajjetvā tattheva nisinnā honti, athañño āgantvā “nakkhattaṃ
tika-vin04t:2620_3: patimānentaṃ, attho bālaṃ upajjhagā, kiṃ nakkhattena karothā”ti vadati, idaṃ chandapārivāsiyañceva
tika-vin04t:2620_4: ajjhāsayapārivāsiyañca. Etasmiṃ pārivāsiye puna chandapārisuddhiṃ anāharitvā kammaṃ
tika-vin04t:2620_5: kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “pārivāsikachandadānenā”ti. Pācittiyanti evaṃ
tika-vin04t:2621_0: Rājagahe thullanandaṃ ārabbha evaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Chandaṃ avissajjetvāva
tika-vin04t:2621_1: avuṭṭhitāya parisāya vuṭṭhāpentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Pārivāsikachandadānatā,
tika-vin04t:2621_2: vuṭṭhāpananti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni gambhinisikkhāpadasadisānevāti.
tika-vin04t:2624: Dvādasame anuvassanti anusaṃvaccharaṃ. Evaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyāpi vuttanayeneva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2625_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2625_1: Ekantarikaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Anuvassatā, vuṭṭhāpananti imānettha
tika-vin04t:2628: Terasame ekantarikaṃ ekaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sesaṃ dvādasamena sadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2633_0: Chattavaggassa paṭhame chattupāhananti padabhājane vuttalakkhaṇaṃ chattañca upāhanāyo
tika-vin04t:2633_1: ca. Dhāreyyāti paribhogavasena maggagamane ekappayogeneva divasampi dhārentiyā ekā
tika-vin04t:2633_2: āpatti. Sace pana tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā chattampi apanāmetvā upāhanāpi omuñcitvā punappunaṃ
tika-vin04t:2634_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha chattupāhanadhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2634_1: “agilānā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, chattasseva upāhanānaṃyeva vā dhāraṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2634_2: agilānāya tikapācittiyaṃ, gilānāya dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Gilānasaññāya pana, ārāme ārāmūpacāre
tika-vin04t:2634_3: dhārentiyā, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Ubhinnaṃ dhāraṇaṃ, anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti
tika-vin04t:2637: Dutiye yānenāti vayhādinā. Etthāpi orohitvā punappunaṃ abhiruhantiyā payogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ. Anāpattiyaṃ “ārāme ārāmūpacāre”ti natthi, sesaṃ paṭhame vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2640: Tatiye saṅghāṇinti yaṃkiñci kaṭūpagaṃ. Dhāreyyāti kaṭiyaṃ paṭimuñceyya. Etthāpi omuñcitvā omuñcitvā dhārentiyā payogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2641_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha saṅghāṇiṃ dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Ābādhapaccayā
tika-vin04t:2641_1: kaṭisuttaṃ dhārentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2644: Catutthe itthālaṅkāranti sīsūpagādīsu aññataraṃ yaṃkiñci piḷandhanaṃ. Idha tassa tassa vasena vatthugaṇanāya āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:2645: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, ābādhapaccayā kiñcideva dhārentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sesaṃ vuttasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2648_0: Pañcame gandhavaṇṇakenāti yenakenaci gandhena ca vaṇṇakena ca. Idha gandhādiyojanato
tika-vin04t:2648_1: paṭṭhāya pubbapayoge dukkaṭaṃ, nahānapariyosāne pācittiyaṃ. Ābādhapaccayā, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2651: Chaṭṭhe vāsitakenāti gandhavāsitakena. Piññākenāti tilapiṭṭhena. Sesaṃ pañcamasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2654_0: Sattame ummaddāpeyyāti ubbaṭṭāpeyya. Parimaddāpeyyāti sambāhāpeyya. Ettha ca hatthaṃ
tika-vin04t:2654_1: amuñcitvā ubbaṭṭane ekāva āpatti, mocetvā mocetvā ubbaṭṭane payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo.
tika-vin04t:2655_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpanaparimaddāpanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2655_1: paññattaṃ, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Idha maggagamanaparissamopi
tika-vin04t:2655_2: gelaññaṃ, corabhayādīhi sarīrakampanādayopi āpadā. Sesaṃ catutthe vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2658: Aṭṭhamanavamadasamesupi sikkhamānāya sāmaṇeriyā gihiniyāti ettakameva nānaṃ. Sesaṃ sattamasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2661_0: Ekādasame bhikkhussa puratoti na abhimukhamevāti attho, idaṃ pana upacāraṃ sandhāya
tika-vin04t:2661_1: kathitanti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā bhikkhussa upacāre antamaso chamāyapi “nisīdāmi, ayyā”ti
tika-vin04t:2662_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anāpucchā nisīdanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2662_1: tikapācittiyaṃ, āpucchite dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ āpucchitasaññāya, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2662_2: ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Bhikkhussa anāpucchā, upacāre nisajjā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvoti
tika-vin04t:2662_3: imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriyanti.
tika-vin04t:2665_0: Dvādasame anokāsakatanti “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne pucchāmī”ti evaṃ akataokāsaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin04t:2665_1: suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā vinayaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchantiyā pācittiyaṃ. Sesesupi
tika-vin04t:2665_2: eseva nayo, sabbaso akārite pana vattabbameva natthi.
tika-vin04t:2666_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2666_1: paññattaṃ. Tattha tattha okāsaṃ kārāpetvā pucchantiyā, anodissa okāsaṃ kārāpetvā
tika-vin04t:2666_2: yattha katthaci pucchantiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Bhikkhussa anokāsakārāpanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2666_3: pañhaṃ pucchananti imānettha dve aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni padasodhammasadisāni, idaṃ
tika-vin04t:2669_1: anuññātasaṃkaccikavirahitā. Gāmaṃ paviseyyāti ettha parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2669_2: aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ atikkamantiyā vā okkamantiyā vā paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ, dutiye pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2670_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha asaṃkaccikāya gāmaṃ pavisanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2670_1: Yassā pana saṃkaccikacīvaraṃ acchinnaṃ vā naṭṭhaṃ vā, tassā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikādīnañca
tika-vin04t:2675: Ito paresu musāvādavaggādīsu sattasu vaggesu bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabboti.
tika-vin04t:2677: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo chasaṭṭhisatā pācittiyā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā sattati, asādhāraṇā channavutīti evaṃ chasaṭṭhisatā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2681_1: cittāgārasikkhāpadaṃ saṅghāṇī itthālaṅkāro gandhavaṇṇako vāsitakapiññāko bhikkhuniādīhi
tika-vin04t:2681_2: ummaddanaparimaddanāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni lokavajjāni akusalacittāni.
tika-vin04t:2681_3: Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo, vināpi cittena āpajjitabbattā acittakāni, citte pana sati
tika-vin04t:2681_4: akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni ceva akusalacittāni cāti. Avasesāni sacittakāni
tika-vin04t:2681_5: paṇṇattivajjāneva. Corivuṭṭhāpanaṃ gāmantaraṃ ārāmasikkhāpadaṃ gabbhinivagge ādito
tika-vin04t:2681_6: paṭṭhāya satta, kumāribhūtavagge ādito paṭṭhāya pañca purisādisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ pārivāsikachandadānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2681_7: anuvassavuṭṭhāpanaṃ ekantarikavuṭṭhāpananti imāni ekūnavīsati sikkhāpadāni sacittakāni
tika-vin04t:2684_0: Pāṭidesanīyesu paṭhame sappinti pubbe vuttavinicchayaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ gosappiādimeva.
tika-vin04t:2684_1: Viññāpetvā bhuñjeyyāti ettha “viññattiyā paṭiladdhaṃ bhuñjissāmī”ti gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2685_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:2685_1: paññattaṃ, “agilānā”ti ayamettha anupaññatti, tikapāṭidesanīyaṃ, gilānāya dvikadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2685_2: Yā pana gilānā gilānasaññā, gilānakāle vā viññāpetvā pacchā agilānā hutvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:2685_3: gilānāya vā sesakaṃ, ñātakappavāritaṭṭhānato vā viññattaṃ, aññassa vā atthāya, attano
tika-vin04t:2685_4: vā dhanena gahitaṃ bhuñjati, tassā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Vuttalakkhaṇasappitā,
tika-vin04t:2685_5: anuññātakāraṇābhāvo, viññatti, ajjhohāroti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni. Samuṭṭhānādīni addhānasadisānīti.
tika-vin04t:2688: Dutiyādīsupi telādīni pubbe vuttavinicchayāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāneva, pāḷiyaṃ anāgatesu pana aṭṭhasupi dukkaṭameva. Sesaṃ sabbattha paṭhame vuttasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2694: Ito paraṃ pana sekhiyāni ceva adhikaraṇasamathā ca sabbapakārato bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāti.
tika-vin04t:2703: Nissāya sā ayaṃ niṭṭhaṃ, gatā ādāya sabbaso;
tika-vin04t:2705: Na hettha taṃ padaṃ atthi, yaṃ virujjheyya pāḷiyā;
tika-vin04t:2707: Yasmā tasmā akatvāva, ettha kaṅkhaṃ hitesinā;
tika-vin04t:2709: Yathā ca niṭṭhaṃ sampattā, kaṅkhāvitaraṇī ayaṃ;
tika-vin04t:2713_6: therena katā ayaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇī nāma pātimokkhavaṇṇanā –
